compare: And if all the trees on earth were pens and the ocean (were ink), and seven oceans were to replenish it, Allah's words could not be exhausted. Truly, Allah is Almighty, Wise.

src: Und Allah liebt jene, die Gutes tun.
ref: And Allah loves the good-doers.
draft: And Allah loves those who do good.
hil: And God loves those who do good.
compare: And Allah loves those who do good.

src: Er sagte: "Ja, und dann werdet ihr zu unseren Nächsten gehören."
ref: "Yes," he replied. "You 'will be among the honoured."
draft: He said, "Yes, and then you will be our neighbors."
hil: "He said, 'Yes, and then you will belong to our neighbors.'"
compare: He said, "Yes, and then you will be our neighbors."

src: Und die ihnen keine Unterstützung gewähren, noch sich selbst helfen können?
ref: Who can neither help them, nor help themselves?
draft: And those who cannot provide them with support, nor help themselves?
hil: Those who do not provide them with support, nor can help themselves, are they?
compare: And those who cannot provide them with support, nor help themselves?

src: Oder (gewahrtest du etwa nicht) denjenigen, der an einer Ortschaft vorbeiging, während die Stützen ihrer (Häuser) dem Erdboden gleichgemacht wurden?!
ref: Or take the man who passed by a town which lay destroyed upside down.
draft: Or (did you not perceive, perhaps) the one who passed by a village while its pillars were being destroyed?
hil: Or such as he who passed by a city that was fallen down upon its pillars, he said, How shall God give life to this now it is dead?
compare: Or (did you not perceive, perhaps) the one who passed by a village while its pillars were being destroyed?

src: Dann entfernten sie sich.
ref: Then they turn away.
draft: Then they moved away.
hil: They then moved away.
compare: They then moved away.

src: Aber er blieb nicht lange aus. Er sagte: "Ich habe (an Wissen) erfaßt, was du nicht erfaßt hast.
ref: But he was not long in coming, and reported: "I have been around where you have not been.
draft: But he didn't stay away for long. He said: "I have grasped (in knowledge) what you have not grasped.
hil: But he did not stay away for long. Your food and drink have not rotted, but you have stayed for a hundred years. He said, 'I have grasped (in knowledge) what you have not grasped.'
compare: But he didn't stay away for long. He said: "I have grasped (in knowledge) what you have not grasped.

src: Es wird für sie keine Speise geben außer aus trockenen Dornen,
ref: They will have no food except bitter thorn,
draft: There will be no food for them except from dry thorns.
hil: There will be no food for them except from dry thorns.
compare: There will be no food for them except from dry thorns.

src: Und wenn ihr (es) nicht vermögt, also gewiß, ALLAH ist allvergebend, allgnädig.
ref: If you do not have the means, then surely God is forgiving and kind.
draft: And if you cannot do it, then surely Allah is all-forgiving, all-merciful.
hil: And if you cannot do it, surely Allah is oft-forgiving, most merciful.
compare: And if you cannot do it, then surely Allah is all-forgiving, all-merciful.

src: Aber nein, die meisten von ihnen wissen nicht Bescheid.
ref: Nay, but the most of them have no knowledge.
draft: But no, most of them don't know.
hil: "But no, most of them don't know."
compare: But no, most of them don't know.

src: Und die ihre Scham bewahren,
ref: Who guard their sex
draft: And those who preserve their shame.
hil: And those who guard their private parts,
compare: And those who guard their private parts,

src: Ibrahim!
ref: "O Ibrahim (Abraham)!
draft: Ibrahim!
hil: Ibrahim!
compare: Ibrahim!

src: Gehen sie jedoch weg, so ist es kein Vergehen für euch, wenn sie zu ihrem Besten über sich selbst verfügen.
ref: But if they leave (of their own accord), you will not be blamed for what they do with themselves in their own rights.
draft: However, if they leave, it is not a offense for you, if they dispose of themselves for their own best.
hil: If, however, they go away, it is not a offense for you, if they dispose of themselves for their own best.
compare: If, however, they go away, it is not a offense for you, if they dispose of themselves for their own best.

src: Was hinderte dich daran, nachdem du gesehen hattest, daß sie irregingen,
ref: What stopped you when you saw them going astray;
draft: What prevented you from going after you had seen that they walked irregularly?
hil: What prevented you, after you had seen them going astray?
compare: What prevented you, after you had seen them going astray?

src: Und (erinnere daran), als WIR dir sagten: "Gewiß, dein HERR wird die Menschen zugrunde richten!" Und WIR machten das Traumgesicht, dasWIR dich sehen ließen, nur als Fitna für die Menschen, so auch den verfluchten Baum im Quran.
ref: When We said to you: "Verily your Lord circumscribes mankind," and showed you the vision and the accursed tree of the Qur'an, it was as a bone of contention for men.
draft: And (remember), when WE told you: "Surely, your LORD will cause to perish the people!" And WE presented the vision that WE showed you, only as a trial for the people, as well as the cursed tree in the Quran.
hil: And (remember), when WE told you: "Surely, your LORD will cause to perish men!" And WE made the vision that WE showed thee but a temptation for men, and likewise the accurst tree in the Qur'an.
compare: And (remember), when WE told you: "Surely, your LORD will cause to perish the people!" And WE presented the vision that WE showed you, only as a trial for the people, as well as the cursed tree in the Quran.

src: Also was ist mit denjenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, sie kommen zu dir eilend
ref: What is the matter with unbelievers that they stare at you with fixed gazes and hasten towards you
draft: Also, what about those who have committed Kufr, they come to you hastily.
hil: So what about those who committed Kufr, they come to you hastening.
compare: So what about those who committed Kufr, they come to you hastening.

src: Hast du etwa nicht diejenigen gesehen, denen ein Teil der Schrift gegeben wurde, sie erkaufen sich das Irregehen und wollen, daß auch ihr irregeht?!
ref: Have you not seen the people who were given a share of the Book, but who purchased only error, and wish that you also go astray?
draft: Have you not seen those to whom a portion of the Scripture was given, who buy error, and desire that you too should go astray from the right path?
hil: Have you not seen those who were given a portion of the Scripture, who buy the wrong path and want you to be misguided as well?
compare: Have you not seen those to whom a portion of the Scripture was given, who buy error, and desire that you too should go astray from the right path?

src: Und wenn dann unsere Boten zu ihnen kommen, um sie abzuberufen, sagen sie: «Wo sind diejenigen, die ihr anstelle Gottes anzurufen pflegtet?»
ref: Until, when Our envoys come to them, to take their souls away, they will say, “Where are they whom you used to pray to besides God?”
draft: And when our messengers come to them to take them away, they say, "Where are those whom you used to worship instead of Allah?"
hil: "And when Our messengers come to take them, they (angels) will say, 'Where are those whom you used to call upon instead of Allah?' They will say, 'They have left us,' and they will bear witness against themselves that they were disbelievers."
compare: And when our messengers come to them to take them away, they say, "Where are those whom you used to worship instead of Allah?"

src: Bist du denn gegen meinen Befehl ungehorsam gewesen?»
ref: Did you not disobey my command?" (And Moses pulled him by the hair).
draft: Are you disobedient against my order?
hil: Have you been disobedient to my command?
compare: Have you been disobedient to my command?

src: Es läßt nichts aus, ob klein oder groß, sondern hält alles aufgezeichnet."
ref: They will find in it whatsoever they had done.
draft: "It doesn't leave anything out, whether small or large, but keeps everything recorded."
hil: It does not omit anything, small or large, but records everything.
compare: "It doesn't leave anything out, whether small or large, but keeps everything recorded."

src: Sie sagten: "Wenn er stiehlt, so stahl bereits sein Bruder vor ihm." Yusuf behielt es jedoch bei sich und offenbarte es ihnen nicht, er sagte (bei sich): "Ihr seid sicherlich niedriger in der Stellung.
ref: They [(Yusuf's (Joseph) brothers] said: "If he steals, there was a brother of his [Yusuf (Joseph)] who did steal before (him)." But these things did Yusuf (Joseph) keep in himself, revealing not the secrets to them.
draft: They said: "If he steals, his brother has already stolen before him." Yusuf, however, kept it to himself and did not reveal it to them, he said (to himself): "You certainly have a lower position."
hil: They said, 'If he steals, his brother has already stolen before him.' Joseph, however, kept his reaction to himself, without disclosing the truth to them. He merely said to himself: 'You are an evil lot.'
compare: They said: "If he steals, his brother has already stolen before him." Yusuf, however, kept it to himself and did not reveal it to them, he said (to himself): "You certainly have a lower position."

src: Hat nicht Derjenige, Der die Himmel und die Erde erschaffen hat, (auch) die Macht, ihresgleichen zu erschaffen? Ja doch! Und Er ist der Allerschaffer und Allwissende.
ref: "Is not He Who created the heavens and the earth able to create the like thereof?" - Yea, indeed! for He is the Creator Supreme, of skill and knowledge (infinite)!
draft: Does not He who created the heavens and the earth have the power to create the like of them? Yes, indeed! And He is the All-Creator and All-Knower.
hil: Do they not see that He who created the heavens and the earth is capable of creating the like of them? Yes, indeed! And He is the All-Creator and All-Knower.
compare: Do they not see that He who created the heavens and the earth is capable of creating the like of them? Yes, indeed! And He is the All-Creator and All-Knower.

src: Sie sagen: «Unser Herr, unser Unglück hat uns besiegt, und wir waren abgeirrte Leute.
ref: They will say: "O Lord, our misery overwhelmed us, so we remained a people astray.
draft: They say, "Our Lord, our misfortune has defeated us and we were misguided people."
hil: They say, 'Our Lord, our misfortune has overcome us, and we were misguided people.'
compare: They say, 'Our Lord, our misfortune has overcome us, and we were misguided people.'

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Greift ALLAH und Seinem Gesandten nicht vor, und handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber!
ref: O YOU WHO believe, do not forestall the judgements of God and His Apostle, and have fear of God.
draft: You, who have internalized the imam! Don't prioritize ALLAH and His messenger, and act according to Taqwa towards ALLAH!
hil: You who have internalized Iman! Do not proceed ahead of Allah and His Noble Messenger and fear Allah in your conduct towards Him. Surely, Allah is All-Hearing, All-Knowing.
compare: You who have internalized Iman! Do not proceed ahead of Allah and His Noble Messenger and fear Allah in your conduct towards Him. Surely, Allah is All-Hearing, All-Knowing.

src: Darum wende dich von ihnen ab und sprich: "Frieden!" Und bald werden sie es wissen.
ref: Therefore excuse them and proclaim, “Peace”; for they will soon come to know.
draft: Therefore turn yourself away from them and say: "Peace!" And soon they will know it.
hil: Therefore turn away from them and say: "Peace!" And soon they will know it.
compare: Therefore turn yourself away from them and say: "Peace!" And soon they will know it.

src: ER sagte: "Fürchtet euch beide nicht! Gewiß, ICH bin mit euch beiden, ICH höre und sehe.
ref: He said, “Do not fear – I am with you, All Hearing and All Seeing.”
draft: He said, "Do not be afraid, surely I am with both of you, I hear and see."
hil: "He said, 'Fear not, I am indeed with you, I hear and see.'"
compare: He said, "Do not be afraid, surely I am with both of you, I hear and see."

src: Sag: "Soll ich euch in Kenntnis setzen über schlimmere Vergeltung als für dies, (was ihr uns verübelt), bei ALLAH?: Es ist (die Vergeltung für) denjenigen, wen ALLAH verflucht, über den ER zürnt und aus denen ER Affen, Schweine und Taghut-Anbeter machte." Diese haben die niedrigere Stellung und sind vom rechten Weg noch mehr verirrt.
ref: Say, “Shall I tell you of those who are in a worse position than this, in Allah’s sight? It is those whom Allah has cursed and has wreaked His wrath upon and turned some of them into apes and swine, and worshippers of the devil; theirs is a worse destination and they have wandered further astray from the Straight Path.”
draft: Say, "Should I inform you of a worse retribution than this, (what you blame us for), from Allah? It is (the retribution for) those whom Allah has cursed, upon whom He has brought His wrath and made them (as) apes and swine and the worshippers of Taghut." Those are in even worse position and further astray from the sound path.
hil: Say, "Shall I tell you about a punishment that is even worse than this, (what you accuse us of), from Allah? It is (the punishment for) those whom Allah has cursed, upon whom He has brought His wrath and made them (as) apes and pigs and the worshippers of Taghut." They are in an even lower position and are even more astray from the right path.
compare: Say, "Should I inform you of a worse retribution than this, (what you blame us for), from Allah? It is (the retribution for) those whom Allah has cursed, upon whom He has brought His wrath and made them (as) apes and swine and the worshippers of Taghut." Those are in even worse position and further astray from the sound path.

src: Nun belohnt sie Gott für das, was sie gesagt haben mit Gärten, unter denen Bäche fließen; darin werden sie ewig weilen.
ref: God will reward them for saying so with gardens where streams flow by, where they will live for ever.
draft: Now God rewards them for what they have said with gardens beneath which rivers flow; they will abide therein forever.
hil: Now Allah will reward them for what they have said with gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever. That is the promise of Allah, truthfully, and who is more truthful than Allah in statement.
compare: Now God rewards them for what they have said with gardens beneath which rivers flow; they will abide therein forever.

src: Und das Jenseits ist wahrlich besser für dich als das Diesseits.
ref: What is to come is better for you than what has gone before;
draft: And the afterlife is truly better for you than this life.
hil: Truly, the afterlife is better for you than this life.
compare: And the afterlife is truly better for you than this life.

src: Sei nun geduldig. Das Versprechen Gottes ist wahr.
ref: So have thou patience; verily the promise of Allah is true.
draft: Be patient now. God's promise is true.
hil: Be patient now. The promise of God is surely true; and let not those who do not believe make you relax your endeavours.
compare: Be patient now. God's promise is true.

src: Dann wird Er euch eure Sünden vergeben und euch eingehen lassen in Gärten, unter denen Bäche fließen, und in angenehme Wohnungen in den Gärten von Eden.
ref: He will forgive you your sins and admit you to gardens with rivers flowing by, and excellent mansions in the garden of Eden.
draft: Then He will forgive you your sins and admit you to gardens through which rivers flow, and to beautiful mansions in the gardens of Eden.
hil: Then He will forgive you your sins and admit you to gardens through which rivers flow, and to pleasant abodes in the gardens of Eden.
compare: Then He will forgive you your sins and admit you to gardens through which rivers flow, and to pleasant abodes in the gardens of Eden.

src: Da zogen sie beide weiter, bis, als sie dann einen Jungen trafen, er ihn tötete.
ref: The two went on till they came to a boy, whom he killed.
draft: Then they both continued until they met a boy and he killed him.
hil: Then they both continued until, when he encountered a boy, he killed him.
compare: Then they both continued until, when he encountered a boy, he killed him.

src: Und sooft eine Sura herabgesandt wird, schauen sie einander an (und sagen): "Sieht euch jemand?" Dann wenden sie sich ab. Allah hat ihre Herzen abgewendet, weil sie Leute sind, die es nicht begreifen.
ref: And whenever a chapter is sent down, one of them looks at the other; “Is there someone watching you?” – and then they turn away; Allah has inverted their hearts because they are a people who do not understand.
draft: And whenever a surah is revealed they look at each other, [saying], "Does anyone see you?" and then they dismiss themselves. Allah has turned their hearts away because they are a people who do not understand.
hil: Whenever a Surah is revealed they look at each other, [saying], "Does anyone see you?" and then they turn away. Allah has turned their hearts away because they are a people who do not understand.
compare: Whenever a Surah is revealed they look at each other, [saying], "Does anyone see you?" and then they turn away. Allah has turned their hearts away because they are a people who do not understand.

src: Ob Wir dich einen Teil dessen, was Wir ihnen androhen, sehen lassen oder dich abberufen, zu Uns wird ihre Rückkehr sein. Dann ist Gott Zeuge über das, was sie tun.
ref: Whether We show you some of the promise (of punishment in wait) for them, or take you to Ourself, their returning is to Us in the end; and God is a witness to all they do.
draft: Whether We show you part of what We threaten them with or recall you, their return is to Us. Then God is witness over what they do.
hil: Whether We show you a part of what We threaten them with or recall you, their return is to Us. Then God is a witness over what they do.
compare: Whether We show you part of what We threaten them with or recall you, their return is to Us. Then God is witness over what they do.

src: Und er beerbt sie, wenn sie kein Kind hat.
ref: And he inherits from her if she leaves no children.
draft: And he inherits from her, if she has no child.
hil: And he inherits from her if she has no children.
compare: And he inherits from her if she has no children.

src: Denken sie nicht über den Quran nach?!
ref: Do they not ponder on what the Qur'an says?
draft: Do you not reflect on the Quran?!
hil: Do they not ponder on what the Quran says? Or have their hearts been sealed with locks?
compare: Do you not reflect on the Quran?!

src: Und wenn sie das Sinnlose hören, wenden sie sich davon ab und sagen: "Uns gehören unsere Handlungen und euch gehören eure Handlungen, Salam sei mit euch!
ref: When they hear idle talk they turn aside and say: "To us our actions, to you yours.
draft: And when they hear the senseless, they turn away from it and say, "We have our own deeds and you have your own deeds, Salam be with you!"
hil: And those who hear the senseless turn away from it and say, 'Our deeds are for us, and your deeds are for you. Peace be upon you!'}
compare: And when they hear the senseless, they turn away from it and say, "We have our own deeds and you have your own deeds, Salam be with you!"

src: Dennoch wollen sie dir mit denjenigen, die es außer Ihm geben soll, Furcht einflößen. Und wen Allah in die Irre gehen läßt, der hat niemanden, der ihn rechtleitet.
ref: They frighten you with others apart from Him, although he whom Allah lets go astray, none can guide him to the Right Way.
draft: Nevertheless, they want to instill fear in you about those who are supposed to exist besides Him. And whoever Allah lets go astray will have no one to guide him.
hil: Yet they try to instill fear in you with those other than Him. And whoever Allah leads astray will have no one to guide him.
compare: Nevertheless, they want to instill fear in you about those who are supposed to exist besides Him. And whoever Allah lets go astray will have no one to guide him.

src: Auch die Sterne sind durch seinen Befehl dienstbar gemacht worden.
ref: The stars are subjected by His Command.
draft: Also the stars have been made serviceable by his command.
hil: Even the stars have been made serviceable by His command.
compare: Even the stars have been made serviceable by His command.

src: ICH werde euch Meine Ayat zeigen, so fordert keine Eile von Mir.
ref: We will show you Our signs, then you will not desire to hasten (the punishment).
draft: I will show you My verses, so do not demand haste from Me.
hil: I will show you My verses, so do not demand haste from Me.
compare: I will show you My verses, so do not demand haste from Me.

src: Und zu Ihm werdet ihr zurückgebracht.
ref: And to Him will you be brought back in the end.
draft: And to Him you will be returned.
hil: And unto Him you shall be returned.
compare: And to Him you will be returned.

src: Sag: "Es wird mir nur alsWahy zuteil, daß euer Gott nur ein einziger Gott ist.
ref: Say: "This is what has been revealed to me: 'Your God is one and only God.'
draft: Say: "It is only bestowed upon me as a revelation that your God is only one God."
hil: Say: 'Indeed, I am only a mortal. It is revealed to me that there is only one God for you.'
compare: Say: "It is only bestowed upon me as a revelation that your God is only one God."

src: ER sagte: "Adam! Teile ihnen deren Namen mit!" Und nachdem er ihnen deren Namen mitgeteilt hatte, sagte ER: "Sagte ICH euch etwa nicht, daß ICH das Verborgene der Himmel und der Erde kenne, und daß ICH das kenne, was ihr offenlegt und was ihr zu verheimlichen pflegtet?!"
ref: He said, ‘O Adam, inform them of their names,’ and when he had informed them of their names, He said, ‘Did I not tell you that I know the Unseen of the heavens and the earth, and that I know whatever you disclose and whatever you conceal?’
draft: He said, "Adam! Tell them their names!" And after he had told them their names, He said, "Did I not tell you that I know the secrets of the heavens and the earth, and that I know what you reveal and what you conceal?!"
hil: He said, "Adam! Tell them their names!" And after he had told them their names, He said, "Did I not tell you that I know the secrets of the heavens and the earth, and that I know what you reveal and what you conceal?!"
compare: He said, "Adam! Tell them their names!" And after he had told them their names, He said, "Did I not tell you that I know the secrets of the heavens and the earth, and that I know what you reveal and what you conceal?!"

src: Und wenn ihr eure Riten beendet habt, dann gedenket Gottes, wie ihr eurer Väter (früher) gedacht habt oder mit noch innigerem Gedenken. Unter den Menschen gibt es welche, die sagen: «Unser Herr, beschenke uns im Diesseits.»
ref: So when you have completed your Hajj rites, remember Allah as you used to remember your forefathers, in fact more than that; and among the people are some that say, “Our Lord!
draft: And when you have finished your rites, then remember God as you remembered your fathers (earlier) or with even deeper remembrance. Among people there are those who say: "Our Lord, give us gifts in this world."
hil: And when you have finished your rites, then remember God as you remembered your fathers (earlier) or with even deeper remembrance. Among people there are those who say: "Our Lord, give us gifts in this world."
compare: And when you have finished your rites, then remember God as you remembered your fathers (earlier) or with even deeper remembrance. Among people there are those who say: "Our Lord, give us gifts in this world."

src: So vergelten Wir den Übeltätern.
ref: That is how We requite the transgressors:
draft: So we repay the wrongdoers.
hil: So We repay the evildoers.
compare: So we repay the wrongdoers.

src: Darum fürchtet Allah, ihr Verständigen, auf daß ihr erfolgreich sein möget.
ref: So fear God, O men of wisdom; you may haply find success.
draft: Therefore, fear Allah, you who are sensible, so that you may be successful.
hil: Therefore, fear Allah, you who are wise, so that you may be successful.
compare: Therefore, fear Allah, you who are wise, so that you may be successful.

src: Friede sei auf euch!
ref: Peace be to you.
draft: Peace be upon you!
hil: Peace be upon you!
compare: Peace be upon you!

src: Sag: Allah hat die Wahrheit gesprochen. So folgt dem Glaubensbekenntnis Ibrahims, (als) Anhänger des rechten Glaubens, und er gehörte nicht zu den Götzendienern.
ref: Say (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “Allah is truthful; so follow the religion of Ibrahim, who was free from all falsehood; and he was not of the polytheists.”
draft: Say: Allah has spoken the truth. So follow the creed of Ibrahim, (as) a follower of the right faith, and he was not one of the idolaters.
hil: Say: Allah has spoken the truth. So follow the creed of Ibrahim, (as) a follower of the right faith, and he was not one of the idolaters.
compare: Say: Allah has spoken the truth. So follow the creed of Ibrahim, (as) a follower of the right faith, and he was not one of the idolaters.

src: Sag: "Ihr Menschen! Bereits kam die Wahrheit zu euch von eurem HERRN. Wer also der Rechtleitung folgt, der folgt der Rechtleitung nur für seinen eigenen Nutzen. Wer jedoch irregeht, der geht nur irre zu seinem eigenen Schaden. Und ich bin kein Wakil über euch."
ref: Say: "O men, the truth has come to you from your Lord, so he who follows the right path does so for himself, and he who goes astray errs against himself, and I am not a guardian over you.
draft: Say: "O mankind! The truth has come to you from your Lord. So whoever is guided, is only guided for the benefit of his own self, and whoever goes astray, it is only to his own loss. And I am not a custodian over you."
hil: Now truth has come to you from your Lord. Whoever follows (i.e. the Quran and Prophet Muhammad SAW), follows guidance is only to his own benefit. Whoever goes astray, it is only to his own loss. And I am not a custodian over you.
compare: Say: "O mankind! The truth has come to you from your Lord. So whoever is guided, is only guided for the benefit of his own self, and whoever goes astray, it is only to his own loss. And I am not a custodian over you."

src: Hierauf rufe sie. Sie werden eilends zu dir kommen.
ref: Then [after slaughtering them] put on each hill a portion of them; then call them - they will come [flying] to you in haste.
draft: Then she calls out. They will come to you in a hurry.
hil: Then, they will swiftly come to you.
compare: Then she calls out. They will come to you in a hurry.

src: Haben denn die Gläubigen nicht den Versuch (, daran zu zweifeln,) aufgegeben, daß, wenn Allah gewollt hätte, Er sicher der ganzen Menschheit hätte den Weg weisen können?
ref: Have the believers not learnt that if God had so willed He could have guided all mankind?
draft: Have believers not given up trying to doubt that if Allah had wanted to, He could have shown the whole of humanity the way?
hil: Have not the believers given up trying to doubt that if Allah had willed, He could certainly have shown the way to all of humanity?
compare: Have not the believers given up trying to doubt that if Allah had willed, He could certainly have shown the way to all of humanity?

src: Und (damit) Er die Heuchler und Heuchlerinnen und die Götzendiener und Götzendienerinnen strafe, die von Allah die böse Erwartung hegen.
ref: And that He may chastise the hypocritical men and the hypocritical women and the associaters and the associatresses, the thinkers of evil thought concerning Allah.
draft: And so that he punishes the hypocrites, both men and women, and the idolaters, both men and women, who have an evil opinion of Allah.
hil: And so that he punishes the hypocrites, both men and women, and the idolaters, both men and women, who have an evil opinion of Allah.
compare: And so that he punishes the hypocrites, both men and women, and the idolaters, both men and women, who have an evil opinion of Allah.

src: Dann rief er in den Finsternissen: "Es gibt keinen Gott außer Dir!
ref: Glory be to Thee!
draft: Then he cried out in the darkness: "There is no god but You!
hil: Then he called out in the darkness, 'There is no god except You!'
compare: Then he cried out in the darkness: "There is no god but You!

src: Ihr haltet sie (beide Zeugen) nach dem rituellen Gebet auf, dann schwören sie bei ALLAH - falls ihr Zweifel hegen solltet -: "Wir erkaufen uns damit nichts Geringfügiges, selbst dann nicht, wenn derjenige, (für den wir Zeugnis ablegen), ein Verwandter ist, und wir verbergen nicht das von ALLAH gebotene Zeugnis, sonst gehören wir doch zu den Verfehlenden."
ref: Detain them after the service of prayer, and if you doubt their word make them swear by God that: "We shall not take a bribe even though it be offered by a near relative, nor hide the testimony of God, for then we shall surely be sinful."
draft: You hold them (both witnesses) after the ritual prayer, then they swear by ALLAH - in case you should have doubts -: "We do not purchase with it anything insignificant, even if the person we testify for is a relative, and we will not hide the testimony that is required by ALLAH, otherwise we will belong to the sinners."
hil: You hold them (both witnesses) after the ritual prayer, then they swear by ALLAH - in case you should have doubts -: "We do not purchase with it anything insignificant, even if the person we testify for is a relative, and we will not hide the testimony that is required by ALLAH, otherwise we will belong to the sinners."
compare: You hold them (both witnesses) after the ritual prayer, then they swear by ALLAH - in case you should have doubts -: "We do not purchase with it anything insignificant, even if the person we testify for is a relative, and we will not hide the testimony that is required by ALLAH, otherwise we will belong to the sinners."

src: Dann sagten sie: "Etwa einem einzigen Menschen von uns folgen wir?
ref: And said: "Should we follow only one man among us?
draft: Then they said, "Do we follow just one person among us?"
hil: "Then they said, 'Do we follow just one person among us?'"
compare: Then they said, "Do we follow just one person among us?"

src: Und gedenke deines HERRN viel und lobpreise Ihn zu Sonnenuntergang und zu Sonnenaufgang!"
ref: And mention thy Lord oft, and give glory at evening and dawn.'
draft: "And remember your LORD much and exalt Him with praise in the morning and at the setting of the sun!"
hil: And remember your LORD frequently and glorify Him at sunset and at dawn!
compare: "And remember your LORD much and exalt Him with praise in the morning and at the setting of the sun!"

src: Wenn ihn Gutes trifft, so ist er damit zufrieden; trifft ihn aber eine Prüfung, dann kehrt er zu seinem (früheren) Weg zurück.
ref: When something good comes his way, he is content with it. But when an ordeal strikes him, he makes a turnaround.
draft: If something good happens to him, he is satisfied with it; but if he experiences a trial, he returns to his (former) path.
hil: If something good happens to him, he is satisfied with it; but if he experiences a trial, he returns to his (former) path.
compare: If something good happens to him, he is satisfied with it; but if he experiences a trial, he returns to his (former) path.

src: Dann ängstigte sich insgeheim, Musa.
ref: And Moses felt afraid within himself.
draft: Then Musa secretly became afraid.
hil: Then Musa secretly became afraid.
compare: Then Musa secretly became afraid.

src: Hast Du nicht gesehen, daß Allah Wasser vom Himmel niedersendet und es als Quellen in die Erde dringen läßt und dadurch Gewächs hervorbringt, das mannigfaltig an Farben ist?
ref: Beholdest thou not that Allah sendeth down water from the heaven, and causeth it to enter springs in the earth, and thereafter produceth thereby corn various coloured.
draft: Did you not see that Allah sends down water from the sky and lets it penetrate into the earth as springs, thereby producing vegetation that is diverse in color?
hil: Have you not seen that Allah sent down water from the sky and with it made springs in the earth, and then with it produces crops of various colors? Then it dries up and you see it become yellow, and He then fragments it into small pieces. Indeed, in this, there is a reminder for people of intellect.
compare: Did you not see that Allah sends down water from the sky and lets it penetrate into the earth as springs, thereby producing vegetation that is diverse in color?

src: Laß uns herausbringen, damit wir gottgefällig Gutes tun, anderes als das, das wir zu tun pflegten." Haben WIR euch etwa nicht ein langes Lebensalter gewährt, während dessen derjenige sich erinnern konnte, der sich erinnern wollte?!
ref: Extricate us, so that we may do good deeds, the opposite of what we used to do”; (It will be said to them) “And did We not give you an age long enough, in which anyone who wants to understand would have understood?
draft: Let us find out, so that we may do good that is pleasing to God, other than what we used to do. Have WE not granted you a long life during which anyone who wished could take heed and be mindful?!
hil: Let us bring forth so that we may do good that is pleasing to God, other than what we used to do. Haven't We granted you a long lifespan during which anyone who wished to remember could do so?
compare: Let us bring forth so that we may do good that is pleasing to God, other than what we used to do. Haven't We granted you a long lifespan during which anyone who wished to remember could do so?

src: O die ihr glaubt, wer von euch sich von seiner Religion abkehrt -, so wird Allah Leute bringen, die Er liebt und die Ihn lieben, bescheiden gegenüber den Gläubigen, mächtig (auftretend) gegenüber den Ungläubigen, und die sich auf Allahs Weg abmühen und nicht den Tadel des Tadlers fürchten. Das ist Allahs Huld, die Er gewährt, wem Er will. Allah ist Allumfassend und Allwissend.
ref: O you who believe! whoever from among you turns back from his religion, then Allah will bring a people, He shall love them and they shall love Him, lowly before the believers, mighty against the unbelievers, they shall strive hard in Allah's way and shall not fear the censure of any censurer; this is Allah's Face, He gives it to whom He pleases, and Allah is Ample-giving, Knowing.
draft: O you who believe, whoever of you turns away from his religion, Allah will bring a people whom He loves and who love Him, humble toward the believers, powerful against the disbelievers; they strive in the cause of Allah and do not fear the blame of a critic. That is the favor of Allah; He bestows it upon whom He wills. And Allah is all-Encompassing and Knowing.
hil: O you who have believed, whoever among you turns away from his religion Allah will bring forth [in place of them] a people He will love and who will love Him [who are] humble toward the believers, powerful against the disbelievers; they strive in the cause of Allah and do not fear the blame of a critic. That is the favour of Allah; He bestows it upon whom He wills. And Allah is all-Encompassing and Knowing.
compare: O you who believe, whoever of you turns away from his religion, Allah will bring a people whom He loves and who love Him, humble toward the believers, powerful against the disbelievers; they strive in the cause of Allah and do not fear the blame of a critic. That is the favor of Allah; He bestows it upon whom He wills. And Allah is all-Encompassing and Knowing.

src: Und wenn Wellen wie überschattende Hüllen sie überdecken, rufen sie zu Gott, wobei sie Ihm gegenüber aufrichtig in der Religion sind. Wenn Er sie ans Land errettet, zeigen nur einige von ihnen einen maßvollen Wandel.
ref: And when the waves cover them like shadows they call upon God, making their religion sincerely His; but when He has delivered them to the land, some of them are lukewarm.
draft: And when waves cover them like overshadowing veils, they call upon God while being sincerely religious towards Him. When He saves them to the land, only some of them show a moderate behavior.
hil: And when waves cover them like overshadowing veils, they call upon God while being sincerely religious towards Him. When He saves them to the land, only a few of them show a moderate behavior.
compare: And when waves cover them like overshadowing veils, they call upon God while being sincerely religious towards Him. When He saves them to the land, only some of them show a moderate behavior.

src: Wäre dies ein demnächst verfügbarer Profit mit einer Reise von mittlerer Entfernung gewesen, wären sie dir gewiß gefolgt.
ref: Were it a gain at hand or a short journey, they would have surely followed you, but the distance seemed too far to them.
draft: If this had been an upcoming profit with a trip of medium distance, they would certainly have followed you.
hil: "If this had been an upcoming profit with a medium-distance trip, they would certainly have followed you."
compare: "If this had been an upcoming profit with a medium-distance trip, they would certainly have followed you."

src: Von Zaqqum-Bäumen essen
ref: Will eat of the tree of Zaqqum,
draft: Eating from the Zaqqum trees.
hil: Eating from the Zaqqum trees.
compare: Eating from the Zaqqum trees.

src: Allah aber ist der Schutzherr der Gottesfürchtigen.
ref: And Allah is the Friend of the God-fearing.
draft: Allah, however, is the protector of the God-fearing.
hil: But Allah is the protector of the God-fearing.
compare: But Allah is the protector of the God-fearing.

src: Folge dem, was dir an Wahy von deinem HERRN zuteil wurde.
ref: Follow what was revealed to you from your Lord.
draft: Follow what has been revealed to you by your Lord's Wahy.
hil: Follow what has been revealed to you by your Lord's Wahy.
compare: Follow what has been revealed to you by your Lord's Wahy.

src: (Ist es) etwa einer, der im Glanz aufgezogen wird und nicht beredt im Wortstreit ist?
ref: Can one who has been raised on ornaments and cannot present her case coolly in a dispute (be associated with God?)
draft: Perhaps one who is raised in splendor and is not eloquent in argument?
hil: Is it one who is raised in splendor and is not eloquent in argument, or one who walks upright on a straight path?
compare: Perhaps one who is raised in splendor and is not eloquent in argument?

src: Keiner außer Allah kann sie abwenden.
ref: There is no one to unveil it apart from God.
draft: No one but Allah can avert them.
hil: No one can turn them away except Allah.
compare: No one can turn them away except Allah.

src: Wenn sie sich abkehren, so befinden sie sich in Widerstreit.
ref: But if they turn away, then they are in schism.
draft: If they turn away, they find themselves in conflict.
hil: But if they turn away, they are in schism and Allah will suffice thee for defence against them.
compare: If they turn away, they find themselves in conflict.

src: Er ist es, Der euch erschaffen hat.
ref: It is He who created you.
draft: He is the one who created you.
hil: He it is who has created you.
compare: He it is who has created you.

src: Und wisset, daß Allah dessen gewahr ist, was in euren Seelen ist.
ref: Know that God knows what is in your hearts.
draft: And know that Allah is aware of what is in your souls.
hil: And be aware that Allah is aware of what is in your souls.
compare: And know that Allah is aware of what is in your souls.

src: Das Feuer darin ist mit Brennstoff,
ref: Full of fire fed by faggots,
draft: The fire inside it is fueled.
hil: The fire therein is fueled.
compare: The fire therein is fueled.

src: Doch wenn sie sich abkehren, so liebt Allah die Ungläubigen nicht.
ref: But if they turn their backs, God loves not the unbelievers.
draft: But if they turn away, Allah does not love the unbelievers.
hil: But if they turn away, then Allah does not love the unbelievers.
compare: But if they turn away, then Allah does not love the unbelievers.

src: Sag (in Meinem Namen): "Meine Diener, die den Iman verinnerlicht haben, handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber!"
ref: Tell them: "O my creatures who have come to belief, have fear of displeasing your Lord.
draft: Say (in my name): "My servants who have internalized faith, act with Taqwa towards Allah!"
hil: Say (in my name): "O people who have firmly established the commands of Allah, giving testimony with justice – and do not let the enmity of anyone tempt you not to do justice; be just, as this is nearer to piety – and fear Allah; indeed Allah is well aware of your deeds."
compare: Say (in my name): "My servants who have internalized faith, act with Taqwa towards Allah!"

src: Doch die, denen Kenntnis und Glauben verliehen wurden, sagen: "lhr habt wahrlich gemäß dem Buche Allahs bis zum Tage der Auferstehung (im Grabe) geweilt.
ref: But those endowed with knowledge and faith will say, “You remained in God’s Book until the Day of Resurrection.
draft: But those to whom knowledge and faith have been granted say: "Truly, ye have dwelt until the Day of Resurrection according to the Book of Allah, the term of which is the Day of Resurrection.
hil: But those to whom knowledge and faith have been granted say, "Truly, you have truly dwelt according to the book of Allah until the Day of Resurrection (in the grave)."
compare: But those to whom knowledge and faith have been granted say: "Truly, ye have dwelt until the Day of Resurrection according to the Book of Allah, the term of which is the Day of Resurrection.

src: Was dich an Gutem traf, dies ist von ALLAH. Und was dich an Unglück traf, dies ist aufgrund eigener (Verfehlungen). Und wir entsandten dich für die Menschen als Gesandten. Und ALLAH genügt als Bezeugender.
ref: Whatever good reaches you, O listeners, is from Allah, and whatever ill reaches you is from yourselves; and We have sent you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) as a Noble Messenger towards all mankind; and Allah is Sufficient, as a Witness.
draft: What hit you of good, it is from Allah. And what hit you of misfortune, it is because of your own doings. And We sent you to mankind as a messenger. And Allah is sufficient as Witness.
hil: What hit you of good is from Allah, and what hit you of misfortune is due to your own actions. And We sent you as a messenger to mankind, and Allah suffices as a witness.
compare: What hit you of good, it is from Allah. And what hit you of misfortune, it is because of your own doings. And We sent you to mankind as a messenger. And Allah is sufficient as Witness.

src: Greift ALLAH und Seinem Gesandten nicht vor, und handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber!
ref: Do not put (yourselves) forward before Allah and His Messenger (SAW), and fear Allah.
draft: Do not precede Allah and His Messenger, and act according to Taqwa towards Allah!
hil: Do not advance ahead of Allah and His Messenger, and act with Taqwa towards Allah. Indeed, Allah is All-Hearing, All-Knowing.
compare: Do not precede Allah and His Messenger, and act according to Taqwa towards Allah!

src: Doch Allah gehört die Macht, und auch Seinem Gesandten und den Gläubigen.
ref: In truth, all honour belongs to Allah, and to His Messenger, and to the believers.
draft: But Allah has the power, and also His messenger and the believers.
hil: But the power belongs to Allah, and also to His messenger and the believers.
compare: But the power belongs to Allah, and also to His messenger and the believers.

src: Laßt sie auf Allahs Erde weiden und fügt ihr nichts Böses zu, sonst überkommt euch eine baldige Strafe."
ref: So leave her alone to graze on God's earth, and do not molest her, otherwise the swiftest punishment would befall you."
draft: "Let them graze on Allah's earth and do not harm them, otherwise a swift punishment will come upon you."
hil: Let them graze on Allah's land and do not inflict any harm on them, otherwise a swift punishment will come upon you.
compare: "Let them graze on Allah's earth and do not harm them, otherwise a swift punishment will come upon you."

src: Sind es aber zwei (Schwestern), dann erhalten sie zwei Drittel von seiner Erbschaft.
ref: In ease he has two sisters then they will get two-thirds of the heritage.
draft: But if they are two (sisters), then they will receive two thirds of his inheritance.
hil: But if they are two sisters, then they will receive two thirds of his inheritance.
compare: But if they are two (sisters), then they will receive two thirds of his inheritance.

src: Vergib uns unsere Verfehlungen und unsere Übertretungen in unseren Angelegenheiten, mache uns standhaft und stehe uns bei gegen die kufr-betreibenden Leute!"
ref: Forgive us our sins and the excesses committed during our efforts, and keep our feet steady, and bestow us help over the disbelievers.”
draft: Forgive us our misconducts and our transgressions in our affairs, make us steadfast and support us against the kufr-practicing people!
hil: Forgive us our faults and our excesses in our affairs, make us steadfast and support us against the disbelieving people!
compare: Forgive us our faults and our excesses in our affairs, make us steadfast and support us against the disbelieving people!

src: Sag: Wenn Allah wollte, würde ich ihn euch nicht verlesen, und Er würde euch nicht davon Kenntnis geben. Ich habe doch vordem ein Leben lang unter euch verweilt.
ref: Say, ‘Had Allah [so] wished, I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have made it known to you, for I have dwelled among you for a lifetime before it.
draft: Say: If Allah had willed, I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have made it known to you, for I had dwelt among you a lifetime before that.
hil: Say, if Allah had willed, I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have made it known to you, as I have dwelt among you for a lifetime before this.
compare: Say: If Allah had willed, I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have made it known to you, for I had dwelt among you a lifetime before that.

src: Und gehe auf der Erde nicht freudenerregt! Gewiß, ALLAH liebt keinen stolzen Eingebildeten.
ref: Do not walk around puffed-up with pride; God does not love arrogant and boastful people.
draft: And do not walk on the earth exultantly! Indeed, Allah does not love any self-deluded, boastful person.
hil: And do not walk on the earth exultantly! Indeed, Allah does not love any self-deluded, boastful person.
compare: And do not walk on the earth exultantly! Indeed, Allah does not love any self-deluded, boastful person.

src: Daß ihr (sogar) die Gräber besucht.
ref: Till you reach the grave.
draft: That you (even) visit the graves.
hil: That you (even) visit the graves.
compare: That you (even) visit the graves.

src: ALLAH leitet nicht diejenigen Menschen recht, die Unrecht begehen.
ref: And Allah guides not those people who are the Zalimun (polytheists and wrong-doers).
draft: ALLAH does not guide those people who commit wrongdoing.
hil: ALLAH does not guide the people who commit wrongdoing on the right path; and all praise is due to Allah, Lord of the creation!
compare: ALLAH does not guide those people who commit wrongdoing.

src: Er sagte: "Bringt ihr mir die frohe Kunde ungeachtet dessen, daß ich vom Alter getroffen bin?
ref: "You bring me the good news now," he said, "when old age has come upon me.
draft: He said, "Will you bring me the glad news despite the fact that I have been hit by old age?"
hil: He said, 'Will you bring me the good news despite the fact that I have been struck by old age?'
compare: He said, 'Will you bring me the good news despite the fact that I have been struck by old age?'

src: Und warne die Menschen vor dem Tag, an dem die Strafe über sie kommen wird.
ref: Warn the people of that Day when the punishment would be inflicted upon them.
draft: And warn the people of the day when the punishment will come upon them.
hil: And warn mankind of the day when the chastisement will come upon them. Then those who did evil will say, 'Our Lord, defer us to a near term, and we will answer Thy call, and follow the Messengers.'
compare: And warn mankind of the day when the chastisement will come upon them. Then those who did evil will say, 'Our Lord, defer us to a near term, and we will answer Thy call, and follow the Messengers.'

src: Tauscht er dann aber nach der bösen Tat etwas Gutes ein, dann bin Ich voller Vergebung und barmherzig.
ref: But if he substitutes good in place of evil, I am Most Forgiving, Most Compassionate.
draft: "If he then exchanges something good for the evil deed, then I am full of forgiveness and mercy."
hil: "But if he replaces something good for the evil deed, then I am full of forgiveness and mercy."
compare: "If he then exchanges something good for the evil deed, then I am full of forgiveness and mercy."

src: ER sagte: "Gewiß, ICH weiß, was ihr nicht wißt."
ref: And God said: "I know what you do not know."
draft: He said, "Certainly, I know what you do not know."
hil: He said, 'Certainly, I know what you do not know.'
compare: He said, "Certainly, I know what you do not know."

src: Aber Allah läßt im richtigen Maß herabkommen, was Er will.
ref: So He gives according to measure as He will.
draft: But Allah sends down, as He wills, [some] in due measure.
hil: But Allah sends down in due measure what He wills.
compare: But Allah sends down in due measure what He wills.

src: O Yusuf, wende dich ab von dieser Sache, und du (, o Frau), bitte um Vergebung für deine Sünde.
ref: “O Yusuf! Disregard this – and O woman!
draft: O Yusuf, turn away from this matter, and you (, o woman), ask forgiveness for your sin.
hil: "O Yusuf, turn away from this matter, and you (, o woman), ask for forgiveness of your sin."
compare: O Yusuf, turn away from this matter, and you (, o woman), ask forgiveness for your sin.

src: ALLAH ist Derjenige, Der die Schrift wahrheitsgemäß hinabsandte sowie Almizan. Und was läßt dich wissen?! Vielleicht liegt die Stunde doch nahe.
ref: It is Allah Who has sent down the Book with the truth, and the Scales of Justice; and what do you know – possibly the Last Day could really be near!
draft: ALLAH is the One who sent down the scripture truthfully and Almizan. And what makes you know?! Perhaps the Hour is near.
hil: "God is the one who sent down the scripture truthfully and Almizan. And what makes you know?! Perhaps the Hour is near."
compare: "God is the one who sent down the scripture truthfully and Almizan. And what makes you know?! Perhaps the Hour is near."

src: Das ist - sie sollen es kosten - heißes Wasser und stinkender Eiter
ref: There will be boiling water for them and cold, clammy, fetid drink to taste,
draft: That is - they should taste it - hot water and stinking pus.
hil: This is - they should taste it - hot water and stinking pus.
compare: This is - they should taste it - hot water and stinking pus.

src: Dies, weil ihre Gesandten immer wieder zu ihnen mit den klaren Beweisen kamen, sie aber sagten: "Sollen (etwa) menschliche Wesen uns rechtleiten?" So wurden sie ungläubig und kehrten sich ab.
ref: That is because, when their Messengers came to them with clear proofs they said: 'Shall humans be our guides' They disbelieved and turned away, but Allah was not in need (of them).
draft: This because their messengers kept coming to them with clear proofs, but they said: "Shall (mere) human beings guide us?" So they disbelieved and turned away.
hil: This is because their messengers came to them time and again with clear proofs, but they said, 'Shall mere human beings guide us?' So they became disbelievers and turned away.
compare: This is because their messengers came to them time and again with clear proofs, but they said, 'Shall mere human beings guide us?' So they became disbelievers and turned away.

src: Vielleicht werdet ihr (Allah) fürchten.
ref: It is expected that this will produce piety in you.
draft: Maybe you will fear (Allah).
hil: Perhaps you will fear (Allah).
compare: Maybe you will fear (Allah).

src: Gewiß, wer ALLAH gegenüber Schirk betreibt, dem hat ALLAH bereits die Dschanna für haram erklärt und sein Aufenthaltsort ist das Feuer." Und für die Unrecht-Begehenden gibt es keine Helfer.
ref: Whosoever associates a compeer with God, will have Paradise denied to him by God, and his abode shall be Hell; and the sinners will have none to help them.
draft: Certainly, whoever commits shirk towards Allah, Allah has already declared Jannah forbidden for him and his place of stay is the fire. And for the wrongdoers, there are no helpers.
hil: Indeed, whoever associates partners with ALLAH, Allah has already declared Jannah forbidden for him and his abode shall be the Fire. And for the wrongdoers, there are no helpers.
compare: Certainly, whoever commits shirk towards Allah, Allah has already declared Jannah forbidden for him and his place of stay is the fire. And for the wrongdoers, there are no helpers.

src: Diejenigen, die Enthaltsamkeit von ihren Frauen beschwören, sollen vier Monate warten.
ref: Those who vow abstinence from their wives must wait for four months.
draft: Those who invoke abstinence from their wives shall wait four months.
hil: "Those who call their wives their mothers then revoke what they had said should wait four months."
compare: Those who invoke abstinence from their wives shall wait four months.

src: Doch vergebt und seid nachsichtig, bis Allah Seine Entscheidung ergehen läßt. Wahrlich, Allah hat zu allem die Macht.
ref: But you forbear and overlook till God fulfil His plan; and God has power over all things.
draft: But forgive and be indulgent until Allah issues His decree. Truly, Allah has power over all things.
hil: Forgive and be patient until Allah makes His decision. Truly, Allah has power over all things.
compare: But forgive and be indulgent until Allah issues His decree. Truly, Allah has power over all things.

src: An jenem Tag habt ihr keinen Zufluchtsort und keine Möglichkeit, (irgend etwas) abzustreiten.
ref: You will have no place of refuge then nor time for denying.
draft: On that day, you will have no refuge and no way to deny anything.
hil: On that day, whoever You refrain from a defense, will have no refuge and no way to deny anything.
compare: On that day, you will have no refuge and no way to deny anything.

src: Diejenigen, die sie anrufen, trachten nach einem Mittel zu ihrem Herrn (und wetteifern), wer von ihnen (Ihm) am nächsten sei, und hoffen auf Seine Barmherzigkeit und fürchten Seine Strafe.
ref: Those they invoke themselves seek the way to their Lord, (striving) which one of them shall be nearest (to Him); and hope for His grace, and dread His punishment.
draft: Those who call upon Him seek a means to their Lord (and compete), who among them is closest to Him, and hope for His mercy and fear His punishment.
hil: Those who call upon Him are striving for a means of access to their Lord, [striving] who among them would be closest to Him. And they hope for His mercy and fear His punishment. Indeed, the punishment of your Lord is to be feared.
compare: Those who call upon Him are striving for a means of access to their Lord, [striving] who among them would be closest to Him. And they hope for His mercy and fear His punishment. Indeed, the punishment of your Lord is to be feared.

src: Dein Herr ist wahrlich voll Huld gegen die Menschen. Aber die meisten von ihnen sind nicht dankbar.
ref: Verily your Lord is gracious to men, though most men are ungrateful.
draft: Your Lord is truly full of grace towards people. But most of them are ungrateful.
hil: The Lord is truly full of grace toward human beings. Only most people are not grateful.
compare: Your Lord is truly full of grace towards people. But most of them are ungrateful.

src: Und diese sind die Weggenossen des Feuers. Darin bleiben sie ewig.
ref: They are the inmates of Hell, where they will abide for ever.
draft: And these are the companions of the fire. They remain therein forever.
hil: And these are the companions of the Fire. They shall abide therein forever.
compare: And these are the companions of the fire. They remain therein forever.

src: Gewiß, mit denjenigen, die ihre Religion spalteten und zu Lagern geworden sind, hast du nichts gemein.
ref: As for those who have created schisms in their order, and formed different sects, you have no concern with them.
draft: Certainly, you have nothing in common with those who have divided their religion and become factions.
hil: Verily, you have nothing in common with those who have split their religion and become factions.
compare: Verily, you have nothing in common with those who have split their religion and become factions.

src: Für diejenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, wurde dann Kleidung aus Feuer gefertigt.
ref: But they who disbelieve will be fitted out with garments of flames.
draft: For those who have engaged in disbelief, clothing made of fire was then made.
hil: For those who have disbelieved, clothing made of fire will then be crafted.
compare: For those who have disbelieved, clothing made of fire will then be crafted.

src: Also werden jene, die gläubig sind und gute Werke tun, in den Gärten der Wonne sein.
ref: Then those who had come to believe and done the right will be in gardens of delight.
draft: So those who are faithful and do good works will be in the gardens of bliss.
hil: God will surely admit those who believe and do the right to gardens with rivers running by, where they will be decked in bracelets of gold and of pearls; and of silk will be their garments.
compare: So those who are faithful and do good works will be in the gardens of bliss.

src: Bereits kam zu euch Unser Gesandter, um euch vieles von dem zu enthüllen, was ihr von der Schrift verborgen habt, und vieles unenthüllt zu lassen. Bereits kam doch zu euch von ALLAH Licht und deutliche Schrift!
ref: Indeed this Noble Messenger (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) of Ours has come to you, revealing to you a lot of the things which you had hidden in the Book, and forgiving a lot of them; indeed towards you has come a light* from Allah, and a clear Book. (* The Holy Prophet is a light from Allah).
draft: Already Our Messenger came to you to reveal many of the things which have been hidden from you in the Book and to overlook many others. Truly, there has come to you a Light and a clear Book from Allah.
hil: O followers of the Book! Indeed, Our Apostle has come to you making clear to you much of what you concealed in the Book and passing over much. Indeed, there has come to you a clear Book and a light from Allah.
compare: Already Our Messenger came to you to reveal many of the things which have been hidden from you in the Book and to overlook many others. Truly, there has come to you a Light and a clear Book from Allah.

src: Und dem Zeugen und dem, was bezeugt ist!
ref: And the witness and the witnessed,
draft: And the witness and what is witnessed!
hil: And the witness and that which is witnessed!
compare: And the witness and that which is witnessed!

src: Und wenn Allah es gewollt hätte, hätte Er euch in Bedrängnis gebracht. Wahrlich, Allah ist Allmächtig, Allweise.
ref: And had Allah so willed, He could have harassed you; verily Allah is Mighty, Wise.
draft: And if Allah had willed, He could have put you in distress. Indeed, Allah is Almighty, Wise.
hil: And had He willed, He would have harassed you. Indeed, He is Almighty, Wise.
compare: And if Allah had willed, He could have put you in distress. Indeed, Allah is Almighty, Wise.

src: Eine Rechtleitung und Barmherzigkeit für die Rechtschaffenen,
ref: And a guidance and grace for those who do good,
draft: A guidance and mercy for the righteous,
hil: Guidance and mercy for the righteous,
compare: A guidance and mercy for the righteous,

src: Und sprich zu den gläubigen Frauen, daß sie ihre Blicke zu Boden schlagen und ihre Keuschheit wahren und ihren Schmuck nicht zur Schau tragen sollen - bis auf das, was davon sichtbar sein darf, und daß sie ihren Schal um ihre Kleidungsausschnitte schlagen und ihren Schmuck vor niemand (anderem) enthüllen sollen als vor ihren Gatten oder Vätern oder den Vätern ihrer Gatten oder ihren Söhnen oder den Söhnen ihrer Gatten oder ihren Brüdern oder den Söhnen ihrer Brüder oder Söhnen ihrer Schwestern oder ihren Frauen oder denen, die sie von Rechts wegen besitzen, oder solchen von ihren männlichen Dienern, die keinen Geschlechtstrieb mehr haben, und den Kindern, die der Blöße der Frauen keine Beachtung schenken. Und sie sollen ihre Füße nicht so (auf den Boden) stampfen, daß bekannt wird, was sie von ihrem Schmuck verbergen.
ref: And command the Muslim women to keep their gaze low and to protect their chastity, and not to reveal their adornment except what is apparent, and to keep the cover wrapped over their bosoms; and not to reveal their adornment except to their own husbands or fathers or husbands’ fathers, or their sons or their husbands’ sons, or their brothers or their brothers’ sons or sisters’ sons, or women of their religion, or the bondwomen they possess, or male servants provided they do not have manliness, or such children who do not know of women’s nakedness, and not to stamp their feet on the ground in order that their hidden adornment be known; and O Muslims, all of you turn in repentance together towards Allah, in the hope of attaining success.
draft: And tell the believing women to lower their gaze and guard their private parts and not display their adornment except that which ordinarily appears thereof and to draw their headcoverings over their chests and not to display their adornment except to their husbands, their fathers, their husbands' fathers, their sons, their husbands' sons, their brothers, their brothers' sons, their sisters' sons, their womenfolk, their slaves, such male attendants as are without lust, or children who are not yet aware of the nakedness of women. And let them not stamp their feet so as to reveal what they hide of their adornment.
hil: And tell the believing women to lower their gaze and guard their private parts and not display their charms except what is apparent outwardly, and to cover their bosoms with their veils and not to show their finery except to their husbands, their fathers, their fathers-in-law, their sons, their husbands' sons, their brothers, their brothers' sons, their sisters' sons, their women, that which their right hands possess, or those male attendants having no need (for women), or boys not yet aware of sex. And let them not stamp their feet to make known what they conceal of their adornment.
compare: And tell the believing women to lower their gaze and guard their private parts and not display their adornment except that which ordinarily appears thereof and to draw their headcoverings over their chests and not to display their adornment except to their husbands, their fathers, their husbands' fathers, their sons, their husbands' sons, their brothers, their brothers' sons, their sisters' sons, their womenfolk, their slaves, such male attendants as are without lust, or children who are not yet aware of the nakedness of women. And let them not stamp their feet so as to reveal what they hide of their adornment.

src: Sie empfinden insgeheim Reue, wenn sie die Pein sehen. Und zwischen ihnen wird in Gerechtigkeit entschieden, und ihnen wird nicht Unrecht getan.
ref: And they shall conceal remorse when they behold the torment, and the matter will be decreed between them in equity, and they shall not be wronged.
draft: They secretly feel remorse when they see the torment. And justice is decided between them, and no wrong is done to them.
hil: They secretly feel repentant when they see the torment, and it will be judged between them with fairness, and no wrong will be done to them.
compare: They secretly feel remorse when they see the torment. And justice is decided between them, and no wrong is done to them.

src: Und keiner begeht mehr Unrecht als derjenige, der im Namen ALLAHs Lügen erdichtet oder das Wahre ableugnet, nachdem es zu ihm gekommen war! Gibt es etwa nicht in Dschahannam eine Bleibe für die Kafir?!
ref: And who is a greater wrong-doer than he who fabricateth a lie against Allah or belieth the truth when it cometh unto him Will there not be in the Hell an abiding-place for the infidels?
draft: And no one commits more injustice than the one who invents lies in the name of Allah or denies the truth after it has come to him! Is there not a place in Jahannam for the Kafir?!
hil: And who is more wicked than he who fabricates lies against Allah or denies the truth after it has come to him? Is there not a place in Jahannam for the Kafir?
compare: And no one commits more injustice than the one who invents lies in the name of Allah or denies the truth after it has come to him! Is there not a place in Jahannam for the Kafir?!

src: Du warst nicht auf der westlichen Seite', als Wir Musa die Angelegenheit auftrugen, und du warst nicht zugegen.
ref: You were not there on the western side (of Mount Sinai) when We gave the commandments to Moses, nor were you witness (to the event).
draft: "You were not on the western side when we entrusted Musa with the matter, and you were not present."
hil: Did you not stay on the western side when we entrusted Musa with the matter, and were you not present?
compare: "You were not on the western side when we entrusted Musa with the matter, and you were not present."

src: Und werdet ihr nun Muslime werden?!
ref: (And say:) "Will you now submit?"
draft: And now will you become Muslims?!
hil: And will you now become Muslims?!
compare: And now will you become Muslims?!

src: Bäche werden unter ihnen in den Gärten der Wonne fließen.
ref: At their feet shall flow streams of running water in gardens of delight.
draft: Streams will flow among them in the gardens of pleasure.
hil: And proclaim to those who believe and do good deeds that they will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. Whenever they are provided with fruit therefrom, they will say, "This is what we were provided with before." And it is given to them in resemblance. And they shall have purified spouses therein, and they shall abide therein forever.
compare: Streams will flow among them in the gardens of pleasure.

src: Und ihr pflegtet euch nicht so zu verdecken, daß nicht euer Gehör, eure Augen und eure Häute Zeugnis wegen euch ablegten. Aber ihr meintet, daß Gott nicht viel wisse von dem, was ihr tut.
ref: Not so did you cover yourselves, that your hearing, your eyes and your skins should not bear witness against you; but you thought that God would never know much of the things that you were working.
draft: And you did not cover yourselves to the extent that your hearing, your eyes, and your skins testified against you. But you thought that God did not know much about what you do.
hil: And you did not conceal yourselves in such a way that not your hearing, your eyes, and your skins gave testimony against you. But you thought that God did not know much about what you were doing.
compare: And you did not conceal yourselves in such a way that not your hearing, your eyes, and your skins gave testimony against you. But you thought that God did not know much about what you were doing.

src: Diejenigen von den Leuten des Buches und von den Polytheisten, die nicht glauben, mögen es nicht gern, daß auf euch etwas Gutes von eurem Herrn herabgesandt wird.
ref: Those without faith among the people of the Book, and those who worship idols, do not wish that good should come to you from your Lord.
draft: Those from the People of the Book and the polytheists who disbelieve do not like that any good should be sent down to you from your Lord.
hil: Those without faith among the people of the Book and those who worship idols do not wish that good should come to you from your Lord.
compare: Those without faith among the people of the Book and those who worship idols do not wish that good should come to you from your Lord.

src: Damit beleben Wir eine abgestorbene Ortschaft. Auf diese Weise werdet auch ihr hervorgebracht werden.
ref: Then We revive a dead land therewith, and even so you will be brought forth (from the dead),
draft: We revive a dead locality with this. In this way, you will also be brought forth.
hil: Thus we revive a dead locality. In this way, you too shall be brought forth.
compare: Thus we revive a dead locality. In this way, you too shall be brought forth.

src: Hierauf wird eure Rückkehr zu eurem Herrn sein.
ref: No one shall bear another's burden.
draft: "Your return to your Lord will be on this."
hil: "Eventually, you will go back to your Lord who will tell you about the things you disputed."
compare: "Eventually, you will go back to your Lord who will tell you about the things you disputed."

src: Jede Gemeinschaft hat einen Gesandten. Wenn nun ihr Gesandter kommt, wird zwischen ihnen in Gerechtigkeit entschieden, und es wird ihnen kein Unrecht zugefügt.
ref: For every people there is an apostle; and when their apostle is come the matter is decided between them equitably, and no one is wronged.
draft: Every community has a messenger. If their messenger comes to them, judgment will be made between them with justice, and they will not be wronged.
hil: Every community has a messenger. If their messenger comes to them, it will be judged with fairness between them, and they will not be wronged.
compare: Every community has a messenger. If their messenger comes to them, it will be judged with fairness between them, and they will not be wronged.

src: Und ihm dann die Herzader durchschnitten,
ref: Then cut off his aorta,
draft: And then they cut the vein of his heart.
hil: And then they cut his heart valve.
compare: And then they cut the vein of his heart.

src: Sie waren beide in der Höhle, und er sagte zu seinem Gefährten: «Sei nicht traurig. Gott ist mit uns.»
ref: When both of them were in the cave, he said to his companion: "Do not grieve, for God is with us."
draft: They were both in the cave, and he said to his companion, "Do not be sad. God is with us."
hil: They were both in the cave, and he said to his companion, 'Do not be sad. God is with us.'
compare: They were both in the cave, and he said to his companion, "Do not be sad. God is with us."

src: Allah wird aber keine Seele zurückstellen, wenn ihre Frist kommt. Und Allah ist Kundig dessen, was ihr tut.
ref: And Allah will never give respite to any soul when its promise arrives; and Allah is Aware of your deeds.
draft: Allah, however, will not hold back any soul when its time has come. And Allah is fully aware of what you do.
hil: "However, when their appointed time comes, Allah will not delay a soul. And Allah is aware of what you do."
compare: Allah, however, will not hold back any soul when its time has come. And Allah is fully aware of what you do.

src: Dann sagte ich: "Bittet euren HERRN um Vergebung! Gewiß, ER ist immer allvergebend,
ref: “I therefore told them, ‘Seek forgiveness from your Lord; He is indeed Most Forgiving.’
draft: Then I said, "Ask your LORD for forgiveness! Surely, HE is always forgiving.
hil: "Then I said, \"Ask your Lord for forgiveness! Indeed, HE is always forgiving.\""
compare: "Then I said, \"Ask your Lord for forgiveness! Indeed, HE is always forgiving.\""

src: Aber Allah hat (euch) bewahrt. Gewiß, Er weiß über das Innerste der Brüste Bescheid.
ref: But God spared you this, for He surely knows what is in the hearts of men.
draft: But Allah has saved you. Indeed, He knows what is in the hearts.
hil: But Allah has kept you safe. Whether you keep your words a secret or speak them aloud, He knows the innermost secrets of your hearts.
compare: But Allah has saved you. Indeed, He knows what is in the hearts.

src: Und gedenke deines Herrn in deinem Herzen in Demut und Furcht, ohne laut vernehmbare Worte am Morgen und am Abend; und sei nicht einer der Unachtsamen.
ref: Meditate on your Lord inwardly with humility and trepidation, reciting His Book softly, morning and evening, and be not negligent.
draft: And remember your Lord in your heart with humility and fear, without speaking aloud words in the morning and in the evening; and do not be one of the heedless.
hil: And remember your Lord in your heart with humility and fear, without speaking aloud in the morning and evening; and do not be one of the heedless.
compare: And remember your Lord in your heart with humility and fear, without speaking aloud words in the morning and in the evening; and do not be one of the heedless.

src: Und von wo du auch herkommst, wende dein Gesicht in Richtung der heiligen Moschee.
ref: And wherever you come from, turn your face towards the Sacred Mosque.
draft: And from wherever you come, turn your face towards the holy mosque.
hil: And from wherever you come, turn your face towards the Sacred Mosque; and indeed it is the truth from your Lord; and Allah is not unaware of your deeds.
compare: And from wherever you come, turn your face towards the Sacred Mosque; and indeed it is the truth from your Lord; and Allah is not unaware of your deeds.

src: Darin sollen sie verweilen auf ewig und immerdar.
ref: He has prepared for them Gardens under which rivers flow (Paradise), to dwell therein forever.
draft: They are to dwell therein forever and ever.
hil: They shall abide therein forever and ever.
compare: They are to dwell therein forever and ever.

src: ALLAH ist Derjenige, Der euch die Nacht machte, damit ihr euch darin ausruht, sowie den Tag hell. Gewiß, ALLAH hat bestimmt den Menschen Gunst erwiesen. Doch die meisten Menschen erweisen sich nicht dankbar.
ref: It is Allah Who created night for you so that you may gain rest in it, and the day giving sight; indeed Allah is Most Munificent towards mankind, but most people do not give thanks.
draft: ALLAH is the One Who made the night for you to rest therein and the day bright. Indeed, ALLAH has conferred favor upon the people, but most of the people are not grateful.
hil: "ALLAH is the One Who made the night for you to rest therein and the day luminous. Indeed, ALLAH has conferred favor upon the people, but most of the people are not grateful."
compare: ALLAH is the One Who made the night for you to rest therein and the day bright. Indeed, ALLAH has conferred favor upon the people, but most of the people are not grateful.

src: Gleich wohlverwahrten Perlen.
ref: Like pearls within their shells,
draft: Equal well-kept pearls.
hil: Like well-kept pearls.
compare: Like well-kept pearls.

src: Das sind die, von denen Gott weiß, was in ihrem Herzen ist.
ref: The secrets of the hearts of these people are well known to God.
draft: These are the ones whom God knows what is in their hearts.
hil: These are the ones of whom God knows what is in their hearts.
compare: These are the ones of whom God knows what is in their hearts.

src: Darin erfaßt sie keine Mühsal, und sie werden nicht daraus vertrieben.
ref: No weariness will come upon them, nor will they be sent away from there.
draft: "Therein they do not grasp any hardship, and they will not be driven away from it."
hil: "Therein they do not grasp any hardship, and they will not be driven away from it."
compare: "Therein they do not grasp any hardship, and they will not be driven away from it."

src: Er ist ja der Allvergebende und Barmherzige.
ref: He is all-forgiving and all-merciful.
draft: He is the All-Forgiving and Merciful.
hil: He is the Forgiver, the Merciful.
compare: He is the Forgiver, the Merciful.

src: Und sag: "Ich hoffe, daß mein HERR mich zu einer besseren Führung als dieses rechtleitet.
ref: Say, "I hope that my Lord will provide me better guidance."
draft: And say: "I hope that my Lord will guide me to a better guidance than this."
hil: "And pray, "O my Lord, guide me to a better guidance than this.""
compare: "And pray, "O my Lord, guide me to a better guidance than this.""

src: Allah aber verspricht euch Vergebung von Sich aus und Huld. Allah ist Allumfassend und Allwissend.
ref: But God promises His pardon and grace, for God is bounteous and all-knowing.
draft: Allah but promises you forgiveness from himself and grace. Allah is all-encompassing and all-knowing.
hil: Allah, however, promises you forgiveness from himself and grace. Allah is all-encompassing and all-knowing.
compare: Allah but promises you forgiveness from himself and grace. Allah is all-encompassing and all-knowing.

src: Als Lebensunterhalt für die Diener. Und Wir haben damit abgestorbene Ortschaften wieder belebt. So erfolgt auch das Herauskommen.
ref: As sustenance for the bondmen; and with it We revived a dead city; this is how you will be raised.
draft: As a livelihood for the servants. And we have thus revived dead villages. This is also how the emergence takes place.
hil: As a livelihood for the servants. And we have thereby revived dormant villages. This is also how the emergence takes place.
compare: As a livelihood for the servants. And we have thus revived dead villages. This is also how the emergence takes place.

src: Was gibt es denn anstelle der Wahrheit außer dem Irregehen?!
ref: What then is there after the truth but error?
draft: What is there instead of the truth, except going astray?!
hil: What is there, instead of the truth, but going astray?
compare: What is there, instead of the truth, but going astray?

src: Und verfertige das Schiff vor Unseren Augen und nach Unserer Eingebung. Und sprich Mich nicht an zugunsten derer, die Unrecht getan haben; sie werden ertränkt werden."
ref: “And build the ship in front of Us, and by Our command, and do not speak to Me regarding the unjust; they will surely be drowned.”
draft: And build the ship before Our eyes and according to Our revelation. And do not address Me concerning those who have done wrong; they will be drowned."
hil: "We inspired him, 'Construct the ship before Our eyes and according to Our revelation, and do not address me concerning those who have done wrong; they will be drowned.'"
compare: And build the ship before Our eyes and according to Our revelation. And do not address Me concerning those who have done wrong; they will be drowned."

src: Diejenigen aber, die sie an seiner Stelle anrufen, entscheiden ohne jede Grundlage.
ref: But those they call apart from Him can not adjudge in the least.
draft: Those, however, who call them in his place, decide without any basis.
hil: However, those who call on them in his place, decide without any basis.
compare: However, those who call on them in his place, decide without any basis.

src: Da sagte er zu seinem Gefährten, während er mit ihm einen Wortwechsel führte: "Ich habe mehr Besitz als du und auch eine mächtigere Schar."
ref: Arguing one day with his friend he said: "I have more wealth than you and more powerful kinsmen."
draft: He said to his companion, while having a discussion with him: "I have more possessions than you and also a more powerful following."
hil: He said to his comrade whilst debating with him: 'I possess more wealth than you do and also a more powerful multitude.'
compare: He said to his comrade whilst debating with him: 'I possess more wealth than you do and also a more powerful multitude.'

src: Aber Allah hebt auf, was der Satan dazwischenwirft. Hierauf legt Allah Seine Zeichen eindeutig fest.
ref: But God nullifies what Satan interjects, and God affirms His revelations.
draft: But Allah nullifies whatever the Satan throws in between. After that, Allah sets His signs firmly.
hil: But Allah nullifies what Satan throws in between. Then Allah clearly sets His signs.
compare: But Allah nullifies what Satan throws in between. Then Allah clearly sets His signs.
