src: Er sagte: "O mein Volk, was meint ihr, wenn ich mich auf einen klaren Beweis von meinem Herrn stütze und Er mir eine Barmherzigkeit von Sich hat zukommen lassen, die aber eurem Blick entzogen wurde, sollen wir sie euch da aufzwingen, wo sie euch zuwider ist?
ref: He said: "O my people, think. If I have a clear proof from my Lord, and He has bestowed on me His grace, though unknown to you, can we force it upon you when you are averse?
draft: He said: "O my people, what do you think if I rely on a clear proof from my Lord and He has given me a mercy from Him which was hidden from your view, should we then force it upon you while you are averse to it?
hil: He said, 'O my people, what do you think if I rely on a clear proof from my Lord and He has given me a mercy from Him which was hidden from your view, should we then force it upon you while you are averse to it?'
compare: He said: "O my people, what do you think if I rely on a clear proof from my Lord and He has given me a mercy from Him which was hidden from your view, should we then force it upon you while you are averse to it?

src: Er sagte: "Allah bewahre mich davor, einer der Unwissenden zu sein."
ref: And he said: "God forbid that I be of the ignorant."
draft: He said, "God forbid that I should be one of the ignorant."
hil: He said, "God forbid that I should be one of the ignorant."
compare: He said, "God forbid that I should be one of the ignorant."

src: Ich bin doch nur ein Ermahner und ein Überbringer froher Botschaft für Leute, die den Iman verinnerlichen."
ref: I am only a bearer of warnings and bringer of happy news for those who believe."
draft: I'm just a preacher and a messenger of good news for people who internalize the Iman.
hil: I am only a warner and a bearer of glad tidings for people who internalize faith.
compare: I am only a warner and a bearer of glad tidings for people who internalize faith.

src: damit er weiß, ob sie wohl die Botschaften ihres Herrn ausgerichtet haben, und daß Er das, was bei ihnen ist, umfaßt, und Er die Zahl von allem erfaßt'.
ref: So that He may know if they have delivered their Lord's messages. He comprehends all that has been given them, and keeps count of everything.
draft: So that he knows whether they have directed the messages of their Lord correctly and that He encompasses what is with them and takes account of everything.
hil: So that He knows whether they have indeed delivered the messages of their Lord, and that He encompasses whatever is with them, and He fully encompasses everything.
compare: So that he knows whether they have directed the messages of their Lord correctly and that He encompasses what is with them and takes account of everything.

src: Sag: "Mein HERR weiß besser Bescheid über denjenigen, der mit der Rechtleitung kam, und über denjenigen, der in einem klaren Fehlgehen ist.
ref: Say: "My Lord knows who has come to guidance, and who is clearly in error."
draft: Say, "My Lord knows best about the one who came with guidance and the one who is in clear error."
hil: Say, "My Lord knows best about the one who came with guidance and the one who is clearly misguided."
compare: Say, "My Lord knows best about the one who came with guidance and the one who is clearly misguided."

src: Und rezitiere das, was dir als Wahy von der Schrift deines HERRN zuteil wurde.
ref: Recite what has been revealed to you of the Book of your Lord.
draft: And recite what has been revealed to you of the Book of your Lord.
hil: And recite what has been revealed to you of the scripture of your Lord as a guidance.
compare: And recite what has been revealed to you of the scripture of your Lord as a guidance.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Erklärt nicht für haram die Tay-yibat dessen, was ALLAH euch für halal erklärte, und übertretet nicht! Gewiß, ALLAH liebt nicht die Übertretenden.
ref: O believers, forbid not such good things as God has permitted you; and transgress not; God loves not transgressors.
draft: You, who have internalized the faith! Do not declare as forbidden the good things that ALLAH has made lawful for you, and do not transgress. Surely, ALLAH does not love the transgressors.
hil: Those of you who have internalized the faith! Do not declare as forbidden the good things that ALLAH has made lawful for you, and do not transgress. Surely, ALLAH does not love the transgressors.
compare: You, who have internalized the faith! Do not declare as forbidden the good things that ALLAH has made lawful for you, and do not transgress. Surely, ALLAH does not love the transgressors.

src: (Alles) Lob gehört Allah, dem Erschaffer der Himmel und der Erde, Der die Engel zu Gesandten gemacht hat mit Flügeln, (je) zwei, drei und vier! Er fügt der Schöpfung hinzu, was Er will. Gewiß, Allah hat zu allem die Macht.
ref: All praise is to Allah, the Maker of the heavens and the earth, Who assigns angels as messengers – who have pairs of two, three, four wings; He increases in creation whatever He wills; indeed Allah is Able to do all things.
draft: All praise belongs to Allah, the Creator of the heavens and the earth, who made the angels messengers with wings, (in) two, three and four. He adds to the creation whatever He wills. Indeed, Allah has power over all things.
hil: All praise is due to God, the Creator of the heavens and the earth, who created the angels with wings, two, three, and four (pairs) as messengers. He adds to the creation whatever He wills. Indeed, Allah has power over all things.
compare: All praise belongs to Allah, the Creator of the heavens and the earth, who made the angels messengers with wings, (in) two, three and four. He adds to the creation whatever He wills. Indeed, Allah has power over all things.

src: Allein nur diejenigen lassen sich warnen, die verständig sind.
ref: Only they think who are wise."
draft: Only those who are wise can be warned.
hil: Only those who are wise can be warned.
compare: Only those who are wise can be warned.

src: Aber die meisten Menschen glauben nicht.
ref: Verily, it is the truth from your Lord, but most of the mankind believe not.
draft: But most people don't believe.
hil: But most people do not believe.
compare: But most people don't believe.

src: Aber es glaubten Musa nur junge Leute aus seinem Volk, trotz ihrer Furcht vor Fir'aun und ihrer führenden Schar, davor, daß er sie verfolgen würde.
ref: But none believed in Moses except some children of his people, for fear that Pharaoh and his chiefs would persecute them.
draft: But only young people from his people believed Musa, despite their fear of Pharaoh and his leading officials, that he would pursue them.
hil: But only the young people from his people believed in Musa, despite their fear of Pharaoh and his leading troops, that he would pursue them.
compare: But only the young people from his people believed in Musa, despite their fear of Pharaoh and his leading troops, that he would pursue them.

src: Darum gewähre nun den Ungläubigen Aufschub, ein klein wenig Aufschub.
ref: So bear with unbelievers with patience, and give them respite for a while.
draft: Therefore, grant the unbelievers a little postponement, a little postponement.
hil: Therefore, grant the unbelievers a little respite, a small respite.
compare: Therefore, grant the unbelievers a little respite, a small respite.

src: Und du wirst im Verfahren Gottes keine Veränderung finden.
ref: And you will not find any change in the Way of Allah.
draft: And you will find no change in the process of God.
hil: And you will not find any change in God's process.
compare: And you will not find any change in God's process.

src: Gewiß, WIR ließen dir Wahy zuteil werden, wie WIR Wahy Nuh und den Propheten nach ihm zuteil werden ließen. Ebenso ließen WIRWahy zuteil werden Ibrahim, Isma'il, Ishaq, Ya'qub, den Stämmen Israils, 'Isa, Ayyub, Yunus, Harun und Sulaiman. Auch ließen WIR Dawud Zabur zukommen.
ref: We have sent revelations to you as We sent revelations to Noah and the prophets (who came) after him; and We sent revelations to Abraham and Ishmael and Isaac and Jacob, and their offspring, and to Jesus and Job, and to Jonah and Aaron and Solomon, and to David We gave the Book of Psalms,
draft: Certainly, we have granted you Wahy as we granted Wahy to Nuh and the prophets after him. Similarly, we have granted Wahy to Ibrahim, Isma'il, Ishaq, Ya'qub, the tribes of Israel, 'Isa, Ayyub, Yunus, Harun, and Sulaiman. We also gave Dawud the Zabur.
hil: Verily, WE have revealed to you Revelation, as We have revealed Revelation to Noah and the Prophets after him. And WE have revealed Revelation to Abraham, Ishmael, Isaac, Jacob, the Descendants, Jesus, Job, Jonah, Aaron, and to Solomon. WE have also given the Book of Psalms to David.
compare: Certainly, we have granted you Wahy as we granted Wahy to Nuh and the prophets after him. Similarly, we have granted Wahy to Ibrahim, Isma'il, Ishaq, Ya'qub, the tribes of Israel, 'Isa, Ayyub, Yunus, Harun, and Sulaiman. We also gave Dawud the Zabur.

src: Und wenn ihnen eine Angelegenheit zu (Ohren) kommt, die Sicherheit oder Furcht betrifft, machen sie es bekannt. Wenn sie es jedoch vor den Gesandten und den Befehlshabern unter ihnen brächten, würden es wahrlich diejenigen unter ihnen wissen, die es herausfinden können.
ref: When there comes to them a matter, be it of security or fear, they broadcast it; if they had referred it to the Messenger and to those in authority among them, those of them whose task it is to investigate would have known the matter.
draft: And if they hear of any matter concerning security or fear, they make it public. If only they had referred it to the Messenger or to those charged with authority among them, then the proper investigators would have known it.
hil: And if they hear of any matter concerning security or fear, they make it public. But if they brought it to the Messenger and to those in authority among them, then the proper investigators would have known it.
compare: And if they hear of any matter concerning security or fear, they make it public. But if they brought it to the Messenger and to those in authority among them, then the proper investigators would have known it.

src: ER wird denjenigen, die Schlechtes taten, doch das vergelten, was sie taten, und ER wird denjenigen, die Ihsan taten, mit dem Besseren vergelten.
ref: He will repay those who do evil according to their deeds, and recompense those who do good with the best.
draft: HE will repay those who did bad deeds for what they did, and HE will repay those who did Ihsan with something better.
hil: HE will reward those who did bad deeds according to their deeds, and HE will grant a better reward to those who did Ihsan.
compare: HE will repay those who did bad deeds for what they did, and HE will repay those who did Ihsan with something better.

src: (Erwähne) den Tag, an dem ALLAH die Gesandten versammelt, dann sagt: "Welche Antwort wurde euch gegeben?!"
ref: The day God will gather the apostles and ask: "What answer was made to you?"
draft: (Mention) the day when ALLAH gathers the messengers and then says, "What answer was given to you?!"
hil: (Mention) the day when ALLAH gathers the messengers and says, 'What answer was given to you?!'
compare: (Mention) the day when ALLAH gathers the messengers and says, 'What answer was given to you?!'

src: Und wenn WIR es wollten, gewiß hätten WIR dir sie gezeigt, dann wirst du sie sicher an ihren Merkmalen erkennen. Und du erkennst sie doch an der Andeutung mit dem Gesagten. Und ALLAH kennt eure Handlungen.
ref: And if We will, We can show them to you so that you may recognise them by their faces; and you will surely recognise them by the way they talk; and Allah knows your deeds.
draft: And if we wanted to, we would certainly have shown them to you, then you will surely recognize them by their characteristics. And you do recognize them by the hint with the said. And Allah knows your actions.
hil: And if we wanted to, we would certainly have shown them to you, then you would surely recognize them by their characteristics. And you do recognize them by the hint with the said. And Allah knows your actions.
compare: And if we wanted to, we would certainly have shown them to you, then you will surely recognize them by their characteristics. And you do recognize them by the hint with the said. And Allah knows your actions.

src: Und beleidigt euch nicht gegenseitig durch Gesten und bewerft euch nicht gegenseitig mit (häßlichen) Beinamen.
ref: Do not slander one another, nor give one another nick-names.
draft: And do not insult each other through gestures and do not throw (ugly) nicknames at each other.
hil: And do not insult each other through gestures and do not throw (ugly) nicknames at each other.
compare: And do not insult each other through gestures and do not throw (ugly) nicknames at each other.

src: An ihnen habt ihr sonst allerlei Nutzen. Und damit ihr, auf ihnen reitend, etwas, was ihr in eurer Brust hegt und anstrebt, erreichen könnt.
ref: And in them you have other benefits as well, and through them you satisfy your needs.
draft: You otherwise have all kinds of benefits from them. And so that you can, by riding on them, achieve something that you cherish and strive for in your heart.
hil: You otherwise have all kinds of benefits from them. And so that you can achieve something that you cherish and strive for in your heart by riding on them.
compare: You otherwise have all kinds of benefits from them. And so that you can achieve something that you cherish and strive for in your heart by riding on them.

src: Auch Derjenige, Der vom Himmel Wasser nach Bestimmung fallen ließ, dann ließen WIR damit eine tote Landschaft erstehen. Solcherart werdet ihr hervorgebracht.
ref: Who sent down water in due measure from the sky, then quickened a region that was dead -- So shall We bring you forth --
draft: Even the one who let water fall from the sky according to destiny, then we let a dead landscape arise from it. You will be produced in such a way.
hil: Also, whoever caused water to fall from the skies according to destiny, we made a barren landscape emerge from it. This is how you are brought forth.
compare: Even the one who let water fall from the sky according to destiny, then we let a dead landscape arise from it. You will be produced in such a way.

src: ER weiß, was in die Erde hineingeht, was aus ihr herauskommt, und was vom Himmel hinabkommt, und in ihn hinaufsteigt. Und ER ist Der Allgnädige, Der Allvergebende.
ref: He knows all that goes into the earth and all that comes out of it, and all that descends from the skies and all that ascends into it; and only He is the Most Merciful, the Oft Forgiving.
draft: He knows what goes into the earth and what comes out of it, and what comes down from the sky and what goes up into it. And He is the Most Merciful, the Most Forgiving.
hil: It knows what goes into the earth, what comes out of it, and what comes from the sky and goes up into it. And it is The Most Merciful, The Most Forgiving.
compare: He knows what goes into the earth and what comes out of it, and what comes down from the sky and what goes up into it. And He is the Most Merciful, the Most Forgiving.

src: Und WIR machten sie zur Rechtleitung für die Kinder Israils.
ref: And We appointed it to be a guidance unto the Children of Is'rail.
draft: And WE made it a guidance for the children of Israel.
hil: And WE appointed them as a guidance for the children of Israel.
compare: And WE appointed them as a guidance for the children of Israel.

src: Gibt es denn einen (anderen) Gott neben Gott? Nein, ihr seid ja Leute, die (Gott andere) gleichsetzen.
ref: Nay, but they are a people who assign to Him equals!
draft: Is there any (other) God beside God? No, you are people who equate (other gods with God).
hil: No! In fact, you are people who turn away (from the truth) by equating (others) with God.
compare: Is there any (other) God beside God? No, you are people who equate (other gods with God).

src: Und gewiß, von seiner Gefolgschaft ist doch Ibrahim.
ref: And Abraham indeed was of his inducement,
draft: And certainly, Ibrahim is part of his entourage.
hil: And indeed, Ibrahim is surely part of his entourage.
compare: And indeed, Ibrahim is surely part of his entourage.

src: Geht also in die Häuser durch ihre Türen.
ref: Enter the house through the main gate, and obey God.
draft: So go into the houses through their doors.
hil: So enter the houses through their doors.
compare: So go into the houses through their doors.

src: dir unterliegt von der Angelegenheit nichts - oder ihnen vergibt oder sie peinigt.
ref: It is no concern of yours whether He redeems them or punishes them.
draft: There is nothing that concerns you about the matter - either it forgives you or it torments you.
hil: "There is nothing about the matter that concerns you - either it forgives you or torments you."
compare: "There is nothing about the matter that concerns you - either it forgives you or torments you."

src: Gewiß, ALLAH vergibt die Verfehlungen - allesamt.
ref: Surely God forgives all sins.
draft: Certainly, ALLAH forgives all misdeeds.
hil: Certainly, ALLAH forgives all transgressions.
compare: Certainly, ALLAH forgives all misdeeds.

src: Wer das tut, hat keine Gemeinschaft mit Gott, es sei denn, ihr hütet euch wirklich vor ihnen.
ref: Whoever does that has nothing to do with God, unless it is to protect your own selves against them.
draft: Whoever does this has no fellowship with God, unless you really guard against them.
hil: Whoever does this has no communion with God unless you truly guard yourself against them.
compare: Whoever does this has no fellowship with God, unless you really guard against them.

src: Allah gebietet Gerechtigkeit, gütig zu sein und den Verwandten zu geben; Er verbietet das Schändliche, das Verwerfliche und die Gewalttätigkeit.
ref: Verily God has enjoined justice, the doing of good, and the giving of gifts to your relatives; and forbidden indecency, impropriety and oppression.
draft: Allah commands justice, kindness to relatives, and forbids shameful acts, evil deeds, and violence.
hil: Allah commands fairness, kindness to relatives and prohibits shameful acts, detestable practices, and violence.
compare: Allah commands justice, kindness to relatives, and forbids shameful acts, evil deeds, and violence.

src: Und ALLAH ist allwissend über die Unrecht-Begehenden.
ref: And Allah is the Knower of he wrong-doers.
draft: And Allah is all-knowing about those who commit injustice.
hil: And God is all-knowing about those who commit injustice.
compare: And Allah is all-knowing about those who commit injustice.

src: Sag: Was meint ihr, wenn er doch von Allah stammt und ihr ihn hierauf verleugnet?
ref: Say: "See ye if the (Revelation) is (really) from Allah, and yet do ye reject it?
draft: Say: What do you mean, if he comes from Allah and you deny him?
hil: Say: What do you mean if he comes from Allah and you deny it?
compare: Say: What do you mean if he comes from Allah and you deny it?

src: ALLAH hat für sie Dschannat vorbereitet, die von Flüssen durchflossen werden. Darin werden sie ewig bleiben. Dies ist der unermeßliche Gewinn.
ref: Allah has kept ready for them Gardens beneath which rivers flow, abiding in it forever; this is the greatest success.
draft: ALLAH has prepared Jannah (paradise) for them, which will be surrounded by rivers. They will reside in it forever. This is the immeasurable gain.
hil: God has a provision of gardens with streams of running water for them. They will abide in it forever. This is the immeasurable gain.
compare: ALLAH has prepared Jannah (paradise) for them, which will be surrounded by rivers. They will reside in it forever. This is the immeasurable gain.

src: Als (der Überbringer) zu Salomo kam, sagte (dieser): "Schüttet ihr Reichtümer über mich aus?
ref: So, when the envoys came to Solomon he said: "Do you wish to increase my wealth?
draft: When (the messenger) came to Solomon, he said: "Are you pouring out your riches on me?".
hil: "When (the messenger) came to Solomon, he said: 'Are you showering me with your riches?'"
compare: "When (the messenger) came to Solomon, he said: 'Are you showering me with your riches?'"

src: Gewiß, ALLAHs Androhung ist wahr. So lasst das diesseitige Leben euch nicht täuschen, und lasst keineswegs das Täuschende euch in ALLAH täuschen!
ref: Surely God's promise is true; so let not the present life delude you, and let not the Deluder delude you concerning God.
draft: Certainly, Allah's threat is true. So do not let this worldly life deceive you, and do not let the deceiver deceive you in Allah!
hil: Surely, Allah's threat is true. So do not let this worldly life deceive you, and do not let the deceiver deceive you in Allah!
compare: Certainly, Allah's threat is true. So do not let this worldly life deceive you, and do not let the deceiver deceive you in Allah!

src: Und als ihnen Unsere Ayat verdeutlicht vorgetragen wurden, haben diejenigen, die Unsere Begegnung nicht erhoffen, gesagt: "Bringe einen Quran außer diesem oder forme ihn um!" Sag: "Mir steht es nicht zu, ihn nach meinem Gutdünken umzuformen. Ich folge nur dem, was mir an Wahy zuteil wird! Ich fürchte, sollte ich meinem HERRN widersprechen, die Peinigung eines gewaltigen Tages!"
ref: And when Our clear verses are recited to them, the people who do not expect to meet Us say, “Bring a Qur’an other than this one, or change it”; say (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “I do not have the right to change it on my own; I only follow what is divinely revealed to me; if I were to disobey my Lord*, then I fear the punishment of the Great Day (of Resurrection). (* Which is impossible.)
draft: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, those who do not expect the meeting with Us say, "Bring us a Quran other than this or change it." Say, [O Muhammad], "It is not for me to change it on my own accord. I only follow what is revealed to me. Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day."
hil: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, those who do not expect the meeting with Us say, 'Bring us a Quran other than this or change it.' Say, 'It is not for me to change it on my own accord. I only follow what is revealed to me. Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day!'
compare: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, those who do not expect the meeting with Us say, 'Bring us a Quran other than this or change it.' Say, 'It is not for me to change it on my own accord. I only follow what is revealed to me. Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day!'

src: Und WIR erschufen den Himmel, die Erde und das, was zwischen ihnen ist, doch nicht aus sinnlosem Treiben.
ref: We have not created the heavens and the earth, and all that lies between them, out of fun.
draft: And WE created the heaven, the earth, and all that is between them, but not in vain.
hil: And WE created the heavens, the earth and all that is between them, not without purpose. This is the belief of those who disbelieve.
compare: And WE created the heaven, the earth, and all that is between them, but not in vain.

src: Wäre nicht zuvor ein Wort von deinem Herrn ergangen, wäre gewiß zwischen ihnen entschieden worden; aber wahrhaftig, sie befinden sich in beunruhigendem Zweifel über ihn (den Quran)
ref: If the Word of your Lord had not preceded it the matter would have been settled between them. They are still in doubt about it and uneasy.
draft: If a word had not gone forth from thy Lord, the matter would have been decided between them; but truly they are in suspicious doubt concerning it (the Quran).
hil: If a word had not already gone forth from thy Lord, judgment would certainly have been made between them; but truly they are in troubling doubt about him (the Quran).
compare: If a word had not gone forth from thy Lord, the matter would have been decided between them; but truly they are in suspicious doubt concerning it (the Quran).

src: Als die Zauberer kamen, sagte Mose zu ihnen: «Werft, was ihr werfen wollt.»
ref: So when the magicians arrived, Moses said to them: "Cast whatever (spell) you have to cast."
draft: When the wizards came, Moses said to them: "Throw whatever you want to throw."
hil: When the sorcerers came, Moses said to them, 'Throw whatever you want to throw.'
compare: When the wizards came, Moses said to them: "Throw whatever you want to throw."

src: Hat sie nicht die Kunde von denen erreicht, die vor ihnen waren vom Volke Noahs, von `Ad und Tamud und vom Volke Abrahams und den Bewohnern Madyans und der zusammengestürzten Städte? Ihre Gesandten kamen mit deutlichen Zeichen zu ihnen. Allah also wollte ihnen kein Unrecht tun, doch sie taten sich selber Unrecht.
ref: Has not the news of those before them come to them; of the people of Nuh and Ad and Samood, and the people of Ibrahim and the dwellers of Madyan and the overthrown cities; their apostles came to them with clear arguments; so it was not Allah Who should do them injustice, but they were unjust to themselves.
draft: Hasn't the news reached her of those before them - the people of Noah, 'Ad and Thamud, the people of Abraham, the inhabitants of Midian and the towns overturned [by the flood] ? Their messengers came to them with clear proofs. And Allah would never have wronged them, but they were wronging themselves.
hil: "Hasn't the news reached them of those who were before them, the people of Noah, 'Ad, Thamud, the people of Abraham, and the inhabitants of Midian and the destroyed cities? Their messengers came to them with clear proofs. Allah did not wrong them, but they wronged themselves."
compare: "Hasn't the news reached them of those who were before them, the people of Noah, 'Ad, Thamud, the people of Abraham, and the inhabitants of Midian and the destroyed cities? Their messengers came to them with clear proofs. Allah did not wrong them, but they wronged themselves."

src: Sie haben ja kein Wissen darüber. Sie stellen nur Schätzungen an.
ref: They do not know its truth at all; they only make guesses.
draft: You do not have any knowledge about it. You can only make estimations.
hil: You have no knowledge about it. You only make estimations.
compare: You do not have any knowledge about it. You can only make estimations.

src: Mir wird offenbart, daß euer Gott ein Einziger Gott ist; so seid aufrichtig gegen Ihn und bittet Ihn um Vergebung." Und wehe den Götzendienern
ref: To me it has been revealed that your God is One God; so go straight with Him, and ask for His forgiveness; and woe to the idolaters
draft: "I am revealed that your God is One God; so be sincere to Him and ask Him for forgiveness." And woe to the idolaters.
hil: "I am revealed that your God is One God; so be sincere to Him and ask Him for forgiveness." And woe to the idolaters.
compare: "I am revealed that your God is One God; so be sincere to Him and ask Him for forgiveness." And woe to the idolaters.

src: Er warf die Tafeln hin und ergriff seinen Bruder beim Kopf, indem er ihn an sich zog.
ref: And he cast aside the tablets, and pulled his brother by the hair.
draft: He threw the tablets and seized his brother by the head, pulling him towards himself.
hil: He threw the tablets and took hold of his brother's head, pulling him towards himself.
compare: He threw the tablets and seized his brother by the head, pulling him towards himself.

src: Allahs Gesandter sagte zu ihnen: "(Achtet auf) Allahs Kamelstute und ihre Trinkzeit."
ref: And the apostle of God had to tell them: "This is God's she-camel, let her drink."
draft: "Allah's messenger said to them: "(Beware of) Allah's she-camel and its drinking time.""
hil: Allah's messenger said to them: '(Beware of) Allah's she-camel and its drinking time.'
compare: "Allah's messenger said to them: "(Beware of) Allah's she-camel and its drinking time.""

src: Und so haben Wir euch zu einer Gemeinschaft der Mitte gemacht, damit ihr Zeugen über die (anderen) Menschen seiet und damit der Gesandte über euch Zeuge sei. Wir hatten die Gebetsrichtung, die du einhieltest, nur bestimmt, um zu wissen, wer dem Gesandten folgt und wer sich auf den Fersen umkehrt.
ref: Thus, have We made of you an Ummat justly balanced, that ye might be witnesses over the nations, and the Messenger a witness over yourselves; and We appointed the Qibla to which thou wast used, only to test those who followed the Messenger from those who would turn on their heels (From the Faith).
draft: And so We have made you a just community that you will be witnesses over the people and the Messenger will be a witness over you. And We did not make the qiblah which you used to face except that We might make evident who would follow the Messenger from who would turn back on his heels.
hil: Thus We have appointed you a midmost nation that you might be witnesses to the people and that the Messenger might be a witness to you. And We did not appoint the direction you were facing except to know who followed the Messenger and who turned back on his heels.
compare: And so We have made you a just community that you will be witnesses over the people and the Messenger will be a witness over you. And We did not make the qiblah which you used to face except that We might make evident who would follow the Messenger from who would turn back on his heels.

src: Nein! Vielmehr sind sie lebendig; aber ihr nehmt es nicht wahr.
ref: In fact, they are alive but you do not perceive that life.
draft: No! Rather, they are alive; but you do not perceive it.
hil: "Actually, they are alive; but you do not perceive it."
compare: No! Rather, they are alive; but you do not perceive it.

src: Sag: Jeder handelt nach seiner Weise.
ref: Say, “Each does according to his disposition.
draft: Say: Everyone acts according to their own way.
hil: Say: Everyone acts according to their disposition.
compare: Say: Everyone acts according to their disposition.

src: Und des Abraham, der (seine Pflichten) erfüllte?
ref: And of Abraham who fulfilled his trust? --
draft: And what about Abraham, who fulfilled (his obligations)?
hil: And what would be the recompense for the one among you who fulfilled his obligations, except the most terrible of chastisement in the hereafter?
compare: And what about Abraham, who fulfilled (his obligations)?

src: Gewiß, diejenigen, denen ihr anstelle von ALLAH dient, haben für euch kein Rizq, so strebt das Rizq bei ALLAH an, dient Ihm und erweist euch Ihm gegenüber dankbar!
ref: Surely those you worship other than God have no power over your means of livelihood. So seek your sustenance from God, and worship Him and give Him thanks.
draft: Certainly, those whom you serve instead of Allah have no provisions for you, so seek provisions from Allah, serve Him and show gratitude to Him!
hil: Certainly, those whom you serve instead of Allah have no provisions for you, so seek provisions from Allah, worship Him, and show gratitude to Him!
compare: Certainly, those whom you serve instead of Allah have no provisions for you, so seek provisions from Allah, worship Him, and show gratitude to Him!

src: Doch wahrlich, er (Jesus) ist ein Vorzeichen der Stunde. So bezweifelt sie nicht, sondern folgt Mir. Das ist ein gerader Weg.
ref: And indeed Eisa is a sign* of the Last Day, therefore do not ever doubt in the Last Day, and obey Me**; this is the Straight Path. (* The advent of Prophet Eisa to earth for the second time. ** By obeying the Noble Messenger.)
draft: But truly, he (Jesus) is a sign of the Hour. So do not doubt it, but follow Me. This is a straight path.
hil: But indeed, he (Jesus) is a sign of the Hour. So do not doubt it, but follow Me. This is a straight path.
compare: But truly, he (Jesus) is a sign of the Hour. So do not doubt it, but follow Me. This is a straight path.

src: (Es gibt) keine Zuflucht.
ref: There is no refuge!
draft: There is no refuge.
hil: "There is no refuge."
compare: There is no refuge.

src: Darin sind wahrlich Zeichen für die Betrachtenden.
ref: Herein are really signs for those who discern.
draft: There are truly signs in it for those who consider.
hil: Behold, in it there are signs for those who contemplate.
compare: There are truly signs in it for those who consider.

src: Die Frau Fir'auns sagte: "(Er wird) für mich und dich ein Grund zur Freude sein. Tötet ihn nicht. Vielleicht nützt er uns oder wir nehmen ihn als Kind an." Dabei merkten sie nicht (, was sie taten).
ref: And the wife of Fir'awn said: a comfort unto me and thee slay him not; belike he shall be of benefit to us or we might like him for a son; and they perceived not.
draft: The woman of Pharaoh said: "(He will) be a source of joy for me and you. Do not kill him. Maybe he will benefit us or we'll take him as a child." They didn't realize (what they were doing) while saying this.
hil: The wife of Pharaoh said: '(He will) be a source of joy for me and you. Do not kill him. Perhaps he may benefit us or we will take him as a child.' They did not realize what they were doing while saying this.
compare: The wife of Pharaoh said: '(He will) be a source of joy for me and you. Do not kill him. Perhaps he may benefit us or we will take him as a child.' They did not realize what they were doing while saying this.

src: An ihnen habt ihr sonst allerlei Nutzen.
ref: You may also obtain other benefits from them.
draft: You otherwise have all sorts of benefits from them.
hil: "You have other benefits from them.",
compare: You otherwise have all sorts of benefits from them.

src: Und Wir gaben ihm solche Schätze, daß deren Schlüssel wahrlich eine schwere Last für eine (ganze) Schar kräftiger Männer gewesen wären.
ref: We had given him treasures, so many that a team of wrestlers could hardly lift their keys.
draft: And We gave him such treasures that the keys to them would have been a truly heavy burden for a (whole) group of strong men.
hil: And We gave him treasures, the keys to which would have been a truly heavy burden for a (whole) group of strong men.
compare: And We gave him such treasures that the keys to them would have been a truly heavy burden for a (whole) group of strong men.

src: Ihr sollt Gott allein dienen. Ich fürchte für euch die Pein eines schmerzvollen Tages.»
ref: Do not worship anyone but God; for I fear the punishment of a dreadful day for you."
draft: "You shall serve God alone. I fear for you the torment of a painful day."
hil: You shall serve God alone. I fear for you the torment of a painful day.
compare: "You shall serve God alone. I fear for you the torment of a painful day."

src: Seid nicht wie diejenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben und zu ihren Brüdern sagten, als diese sich auf Handelsreisen oder Feldzügen befanden: "Wären sie bei uns geblieben, wären sie weder gestorben, noch getötet worden." (Sagt es nicht), damit ALLAH dies als Bitterkeit (nur) in ihren Herzen bleiben läßt.
ref: Be not like those who disbelieve (hypocrites) and who say to their brethren when they travel through the earth or go out to fight: "If they had stayed with us, they would not have died or been killed," so that Allah may make it a cause of regret in their hearts.
draft: Do not be like those who committed disbelief and said to their brothers who were traveling or fighting in battles, "If they had been with us, they would not have died or been killed." (Do not say this) so that Allah may make it a source of regret in their hearts.
hil: Do not be like those who said to their brothers, when they were on journeys or on military expeditions, and had they stayed with us, they would not have died or been killed, those who have disbelieved. Do not say (such thing), so Allah makes it a source of anguish for them in their hearts.
compare: Do not be like those who committed disbelief and said to their brothers who were traveling or fighting in battles, "If they had been with us, they would not have died or been killed." (Do not say this) so that Allah may make it a source of regret in their hearts.

src: Und Er hat euch in der Religion keine Bedrängnis auferlegt; so ist die Glaubensrichtung eures Vaters Abraham. Er hat euch Muslime genannt, früher und (nunmehr) in diesem (Buch), auf daß der Gesandte Zeuge über euch sei und ihr Zeugen über die Menschen seid.
ref: He has chosen you (to convey His Message of Islamic Monotheism to mankind by inviting them to His religion, Islam), and has not laid upon you in religion any hardship, it is the religion of your father Ibrahim (Abraham) (Islamic Monotheism).
draft: And He has not placed upon you any difficulty in the religion. (It is) the religion of your father, Abraham. Allah named you "Muslims" before (in former scriptures) and in this (revelation) that the Messenger may be a witness over you and you may be witnesses over the people.
hil: And He has not laid upon you in religion any hardship. (This is) the way of the one upon whom Allah has bestowed His favor, so follow it. And (remember that) Allah is All-Hearing, All-Knowing. He has named you Muslims before and in this (revelation) that the Messenger may be a witness over you and you may be witnesses over the people, so perform prayer and give zakah and hold fast to Allah. He is your protector; and excellent is the protector, and excellent is the helper.
compare: And He has not placed upon you any difficulty in the religion. (It is) the religion of your father, Abraham. Allah named you "Muslims" before (in former scriptures) and in this (revelation) that the Messenger may be a witness over you and you may be witnesses over the people.

src: Sag: Wollt ihr denn Allah kundtun, was Er nicht kennt, weder in den Himmeln noch auf der Erde? Preis sei Ihm!
ref: You inform Allah of something which in His knowledge does not exist in the heavens or in the earth?” Purity and Supremacy are to Him, above their association. (* Some things like the sun, stars, trees are useful but they too are created by Allah.
draft: Say: Do you want to inform Allah of what He does not know, neither in the heavens nor on the earth? Glory be to Him!
hil: Say, do you wish to inform Allah of that which He knows not in the heavens or on the earth? Glory be to Him!
compare: Say, do you wish to inform Allah of that which He knows not in the heavens or on the earth? Glory be to Him!

src: Habe Ich euch, ihr Kinder Adams, nicht geboten, nicht Satan zu dienen - denn er ist euer offenkundiger Feind -
ref: Did I not commit you, O children of Adam, not to worship Satan who is your acknowledged foe,
draft: I have not commanded you, O children of Adam, to serve the Satan, for he is your open enemy.
hil: I have not commanded you, O children of Adam, to serve the Satan, for he is your open enemy.
compare: I have not commanded you, O children of Adam, to serve the Satan, for he is your open enemy.

src: Was aber diejenigen angeht, die ungläubig sind, so sagen sie: "Was will denn Allah damit als Gleichnis?" Er läßt damit viele in die Irre gehen und leitet viele damit recht, doch läßt Er damit nur die Frevler in die Irre gehen,
ref: He misleads many thereby, and He guides many thereby; and with it He misleads only those who are rebellious.
draft: As for those who disbelieve, they say, "What does Allah mean by this parable?" He causes many thereby to err and many He leads thereby aright, but He does not cause thereby except the defiantly disobedient [to Allah].
hil: As for those who disbelieve, they say, 'What does Allah mean by this parable?' He causes many thereby to err and many He guides thereby aright, but He sends astray thereby only the defiantly disobedient [to Allah].
compare: As for those who disbelieve, they say, 'What does Allah mean by this parable?' He causes many thereby to err and many He guides thereby aright, but He sends astray thereby only the defiantly disobedient [to Allah].

src: Und als ihm Unsere Ayat vorgetragen wurden, kehrte er den Rücken in Arroganz um, als ob er sie nicht hörte, als ob in seinen Ohren Schwerhörigkeit wäre.
ref: When Our verses are recited before them they turn away haughtily as though they did not hear them, as if a deafness had come into their ears.
draft: And when Our verses are recited to him, he turns away arrogantly as if he had not heard them, as if there was deafness in his ears.
hil: When Our verses are recited to him, he turns away haughtily as if he did not hear them - as if there is deafness in his ears. So give him the glad tidings of a painful punishment.
compare: And when Our verses are recited to him, he turns away arrogantly as if he had not heard them, as if there was deafness in his ears.

src: Tragen werden sie aber nichts von ihren Verfehlungen, denn sie sind fürwahr Lügner.
ref: Surely, they are liars.
draft: They will not carry anything with them from their mistakes, for they are truly liars.
hil: "But they will not carry anything of their transgressions, for they are truly liars."
compare: "But they will not carry anything of their transgressions, for they are truly liars."

src: Aber ihr liebt die nicht, die gut raten.»
ref: (The people in the graves can hear the speech of those who are on earth.)
draft: But you do not love those who give good advice.
hil: But you do not love those who give good advice.
compare: But you do not love those who give good advice.

src: Bereits war es eine Aya für euch in zwei Gruppierungen, die aufeinander trafen, eine Gruppe kämpfte fi-sabilillah, und eine andere war kufr-betreibend. (Die Mumin) sahen sie augenscheinlich in doppelter Anzahl.
ref: There was a token for you in the two armies which clashed (in the battle of Badr), one fighting for God, the other of unbelievers who saw with their own eyes the faithful to be two times as many as they, for God reinforces with His help whomsoever He will.
draft: Already there was [a sign] for you in the two armies which met - one fighting in the way of Allah and another disbelieving. They saw them [to be] twice their [own] number in clear sight.
hil: Indeed, there was a sign for you in the two armies that clashed: one fighting in Allah's cause against the disbelievers, whom the Muslims saw to be twice their number. And Allah strengthens with His victory whom He wills. Surely, therein is a lesson for those who reflect.
compare: Indeed, there was a sign for you in the two armies that clashed: one fighting in Allah's cause against the disbelievers, whom the Muslims saw to be twice their number. And Allah strengthens with His victory whom He wills. Surely, therein is a lesson for those who reflect.

src: Was ist mit euch, daß ihr Allah nicht (in der Ihm gebührenden Weise) ehrt
ref: What has come upon you that you do not fear the majesty of God,
draft: What's wrong with you that you don't honor Allah (in the way He deserves)?
hil: What is wrong with you that you do not honour Allah in the way He deserves?
compare: What's wrong with you that you don't honor Allah (in the way He deserves)?

src: Der Satan droht euch Armut an und befiehlt euch Schändliches. Gott verheißt euch Vergebung von seiner Seite und Huld. Gott umfaßt und weiß alles.
ref: The devil scares you of poverty and bids you to the shameful; and Allah promises you forgiveness from Him, and munificence; and Allah is Most Capable, All Knowing.
draft: The devil threatens you with poverty and commands you to do shameful deeds. God promises you forgiveness from His side and grace. God encompasses and knows everything.
hil: Satan threatens you with poverty and orders you to do shameful things. God promises you forgiveness from His side and favor. God encompasses and knows everything.
compare: Satan threatens you with poverty and orders you to do shameful things. God promises you forgiveness from His side and favor. God encompasses and knows everything.

src: Beinahe werde ICH sie enthüllen, damit jeder Seele nach ihrem Bestreben vergolten wird.
ref: I keep it secret that every soul may be rewarded for its endeavour.
draft: Almost I will reveal them, so that every soul will be rewarded according to its desire.
hil: Almost I will reveal them, so that every soul will be rewarded according to its desire.
compare: Almost I will reveal them, so that every soul will be rewarded according to its desire.

src: Und (Wir sandten) zu Madyan ihren Bruder Shuayb.
ref: Remember, We sent to Midian their brother Shu'aib.
draft: And (We sent) to Midian their brother Shuayb.
hil: And to Midian (We sent) their brother Shuayb.
compare: And (We sent) to Midian their brother Shuayb.

src: Mache Da"wa zum Weg deines HERRN mit Weisheit und schöner Ermahnung, und disputiere mit ihnen auf die beste Art. Gewiß, dein HERR ist es, der Wissen darüber hat, wer von Seinem Weg abgekommen ist.
ref: Call them unto the way of thy Lord with Wisdom and goodly exhortation, and argue with them with that which is best. Verily thy Lord!
draft: Call to the path of your Lord with wisdom and beautiful exhortation, and argue with them in the best way. Indeed, your Lord is the one who knows best who has strayed from His path.
hil: Call to the path of your God with wisdom and beautiful exhortation, and argue with them in the best way. Your God is the one who knows best who has strayed from His path.
compare: Call to the path of your Lord with wisdom and beautiful exhortation, and argue with them in the best way. Indeed, your Lord is the one who knows best who has strayed from His path.

src: Und da gibt es bei ihnen Werke, die anders sind als diese, und die sie vollbringen.
ref: Moreover, there are other deeds besides this which they do.
draft: And there are works among them that are different from these, and that they accomplish.
hil: And there are works among them that are different from these, and that they perform.
compare: And there are works among them that are different from these, and that they accomplish.

src: Weiß er denn nicht?
ref: So does he not know?
draft: He does not know?
hil: Does he not know?
compare: Does he not know?

src: Und Wir haben einige der Propheten vor den anderen bevorzugt. Und Wir haben David eine Schrift zukommen lassen.
ref: We exalted some of the prophets over the others; and to David We gave the Book of Psalms.
draft: And we have preferred some of the prophets above others. And We have given David a scripture.
hil: And We have preferred some of the prophets above others. And We have given David a scripture.
compare: And we have preferred some of the prophets above others. And We have given David a scripture.

src: Und wenn eine jede Seele, die Unrecht begangen hat, alles besäße, was auf Erden ist, würde sie versuchen, sich damit (von der Strafe) loszukaufen. Und sie werden Reue empfinden, wenn sie sehen, wie die Strafe (über sie) kommt.
ref: Even if every soul that has sinned possessed whatever is on the earth, it would surely offer it to ransom itself, and feel repentant on seeing the punishment.
draft: And if every soul that has done wrong possessed everything that is on earth, it would try to redeem itself (from the punishment) with it. And they will feel regret when they see how the punishment (comes upon them).
hil: If every unjust soul owned everything on earth, it would certainly give it to redeem itself, and they secretly felt repentant when they saw the punishment; it has been judged between them with fairness, they will not be wronged.
compare: And if every soul that has done wrong possessed everything that is on earth, it would try to redeem itself (from the punishment) with it. And they will feel regret when they see how the punishment (comes upon them).

src: Würden sie doch, wenn sie euch besiegten, weder Bindungen noch Verpflichtungen euch gegenüber einhalten! Sie würden euch mit dem Munde gefällig sein, indes ihre Herzen sich weigerten; und die meisten von ihnen sind Frevler.
ref: If they get the better of you, they will not observe towards you any bond or treaty, giving you satisfaction with their mouths but in their hearts refusing; and the most of them are ungodly.
draft: If they were to defeat you, they would not keep any ties or obligations to you! They would be pleasing with their mouths, while their hearts refused; and most of them are transgressors.
hil: If they were to defeat you, they would not keep any ties or obligations to you! They would be pleasing with their mouths, while their hearts refused; and most of them are transgressors.
compare: If they were to defeat you, they would not keep any ties or obligations to you! They would be pleasing with their mouths, while their hearts refused; and most of them are transgressors.

src: (Sie sind) verflucht. Wo immer sie (im Kampf) angetroffen werden, werden sie ergriffen und allesamt getötet.
ref: Accursed, they would be seized wherever found, and slain mercilessly.
draft: (Curse upon them.) Wherever they are encountered (in battle), they are captured and all killed.
hil: "Cursed are they, wherever they are encountered (in battle), they are captured and all killed."
compare: "Cursed are they, wherever they are encountered (in battle), they are captured and all killed."

src: Und es hielt Uns nichts zurück, Gesandte mit den Ayat zu entsenden, außer daß die Früheren sie als Lüge erklärten. Und WIR ließen Thamud das Kamelweibchen als Erläuterung zuteil werden, so begingen sie mit ihm Unrecht.
ref: Naught prevented Us from sending the signs but that the ancients cried lies to them; and We brought Thamood the She-camel visible, but they did her wrong.
draft: And nothing held us back from sending messengers with the verses except that the earlier people denied them as lies. We made the she-camel a clear sign for Thamud, but they wronged it.
hil: And nothing held us back from sending messengers with the verses except that the earlier people denied them as lies. We made the she-camel a clear sign for Thamud, but they wronged it.
compare: And nothing held us back from sending messengers with the verses except that the earlier people denied them as lies. We made the she-camel a clear sign for Thamud, but they wronged it.

src: Vielmehr hat Allah ihn zu Sich erhoben. Allah ist Allmächtig und Allweise.
ref: Allah took him up to Himself; and Allah is Mighty, Wise.
draft: Rather, Allah has raised him to Himself. Allah is All-Powerful and All-Wise.
hil: But God raised him up (in position) and closer to Himself; and God is all-mighty and all-wise.
compare: Rather, Allah has raised him to Himself. Allah is All-Powerful and All-Wise.

src: (Von ihnen) sagen wir uns vor Dir los.
ref: We led them astray, as we were astray ourselves. We declare our innocence (from them) before You.
draft: We say goodbye to each other in front of you.
hil: We dissociate ourselves from them before you.
compare: We dissociate ourselves from them before you.

src: Nicht Wir taten ihnen Unrecht, sondern sie taten sich selber Unrecht an; und ihre Götter, die sie statt Allah anriefen, nützten ihnen überhaupt nichts, als der Befehl deines Herrn eintraf; sie stürzten sie nur noch mehr ins Verderben.
ref: We did not wrong them; they wronged themselves. When your Lord's chastisement descended upon them, their gods, on whom they called apart from God, were not of the least avail, and all they did was only to add to their destruction.
draft: We did not wrong them, but rather they wronged themselves; and their gods, whom they called upon instead of Allah, availed them naught when the command of your Lord came; and they added to them naught but perdition.
hil: We did not do them wrong, but rather they wronged themselves; and their gods, whom they called upon instead of Allah, availed them naught when the decree of your Lord came; they only plunged them deeper into destruction.
compare: We did not do them wrong, but rather they wronged themselves; and their gods, whom they called upon instead of Allah, availed them naught when the decree of your Lord came; they only plunged them deeper into destruction.

src: Wahrlich, Allah hat Macht über alle Dinge.
ref: Indeed God has power over everything.
draft: Truly, Allah has power over all things.
hil: Truly, Allah has power over all things.
compare: Truly, Allah has power over all things.

src: Und es dann zu grauer Spreu macht.
ref: Then reduces them to rusty rubbish.
draft: And then turns it into gray chaff.
hil: And turns it into gray chaff.
compare: And turns it into gray chaff.

src: Ihr werdet doch, inscha-allah, Almasdschidil-haram betreten, sicher mit rasierten Häuptern oder mit kurzgeschnittenen (Haaren).
ref: If Allah so wills you shall certainly enter the Inviolable Mosque, in full security, you will shave your heads and cut your hair short, and do so without any fear.
draft: You will enter Al-Masjid al-Haram, God willing, surely with shaved heads or with short-cropped hair.
hil: You will enter Al-Masjid al-Haram, God willing, surely with shaved heads or with short-cropped hair.
compare: You will enter Al-Masjid al-Haram, God willing, surely with shaved heads or with short-cropped hair.

src: Diese werden freigesprochen von dem, was man (über sie) redet.
ref: Those are acquitted of what they say.
draft: They are acquitted of what is being said about them.
hil: They will be acquitted of what is spoken (about them).
compare: They will be acquitted of what is spoken (about them).

src: Und wenn das Wort über sie fällig wird, bringen Wir ihnen ein Tier aus der Erde hervor, das zu ihnen spricht; (dies), weil die Menschen von Unseren Zeichen nicht überzeugt sind.
ref: When the sentence will have been passed against them, We shall bring forth beastly brutes from the earth who will torment them, for men certainly do not believe Our signs.
draft: And when the word is applied to them, We will bring forth for them a creature from the earth speaking to them, (saying) that the people were not certain in Our signs.
hil: "And when the word is cast over them, We bring forth for them from the earth a creature talking to them, (saying), 'that is because people are not convinced by Our signs.'"
compare: "And when the word is cast over them, We bring forth for them from the earth a creature talking to them, (saying), 'that is because people are not convinced by Our signs.'"

src: Und ich bin nicht Diener Dessen, was ihr gedient habt,
ref: Nor will I worship what you worship,
draft: And I am not a servant of what you have served.
hil: And I am not a servant of what you have served.
compare: And I am not a servant of what you have served.

src: ALLAH hat für sie Dschannat vorbereitet, die von Flüssen durchflossen werden.
ref: Allah has prepared for them Gardens beneath which rivers flow.
draft: ALLAH has prepared paradise for them, which is traversed by rivers.
hil: God has provision for them of gardens with streams of running water, where they will abide forever.
compare: God has provision for them of gardens with streams of running water, where they will abide forever.

src: Bei dem Morgen
ref: I CALL TO witness the early hours of morning,
draft: "At the morning".
hil: "At the morning",
compare: "At the morning".

src: Aber die Antwort seines Volkes war nur, daß sie sagten: "Tötet ihn oder verbrennt ihn." Da rettete Allah ihn aus dem Feuer.
ref: The people (of Abraham) had no answer except: "Kill him or burn him;" but God saved him from the fire.
draft: But the answer of his people was only that they said, "Kill him or burn him." Then Allah saved him from the fire.
hil: But when his people's only response was saying, "Kill him or burn him" and Allah saved him from the fire.
compare: But the answer of his people was only that they said, "Kill him or burn him." Then Allah saved him from the fire.

src: Und ein Zauberer soll keinen Erfolg haben, woher er auch kommen mag."
ref: That which they have made is only a magician's trick, and the magician will never be successful, no matter whatever amount (of skill) he may attain."
draft: "And a wizard shall not have success, no matter where he may come from."
hil: And a wizard shall have no success, no matter where he may come from.
compare: And a wizard shall have no success, no matter where he may come from.

src: Vortreffliche, die (alles) aufschreiben,
ref: Illustrious scribes
draft: "Excellent ones, who write down (everything)"
hil: "Excellent ones, who write down (everything)"
compare: "Excellent ones, who write down (everything)"

src: Er sagte: "Es (die Schätze) wurde mir nur um des Wissens willen, das ich besitze, gegeben."
ref: He said: "This has come to me through my own acumen."
draft: He said: "It was only given to me for the sake of the knowledge that I possess."
hil: He said, "It was only given to me for the sake of the knowledge that I possess."
compare: He said: "It was only given to me for the sake of the knowledge that I possess."

src: Das Verschieben (eines Haram-Monats) ist eine Steigerung von Kufr. Damit werden diejenigen irregeleitet, die Kufr betrieben haben. Sie erklären ihn in einem Jahr für einen Nicht-Haram-Monat und in einem anderen Jahr für einen Haram-Monat, um der Anzahl der von ALLAH festgelegten Haram-Monate zu entsprechen und dann für halal zu erklären, was ALLAH für haram erklärte. Ihnen wurde das Schlechte ihrer Handlungen als schön dargeboten. ALLAH leitet die Kafir-Leute nicht recht.
ref: Their postponing of the months is nothing but furtherance in disbelief – the disbelievers are misled by it – they decree it lawful in one year and regard it forbidden in another year, in order to equate to the number of the months which Allah has made sacred, and to make lawful what Allah has forbidden; their evil deeds seem good in their sight; and Allah does not guide the disbelievers.
draft: The postponement (of a Haram month) is an increase in Kufr. This misleads those who have committed Kufr. They declare it to be a non-Haram month in one year and a Haram month in another year in order to correspond to the number of Haram months set by ALLAH, and then declare as halal what ALLAH has declared as haram. The badness of their actions has been presented to them as beauty. ALLAH does not guide the disbelieving people rightly.
hil: Postponing (a Haram month) is an increase in Kufr. It misguides those who have committed Kufr. They declare it a non-Haram month in one year and a Haram month in another year, to correspond with the number of Haram months set by Allah, and then declare as halal what Allah declared as haram. The evil of their deeds has been made to appear attractive to them. Allah does not guide the disbelieving people rightly.
compare: The postponement (of a Haram month) is an increase in Kufr. This misleads those who have committed Kufr. They declare it to be a non-Haram month in one year and a Haram month in another year in order to correspond to the number of Haram months set by ALLAH, and then declare as halal what ALLAH has declared as haram. The badness of their actions has been presented to them as beauty. ALLAH does not guide the disbelieving people rightly.

src: Er sprach: "O mein Volk, (ihr) seht nicht ein, daß ich einen klaren Beweis von meinem Herrn habe; und Er hat mir Seine Barmherzigkeit gewährt, die euch aber verborgen geblieben ist.
ref: He said: "O my people! Tell me, if I have a clear proof from my Lord, and a Mercy (Prophethood, etc.) has come to me from Him, but that (Mercy) has been obscured from your sight.
draft: He said: "O my people, you do not perceive that I have a clear proof from my Lord; and He has granted me His mercy, though it is hidden from you.
hil: He said, "O my people, do you not see that I have a clear proof from my Lord, and He has granted me His mercy, which has been hidden from you."
compare: He said, "O my people, do you not see that I have a clear proof from my Lord, and He has granted me His mercy, which has been hidden from you."

src: Gewiß, WIR entsandten dich mit der Wahrheit als Überbringer froher Botschaft und als Warner.
ref: We have sent you with the truth, to give glad tidings and to warn.
draft: Certainly, WE sent you as a bearer of glad tidings and a warner with the truth.
hil: Verily, We have sent you with the Truth, giving glad tidings and heralding warnings.
compare: Verily, We have sent you with the Truth, giving glad tidings and heralding warnings.

src: Selbst wenn ich zu meinem Herrn zurückgebracht werde, so werde ich ganz gewiß einen besseren Aufenthalt als diesen finden."
ref: And even if I am returned to my Lord, I will find something better than this in return.”
draft: "Even if I am brought back to my Lord, I will surely find a better dwelling than this one."
hil: Even if I am returned to my Lord, I will surely find a better dwelling place than this one
compare: "Even if I am brought back to my Lord, I will surely find a better dwelling than this one."

src: Und Allahs ist, was in den Himmeln und was auf der Erde ist; Er verzeiht, wem Er will, und straft, wen Er will, und Allah ist Allverzeihend und Barmherzig.
ref: To God belongs all that is in the heavens and the earth: He may pardon whom He please and punish whom He will. Yet God is forgiving and kind.
draft: "And Allah's is whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. He forgives whom He wills and punishes whom He wills, and Allah is Forgiving and Merciful."
hil: To God belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth, He forgives whom He wills and punishes whom He wills, and God is Forgiving and Merciful.
compare: To God belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth, He forgives whom He wills and punishes whom He wills, and God is Forgiving and Merciful.

src: Dabei hatten sie sich vorher Gott gegenüber verpflichtet, sie würden nicht den Rücken kehren. Über die Verpflichtung Gott gegenüber wird Rechenschaft gefordert.
ref: Whereas earlier they had made a promise to God that they would never turn their backs; and a promise made to God is answerable.
draft: They had previously committed themselves to God that they would not turn their backs. Accountability is demanded regarding the commitment to God.
hil: Although they had pledged to God in the past not to turn their backs, accountability is demanded regarding their commitment to God.
compare: Although they had pledged to God in the past not to turn their backs, accountability is demanded regarding their commitment to God.

src: Bereits haben sie doch Musa um Größeres als dieses gebeten, sie sagten: "Zeige uns ALLAH offenkundig!" Dann erschlug sie der Blitz wegen ihrer Übertretung, dann nahmen sie sich das Kalb (als Götzen), nachdem zu ihnen die deutlichen Zeichen gekommen waren, dann haben WIR ihnen dies vergeben und ließen Musa einen eindeutigen Beweis zuteil werden.
ref: Of Moses they asked greater than that, they said to him: 'Show us Allah openly' And a thunderbolt took them for their evil doing. Then they took to themselves the calf, after the clear proofs had come to them, yet We forgave that and We gave Moses clear authority.
draft: They have already asked Musa for something greater than this, they said: "Show us ALLAH clearly!" Then the lightning struck them because of their transgression, and then they took the calf (as an idol) after the clear signs came to them, then We forgave them for this and let Musa have a clear proof.
hil: They have already asked Musa for something greater than this, they said: "Show us ALLAH clearly!" Then the lightning struck them because of their transgression, and then they took the calf (as an idol) after the clear signs came to them, then We forgave them for this and let Musa have a clear proof.
compare: They have already asked Musa for something greater than this, they said: "Show us ALLAH clearly!" Then the lightning struck them because of their transgression, and then they took the calf (as an idol) after the clear signs came to them, then We forgave them for this and let Musa have a clear proof.

src: Und so erweckten Wir sie auf, damit sie sich gegenseitig fragten.
ref: Even so We roused them that they may question one another.
draft: And so We woke them up, so that they could ask each other.
hil: And thus We awakened them so that they could question each other.
compare: And thus We awakened them so that they could question each other.

src: Was ist Al-Haqqa?
ref: What is the concrete reality?
draft: What is Al-Haqqa?
hil: What is Al-Haqqa?
compare: What is Al-Haqqa?

src: ER sagte: "In Kürze werden sie es doch noch bereuen."
ref: Answered (the Lord): "They shall wake up repenting soon."
draft: He said, "They will regret it shortly."
hil: "He said, 'They will regret it shortly.'"
compare: "He said, 'They will regret it shortly.'"

src: Und wenn ein Teil von euch an das glauben sollte, womit ich gesandt worden bin, ein anderer Teil aber nicht glauben sollte, so geduldet euch, bis Allah zwischen uns richtet. Er ist der Beste derer, die richten."
ref: If some of you believe what has been sent through me, and some of you do not, have patience until God decide between us, for He is the best of all judges."
draft: "And if a part of you believes in that which I have been sent with, but another part does not believe, then be patient until Allah judges between us. He is the Best of judges."
hil: "And if a part of you should believe in that with which I have been sent and another part should not believe, then be patient until Allah judges between us. He is the best of judges."
compare: "And if a part of you believes in that which I have been sent with, but another part does not believe, then be patient until Allah judges between us. He is the Best of judges."

src: Verkündet ihr mir daß ich auferstehen soll, obwohl schon vor mir Geschlechter dahingegangen sind?" und (der ihnen, wenn) sie beide Allah zu Hilfe rufen (und zu ihm sagen): "Wehe dir, glaube!
ref: You promise me that I will be raised again whereas generations have passed away before me?” And they both seek Allah’s help and say to him, “May you be ruined, accept faith!
draft: "Will you announce to me that I should resurrect, even though generations have passed away before me?" and (to whom) they both call Allah for help (and say to Him): "Woe to you! Believe (in Allah)."
hil: Will you announce to me that I should resurrect, even though generations have passed away before me?" They both call upon Allah for help and say to Him: "Woe to you, believe!"
compare: Will you announce to me that I should resurrect, even though generations have passed away before me?" They both call upon Allah for help and say to Him: "Woe to you, believe!"

src: Es gibt für den Blinden keinen Grund zur Bedrängnis, es gibt für den Hinkenden keinen Grund zur Bedrängnis, es gibt für den Kranken keinen Grund zur Bedrängnis, sowie auch für euch nicht, in euren (eigenen) Häusern zu essen oder in den Häusern eurer Väter, den Häusern eurer Mütter, den Häusern eurer Brüder, den Häusern eurer Schwestern, den Häusern eurer Onkel väterlicherseits, den Häusern eurer Tanten väterlicherseits, den Häusern eurer Onkel mütterlicherseits, den Häusern eurer Tanten mütterlicherseits, (in einem Haus,) dessen Schlüssel ihr besitzt, oder (im Haus) eures Freundes.
ref: No restriction is there upon the blind, nor is there the restriction upon a lame, nor is there a restriction upon the sick. nor upon yourselves that ye eat in your houses or the houses of your fathers or the houses of your mothers or the houses of your brothers or the houses of your sisters or the houses of your fathers brothers or the houses of your fathers sisters or the houses of your mothers brothers or the houses of your mothers sisters or from that house where of ye own the keys or from the house of a friend.
draft: There is no reason for distress for the blind person, there is no reason for distress for the lame person, there is no reason for distress for the sick person, just as there is no reason for distress for you when eating in your own homes or in the homes of your fathers, the homes of your mothers, the homes of your brothers, the homes of your sisters, the homes of your paternal uncles, the homes of your paternal aunts, the homes of your maternal uncles, the homes of your maternal aunts, (in a house) whose keys you possess, or (in the house) of your friend.
hil: There is no reason for distress for the blind person, there is no reason for distress for the lame person, there is no reason for distress for the sick person, as well as for you, to eat in your (own) homes or in the homes of your fathers, the homes of your mothers, the homes of your brothers, the homes of your sisters, the homes of your paternal uncles, the homes of your paternal aunts, the homes of your maternal uncles, the homes of your maternal aunts, (in a house,) whose keys you possess, or (in the house) of your friend.
compare: There is no reason for distress for the blind person, there is no reason for distress for the lame person, there is no reason for distress for the sick person, just as there is no reason for distress for you when eating in your own homes or in the homes of your fathers, the homes of your mothers, the homes of your brothers, the homes of your sisters, the homes of your paternal uncles, the homes of your paternal aunts, the homes of your maternal uncles, the homes of your maternal aunts, (in a house) whose keys you possess, or (in the house) of your friend.

src: Gewiß, WIR sandten dir die Schrift für die Menschen der Wahrheit gemäß hinab. Wer also Rechtleitung findet, (tut es allein) für sich selbst, und wer irregeht, (tut es ausschließlich) gegen sich selbst. Und du bist über sie kein Wakil.
ref: We have indeed sent down this Book to you with the truth, in order to guide mankind; so whoever attains guidance has attained it is for his own good, and whoever strays, has strayed for his own harm; and you are not at all responsible for them.
draft: Surely, WE have sent down the Book to you with the truth for mankind. So whoever receives guidance, receives it for the good of his own soul, and whoever goes astray, goes astray only to its detriment. And you are not in charge of them.
hil: Certainly, WE sent down the Scripture to you in accordance with the truth for mankind. So whoever finds guidance, does so for his own good, and whoever goes astray, does so to his own detriment. And you are not in charge of them.
compare: Surely, WE have sent down the Book to you with the truth for mankind. So whoever receives guidance, receives it for the good of his own soul, and whoever goes astray, goes astray only to its detriment. And you are not in charge of them.

src: Doch wenn sie sich abkehren, so wisse, daß Allah sie für einen Teil ihrer Sünden treffen will. Viele von den Menschen sind fürwahr Frevler.
ref: If they turn away, then know that God is sure to punish them for some of their sins; and many of them are transgressors.
draft: But if they turn away, be aware that Allah intends to afflict them for some of their sins. Many of the people are certainly transgressors.
hil: However, if they turn away, know that Allah intends to afflict them for a part of their sins. Indeed, many people are transgressors.
compare: But if they turn away, be aware that Allah intends to afflict them for some of their sins. Many of the people are certainly transgressors.

src: Darin lag wahrhaftig eine schwere Prüfung von eurem HERRN!
ref: In this was a great trial from your Lord."
draft: There was truly a heavy trial from your LORD in that!
hil: Surely, therein was a heavy trial from your Lord.
compare: There was truly a heavy trial from your LORD in that!

src: Dein Herr ist schnell im Bestrafen, und Er ist voller Vergebung und barmherzig.
ref: Indeed your Lord's retribution is swift, yet He is forgiving and kind.
draft: Your Lord is quick in punishing, and He is full of forgiveness and mercy.
hil: Your Lord is quick to punish, and He is full of forgiveness and mercy.
compare: Your Lord is quick in punishing, and He is full of forgiveness and mercy.

src: Hätte es doch aus den Generationen vor euch manche gegeben, die einsichtig waren, welche Verderben auf Erden verboten! Ausgenommen davon sind die Wenigen aus denen, die WIR erretteten.
ref: If only there had been men endued with virtue in the ages before you, who could preserve men from doing evil in the world, other than the few We saved from among them.
draft: If only there had been some among the generations before you who were insightful about the destruction on earth that is prohibited! The exception to this are the few from among them whom we saved.
hil: If only there had been among the generations before you some who were insightful about the destruction on earth that is prohibited! The exception to this are the few among them whom we saved.
compare: If only there had been some among the generations before you who were insightful about the destruction on earth that is prohibited! The exception to this are the few from among them whom we saved.

src: Und Allah gehört die Herrschaft der Himmel und der Erde und dessen, was dazwischen ist, und zu Ihm ist der Ausgang.
ref: For to God belongs the kingdom of the heavens and of the earth, and all that is between them; to Him is the homecoming.
draft: And Allah's is the sovereignty of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, and to Him is the [final] destination [of all].
hil: And blessed is He to whom belongs the sovereignty of the heavens, the earth, and all that is between them, and He has the knowledge of the Hour of Doom.
compare: And Allah's is the sovereignty of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, and to Him is the [final] destination [of all].

src: Wenn sie es aber aus der Nähe sehen, dann werden die Gesichter derer, die ungläubig sind, schlimm betroffen. Und es wird gesprochen: «Das ist das, was ihr herbeizurufen suchtet.»
ref: So when they will see it close, the faces of the disbelievers will become ghastly, and it will be declared, “This is what you were demanding.”
draft: If, however, they see it up close, then the faces of those who are unbelievers will be badly affected. And it will be said: "This is what you were calling for."
hil: But if they see it up close, the faces of those who are unbelievers will be badly affected, and it will be said, 'This is what you were calling for.'
compare: If, however, they see it up close, then the faces of those who are unbelievers will be badly affected. And it will be said: "This is what you were calling for."

src: Und gewiß, bereits schickten WIR vor dir Gesandte zu ihren Leuten, dann kamen sie zu ihnen mit den klaren Zeichen, dann übten WIR Vergeltung an denjenigen, die schwere Verfehlungen begingen.
ref: Verily We sent many apostles before you to their people, who brought clear signs with them. Then We retributed those who were sinful.
draft: And certainly, before you, we sent messengers to their people, and they came to them with clear proofs. Then we took retribution from those who committed crimes.
hil: Indeed, We have already sent messengers before you to their people and they came to them with clear proofs. Then We took revenge on those who committed great sins.
compare: And certainly, before you, we sent messengers to their people, and they came to them with clear proofs. Then we took retribution from those who committed crimes.

src: Aber diejenigen, die ungläubig sind, erdichten Lügen gegen Gott, und die meisten von ihnen haben keinen Verstand.
ref: The unbelievers fabricate lies of God, for many of them are devoid of sense.
draft: But those who are unbelievers invent lies about God, and most of them have no understanding.
hil: But those who are unbelievers fabricate lies against God, and most of them have no understanding.
compare: But those who are unbelievers invent lies about God, and most of them have no understanding.

src: Er (Moses) sagte: " Er ist euer Herr und der Herr eurer Vorväter."
ref: (Moses continued): "Your Lord and the Lord of your fathers before you."
draft: He (Moses) said: "He is your Lord and the Lord of your ancestors."
hil: He (Moses) said, 'He is your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers.'
compare: He (Moses) said: "He is your Lord and the Lord of your ancestors."

src: Sag: "Sterbt mit eurer Wut."
ref: Say: "Die of your rage.
draft: Say: "Die with your anger."
hil: Say, 'Die with your anger.' Allah knows well what lies within the hearts.
compare: Say, 'Die with your anger.' Allah knows well what lies within the hearts.

src: Doch ihr seid selten dankbar.
ref: Little thanks you give.
draft: But you are seldom grateful.
hil: But you are rarely grateful.
compare: But you are seldom grateful.

src: Es hielt auf dem Djudi an. Und es wurde gesprochen: «Weg mit den Leuten, die Unrecht tun!»
ref: The ark came to rest on Judi (Mount Ararat), and it was said: "Away with the cursed people!"
draft: It stopped at Djudi. And it was said: "Away with the people who do wrong!"
hil: It stopped at Djudi. And it was said: 'Away with the people who do wrong!'
compare: It stopped at Djudi. And it was said: "Away with the people who do wrong!"

src: Dazu hat Er sie erschaffen. Und so erfüllt sich das Wort deines Herrn: "Ich werde die Hölle ganz gewiß mit den Ginn und den Menschen allesamt füllen."
ref: To that end He created them, and perfectly is fulfilled the word of thy Lord: 'I shall assuredly fill Gehenna with jinn and men all together.'
draft: To this end, He created her. And so the word of your Lord is fulfilled: "I will surely fill hell with the jinn and all mankind."
hil: "To this end, He created her. And thus is fulfilled the word of your Lord: 'I will certainly fill Hell with jinn and all mankind.'"
compare: "To this end, He created her. And thus is fulfilled the word of your Lord: 'I will certainly fill Hell with jinn and all mankind.'"

src: Die Sonne und der Mond (laufen) nach Berechnung.
ref: The sun and moon revolve to a computation;
draft: The sun and the moon (run) according to calculation.
hil: The sun and the moon run according to calculation.
compare: The sun and the moon (run) according to calculation.

src: Und wer (dies) nicht aufbringen kann, fastet an zwei aufeinanderfolgenden Monaten als Reue vor ALLAH.
ref: Then whosoever findeth not the wherewithal, on him is the fasting for two months in succession: a penance from Allah.
draft: And whoever cannot do this, shall fast for two consecutive months as a penance before Allah.
hil: And whoever cannot do so shall fast for two consecutive months as a penance before Allah.
compare: And whoever cannot do so shall fast for two consecutive months as a penance before Allah.

src: Und Wir ließen die Kinder Israels das Meer überqueren.
ref: And We led the Children of Isra'il across the sea.
draft: And We let the Children of Israel cross the sea.
hil: And indeed We let the Children of Israel cross the sea.
compare: And We let the Children of Israel cross the sea.

src: Allah weiß, daß ihr an sie denken werdet.
ref: God knows that you will be thinking about them.
draft: Allah knows that you will think of them.
hil: Allah knows that you will remember them; but do not promise them secretly unless you speak kind words (only of indication).
compare: Allah knows that you will remember them; but do not promise them secretly unless you speak kind words (only of indication).

src: Darin werden sie auf ewig weilen.
ref: They will abide in them for ever.
draft: They will dwell there forever.
hil: They will abide in it forever.
compare: They will dwell there forever.

src: Unzweifelhaft kennt Allah, was sie verbergen und was sie kundtun. Wahrlich, Er liebt die Hochmütigen nicht.
ref: Certainly Allah knows what they hide and what they disclose; indeed He does not like the proud.
draft: Undoubtedly, Allah knows what they conceal and what they reveal. Verily, He does not love the arrogant.
hil: Without doubt Allah knows what they conceal and what they reveal. Indeed, He does not love the arrogant.
