compare: Undoubtedly, Allah knows what they conceal and what they reveal. Verily, He does not love the arrogant.

src: Meint ihr etwa, ihr würdet verlassen sein, wo Allah doch noch nicht jene von euch gezeichnet hat, die (in Seiner Sache) kämpfen und sich keinen zum Vertrauten nehmen außer Allah und Seinen Gesandten und die Gläubigen?
ref: Do you think you will get away before God knows who among you fought and did not take anyone but God, His Apostle and the faithful, as their friends?
draft: Do you think you will be left abandoned, while Allah has not yet identified among you those who fight in His cause and do not take anyone as intimate friends other than Allah and His Messenger and the believers?
hil: Do you think you will be left abandoned, where Allah has not yet identified those among you who fight in His cause, and do not take anyone as intimate friends other than Allah and His Messenger and the believers?
compare: Do you think you will be left abandoned, while Allah has not yet identified among you those who fight in His cause and do not take anyone as intimate friends other than Allah and His Messenger and the believers?

src: Als das Land dann trotz seiner Weite ihnen eng erschien, ihre Seelen unter Beklemmung litten und sie wußten, daß es keine Zuflucht vor ALLAH gibt außer (der reuigen Umkehr) zu Ihm, dann verhalf ER ihnen zur Reue, damit sie bereuen.
ref: Then, when the earth, as vast as it is, closed in on them, and their very souls closed in on them, and they realized that there was no refuge from God, except in Him, He redeemed them, so that they may repent.
draft: When the country then seemed narrow to them despite its vastness, their souls suffered from anxiety and they knew that there is no refuge from Allah except (in repentance) to Him, then He helped them to repent so that they may repent.
hil: When the land then seemed narrow to them despite its vastness, their souls suffered from anxiety and they knew that there is no refuge from Allah except in repentance to Him, then He helped them to repent so that they may repent.
compare: When the country then seemed narrow to them despite its vastness, their souls suffered from anxiety and they knew that there is no refuge from Allah except (in repentance) to Him, then He helped them to repent so that they may repent.

src: ER gewährt Weisheit, wem ER will.
ref: He gives wisdom to whomever He wills.
draft: He grants wisdom to whom He wills.
hil: He grants wisdom to whom He wills.
compare: He grants wisdom to whom He wills.

src: Die Entscheidung liegt nur bei Allah. Er legt die Wahrheit dar, und Er ist der beste Richter."
ref: He relates the truth, and He is the Best of deciders.'
draft: "The decision lies only with Allah. He presents the truth, and He is the best judge."
hil: Say: "The decision lies only with God. He presents the truth, and He is the best of judges."
compare: "The decision lies only with Allah. He presents the truth, and He is the best judge."

src: Das ist eine Erinnerung für die, die (Gottes) gedenken.
ref: This is a reminder for those who are observant.
draft: This is a reminder for those who remember (God).
hil: This is a reminder for those who remember (God).
compare: This is a reminder for those who remember (God).

src: Also erbärmlich ist die Bleibe der Arroganten."
ref: How grievous a destination for the haughty!
draft: Also miserable is the abode of the arrogant.
hil: So miserable is the abode of the arrogant.
compare: So miserable is the abode of the arrogant.

src: Und Wir ließen einen Regen auf sie niedergehen; wie böse war der Regen für diejenigen, die gewarnt worden waren!
ref: And rained on them a shower (of Stones). How terrible was the rain (that fell) on those who had been warned!
draft: And We caused a rain [of stones] to descend upon them, and how wretched was the rain of those who had been warned.
hil: "And We sent down upon them a rain, and how terrible was the rain of those who had been warned!"
compare: And We caused a rain [of stones] to descend upon them, and how wretched was the rain of those who had been warned.

src: Keineswegs! Beim Mond
ref: I say the truth, and call the moon to witness,
draft: Not at all! At the moon.
hil: Not at all! By the moon.
compare: Not at all! By the moon.

src: Hast du nicht gesehen, daß Allah Wasser vom Himmel herniedersendet?
ref: Have you not seen that it is Allah Who causes the water to descend from the sky?
draft: Have you not seen that Allah sends down water from heaven?
hil: Did you see that Allah sent water down from the sky?
compare: Have you not seen that Allah sends down water from heaven?

src: Dann verbarg er Furcht vor ihnen. Sie sagten: "Fürchte dich nicht!"
ref: (When they did not eat), He conceived a fear of them.
draft: Then he hid fear from them. They said, "Do not be afraid!"
hil: Then he concealed fear from them. They said, "Do not be afraid!"
compare: Then he hid fear from them. They said, "Do not be afraid!"

src: Nennt sie nach ihren Vätern; das ist gerechter vor Allah.
ref: Call them by the names of their fathers. This is the right course in the sight of God.
draft: Call them by their fathers; that is more just in the sight of Allah.
hil: Call them by their fathers; that is more just in the sight of Allah.
compare: Call them by their fathers; that is more just in the sight of Allah.

src: Ich habe ihnen nichts gesagt außer dem, womit DU mich beauftragt hast: Dient ALLAH, meinem HERRN und eurem HERRN. Und ich war Zeuge über sie, solange ich unter ihnen weilte.
ref: I only said to them what Thou didst command me: "Serve God, my Lord and your Lord."
draft: I have not told them anything except what YOU have commissioned me with: Serve ALLAH, my LORD and your LORD. And I was a witness over them as long as I lived among them.
hil: I did not tell them anything except what YOU commissioned me with: Serve ALLAH, my Lord and your Lord. And I was a witness over them as long as I lived among them.
compare: I have not told them anything except what YOU have commissioned me with: Serve ALLAH, my LORD and your LORD. And I was a witness over them as long as I lived among them.

src: Auch wenn ein Koran käme, mit dem die Berge versetzt oder die Erde zerstückelt oder zu den Toten gesprochen werden könnte... Nein, bei der ganzen Angelegenheit hat Gott allein zu entscheiden. Wissen denn diejenigen, die glauben, nicht, daß Gott, wenn Er wollte, die Menschen alle rechtleiten würde? Diejenigen, die ungläubig sind, wird immer eine Katastrophe treffen für das, was sie gemacht haben, oder sie wird in der Nähe ihrer Wohnstätten niedergehen, bis das Versprechen Gottes eintrifft. Und Gott bricht das Versprechen nicht.
ref: And were such a Qur’an to come that would cause the mountains to move, or the earth to split asunder, or the dead to speak, even then these disbelievers would not believe; in fact, all matters are only at Allah’s discretion; so have not the Muslims despaired in that, had Allah willed, He would have guided all mankind? Disasters shall continue to strike the disbelievers on account of their deeds, or descend near their homes until Allah’s promise comes; indeed Allah does not break the promise.
draft: Even if a Quran came by which the mountains were moved or the earth was broken up or with which the dead were made to speak... No, in this matter, only God decides. Do those who believe not know that God would guide all people aright if He wished? The unbelievers will always be struck by disaster, either for what they have done or it will befall close to their homes, until God's promise is fulfilled. And God does not break His promise.
hil: Even if a Quran came by which the mountains were moved or the earth was broken up or with which the dead were made to speak, in this matter, only God decides. Do those who believe not know that if He willed, God would guide all people rightly? The unbelievers will always be struck by disaster for what they did or it will befall close to their homes until God's promise is fulfilled. And God does not break His promise.
compare: Even if a Quran came by which the mountains were moved or the earth was broken up or with which the dead were made to speak... No, in this matter, only God decides. Do those who believe not know that God would guide all people aright if He wished? The unbelievers will always be struck by disaster, either for what they have done or it will befall close to their homes, until God's promise is fulfilled. And God does not break His promise.

src: Und (eines Tages) trat er in die Stadt, ohne von ihren Einwohnern bemerkt zu werden, dann fand er zwei Männer, die gegeneinander kämpften, dieser gehörte seiner Partei an und jener war von seinen Feinden, dann bat ihn derjenige, der seiner Partei angehörte, um Hilfe gegen denjenigen, der von seinen Feinden war, dann schlug Musa mit der Faust auf ihn, dann tötete er ihn. Er sagte: "Dies ist vom Werk des Satans, gewiß, er ist ein verleitender, entschiedener Feind."
ref: And he entered the city when its inhabitants were sleeping unaware in the afternoon – he therefore found two men fighting; one was from Moosa’s group, and the other from among his enemies; so the one who was of Moosa’s group pleaded to Moosa for help against him who was of his enemies – therefore Moosa punched him thereby finishing him; he said, “This act was from the devil*; indeed he is an open enemy, a misleader.” (* The act of oppressing the man from Bani Israel).
draft: And (one day) he entered the city without being noticed by its inhabitants, then he found two men fighting against each other, one belonged to his party and the other was from his enemies, then the one who belonged to his party asked him for help against the one who was from his enemies, then Moses hit him with his fist, then he killed him. He said, "This is from the work of Satan, certainly he is a misguiding, determined enemy."
hil: And (one day) he entered the city without being noticed by its inhabitants, then he found two men fighting against each other, one belonged to his party and the other was from his enemies, then the one who belonged to his party asked him for help against the one who was from his enemies, then Moses struck him with his fist and finished him off. He said, "This is of Satan's doing," said.
compare: And (one day) he entered the city without being noticed by its inhabitants, then he found two men fighting against each other, one belonged to his party and the other was from his enemies, then the one who belonged to his party asked him for help against the one who was from his enemies, then Moses hit him with his fist, then he killed him. He said, "This is from the work of Satan, certainly he is a misguiding, determined enemy."

src: Da wurden ihre Herzen versiegelt, so daß sie nicht begreifen.
ref: So their hearts were sealed; and now they do not understand.
draft: Their hearts were sealed so that they do not understand.
hil: And their hearts were sealed, so they do not understand.
compare: And their hearts were sealed, so they do not understand.

src: Dies sind Allahs Zeichen, die Wir dir der Wahrheit entsprechend verlesen. Und du bist wahrlich einer der Gesandten.
ref: These are the messages of God. We recite them to you in all truth, as indeed you are one of the apostles.
draft: These are Allah's signs that We recite to you in truth. And you are certainly one of the messengers.
hil: These are the signs of Allah, that We recite to you with truth. And you are certainly one of the messengers.
compare: These are the signs of Allah, that We recite to you with truth. And you are certainly one of the messengers.

src: Und keiner ist unter euch, der nicht daran vorbeikommen wird das ist eine von deinem Herrn beschlossene Fügung.
ref: There is not one among you who will not reach it. Your Lord has made this incumbent on Himself.
draft: And there is none among you who will not pass away; this is a decreed ordinance of your Lord.
hil: And none among you will escape it - this is a decree from your Lord. And your Lord is not unaware of what you do.
compare: And none among you will escape it - this is a decree from your Lord. And your Lord is not unaware of what you do.

src: Viele von den Besitzern des Buches möchten euch, nachdem ihr gläubig geworden seid, gern wieder zu Ungläubigen machen, aus Neid in ihren Seelen, nachdem ihnen die Wahrheit klar gemacht wurde. Doch vergebt und seid nachsichtig, bis Allah Seine Entscheidung ergehen läßt. Wahrlich, Allah hat zu allem die Macht.
ref: Many among People given the Book(s) wished to turn you to disbelief after you had accepted faith; out of hearts’ envy, after the truth has become very clear to them; so leave them and be tolerant, until Allah brings His command; indeed Allah is Able to do all things.
draft: Many of the owners of the book would like to make you unbelievers again after you have become faithful, out of envy in their souls after the truth has been made clear to them. But forgive and be patient until Allah makes His decision. Truly, Allah has power over all things.
hil: Fain would many of the people of the Book turn you back infidels after ye have believed, out of envy from their souls, after the truth hath become manifest unto them. So pardon them, pass over until Allah sendeth His command. Truly, Allah has power over all things.
compare: Many of the owners of the book would like to make you unbelievers again after you have become faithful, out of envy in their souls after the truth has been made clear to them. But forgive and be patient until Allah makes His decision. Truly, Allah has power over all things.

src: Dir steht es nicht zu, dich darin hochmütig zu verhalten.
ref: You have no right to be insolent here.
draft: "You are not entitled to behave arrogantly in it."
hil: It is not for thee to show pride here, so go forth!
compare: "You are not entitled to behave arrogantly in it."

src: Und das Herz der Mutter Musas wurde leer.
ref: The mother of Moses was perturbed in the morning.
draft: And the heart of the mother of Musa became empty.
hil: "And the heart of Moses' mother became empty."
compare: "And the heart of Moses' mother became empty."

src: (Es ist) der durchbohrend helle Stem.
ref: It is the star that shines with a piercing brightness --
draft: "It is the piercingly bright stem."
hil: He is the piercingly bright stem.
compare: "It is the piercingly bright stem."

src: Sie beide unterstanden zwei rechtschaffenen (Dienern) von Unseren Dienern, doch handelten sie verräterisch an ihnen, und so haben ihnen diese vor Allah nichts genützt.
ref: They were under two of Our righteous servants, but they betrayed them.
draft: They both were subjected to two righteous (servants) of Our servants, but they acted treacherously towards them, and thus they have not benefited them before Allah.
hil: Both of them were under the authority of two of our righteous servants. However, they acted treacherously towards them which did not benefit them in front of Allah.
compare: Both of them were under the authority of two of our righteous servants. However, they acted treacherously towards them which did not benefit them in front of Allah.

src: Und die den Tag des Gerichtes für wahr halten,
ref: And those who believe in the Day of Judgement,
draft: And those who believe in the Day of Judgment to be true.
hil: And those who believe in the Day of Judgment to be true.
compare: And those who believe in the Day of Judgment to be true.

src: Habt ihr betrachtet, was euch an Sperma entfließt?
ref: Just consider (the semen) that you emit,
draft: Have you considered what sperm is flowing out of you?
hil: Have you considered what is flowing out of you as a worldly usage and adornment? And what is with Allah is better and more lasting. Do you not have sense?
compare: Have you considered what sperm is flowing out of you?

src: Gewiß, bereits erwies ALLAH den Mumin Gutes, als ER ihnen einen Gesandten schickte, der zu ihnen gehört, der ihnen Seine Ayat vorträgt, sie läutert und ihnen die Schrift und die Weisheit lehrt.
ref: Allah has indeed bestowed a great favour upon the Muslims, in that He sent to them a Noble Messenger (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) from among them, who recites to them His verses, and purifies them, and teaches them the Book and wisdom; and before it, they were definitely in open error.
draft: Surely, ALLAH has already shown goodness to the believers by sending them a Messenger from among themselves, who recites to them His revelations, purifies them, teaches them the Book and wisdom.
hil: Verily, Allah has already shown the believers goodness when He sent them a messenger from among themselves, who recites His revelations to them, purifies them, teaches them the Scripture, and the wisdom.
compare: Verily, Allah has already shown the believers goodness when He sent them a messenger from among themselves, who recites His revelations to them, purifies them, teaches them the Scripture, and the wisdom.

src: Wo geht ihr denn hin?
ref: So whither do you stray?
draft: Where are you going then?
hil: Where are you headed, then?
compare: Where are you headed, then?

src: Fügt sie sich, so stiftet in Ge rechtigkeit Frieden zwischen ihnen und seid gerecht. Wahrlich, Allah liebt die Gerechten.
ref: And if it does revert, make peace between them with justice, and be equitable for Allah loves the equitable.
draft: If she accepts, she creates peace between them in righteousness and be just. Truly, Allah loves the just.
hil: If they comply, create peace between them justly, and be fair, Allah loves the just.
compare: If she accepts, she creates peace between them in righteousness and be just. Truly, Allah loves the just.

src: So ist die Pein. Doch die Pein des Jenseits ist größer, wenn sie es nur wüßten!
ref: Such is Our chastisement; and the punishment of the Hereafter will be greater, if only they knew!
draft: So is the pain. But the pain of the afterlife is greater, if only they knew it!
hil: This is the pain. But the suffering of the afterlife is greater if only they knew!
compare: So is the pain. But the pain of the afterlife is greater, if only they knew it!

src: Gewiß, im Aufeinanderfolgen von Nacht und Tag und was ALLAH in den Himmeln und der Erde erschaffen hat, gibt es sicherlich Ayat für Menschen, die Taqwa gemäß handeln.
ref: In the alternation of night and day, and all that He has created in the heavens and the earth, are certainly signs for people who fear God.
draft: Certainly, in the succession of night and day and in what Allah has created in the heavens and the earth, there are surely signs for people who act according to taqwa.
hil: Surely, in the alternation of night and day, and in what Allah has created in the heavens and the earth, there are signs for people who act in accordance with Taqwa.
compare: Certainly, in the succession of night and day and in what Allah has created in the heavens and the earth, there are surely signs for people who act according to taqwa.

src: Unser HERR umfaßt alles mit Wissen.
ref: Our Lord embraces all things in His knowledge.
draft: "Our LORD encompasses everything with knowledge."
hil: "Our LORD encompasses everything with knowledge."
compare: "Our LORD encompasses everything with knowledge."

src: Dieser ist Der Allwissende über das Verborgene und das Sichtbare, Der Allwürdige, Der Allgnädige.
ref: Such is (He) the knower of the unknown and the known, the mighty and the merciful,
draft: This is the Omniscient about the hidden and the visible, the Honorable, the Merciful.
hil: He is the Omniscient of the hidden and the visible, the Honorable, the Merciful.
compare: He is the Omniscient of the hidden and the visible, the Honorable, the Merciful.

src: Das ist etwas von dem, was mich mein Herr gelehrt hat.
ref: This knowledge is one of the things my Lord has taught me.
draft: This is something my master has taught me.
hil: This is of that which my Lord has taught me.
compare: This is something my master has taught me.

src: Gewiß, WIR umhüllten ihre Herzen doch mit Bedeckung, damit sie ihn (den Quran) nicht begreifen, und machten ihre Ohren schwerhörig. Selbst dann, wenn du sie zur Rechtleitung einladen würdest, werden sie nie einer Rechtleitung folgen.
ref: Verily We have placed a covering on their hearts so that they do not understand, and a deafness in their ears so that however you may call them to guidance they will never be guided aright.
draft: Certainly, WE wrapped their hearts in concealment so that they would not understand it (the Quran), and made their ears deaf. Even if you would invite them to guidance, they will never follow guidance.
hil: Verily, we have enveloped their hearts with coverings, lest they understand it (the Quran), and made their ears hard of hearing. Even if you were to invite them to guidance, they would never follow guidance.
compare: Certainly, WE wrapped their hearts in concealment so that they would not understand it (the Quran), and made their ears deaf. Even if you would invite them to guidance, they will never follow guidance.

src: Er sagte: "Gewiß, ich bin dein Bruder. So sei nicht bekümmert wegen dessen, was sie getan haben."
ref: He said, "I am your brother, so do not feel distressed about whatever they have been doing."
draft: He said, "Certainly, I am your brother. So don't worry about what they have done."
hil: "He said, 'Certainly, I am your brother. So don't worry about what they have done.'"
compare: "He said, 'Certainly, I am your brother. So don't worry about what they have done.'"

src: (WIR offenbarten dir) wie WIR (den Gesandten) derjenigen Einteilenden hinabsandten,
ref: Like (those) We had sent to those schismatics who slandered their Books
draft: We revealed to you how We sent down (the Messenger) to those who divide (the scriptures).
hil: We revealed to you how We sent down (the Messenger) to those who divide the scriptures,
compare: We revealed to you how We sent down (the Messenger) to those who divide (the scriptures).

src: Immer wieder, wenn ihre Häute gargekocht sein werden, werden WIR sie ihnen gegen andere Häute austauschen, damit sie die Peinigung (richtig) erfahren.
ref: We shall burn them in Fire. As often as their skins are roasted through, We shall change them for other skins that they may taste the punishment.
draft: Again and again, when their skins will have been boiled tender, we will exchange them for other skins so that they may experience the torment (correctly).
hil: Again and again, when their skins will have been boiled tender, we will exchange them for other skins so that they may experience the torment (correctly).
compare: Again and again, when their skins will have been boiled tender, we will exchange them for other skins so that they may experience the torment (correctly).

src: Erhebe dich und warne
ref: Arise and warn,
draft: Rise and warn.
hil: Arise and warn.
compare: Rise and warn.

src: Gewiß, ALLAH ist allwissend, allkundig.
ref: Surely God knows and is cognisant.
draft: Certainly, Allah is omniscient and all-knowing.
hil: Certainly, Allah is omniscient and all-knowing.
compare: Certainly, Allah is omniscient and all-knowing.

src: Allah ist mit den Standhaften."
ref: God is with those who are patient (and persevere)."
draft: "Allah is with the steadfast."
hil: Allah is with the steadfast.
compare: "Allah is with the steadfast."

src: Aber nein! Wenn ihr es sicher wüßtet!
ref: And yet if you knew with positive knowledge
draft: But no! If only you knew for sure!
hil: O no! If you only knew for sure!
compare: But no! If only you knew for sure!

src: Und sie fragen dich nach den Felsenbergen, dann sag: "Mein HERR wird sie in (kleinste) Teilchen zerkleinern.
ref: They will ask you about the mountains. Tell them: "My Lord will uproot them from the base,
draft: And they ask you about the mountain rocks, then say: "My Lord will crush them into (small) particles."
hil: And if they ask you about the mountain rocks, then say, My Lord will break them into (small) pieces.
compare: And they ask you about the mountain rocks, then say: "My Lord will crush them into (small) particles."

src: Und diejenigen von euch, die abberufen werden und Gattinnen hinterlassen - so sollen diese (mit sich) selbst vier Monate und zehn (Tage) abwarten. Wenn sie dann ihre festgesetzte Zeit erreicht haben, so ist für euch keine Sünde in dem, was sie in rechtlicher Weise mit sich selbst unternehmen. Allah ist dessen, was ihr tut, Kundig.
ref: Wives of men who die among you should wait (after their husbands death) for four months and ten days; and when the term is over there is no sin if they do what they like with themselves honourably, for God is aware of all that you do.
draft: And those of you who are called [to die] and leave behind wives - they [the wives] shall wait [with regard to their remarriage] four months and ten days. And when they have fulfilled their term, there is no blame upon you for what they do with themselves in a lawful manner. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.
hil: And those of you who are called [to die] and leave behind wives - they [the wives] should wait on themselves [i.e., observe 'Idda] for four months and ten [days]. And when they have fulfilled their term, there is no blame upon you for what they do with themselves in a lawful manner. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.
compare: And those of you who are called [to die] and leave behind wives - they [the wives] shall wait [with regard to their remarriage] four months and ten days. And when they have fulfilled their term, there is no blame upon you for what they do with themselves in a lawful manner. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.

src: Behaltet sie aber nicht aus Schadenslust, um Übertretungen zu begehen. Wer dies tut, der hat sich selbst Unrecht getan.
ref: It is transgression to retain them merely for harassment; and whoever' does that indeed wrongs his own self.
draft: Keep them not out of malice to commit transgressions. Whoever does this has done wrong to himself.
hil: But keep them not out of malice to commit transgressions. Whoever does this has done wrong to himself.
compare: Keep them not out of malice to commit transgressions. Whoever does this has done wrong to himself.

src: Und diejenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, sagen: "Würde ihm doch eine Aya von seinem HERRN hinabgesandt!" Sag: "Gewiß ALLAH läßt abirren, wen ER will, und leitet zu Sich denjenigen recht, der sich reumütig besinnt.
ref: And those who disbelieve say: 'Why has no sign been sent down to him by his Lord' Say: 'Allah leads astray whom He will, and guides those who repent,
draft: And those who disbelieved said: "Why has a sign not been sent down to him from his Lord?" Say, "Indeed, Allah leaves astray whom He wills and guides to Himself whoever turns back [to Him] in repentance."
hil: And those who disbelieved said, 'Why has not a sign been sent down to him from his Lord?' Say, 'Indeed, Allah leaves astray whom He wills and guides to Himself whoever repents and believes.'
compare: And those who disbelieved said, 'Why has not a sign been sent down to him from his Lord?' Say, 'Indeed, Allah leaves astray whom He wills and guides to Himself whoever repents and believes.'

src: Als er sie nun mit ihrem Bedarf ausgestattet hatte, sagte er: "Bringt mir einen (Halb)bruder von euch väterlicherseits. Seht ihr denn nicht, daß ich volles Maß gebe und daß ich der beste Obdachgeber bin?
ref: And when he provided them with their provisions he said, “Bring your step-brother to me; do you not see that I measure in full and that I am the best host?”
draft: When he had now equipped her with what she needed, he said: "Bring me a (half)brother of yours from your father's side. Don't you see that I give full measure and that I am the best shelter provider?
hil: When he had now equipped her with what she needed, he said: "Have you not seen that I have given full measure, and that I am the best of hosts? Bring me a (half)brother of yours from your father's side."
compare: When he had now equipped her with what she needed, he said: "Have you not seen that I have given full measure, and that I am the best of hosts? Bring me a (half)brother of yours from your father's side."

src: Schlecht ist, was sie erkaufen.
ref: Vile is that wherewith they have bartered.
draft: Bad is what they purchase.
hil: Bad is what they buy.
compare: Bad is what they buy.

src: Was für eine erfreuliche Belohnung nach dem Diesseits!"
ref: How excellent the recompense of Paradise!
draft: "What a delightful reward after this life!"
hil: What a delightful reward after this life!
compare: "What a delightful reward after this life!"

src: Und sie sagen: "Der Allerbarmer hat Sich Kinder genommen." Preis sei Ihm!
ref: And they said, “The Most Gracious has chosen a son – Purity is to Him!
draft: And they say, "The Most Merciful has taken children for Himself." Praise be to Him!
hil: And they said, “The Most Merciful has taken an offspring for Himself.” Praise be to Him! No, to Him belongs all that is in the heavens and on earth. All are submissive to Him.
compare: And they say, "The Most Merciful has taken children for Himself." Praise be to Him!

src: Meidet darum den Greuel der Götzen und meidet das Wort der Lüge.
ref: Avoid the repugnance of idols, and false and frivolous talk.
draft: Therefore avoid the abomination of idols and avoid the word of lies.
hil: So avoid the abomination of idols and shun the word of lying.
compare: So avoid the abomination of idols and shun the word of lying.

src: Und weshalb speist ihr nicht von dem, worauf ALLAHs Name (beim Schächten) erwähnt wurde, nachdem ER euch deutlich das vorgetragen hat, was ER euch für haram erklärte - außer dem, wozu ihr gezwungen werdet?!
ref: And why should you not eat of that over which the name of God has been pronounced, when He has made it distinctly clear what is forbidden, unless you are constrained to do so.
draft: And why do you not eat of that upon which Allah's name has been mentioned, while He has explained in detail to you what He has forbidden you, excepting that to which you are compelled.
hil: And why don't you eat of that on which Allah's name has been pronounced, when He has clearly recited to you what is prohibited to you, except that to which you are compelled?
compare: And why do you not eat of that upon which Allah's name has been mentioned, while He has explained in detail to you what He has forbidden you, excepting that to which you are compelled.

src: Sag: "Egal ob ihr das, was ihr in euren Brüsten tragt, verheimlicht oder offenbart, ALLAH weiß darüber Bescheid, und ER weiß, was in den Himmeln und was auf Erden ist. Und ALLAH ist über alles allmächtig.
ref: Say: "Whether you conceal or reveal whatsoever is in your hearts it is all known to God, as is known to Him all that is in the heavens and the earth; and God has the power over all things."
draft: Say: "Whether you conceal or reveal what you carry in your breasts, Allah is aware of it, and He knows what is in the heavens and what is on earth. And Allah is capable of all things."
hil: Say: "Whether you conceal or reveal what you carry in your breasts, God knows about it, and He knows what is in the heavens and what is on earth. And God is all-powerful over everything."
compare: Say: "Whether you conceal or reveal what you carry in your breasts, Allah is aware of it, and He knows what is in the heavens and what is on earth. And Allah is capable of all things."

src: Esset von dem, was Allah euch gegeben hat und folgt nicht die Fußstapfen des Satans.
ref: Eat of what Allah has provided for you, and follow not the footsteps of Shaitan (Satan).
draft: Eat of what Allah has provided for you, and do not follow the footsteps of Satan.
hil: Eat of what Allah has given you and do not follow the steps of Satan; surely, he is a manifest foe to you.
compare: Eat of what Allah has provided for you, and do not follow the footsteps of Satan.

src: Wenn ihr leidet, so leiden sie auch, wie ihr leidet; ihr aber erhofft von Gott, was sie nicht erhoffen. Gott weiß Bescheid und ist weise.
ref: If you are suffering, they are also suffering like you, but you expect from Allah what they do not expect, and Allah is all-knowing, all-wise.
draft: If you suffer, they suffer too, as you suffer; but you hope from God what they do not hope. God knows and is wise.
hil: If you suffer, they suffer too, as you suffer; but you hope from God what they do not hope. God knows and is wise.
compare: If you suffer, they suffer too, as you suffer; but you hope from God what they do not hope. God knows and is wise.

src: Und sollte ER dir Gutes bestimmen, so kann niemand Seine Gunst abwenden.
ref: And if He wants good for you, none can repel His grace.
draft: And if HE determines good for you, no one can avert His favor.
hil: And if He decrees good for you, then none can withhold His bounty.
compare: And if He decrees good for you, then none can withhold His bounty.

src: Sie befragen dich über Berauschendes und Glücksspiel. Sprich: "In beiden liegt großes Übel und Nutzen für die Menschen.
ref: They ask you about drinking and gambling.
draft: They question you about intoxication and gambling. Say: "In both lies great harm and benefit for people."
hil: They ask you about intoxication and gambling. Say, "In both there is great sin and benefit for people, but their sin is greater than their benefit."
compare: They question you about intoxication and gambling. Say: "In both lies great harm and benefit for people."

src: über den Sieg von ALLAH. ER verhilft zum Sieg, wem ER will.
ref: He helps whomever He wants.
draft: About the victory of Allah. He grants victory to whom He wills.
hil: About the victory of Allah. He helps whom He wills. And He is the All-Mighty, ever-merciful.
compare: About the victory of Allah. He helps whom He wills. And He is the All-Mighty, ever-merciful.

src: Sie sagten: "Halte ihn mit seinem Bruder hin, und schicke in die Städte Boten,
ref: They said: "Put him and his brother off (awhile) and send out heralds to the cities
draft: They said: "Hold him up with his brother and send messengers to the cities,"
hil: They said: "Hold him up with his brother and send messengers to the cities."
compare: They said: "Hold him up with his brother and send messengers to the cities,"

src: Du meinst, sie bilden eine Einheit, aber ihre Herzen sind geteilt. Dies, weil sie Leute sind, die keinen Verstand haben.
ref: Their valour is great, among themselves; you think of them as a host; but their hearts are scattered; that is because they are a people who have no sense.
draft: You mean they are a unit, but their hearts are divided. This is because they are people who have no understanding.
hil: You think they form a unity, but their hearts are divided, because they are people who lack understanding.
compare: You think they form a unity, but their hearts are divided, because they are people who lack understanding.

src: Am Tag, da Wir mit der größten Gewalt zupacken werden, gewiß, da werden Wir Vergeltung üben.
ref: The day that We shall seize them with a grievous hold, We will indeed castigate them.
draft: On the day when we will grip with the greatest force, certainly, there will be retaliation.
hil: On the day when we grip with the greatest force, certainly, there will be retaliation.
compare: On the day when we will grip with the greatest force, certainly, there will be retaliation.

src: Und ihr seid die Überlegenen!
ref: You shall prevail.
draft: And you are the superior ones!
hil: And you are the superior ones!
compare: And you are the superior ones!

src: Frag die Kinder Israels, wie viele deutliche Zeichen Wir ihnen zukommen ließen. Wenn aber einer die Gnade Gottes eintauscht, nachdem sie zu ihm gekommen ist, so verhängt Gott eine harte Strafe.
ref: Ask the Descendants of Israel how many clear signs We gave them; and whoever alters Allah’s favour which came to him, then indeed Allah’s punishment is severe.
draft: Ask the Children of Israel how many clear signs We have sent them. But whoever exchanges the grace of God, after it has come to him, then God is strict in punishment.
hil: Ask the Children of Israel how many clear signs We have sent them. But whoever exchanges the grace of God, after it has come to him, then God is strict in punishment.
compare: Ask the Children of Israel how many clear signs We have sent them. But whoever exchanges the grace of God, after it has come to him, then God is strict in punishment.

src: Gewiß, WIR sind es, Der belebt und sterben läßt, und zu Uns ist das Werden,
ref: We are the one who give life and death, and to Us will be the destination.
draft: Certainly, IT is us, who bring to life and let die, and unto Us is the becoming.
hil: Verily, it is We who give life and cause death, and to Us is the destination.
compare: Verily, it is We who give life and cause death, and to Us is the destination.

src: Da schmetterte ihr Herr sie für ihre Sünde nieder, und so ebnete Er über ihnen die Erde ein.
ref: So God obliterated them for their crime, and (destroyed) all of them alike.
draft: Then her Lord struck her down for her sin and leveled the earth above them.
hil: And thus their Lord struck them down for their sin, and leveled the Earth above them.
compare: And thus their Lord struck them down for their sin, and leveled the Earth above them.

src: Da brachen aus ihm zwölf Quellen hervor, so daß jede Menschengruppe wußte, wo ihre Trinkstelle war. - «Eßt und trinkt von dem, was Gott beschert hat, und verbreitet nicht Unheil auf der Erde.»
ref: 'Eat and drink of God's providing, and mischief not in the earth, doing corruption.'
draft: Twelve springs burst forth from it, so that each group of people knew where their drinking place was. "Eat and drink from what God has provided, and do not spread mischief on earth."
hil: Twelve springs burst forth from it, so that each group of people knew where their drinking place was. "Eat and drink from what God has provided, and do not spread mischief on earth."
compare: Twelve springs burst forth from it, so that each group of people knew where their drinking place was. "Eat and drink from what God has provided, and do not spread mischief on earth."

src: Und wenn du sie fragst, wer Wasser vom Himmel herabkommen läßt und die Erde damit nach ihrem Absterben belebt, sagen sie bestimmt: «Gott.» Sprich: Lob sei Gott!
ref: And if you asked them, "Who sends down rain from the sky and gives life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness?" they would surely say " Allah."
draft: And if you ask them who sends water down from the sky, and thereby gives life to the earth after it had been lifeless, they will certainly say: "God." Say: "Praise be to God."
hil: And if you ask them who sends water down from the sky, and thereby gives life to the earth after it had been lifeless, they will answer: "God." Say: "Praise be to God!"
compare: And if you ask them who sends water down from the sky, and thereby gives life to the earth after it had been lifeless, they will certainly say: "God." Say: "Praise be to God."

src: Und übereile dich nicht mit dem Koran, bevor er dir zu Ende offenbart worden ist.
ref: And be not in haste (O Muhammad SAW) with the Quran before its revelation is completed to you, and say: "My Lord!
draft: And do not hasten with the Quran before it has been revealed to you in full.
hil: Do not be hasty with the Quran until it has been completely revealed to you.
compare: And do not hasten with the Quran before it has been revealed to you in full.

src: Gewiß, ALLAH wird die Nifaq- und die Kufr-Betreibenden in Dschahannam versammeln, allesamt.
ref: Indeed God will put the hypocrites and infidels together in Hell.
draft: Surely, ALLAH will gather the hypocrites and the disbelievers in Jahannam (Hell), all together.
hil: Verily, ALLAH will gather the hypocrites and disbelievers together in Jahannam (Hell), all of them.
compare: Surely, ALLAH will gather the hypocrites and the disbelievers in Jahannam (Hell), all together.

src: Wenn Gott für mich Schaden will, können sie denn seinen Schaden beheben?
ref: If God willed any harm for me, can they lift His harm?
draft: If God wants harm for me, can they fix his damage?
hil: Say, "If God intends to harm me, can they repair his damage?
compare: Say, "If God intends to harm me, can they repair his damage?

src: Nein, es ist schlechter für sie. Am Tag der Auferstehung wird ihnen das, womit sie gegeizt haben, als Halskette umgelegt werden.
ref: In fact, it is worse; for what they grudged will be hung around their necks on the Day of Resurrection.
draft: No, it is worse for them. On the day of resurrection, what they have hoarded will be hung around their necks as a necklace.
hil: No, it is bad for them. On the day of resurrection, what they have hoarded will be hung around their necks as a necklace.
compare: No, it is worse for them. On the day of resurrection, what they have hoarded will be hung around their necks as a necklace.

src: Und ihr werdet befragt werden.
ref: You will surely be questioned about it.
draft: And you will be questioned.
hil: And you will be questioned.
compare: And you will be questioned.

src: Unser Herr umfaßt alle Dinge in seinem Wissen. Auf Gott vertrauen wir.
ref: For our Lord has embraced everything with knowledge, and in Allah we have put our trust.
draft: Our Lord encompasses all things in his knowledge. We trust in God.
hil: Our Lord encompasses all with knowledge. We rely on God.
compare: Our Lord encompasses all things in his knowledge. We trust in God.

src: Und führe ihnen als Gleichnis zwei Männer an.
ref: Tell them the parable of two men.
draft: And present to them the parable of two men.
hil: And present to them the parable of two men.
compare: And present to them the parable of two men.

src: Diese sind wie die An'am, nein, sondern sie sind noch abirrender! Diese sind die wirklichen Achtlosen.
ref: They are people unconcerned.
draft: These are like the An'am, no, but they are still wandering! These are the real careless ones.
hil: They are like the cattle, but no, they are even more misguided! They are the truly heedless ones.
compare: They are like the cattle, but no, they are even more misguided! They are the truly heedless ones.

src: "Mein Söhnchen! Sollte es sich auch nur um das Gewicht eines Senfkorns handeln, das sich in einem Stein, in den Himmeln oder auf Erden befinden sollte, ALLAH bringt sie.
ref: "O my son, whatsoever it may be, even though equal to a mustard seed in weight, or within a rock or in the sky or in the earth, God will bring it forth.
draft: "My little son! Even if it's just the weight of a mustard seed, wherever it may be, in a stone, in the heavens or on earth, ALLAH will bring it."
hil: "O my son, if it be (anything) equal to the weight of a mustard seed, and though it be in a rock, or in the heavens, or in the earth, Allah will bring it forth. Verily, Allah is Merciful, Expert."
compare: "My little son! Even if it's just the weight of a mustard seed, wherever it may be, in a stone, in the heavens or on earth, ALLAH will bring it."

src: Sie werden aber (seiner) nicht gedenken, außer daß Allah es will.
ref: And what advice will they heed, except if Allah wills?
draft: They will not remember him, except that Allah wills it.
hil: However, they will not remember him, unless God wills it.
compare: However, they will not remember him, unless God wills it.

src: Und WIR haben dir die Schrift mit der Wahrheit hinabgesandt als Bestätigung dessen, was ihr von der Schrift voranging, und als Hüter über sie.
ref: And to you We have revealed the Book containing the truth, confirming the earlier revelations, and preserving them (from change and corruption).
draft: And WE have sent down to you the Book with the truth, confirming what was before it of the Scripture and as a guardian over it.
hil: And We have sent down to you the Scripture with the truth, confirming what came before it regarding the Scripture and serving as its guardian.
compare: And WE have sent down to you the Book with the truth, confirming what was before it of the Scripture and as a guardian over it.

src: Und sollten sie dem Salam zugeneigt sein, dann sei ihm ebenfalls zugeneigt und übe ALLAH gegenüber Tawakkul!
ref: But if they incline to peace, you also incline to it, and (put your) trust in Allah.
draft: And if you are inclined towards Salam, then also be inclined towards him and exercise Tawakkul towards Allah!
hil: And if they are inclined towards Salam, then be inclined towards him as well and exercise Tawakkul towards Allah!
compare: And if you are inclined towards Salam, then also be inclined towards him and exercise Tawakkul towards Allah!

src: Und erzähle von der Gnade deines Herrn.
ref: And keep recounting the favours of your Lord.
draft: And tell of the grace of your Lord.
hil: And speak of the grace of your Lord.
compare: And tell of the grace of your Lord.

src: Und jedes Volk hat einen, der es rechtleitet.
ref: You are only a warner, and every people has its guide.
draft: And every people has one who guides it rightly.
hil: And every people has one who guides them rightly.
compare: And every people has one who guides them rightly.

src: Und Saatfelder und eine treffliche Stätte,
ref: And fields and stately mansions,
draft: And seed fields and an excellent location.
hil: And seed fields and an excellent location.
compare: And seed fields and an excellent location.

src: Danach werdet ihr zu eurem Herrn heimkehren; und Er wird euch verkünden, was ihr zu tun pflegtet. Wahrlich, Er weiß wohl, was in den Herzen ist.
ref: You will return to your Lord in the end and He will declare to you what you have done: He knows well what is in the hearts of men.
draft: Afterwards, you will return to your Lord, and He will inform you of what you used to do. Surely, He knows what is in the hearts.
hil: Then you will be returned to your Lord who knows what is hidden and what is seen, and He will tell you what you used to do. Indeed, He knows what is within the hearts.
compare: Then you will be returned to your Lord who knows what is hidden and what is seen, and He will tell you what you used to do. Indeed, He knows what is within the hearts.

src: Dann ließen Wir Unsere Gesandten ihren Spuren folgen; und Wir ließen (ihnen) Jesus, den Sohn der Maria, folgen, und Wir gaben ihm das Evangelium. Und in die Herzen derer, die ihm folgten, legten Wir Güte und Barmherzigkeit.
ref: Thereafter in their footsteps We caused Our apostles to follow, and We caused lsa, son Of Maryam, to follow them, and We vouchsafed Unto him the Injil, and We placed In the hearts of those who followed him tenderness and mercy.
draft: Then We followed Our messengers in their footsteps and We let Jesus, son of Mary, follow them; and We gave him the Gospel. And We placed in the hearts of those who followed him kindness and mercy.
hil: Then We made Our messengers follow their tracks; and We made Jesus, the son of Mary, follow them, and We bestowed upon him the Gospel. And into the hearts of those who followed him, We placed kindness and mercy.
compare: Then We followed Our messengers in their footsteps and We let Jesus, son of Mary, follow them; and We gave him the Gospel. And We placed in the hearts of those who followed him kindness and mercy.

src: Gewiß, Pharao erhob sich in Arroganz im Lande und machte dessen Bewohner zu Parteien.
ref: Pharaoh exalted himself in the land, and divided its people into factions.
draft: Surely, Pharaoh rose up in arrogance in the land and made its inhabitants into factions.
hil: Indeed, Pharaoh rose up in arrogance in the land and made its inhabitants into factions.
compare: Surely, Pharaoh rose up in arrogance in the land and made its inhabitants into factions.

src: - Am Tag, da die Erde, sie freilassend, sich ihnen aufspalten wird und sie eilig (hervorkommen).
ref: The day the earth will split asunder they will come out hurriedly.
draft: On the day when the Earth, releasing them, will split and they will emerge hastily.
hil: On the day when the Earth will split and release them hastily.
compare: On the day when the Earth, releasing them, will split and they will emerge hastily.

src: Dann tut Er ihnen am Tag der Auferstehung kund, was sie getan haben.
ref: And on the Day of Judgement He will announce their deeds to them.
draft: Then on the Day of Resurrection, He will make known to them what they have done.
hil: Then on the Day of Judgment, God will inform them of what they have done.
compare: Then on the Day of Resurrection, He will make known to them what they have done.

src: Er (Zakariyya) sagte: "Mein Herr, setze mir ein Zeichen." Er sagte: "Dein Zeichen ist, daß du drei Tage lang nicht zu den Menschen sprechen wirst außer durch Gebärden. Und gedenke deines Herrn häufig und preise (Ihn) am Abend und am frühen Morgen!"
ref: He said: 'Lord, appoint for me a sign' He said: 'Your sign is that you shall not speak to people except by signs for three days' And remember your Lord abundantly, exalt Him in the evening and at the dawn'
draft: He (Zakariyya) said, "My Lord, give me a sign." He said, "Your sign is that you will not speak to the people for three days except by gesture. And remember your Lord often and glorify Him in the evening and the early morning!"
hil: He (Zakariyya) said, 'My Lord, give me a sign.' He said, 'Your sign is that you will not speak to the people for three days except through gestures. And remember your Lord often and glorify Him in the evening and the early morning!'
compare: He (Zakariyya) said, "My Lord, give me a sign." He said, "Your sign is that you will not speak to the people for three days except by gesture. And remember your Lord often and glorify Him in the evening and the early morning!"

src: Und Salomo (machten Wir) den Wind (dienstbar), der in seinem Auftrage in das Land blies, das Wir gesegnet hatten.
ref: We made tempestuous winds obedient to Solomon which blew swiftly to sail at his bidding (with his ships) to the land We had blessed.
draft: And Solomon (We made) the wind (subservient) to him, blowing in the land which We had blessed at his command.
hil: And Solomon made the wind subservient to his command, blowing in the land which We had blessed.
compare: And Solomon (We made) the wind (subservient) to him, blowing in the land which We had blessed at his command.

src: Meine Macht hat mich verlassen."
ref: Vanished has my power from me."
draft: "My power has left me."
hil: My power has left me.
compare: "My power has left me."

src: Und subhanallah, Der HERR aller Schöpfung.
ref: Praised be God, the Lord of all the worlds.
draft: And subhanallah, the Lord of all creation.
hil: And subhanallah, the Lord of all creation.
compare: And subhanallah, the Lord of all creation.

src: Dann sagten WIR: "Adam!
ref: Then We said: "O Adam!
draft: Then WE said, "Adam!"
hil: Then WE said, "Adam!"
compare: Then WE said, "Adam!"

src: Sag: "ALLAH leitet die Erschaffung ein, dann wiederholt ER sie!"
ref: Say: "It is God alone who first creates and then reverts it.
draft: Say: "ALLAH initiates creation, then repeats it!"
hil: Say, "Allah initiates creation, then repeats it!"
compare: Say, "Allah initiates creation, then repeats it!"

src: Und in die Herzen derer, die ihm folgten, legten Wir Güte und Barmherzigkeit.
ref: And We set in the hearts of those who followed him tenderness and mercy.
draft: And into the hearts of those who followed him, We put kindness and mercy.
hil: And into the hearts of those who followed him, We placed kindness and mercy.
compare: And into the hearts of those who followed him, We placed kindness and mercy.

src: Und (mir wurde befohlen): "Richte dein Antlitz auf die einzig wahre Religion, und sei nicht einer der Götzendiener.
ref: And to set my face toward the way, as one upright, and not be one of those who associate others with God.
draft: And (I was commanded): "Direct your face towards the true religion and do not be one of the idolaters".
hil: And (I was commanded): "Direct your face to the only true religion and do not be one of the idolaters."
compare: And (I was commanded): "Direct your face to the only true religion and do not be one of the idolaters."

src: Mose sagte zu ihm: «Darf ich dir folgen, auf daß du mich von dem lehrst, was du über den rechten Weg belehrt worden bist?»
ref: Moses said to him: "May I attend upon you that you may instruct me in the knowledge you have been taught of the right way?"
draft: Moses said to him, "May I follow you, so that you may teach me what you have been taught about the right way?"
hil: "Moses said to him, 'May I follow you, so that you may teach me what you have been taught about the right way?'"
compare: Moses said to him, "May I follow you, so that you may teach me what you have been taught about the right way?"

src: Dann haben Wir das Zeichen der Nacht ausgelöscht und das Zeichen des Tages hell gemacht, damit ihr nach Huld von eurem Herrn trachtet und damit ihr die Zahl der Jahre und die (Zeit)rechnung wißt. Und alles haben Wir ganz ausführlich dargelegt.
ref: Then We make dark the portent of the night, and We make the portent of the day sight-giving, that ye may seek bounty from your Lord, and that ye may know the computation of the years, and the reckoning; and everything have We expounded with a clear expounding.
draft: Then We have erased the sign of the night and made the sign of the day clear, so that you may seek bounty from your Lord and so that you may know the count of years and the calculation [of time]. And everything We have set out in detail.
hil: Then He erased the sign of the night and made the sign of the day luminous so that you may seek bounty from your Lord and that you come to know the count of years and the calculation [of time]. And everything We have detailed with complete elaboration.
compare: Then We have erased the sign of the night and made the sign of the day clear, so that you may seek bounty from your Lord and so that you may know the count of years and the calculation [of time]. And everything We have set out in detail.

src: Also Niedergang ist für diejenigen, die Unrecht begingen, bei der Peinigung eines qualvollen Tages bestimmt.
ref: Woe alas to the sinners for the torment of the grievous Day!
draft: Also downfall is determined for those who committed wrongdoing, in the torment of a painful day.
hil: So, downfall is predetermined for those who committed injustice, they will not be helped by remorse on the day of distress, nor will they be able to beg for mercy.
compare: So, downfall is predetermined for those who committed injustice, they will not be helped by remorse on the day of distress, nor will they be able to beg for mercy.

src: Hat er Brüder, so steht seiner Mutter ein Sechstel zu. (Dies gilt) nach Berücksichtigung eines Testamentes, das er etwa gemacht hat, oder einer (bestehenden) Schuld. - Eure Väter und eure Söhne: Ihr wißt nicht, wer von ihnen euch im Nutzen nähersteht. - (Dies ist) eine Pflicht von seiten Gottes.
ref: Your fathers and your sons -- you know not which out of them is nearer in profit to you.
draft: If he has brothers, his mother is entitled to one sixth (of his inheritance), in consideration of a will he may have made or a debt (he may have incurred). Your fathers and your sons - you do not know which of them is nearest to you in benefit. (This is) an obligation (imposed) by Allah.
hil: If he has siblings, his mother is entitled to one-sixth. This applies after consideration of a will he may have made, or a debt he may have incurred. Your parents and your children - you do not know who is closer to you in terms of benefit. This is an obligation from God.
compare: If he has siblings, his mother is entitled to one-sixth. This applies after consideration of a will he may have made, or a debt he may have incurred. Your parents and your children - you do not know who is closer to you in terms of benefit. This is an obligation from God.

src: Dachten die Menschen etwa, daß sie in Ruhe gelassen werden, zu sagen: "Wir verinnerlichten den Iman", ohne daß sie einer Fitna unterzogen werden?!
ref: Do men think they will get away by saying: "We believe," and will not be tried?
draft: Did people really think that they would be left alone to say "We internalized the Iman" without being subjected to fitna?!
hil: Did people really think that they would be left alone to say 'We internalized the Iman' without being subjected to fitna?!
compare: Did people really think that they would be left alone to say 'We internalized the Iman' without being subjected to fitna?!

src: O die ihr glaubt, entweiht nicht die Kultzeichen Allahs, noch den Schutzmonat, noch die Opfertiere, noch die Halsgehänge, noch die, die das geschützte Haus aufsuchen, indem sie nach Huld von ihrem Herrn trachten und nach Wohlgefallen. - Wenn ihr den Weihezustand abgelegt habt, dann dürft ihr jagen. - Und der Haß, den ihr gegen (bestimmte) Leute hegt, weil sie euch von der geschützten Gebetsstätte abgehalten haben, soll euch ja nicht dazu bringen zu übertreten.
ref: O you who believe, do not violate the (sanctity of) offerings to God, nor the rites of the holy month, nor sacrificial cattle with garlands (that are brought to the Ka'bah), nor of the people who flock to the Holy House seeking the bounties of their Lord, and His pleasure. Hunt when you have laid aside the robe of the pilgrim.
draft: O ye who believe! Profane not Allah's monuments nor the Sacred Month nor the offerings nor the garlands, nor those repairing to the Sacred House, seeking the grace and pleasure of their Lord. But when ye have left the sacred territory, then ye may hunt. And let not your hatred of a folk who (once) stopped your going to the inviolable place of worship seduce you to transgress;
hil: O you who believe! Do not profane the symbols of Allah nor the sacred month, nor the animals of sacrifice, nor the garlands, nor those repairing to the sacred House, seeking the grace and favor of their Lord. But once you are free from the state of consecration, then you are free to hunt. And do not let your wrath against people who have barred you from the inviolable place of worship move you to commit undue transgressions.
compare: O ye who believe! Profane not Allah's monuments nor the Sacred Month nor the offerings nor the garlands, nor those repairing to the Sacred House, seeking the grace and pleasure of their Lord. But when ye have left the sacred territory, then ye may hunt. And let not your hatred of a folk who (once) stopped your going to the inviolable place of worship seduce you to transgress;

src: Das ist die Huld Gottes. Und Gott genügt als der, der Bescheid weiß.
ref: This is a favour from God; and sufficient is God, the all-knowing.
draft: "This is the grace of God. And God suffices as the one who knows best."
hil: "This is the grace of God. And do not please the disbelievers and the hypocrites, and rely upon Allah; and Allah suffices as a Trustee."
compare: "This is the grace of God. And God suffices as the one who knows best."

src: Sag: "Sollen wir euch eine Mitteilung über die Erfolglosesten beim Handeln machen?!"
ref: Say: "Shall I tell you whose labour will be wasted?
draft: Say: "Shall we give you a report on the least successful in trading?!"
hil: Say: "Shall we give you a report on the least successful in trading?!"
compare: Say: "Shall we give you a report on the least successful in trading?!"

src: Doch ALLAH leitet recht, wen ER will.
ref: Allah guides whom He will.
draft: But ALLAH guides right whoever HE wants.
hil: But Allah guides whomever He wills to the straight path.
compare: But Allah guides whomever He wills to the straight path.

src: Gewiß, ALLAH bleibt nichts verborgen, weder auf Erden noch im Himmel.
ref: There is nothing in the earth and the heavens that is hidden from God.
draft: Surely, Allah keeps nothing hidden, neither on Earth nor in Heaven.
hil: "Verily, nothing is hidden from Allah, neither in the Earth nor in the heaven."
compare: "Verily, nothing is hidden from Allah, neither in the Earth nor in the heaven."

src: Euch werden weder eure Verwandten noch eure Kinder nützen. Am Tag der Auferstehung richtet ALLAH unter euch. Und ALLAH ist dessen, was ihr tut, allsehend.
ref: Neither your relations nor your offspring will in the least benefit you, on the Day of Resurrection; He will separate you from them; and Allah is seeing your deeds.
draft: "You will not benefit from your relatives nor your children. On the Day of Resurrection, Allah will judge among you. And Allah is All-Seeing of what you do."
hil: Your relatives or children will not benefit you. On the Day of Resurrection, Allah will judge among you. And Allah is all-seeing of what you do.
compare: "You will not benefit from your relatives nor your children. On the Day of Resurrection, Allah will judge among you. And Allah is All-Seeing of what you do."

src: Und dein HERR ist Der Allvergebende, mit der Allgnade. Würde ER sie belangen für das, was sie sich erworben haben, hätte ER ihnen die Peinigung beschleunigt. Nein, sondern für sie ist ein Termin bestimmt, vor dem sie keine Zuflucht finden werden.
ref: And your Lord is the Oft Forgiver, the Merciful; if He seized them for their deeds, He would soon send the punishment upon them; but for them is an appointed time from which they will not find any refuge.
draft: And your LORD is the Most Forgiving, full of grace. If HE were to pursue them for what they have earned, HE would have hastened for them the punishment. No, but there is for them an appointed time before which they will find no refuge.
hil: And your LORD is the Most Forgiving, full of grace. If HE were to pursue them for what they have earned, HE would have hastened for them the punishment. No, but there is an appointed time for them before which they will find no refuge.
compare: And your LORD is the Most Forgiving, full of grace. If HE were to pursue them for what they have earned, HE would have hastened for them the punishment. No, but there is an appointed time for them before which they will find no refuge.

src: Aber sie schnitten ihr die Sehnen durch. Da sagte er: "Genießt (euer Leben) in eurer Wohnstätte noch drei Tage lang.
ref: But they hamstrung her, and so He said, “Enjoy yourselves in your homes for three days.
draft: But they cut her tendons. Then he said: "Enjoy your life in your dwelling for three more days."
hil: But they cut her tendons. Then he said, 'Enjoy your life in your dwelling for three more days.'
compare: But they cut her tendons. Then he said: "Enjoy your life in your dwelling for three more days."

src: Wenn ihr sie anruft, hören sie euer Bittgebet nicht, und wenn sie (es) auch hörten, würden sie euch doch nicht erhören. Und am Tag der Auferstehung verleugnen sie, daß ihr (sie Allah) beigesellt habt. Keiner kann dir kundtun wie Einer, der Kenntnis von allem hat.
ref: If you call them, they do not hear your call; and supposedly if they heard it, they cannot fulfil your needs; and on the Day of Resurrection they will deny your ascribed partnership; and none will inform you like Him Who informs.
draft: If you call them, they will not hear your prayer, and even if they did, they would not answer you. And on the Day of Resurrection, they will deny that you associated partners with Allah. No one can inform you like One who has knowledge of everything.
hil: If you call them, they will not hear your prayer, and even if they did, they would not answer you. And on the Day of Resurrection, they will deny that you associated partners with Allah. None can inform you like One who has knowledge of everything.
compare: If you call them, they will not hear your prayer, and even if they did, they would not answer you. And on the Day of Resurrection, they will deny that you associated partners with Allah. No one can inform you like One who has knowledge of everything.

src: ER ist Der absolut Autarke!
ref: He is Rich (Free of all wants).
draft: He is the completely self-sufficient!
hil: He is the Perfect, the Merciful; If He wills, He can remove you and bring others in your stead – the way He created you from the descendants of others.
compare: He is the completely self-sufficient!

src: O mein Volk, erfleht Vergebung von eurem Herrn, dann bekehrt euch reumütig zu Ihm; Er wird (den Segen) in reichlicher Weise vom Himmel über euch schicken und wird euch Kraft zu eurer Kraft hinzugeben. So wendet euch nicht als Schuldige ab."
ref: “And O my people! Seek forgiveness from your Lord, then incline towards Him in repentance – He will send abundant rain from the sky upon you and will give you much more strength than you have – and do not turn away committing crimes!”
draft: O my people, ask forgiveness of your Lord and then repent to Him; He will send down showers of rain upon you in abundance and increase you in strength [added unto your strength]. So do not turn away, [being] criminals.
hil: O my people, ask forgiveness of your Lord and then repent to Him; He will send down showers of rain upon you in abundance and increase you in strength [added unto your strength]. So do not turn away, [being] criminals.
compare: O my people, ask forgiveness of your Lord and then repent to Him; He will send down showers of rain upon you in abundance and increase you in strength [added unto your strength]. So do not turn away, [being] criminals.

src: Und wir erwarten für euch, daß ALLAH euch mit einer Peinigung trifft entweder (direkt) von Sich oder durch uns.
ref: Yet what we are waiting for you is the punishment of God, direct or through us.
draft: And we expect for you that ALLAH will inflict a punishment on you either directly from Himself or through us.
hil: We expect that ALLAH will inflict punishment upon you either directly from Himself or through us.
compare: And we expect for you that ALLAH will inflict a punishment on you either directly from Himself or through us.

src: Diejenige, in deren Haus er war, suchte ihn dann gegen seine Neigung zu verführen.
ref: Now the woman in whose house he was solicited him, and closed the doors on them.
draft: The one in whose house he was, then sought to seduce him against his inclination.
hil: The one who was in whose house he then sought to seduce him against his inclination.
compare: The one in whose house he was, then sought to seduce him against his inclination.

src: über diese Welt und das Jenseits. Sie befragen dich über die Waisen.
ref: (Their bearings) on this life and the Hereafter.
draft: About this world and the hereafter. They ask you about the orphans.
hil: They ask you about orphans in relation to this world and the Hereafter.
compare: They ask you about orphans in relation to this world and the Hereafter.

src: Ihre Angelegenheit steht (allein) bei Allah. Hierauf wird Er ihnen kundtun, was sie zu tun pflegten.
ref: Their case rests with God; then He will inform them of what they used to do.
draft: Your matter rests solely with Allah. Then He will inform them of what they used to do.
hil: Your matter rests solely with Allah. Then He will make known to them what they used to do.
compare: Your matter rests solely with Allah. Then He will inform them of what they used to do.

src: Warum verbietest du das, was Allah dir erlaubt hat, um nach der Zufriedenheit deiner Frauen zu trachten?
ref: Why do you ban (for yourself) that which Allah has made lawful to you, seeking to please your wives?
draft: Why do you forbid what Allah has allowed you to seek the satisfaction of your wives?
hil: Why do you forbid what Allah has allowed you to seek the satisfaction of your wives?
compare: Why do you forbid what Allah has allowed you to seek the satisfaction of your wives?

src: (Das sind) diejenigen, die zu ihren Brüdern sagten, während sie daheim blieben: "Hätten sie uns gehorcht, wären sie nicht erschlagen worden."
ref: who said of their brothers (and they themselves held back), 'Had they obeyed us, they would not have been slain.'
draft: (Those are) the ones who said to their brothers while staying at home, "If they had listened to us, they would not have been killed."
hil: Those are the ones who said to their brothers while staying at home, "If they had obeyed us, they would not have been killed."
compare: Those are the ones who said to their brothers while staying at home, "If they had obeyed us, they would not have been killed."

src: damit ihr euch auf ihren Rücken/Decks zurechtsetzt, dann euch an die Wohltat eures HERRN erinnert, wenn ihr euch darauf zurechtgesetzt habt, und sagt: "subhanal-ladhi sach-chara lana hadha wama kunna lahu muqrinin
ref: So that when you sit astride of them and think of the bounties of your Lord, you may say: "All glory to Him who subjugated these for us. We were incapable of doing so.
draft: So that you can settle down on their backs/decks, and remember the kindness of your Lord when you have settled on them, and say: "Subhanal-ladhi sakhkhara lana hadha wama kunna lahu muqrinin."
hil: "O believers, mount your horses and load your baggage on them, so that you may remember the favor of your Lord when you sit on them and say, "Glory be to Him who has subjected these to us, and we could not have it otherwise.""
compare: So that you can settle down on their backs/decks, and remember the kindness of your Lord when you have settled on them, and say: "Subhanal-ladhi sakhkhara lana hadha wama kunna lahu muqrinin."

src: ER ließ beide Meere aufeinandertreffen,
ref: He has set two seas in motion that flow side by side together,
draft: He caused both seas to meet.
hil: He caused the two seas to meet.
compare: He caused both seas to meet.

src: Sind sie dir dann aber ungehorsam, so sprich: "lch bin schuldlos an dem, was ihr tut."
ref: If they do not obey you, tell them: "I am not responsible for what you do."
draft: If they are disobedient to you, say: "I am innocent of what you do."
hil: If they are disobedient to you, say: "I am innocent of what you do."
compare: If they are disobedient to you, say: "I am innocent of what you do."

src: Und (auch) mit denen, die sagen: "Wir sind Christen'" haben Wir ihr Abkommen getroffen. Aber dann vergaßen sie einen Teil von dem, womit sie ermahnt worden waren.
ref: And with those who say 'We are Christians' We took compact; and they have forgotten a portion of that they were reminded of.
draft: And with those who say, "We are Christians," We have made their covenant. But they forgot a portion of that of which they were reminded.
hil: And indeed, those who say, "We are Christians," are closest in affection to the believers. This is because among them are priests and monks, and they are not proud. We have made their covenant, but they forgot a portion of what they were reminded of.
compare: And with those who say, "We are Christians," We have made their covenant. But they forgot a portion of that of which they were reminded.

src: Und sie können es nicht vereiteln.
ref: They cannot get the better (of Us).
draft: And they cannot prevent it.
hil: And they cannot prevent it.
compare: And they cannot prevent it.

src: Du bist ja der Steinigung würdig.
ref: [Tafsir At-Tabari]
draft: You are worthy of stoning.
hil: You are worthy of stoning.
compare: You are worthy of stoning.

src: Gibt es denn einen (anderen) Gott neben Allah? Nein!
ref: Is there another god with God?
draft: Is there any (other) god besides Allah? No!
hil: Is there any other god beside Allah? No!
compare: Is there any (other) god besides Allah? No!

src: "Wurde den Kafir vergolten, was sie zu machen pflegten?"
ref: Will not the infidels pay for what they had done?
draft: "Did the infidel get what they used to do?"
hil: "Was the infidel avenged for what they used to do?"
compare: "Was the infidel avenged for what they used to do?"

src: Sind diese gleich? Preis sei Allah!
ref: Are they equal in comparison?
draft: Are they the same? Price be to Allah!
hil: Are they the same? Glory be to Allah!
compare: Are they the same? Glory be to Allah!

src: Also hinsichtlich derjenigen, die den Iman verinnerlicht und gottgefällig Gutes getan haben, diese sind in einem Garten, sie freuen sich.
ref: Those who believed and did the right will be feasted in a rich, well-watered meadow.
draft: Regarding those who internalized the faith and have done good deeds pleasing to God, they are in a garden, rejoicing.
hil: So, with regard to those who have internalized faith and done good that is pleasing to God, they are in a garden enjoying themselves.
compare: So, with regard to those who have internalized faith and done good that is pleasing to God, they are in a garden enjoying themselves.

src: Dann nachdem von ihren Herzen der Schrecken weggenommen worden war, sagten sie: "Was sagte denn euer HERR?" Sie sagten: "Die Wahrheit!"
ref: When terror is lifted from their hearts, they shall say: 'What did your Lord say' 'The truth' they shall answer.
draft: Then after the terror had been taken away from their hearts, they said, "What did your Lord say?" They said, "The truth!"
hil: "After the terror had been taken away from their hearts, they said, \"What did your Lord say?\" They said, \"The truth!\""
compare: Then after the terror had been taken away from their hearts, they said, "What did your Lord say?" They said, "The truth!"

src: Sag: "Ich bin über euch kein Wakil."
ref: Say: "I am not a warden over you."
draft: Say: "I am not your Wakil."
hil: Say, 'I am not your Wakil.'
compare: Say: "I am not your Wakil."

src: Dann gewiß, sie werden doch in Dschahannam hineingeworfen.
ref: Then they will indeed burn in Hell.
draft: Then surely they will be thrown into Jahannam.
hil: Then surely they will be thrown into Jahannam.
compare: Then surely they will be thrown into Jahannam.

src: Es gibt keinen Platz für euch hier, so kehrt um!"
ref: There is no stand (possible) for you (against the enemy attack!)
draft: "There is no room for you here, so turn back!"
hil: There is no place for you here, so turn around!
compare: "There is no room for you here, so turn back!"

src: Sie sagten: "O unser Vater, wir gingen, um einen Wettlauf zu machen, und ließen Yusuf bei unseren Sachen zurück. Da fraß ihn der Wolf.
ref: And said: "We went racing with one another and left Joseph to guard our things when a wolf devoured him.
draft: They said, "O our father, we went to make a race and left Yusuf behind with our things. Then a wolf ate him."
hil: They said, "O our father, we went to make a race and left Yusuf behind with our things. Then a wolf ate him."
compare: They said, "O our father, we went to make a race and left Yusuf behind with our things. Then a wolf ate him."

src: Doch wenn eine entscheidende Sura herabgesandt wird und darin von Kampf die Rede ist, dann siehst du die, in deren Herzen Krankheit ist, dich mit dem Blick eines (Menschen) anschauen, der im Sterben von Ohnmacht befallen wird; also wehe ihnen!
ref: But when a categorical Surah is revealed that mentions war, you should see those who are sceptical staring at you like a man in the swoon of death. Alas the woe for them!
draft: But when a decisive sura is sent down and therein is mentioned of fighting, then you see those in whose hearts is disease looking at you, with the look of someone over whom death is hovering; so woe to them!
hil: But when a decisive sura is revealed, in which fighting is mentioned, then you see those whose hearts are diseased looking at you with the look of someone over whom death swoons so woe to them!
compare: But when a decisive sura is sent down and therein is mentioned of fighting, then you see those in whose hearts is disease looking at you, with the look of someone over whom death is hovering; so woe to them!

src: Zweifellos sind sie es, die im Jenseits die Verlierenden sein werden.
ref: They will surely be losers in the life to come,
draft: Undoubtedly, they will be the losers in the afterlife.
hil: Undoubtedly, they will be the losers in the afterlife.
compare: Undoubtedly, they will be the losers in the afterlife.

src: ER ist Derjenige, Der diejenigen von den Schriftbesitzern, die Kufr betrieben haben, von ihren Wohnstätten zur ersten Vertreibung heraustreiben ließ. Ihr dachtet nicht, daß sie herauskommen werden, und sie dachten, daß ihre Burgen sie vor ALLAH schützen würden. Dann kam ALLAH zu ihnen von da, womit sie nicht rechneten, und warf in ihre Herzen den Schrecken. Sie zerstörten ihre Häuser mit ihren eigenen Händen und den Händen der Mumin. So zieht (daraus) eine Lehre, ihr mit Einblick!
ref: It is He Who expelled the disbelievers among the People given the Book(s) from their homes, for their first gathering; you did not expect them to leave, whereas they assumed that their fortresses would save them from Allah, so Allah’s command came to them from a place they had not imagined; and He instilled awe in their hearts, so they ruin their own houses by their own hands and at the hands of the Muslims; therefore learn a lesson, O those who can perceive!
draft: HE is the one who drove out from their dwellings those among the people of the Scripture who disbelieved. You did not think they would leave, and they thought that their fortresses would protect them from Allah; but [the decree of] Allah came upon them from where they had not expected, and He cast terror into their hearts [so] they destroyed their houses by their [own] hands and the hands of the believers. So take a lesson from this, O people of vision.
hil: HE is the One who drove out from their dwellings those among the people of the Scripture who disbelieved. You did not think they would leave, and they thought that their fortresses would protect them from Allah; but Allah came upon them from where they had not expected, and He cast terror into their hearts [so] they destroyed their houses by their [own] hands and the hands of the believers. So take a lesson from this, O people of insight!
compare: HE is the One who drove out from their dwellings those among the people of the Scripture who disbelieved. You did not think they would leave, and they thought that their fortresses would protect them from Allah; but Allah came upon them from where they had not expected, and He cast terror into their hearts [so] they destroyed their houses by their [own] hands and the hands of the believers. So take a lesson from this, O people of insight!

src: Einer Seele wird nicht auferlegt, außer was sie vermag.
ref: No person shall have a burden laid on him greater than he can bear.
draft: One's soul is not burdened with more than it can bear.
hil: No soul is burdened beyond its capacity.
compare: No soul is burdened beyond its capacity.

src: So handelten (auch) diejenigen, die vor ihnen waren. Obliegt denn den Gesandten etwas anderes als die deutliche Übermittlung (der Botschaft)?
ref: So did those before them; yet is aught for the Messengers, but to deliver the manifest Message?
draft: So acted (also) those who were before them. Do the messengers have any other duty than to clearly convey the message?
hil: Those before them acted (in the same way). Is there any other duty upon messengers except for the clear delivery (of the message)?
compare: So acted (also) those who were before them. Do the messengers have any other duty than to clearly convey the message?

src: Gewiß, die Stunde wird sicher eintreffen. So übe schöne Nachsicht.
ref: Surely the Hour is coming; so pardon thou, with a gracious pardoning.
draft: Certainly, the hour will surely come. So practice beautiful patience.
hil: Surely, the hour will come. So practice beautiful forbearance.
compare: Surely, the hour will come. So practice beautiful forbearance.

src: Doch sie folgten ihren Neigungen.
ref: And they follow their own desires?
draft: But they followed their inclinations.
hil: However, they followed their inclinations.
compare: However, they followed their inclinations.

src: Und unter den Menschen gibt es auch manch einen, der sich selbst veräußern würde im Streben nach dem Wohlwollen Gottes.
