compare: And you have a date that will not be broken for you. And look at your God, to whom you have devoted yourself constantly.

src: Und ER erschafft, was ihr nicht kennt.
ref: He created other things too which you do not know.
draft: And HE creates what you do not know.
hil: And it creates what you do not know.
compare: And HE creates what you do not know.

src: ER sagte: "Geh!
ref: (And God) said: "Away!
draft: He said, "Go!"
hil: He said, "Go!"
compare: He said, "Go!"

src: Also diejenigen, die den Iman an ihn verinnerlicht, ihn geehrt, ihm zum Sieg verholfen haben und dem Licht (Quran) gefolgt sind, das ihm hinabgesandt wurde, diese sind die wirklichen Erfolgreichen.
ref: Those who believe and honour and help him, and follow the light sent with him, are those who will attain their goal."
draft: So those who internalize the iman in him, honored him, helped him to victory and followed the light (Quran) that was revealed to him, these are the real successful ones.
hil: Those who have accepted faith, honored him, helped him to victory, and followed the light (Quran) that was revealed to him, they will be truly successful.
compare: Those who have accepted faith, honored him, helped him to victory, and followed the light (Quran) that was revealed to him, they will be truly successful.

src: Doch ich verfüge nicht über das, was ihr übereilt haben wollt.
ref: But what you wish to be hastened is not within my power.
draft: But I do not have what you want to rush.
hil: "But I do not have what you wanted to rush after."
compare: "But I do not have what you wanted to rush after."

src: Gespottet wurde schon vor dir über Gesandte. Da umschloß diejenigen, die sie verhöhnt hatten, das, worüber sie spotteten.
ref: Surely the apostles have been mocked before you; but what they had mocked rebounded on the mockers themselves.
draft: Mockery has already been made about emissaries before you. So those who mocked them, were enclosed by what they mocked.
hil: Mockery has been made about emissaries before you. So, those who ridiculed them were surrounded by what they were ridiculing.
compare: Mockery has been made about emissaries before you. So, those who ridiculed them were surrounded by what they were ridiculing.

src: O ihr, die ihr glaubt, fürchtet Allah; und eine jede Seele schaue nach dem, was sie für morgen vorausschickt. Und fürchtet Allah; wahrlich, Allah ist dessen wohl kundig, was ihr tut.
ref: O People who Believe! Fear Allah, and every soul must see what it has sent ahead for tomorrow; and fear Allah; indeed Allah is Aware of your deeds.
draft: O you who believe, fear Allah; and let every soul look to what it has put forth for tomorrow. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is acquainted with what you do.
hil: O ye who believe! Fear Allah; let each soul look to what it has put forth for tomorrow, and fear Allah. Verily, Allah is Aware of what ye do.
compare: O you who believe, fear Allah; and let every soul look to what it has put forth for tomorrow. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is acquainted with what you do.

src: Und für sie ist eine schmerzhafte Pein bestimmt.
ref: They will have a painful punishment.
draft: And for them a painful torment is destined.
hil: And a painful punishment is intended for them.
compare: And a painful punishment is intended for them.

src: Und Fir'aun sagte: "O ihr führende Schar, keinen anderen Gott weiß ich für euch als mich (selbst). So entfache mir, o Haman, einen Brand auf Lehm, und mache mir einen Hochbau, auf daß ich zum Gott Musas emporsteige. Ich glaube fürwahr, daß er zu den Lügnern gehört."
ref: 'Assembly' said Pharaoh, 'I do not know that you have any god except me' 'O Haman, kindle a fire upon clay and make me a tower so that I can climb to see the God of Moses, I think that he is one of the liars'
draft: And Pharaoh said: "O you leading group, I know no other god for you but myself. So light a fire for me, O Haman, upon clay and make me a tower, that I may climb up to the god of Moses. Verily, I think he is one of the liars."
hil: And Pharaoh said, 'O you nobles, I am aware of no other lord of yours but myself; therefore, O Haman, fire some clay to build a tower for me that I may mount up (and see) the God of Moses, for I think he is a liar.'
compare: And Pharaoh said: "O you leading group, I know no other god for you but myself. So light a fire for me, O Haman, upon clay and make me a tower, that I may climb up to the god of Moses. Verily, I think he is one of the liars."

src: ER ist Derjenige, Der euch Seine Ayat zeigt und euch Rizq vom Himmel nach und nach hinabsendet.
ref: It is He who shows you His signs, and sends you food from the heavens.
draft: HE is the One who shows you His signs and sends down sustenance for you from the sky, little by little.
hil: "He is the One who shows you His signs and sends down sustenance for you from the sky, little by little."
compare: HE is the One who shows you His signs and sends down sustenance for you from the sky, little by little.

src: Diese verinnerlichen den Iman an ihn. Und wer von Al-ahzab daran Kufr betreibt, dem ist das Feuer bestimmt.
ref: Such believe therein, and whoso disbelieveth therein of the clans, the Fire is his appointed place.
draft: These internalize faith in him. And whoever commits disbelief in him of the Al-Ahzab, the Fire is appointed to him.
hil: They internalize faith in him. And whoever commits disbelief in him of the Al-Ahzab, the Fire is appointed to him.
compare: These internalize faith in him. And whoever commits disbelief in him of the Al-Ahzab, the Fire is appointed to him.

src: Er sagte: "O wehe mir! War ich unfähig, zu sein wie dieser Rabe und die böse Tat an meinem Bruder zu verbergen?"
ref: He said: woe unto me was incapable of being like unto this raven so that I might cover the corpse of my brother!
draft: He said, "Oh woe is me! Was I unable to be like this raven and hide the evil deed from my brother?"
hil: "He said, 'Oh woe is me! Was I incapable of being like this raven and concealing the evil deed from my brother?'
compare: "He said, 'Oh woe is me! Was I incapable of being like this raven and concealing the evil deed from my brother?'

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Sagt nicht ra'ina, sondern sagt unzurna und hört zu! Und für die Kafir ist eine qualvolle Peinigung bestimmt.
ref: O believers, do not say, 'Observe us,' but say, 'Regard us'; and give ear; for unbelievers awaits a painful chastisement.
draft: You, who have internalized the Imam! Do not say 'ra'ina', but say 'unzurna' and listen! And for the kafir, a painful torment is destined.
hil: You who have internalized the faith! Do not say 'ra'ina,' but say 'unzurna,' and listen! And painful punishment is decreed for the disbelievers.
compare: You who have internalized the faith! Do not say 'ra'ina,' but say 'unzurna,' and listen! And painful punishment is decreed for the disbelievers.

src: Der alles gut gemacht hat, was Er erschuf.
ref: who has created all things well.
draft: The one who has done everything well, that he created.
hil: He who has made everything good that He created.
compare: He who has made everything good that He created.

src: Gewiß, Allah vergibt die Sünden alle. Er ist ja der Allvergebende und Barmherzige.
ref: Despair not of the Mercy of Allah: for Allah forgives all sins: for He is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
draft: Certainly, Allah forgives all sins. He is the All-Forgiving and Merciful.
hil: Undoubtedly, Allah forgives all sins. He is the All-Forgiving and Merciful.
compare: Certainly, Allah forgives all sins. He is the All-Forgiving and Merciful.

src: Er ist es, der die Himmel und die Erde der Wahrheit entsprechend erschaffen hat.
ref: It is He who created the heavens and the earth with a definite purpose.
draft: He is the one who created the heavens and the earth in accordance with truth.
hil: It is it that has created the heavens and the earth in truth, and on the Day of Resurrection, he will say, 'Be!' and it shall become.
compare: He is the one who created the heavens and the earth in accordance with truth.

src: Und zu Seinen Ayat zählt euer Schlaf während der Nacht und am Tag und euer Anstreben nach Seiner Gunst. Gewiß, darin sind doch Ayat für Leute, die hören.
ref: And among His signs is your sleeping during the night and day, and your seeking His munificence; indeed in this are signs for people who heed.
draft: And among His signs is your sleep during the night and day and your endeavor for His favor. Indeed, in that are signs for a people who listen.
hil: And among His signs is your sleep during the night and day, and your endeavor for His favor. Indeed, in that, there are signs for people who listen.
compare: And among His signs is your sleep during the night and day and your endeavor for His favor. Indeed, in that are signs for a people who listen.

src: Oder dachten diejenigen, in deren Herzen Krankheit ist, daß ALLAH ihren Groll nie hervorbringen wird?!
ref: Do they whose minds are filled with doubt, think that God will not expose their malice?
draft: Or did those in whose hearts there is disease think that Allah would never bring forth their resentment?
hil: Or did those in whose hearts there is sickness and disbelief think that Allah will never bring forth their resentment?
compare: Or did those in whose hearts there is sickness and disbelief think that Allah will never bring forth their resentment?

src: Sag: "Wer gewährt euch Rizq von den Himmeln und der Erde?" Sag: "ALLAH!
ref: Proclaim, “Who provides you sustenance from the sky and the earth?”
draft: Say: "Who provides you with sustenance from the heavens and the earth?" Say: "ALLAH!"
hil: Say: 'Who provides for you from heavens and earth?' Say: 'Allah!' Surely, either we or you are rightly guided or in clear error.
compare: Say: "Who provides you with sustenance from the heavens and the earth?" Say: "ALLAH!"

src: Und WIR schenkten ihm Ishaq und Ya'qub, bestimmten die Prophetenschaft und die Schrift bei seiner Nachkommenschaft und ließen ihm seine Belohnung im Diesseits zuteil werden.
ref: And, We gave him (Abraham), Isaac and Jacob and appointed on his descendants the Prophethood and the Book.
draft: And WE gave him Isaac and Jacob, established Prophethood and Scripture amongst his descendants and bestowed upon him his reward in this world.
hil: And We gave him Isaac and Jacob, appointed prophethood and scripture to his descendants, and bestowed upon him his reward in this world.
compare: And WE gave him Isaac and Jacob, established Prophethood and Scripture amongst his descendants and bestowed upon him his reward in this world.

src: Aber nein! Die Ungerechten befinden sich in deutlichem Irrtum.
ref: Nay, but the evildoers are in manifest error.
draft: But no! The unjust are in clear error.
hil: But no! The evil-doers are lost in palpable error.
compare: But no! The unjust are in clear error.

src: Diese erhoben sich jedoch in Arroganz und waren schwer verfehlende Leute.
ref: But they behaved arrogantly and were Mujrimun (disbelievers, sinners, polytheists, criminals, etc.) folk.
draft: These, however, rose in arrogance and were greatly misguided people.
hil: "But they rose in arrogance and were greatly misguided people."
compare: These, however, rose in arrogance and were greatly misguided people.

src: Und wenn sie als Gefangene zu euch kommen, so löst ihr sie aus.
ref: Although, should they come to you as captives, you would ransom them.
draft: And if they come to you as prisoners, you shall release them.
hil: And if they come to you as captives, you shall set them free.
compare: And if they come to you as prisoners, you shall release them.

src: Doch kooperiert nicht bei dem Verwerflichen und bei der Übertretung! Und handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber.
ref: Assist each other to virtue and piety, and assist not each other to sin and transgression, Fear Allah: verily Allah is Severe in chastising.
draft: However, do not cooperate in wrongdoing and transgression! And act with Taqwa towards Allah.
hil: But do not cooperate in what is forbidden or sinful, and act with Taqwa towards Allah.
compare: But do not cooperate in what is forbidden or sinful, and act with Taqwa towards Allah.

src: (Fordert) dann hernach entweder Gnade oder Lösegeld, bis der Krieg seine Lasten (von euch) wegnimmt. Das ist so.
ref: Then, either free them by grace orransom until war shall lay down its loads, in this way, it shall be.
draft: Then afterwards, (demand) either grace or ransom, until the war takes its burdens (from you). That's how it is.
hil: "Then afterwards, (demand) either mercy or ransom, until the war takes its burden (from you). That's how it is."
compare: "Then afterwards, (demand) either mercy or ransom, until the war takes its burden (from you). That's how it is."

src: Davon sind diejenigen Götzendiener ausgenommen, mit denen ihr einen Vertrag eingegangen seid und die es euch an nichts haben fehlen lassen und die keine anderen gegen euch unterstützt haben.
ref: Except those idolaters with whom you have a treaty, who have not failed you in the least, nor helped anyone against you.
draft: Those idolaters are exempted from this, with whom you have entered into a treaty and who have never failed you in anything and who have not supported anyone against you.
hil: Therefore, as long as they are honest with you, be correct with them. Those idolaters are honest with you, and have never failed you in anything, and have not supported anyone else against you, so be honest with them.
compare: Those idolaters are exempted from this, with whom you have entered into a treaty and who have never failed you in anything and who have not supported anyone against you.

src: - denn gewiß, vor der Strafe ihres Herrn (kann) sich niemand sicher glauben,
ref: Surely no one can be secure from the punishment of his Lord, --
draft: because certainly, no one can consider themselves safe from the punishment of their Lord.
hil: because indeed, no one can consider themselves safe from the punishment of their Lord.
compare: because certainly, no one can consider themselves safe from the punishment of their Lord.

src: Am Tag, da sie auf ihren Gesichtern ins (Höllen)feuer gezerrt werden: "Kostet die Berührung der Sengenden."
ref: On that Day they will be dragged into the fire faces foremost, (and told:) "Taste the feel of Hell."
draft: On the day they are dragged into the (Hell)fire upon their faces: "Taste the touch of the Scorching (Fire)!"
hil: On the day when they will be dragged on their faces into the fire, (they will be told), 'Feel the touch of the burning.'
compare: On the day they are dragged into the (Hell)fire upon their faces: "Taste the touch of the Scorching (Fire)!"

src: Ob der eine reich oder arm ist, so ist Allah beiden näher; darum folgt nicht der persönlichen Neigung, auf daß ihr gerecht handeln könnt. Und wenn ihr aber (die Wahrheit) verdreht oder euch von (der Wahrheit) abwendet, so ist Allah eures Tuns kundig.
ref: Whether a man be rich or poor, God is his greater well-wisher than you. So follow not the behests of lust lest you swerve from justice; and if you prevaricate or avoid (giving evidence), God is cognisant of all that you do.
draft: Whether one is rich or poor, Allah is closer to both; therefore, do not follow personal inclination, so that you may act justly. And if you distort (the truth) or turn away (from the truth), then indeed, Allah is ever Acquainted with what you do.
hil: Whether one is rich or poor, Allah is closer to both; therefore, do not follow personal inclination, so that you may act justly. And if you twist the truth or turn away from it, then indeed, Allah is aware of what you do.
compare: Whether one is rich or poor, Allah is closer to both; therefore, do not follow personal inclination, so that you may act justly. And if you twist the truth or turn away from it, then indeed, Allah is aware of what you do.

src: Und richte deine Wünsche auf deinen Herrn aus.
ref: And turn to your Lord with all your love.
draft: And direct your desires to your Lord.
hil: And direct your desires towards your Lord.
compare: And direct your desires towards your Lord.

src: So ruft Ihn an, (wobei ihr) Ihm gegenüber aufrichtig in der Religion (seid).
ref: Therefore pray to Him with obedience all-exclusive.
draft: So call Him (while being) sincere towards Him in religion.
hil: Call upon Him, while being sincere towards Him in religion.
compare: Call upon Him, while being sincere towards Him in religion.

src: Aber viele von ihnen waren Frevler.
ref: But many of them are wicked.
draft: But many of them were sinners.
hil: "But many of them were sinners."
compare: But many of them were sinners.

src: Eine Gruppe von meinen Dienern pflegte zu sagen: >Unser Herr, wir glauben, so vergib uns und erbarme dich unser.
ref: There was a section among My creatures that said: 'O Lord, we believe.
draft: "A group of my servants used to say: 'Our Lord, we believe, so forgive us and have mercy on us.'"
hil: A group among my bondmen said: 'Our Lord! We have accepted faith, therefore forgive us and have mercy on us. You are the Best Among The Merciful.'
compare: "A group of my servants used to say: 'Our Lord, we believe, so forgive us and have mercy on us.'"

src: Und wenn Wir eine Stadt verderben wollen, befehlen Wir denen, die in ihr üppig leben, (zu freveln), und sie freveln in ihr.
ref: And when We decide to destroy a town (population), We (first) send a definite order (to obey Allah and be righteous) to those among them [or We (first) increase in number those of its population] who are given the good things of this life.
draft: And if we want to destroy a city, we command those who live luxuriously in it, (to act wickedly), and they act wickedly in it.
hil: And when We want to destroy a city, We command those who live in luxury within it, (to sin), and they commit sins therein.
compare: And when We want to destroy a city, We command those who live in luxury within it, (to sin), and they commit sins therein.

src: Soll die Ermahnung (ausgerechnet) auf ihn aus unserer Mitte herabgesandt worden sein?"
ref: Hath Unto him the admonition been sent down from amongst us!
draft: "Should the admonition (of all people) have been sent down to him from our midst?"
hil: Could the admonishment have been sent down to him (of all people) from within our midst?
compare: "Should the admonition (of all people) have been sent down to him from our midst?"

src: Gewiß, wen DU ins Feuer eintreten läßt, den hast DU bereits mit Sicherheit erniedrigt.
ref: Whom Thou causest to enter the Fire: him indeed Thou hast confounded.
draft: Certainly, whoever you let enter the fire, you have already humiliated them with certainty.
hil: Verily, whoever you allow to enter the Fire, you have indeed disgraced them already.
compare: Verily, whoever you allow to enter the Fire, you have indeed disgraced them already.

src: Und sie sagten: "Unser HERR!
ref: And they said, “Our Lord!
draft: And they said: "Our Lord!
hil: And they said: "Our Lord!"
compare: And they said: "Our Lord!

src: Sie sagten: "Wir werden seinen Vater trotz seiner Zuneigung ihm gegenüber zu überreden suchen.
ref: They said, “We will solicit him from his father.
draft: They said, "We will try to persuade his father despite his affection towards him."
hil: They said, 'We will try to persuade his father despite his affection towards him.'
compare: They said, 'We will try to persuade his father despite his affection towards him.'

src: Wenn WIR wollen, lassen WIR mit ihnen die Erde versinken oder lassen WIR über ihnen Bruchteile vom Himmel fallen. Gewiß, darin ist doch eine Aya für jeden umkehrenden Diener.
ref: If We will, We can bury them into the earth or cause a part of the sky to fall on them; indeed in this is a sign for every repentant bondman.
draft: If we want, we let the earth sink with them or we let fragments from the sky fall over them. Surely, there is an Aya in this for every repentant servant.
hil: Indeed, there is a sign for those who repent in the fact that if We will, We can submerge the earth with them, or let fragments fall upon them from the sky. Verily, in this there is a lesson for each repenting servant.
compare: Indeed, there is a sign for those who repent in the fact that if We will, We can submerge the earth with them, or let fragments fall upon them from the sky. Verily, in this there is a lesson for each repenting servant.

src: O meine Kinder, geht und erkundigt euch über Yusuf und seinen Bruder. Und gebt nicht die Hoffnung auf das Erbarmen Allahs auf.
ref: O sons, go in search of Joseph and his brother, and do not despair of the mercy of God.
draft: O my children, go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother. And do not give up hope on the mercy of Allah.
hil: O my children, go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother. And do not give up hope on the mercy of Allah.
compare: O my children, go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother. And do not give up hope on the mercy of Allah.

src: Der Ungläubige ist ein Helfer gegen seinen Herrn.
ref: The unbeliever has always been an auxiliary against his Lord.
draft: The unbeliever is a helper against his Lord.
hil: O you who have believed, the unbeliever is a helper against his Lord.
compare: O you who have believed, the unbeliever is a helper against his Lord.

src: Und sollten sie gegen euch den bewaffneten Kampf aufnehmen, werden sie euch den Rücken flüchtend kehren, dann wird ihnen nicht beigestanden.
ref: And if they fight you, they will turn around and flee, then they will not be helped.
draft: And if they take up armed combat against you, they will turn their backs to flee, then they will not be assisted.
hil: And if they take up arms against you, they will turn their backs to flee, and will not be given support.
compare: And if they take up arms against you, they will turn their backs to flee, and will not be given support.

src: Und was lehrt dich wissen, was At-Tariq ist?
ref: How will you comprehend what the night star is?
draft: And what does knowledge teach you about what At-Tariq is?
hil: And what does knowledge teach you about what At-Tariq is?
compare: And what does knowledge teach you about what At-Tariq is?

src: Und solltest du sie um Rechtleitung bitten, hören sie bestimmt nicht.
ref: When you call upon them for guidance, they do not hear.
draft: And if you were to ask them for guidance, they certainly wouldn't listen.
hil: And if you ask them for guidance, they certainly won't listen.
compare: And if you ask them for guidance, they certainly won't listen.

src: Es wird (zu ihnen) gesagt werden: "Betretet die Tore der Hölle, ewig darin zu bleiben."
ref: "Enter the gates of Hell," they will be told, "and there abide for ever."
draft: "It will be said to them: 'Enter the gates of Hell, to stay there forever.'"
hil: "They will be asked to enter the gates of Hell to stay there forever."
compare: "It will be said to them: 'Enter the gates of Hell, to stay there forever.'"

src: Und WIR erhöhten die einen von ihnen über die anderen um Stellungen, damit die einen von ihnen die anderen zu Beschäftigten nehmen. Doch die Gnade deines HERRN ist besser als das, was sie anhäufen.
ref: We have distributed among them their comforts in the life of this world, and gave high status to some over others so that they mock at each other; and the mercy of your Lord is better than all what they hoard.
draft: And WE elevated one of them over the others in ranks so he might take them for service. But the mercy of your Lord is better than what they accumulate.
hil: And we made some of them higher in rank than others so that they may employ others for service. But the mercy of your Lord is better than what they accumulate.
compare: And WE elevated one of them over the others in ranks so he might take them for service. But the mercy of your Lord is better than what they accumulate.

src: Doch nur diejenigen, die zuhören, hören auf dich, während die Toten ALLAH erweckt. Dann werden sie zu Ihm zurückgebracht.
ref: Only they will respond who can hear. As for the dead, raised they will be by God, then to Him they will be returned.
draft: But only those who listen, hear you, while the dead are raised by Allah. Then they are returned to Him.
hil: But only those who listen will hear you, while the dead are raised by Allah. Then they will be brought back to Him.
compare: But only those who listen will hear you, while the dead are raised by Allah. Then they will be brought back to Him.

src: Und wenn ihnen gesagt wird: "Folgt dem, was ALLAH hinabsandte." Sagen sie: "Nein, sondern wir folgen dem, woran wir unsere Ahnen fanden."
ref: and when it is said to them, 'Follow what God has sent down,' they say, 'No; but we will follow such things as we found our fathers doing.' What?
draft: And when they are told, "Follow that which Allah has revealed," they say, "Rather, we will follow that which we found our fathers doing."
hil: And when they are told, 'Follow that which God has revealed,' they say, 'No, rather, we follow that which our forefathers found.'
compare: And when they are told, "Follow that which Allah has revealed," they say, "Rather, we will follow that which we found our fathers doing."

src: Und es wurde den Menschen gesagt: "Wollt ihr euch nicht versammeln,
ref: And the people were also asked to assemble.
draft: And people were told: "Don't you want to gather together,
hil: And it was said to the people, 'Don't you want to gather together,'
compare: And it was said to the people, 'Don't you want to gather together,'

src: Ihr, die den Iman bekundet habt!
ref: O People who Believe!
draft: Your, who have declared faith!
hil: O you who believe, make not friends of those who incurred the wrath of Allah; they despair of the life to come even as the unbelievers despair of those in the graves.
compare: Your, who have declared faith!

src: Das Bleibende (an Lohn) von Allah ist besser für euch, wenn ihr gläubig seid. Und ich bin nicht Hüter über euch."
ref: That which is left to you by God is better, if you are true believers; yet I am not a warden over you."
draft: "The lasting (reward) from Allah is better for you if you are believers. And I am not a guardian over you."
hil: The lasting reward from Allah is better for you if you are believers. And I am not a guardian over you.
compare: "The lasting (reward) from Allah is better for you if you are believers. And I am not a guardian over you."

src: (Er ist) der Erschaffer der Himmel und der Erde.
ref: The Creator of the heavens and the earth.
draft: He is the creator of the heavens and the earth.
hil: He is the Creator of the heavens and the earth.
compare: He is the Creator of the heavens and the earth.

src: Und Frömmigkeit besteht nicht darin, daß ihr durch die Hinterseite in die Häuser geht. Frömmigkeit besteht darin, daß man gottesfürchtig ist.
ref: Piety does not lie in entering the house through the back door, for the pious man is he who follows the straight path.
draft: And piety does not consist in entering houses through the back. Piety consists in being God-fearing.
hil: Piety does not consist in people entering the phases of time and the pilgrimage season. Piety consists in being God-fearing.
compare: And piety does not consist in entering houses through the back. Piety consists in being God-fearing.

src: Sie alle haben WIR vor den Menschen ausgezeichnet,
ref: And each one of them We favoured over all mankind.
draft: They all have distinguished US in front of people.
hil: We have distinguished all of them in front of people.
compare: We have distinguished all of them in front of people.

src: Die Vornehmen seines Volkes, die nicht glaubten, sagten: "Wir sehen in dir nur einen Menschen unseresgleichen und wir sehen, daß dir keine als jene gefolgt sind, die aller äußeren Erscheinung nach die Niedrigsten unter uns sind, noch sehen wir in euch irgendeinen Vorzug vor uns; nein, wir erachten euch für Lügner."
ref: The leaders of the people who were unbelievers, replied: "We see that you are but a man like us, and see that none among us follows you but the meanest and immature of judgement, and do not see any excellence in you above us. In fact, we think you are a liar."
draft: The nobles of his people, who did not believe, said: "We see in you only a person like us and we see that no one has followed you except those who are the lowest among us in appearance, nor do we see any superiority in you over us; no, we consider you to be liars."
hil: The noble ones of his people who did not believe said: "We only see in you a human like ourselves, and we see that none except those who appear to be the lowest among us have followed you, nor do we see any superiority in you over us. No, we consider you to be a liar."
compare: The nobles of his people, who did not believe, said: "We see in you only a person like us and we see that no one has followed you except those who are the lowest among us in appearance, nor do we see any superiority in you over us; no, we consider you to be liars."

src: Und das Wort wird über sie fällig werden dafür, daß sie Unrecht taten, und da werden sie nicht reden.
ref: When the sentence will have been passed upon them for their wickedness, they will not be able to say a word.
draft: And the word will befall them for doing wrong, and they shall not speak.
hil: And the word shall befall them for doing wrong, and they shall not speak.
compare: And the word will befall them for doing wrong, and they shall not speak.

src: Er steht für die Gerechtigkeit ein. Es gibt keinen Gott außer Ihm, dem Mächtigen, dem Weisen.
ref: He upholds justice there is no god except He, the Mighty, the Wise.
draft: He stands up for justice. There is no god but Him, the Mighty, the Wise.
hil: He stands up for justice. There is no god but Him, the Mighty, the Wise.
compare: He stands up for justice. There is no god but Him, the Mighty, the Wise.

src: Und WIR machten sie zu Imamen, die zum Feuer einladen. Und am Tag der Auferstehung wird ihnen nicht beigestanden.
ref: We made them the leaders of those who call to Hell; and on the Day of Judgement they will not be helped.
draft: And WE made them imams who invite to the Fire. And on the Day of Resurrection, they will not be helped.
hil: WE made them imams who invite to the Fire. And on the Day of Resurrection, they will not be helped.
compare: And WE made them imams who invite to the Fire. And on the Day of Resurrection, they will not be helped.

src: Er sagte: «Doch. Aber mein Herz soll Ruhe finden.»
ref: Ibrahim said, “Surely yes, why not?
draft: He said: "Yes, but my heart shall find peace."
hil: "He said: 'Yes, but my heart shall find peace.'"
compare: "He said: 'Yes, but my heart shall find peace.'"

src: Kinder Adams! Bereits haben WIR euch Kleidung hinabgesandt, die eure Schamteile bedeckt, auch schmückende Kleidung.
ref: O sons of Adam, We have revealed to you a dress that would both hide your nakedness and be an adornment, but the raiment of piety is best.
draft: Children of Adam! We have already sent down to you clothing that covers your shame, as well as adornment.
hil: Children of Adam! Already have We sent down to you clothing that covers your shame, as well as adornment.
compare: Children of Adam! We have already sent down to you clothing that covers your shame, as well as adornment.

src: Sie werden sagen: "(All dies ist) Allahs." Sprich: "Wieso also seid ihr verblendet?"
ref: Thereupon they will say, “Such greatness is only that of Allah”; say, “Then by what magic are you deceived?”
draft: You will say, "(All of this is) Allah's." Say: "So why are you deluded?"
hil: They will say, "God's." Say, "So why are you deluded?"
compare: You will say, "(All of this is) Allah's." Say: "So why are you deluded?"

src: Vielmehr (soll er sagen): "Seid Gottesgelehrte mit dem, was ihr gelehrt habt und mit dem, was ihr studiert habt."
ref: Rather, 'Be you masters in that you know the Book, and in that you study.'
draft: Rather (he should say): "Be scholars of God with what you have taught and with what you have studied."
hil: "Rather (he should say): 'Be scholars of God with what you have taught, bearing clear signs, and with that which you have studied.'"
compare: Rather (he should say): "Be scholars of God with what you have taught and with what you have studied."

src: Ich folge nur dem, was mir eingegeben wird.
ref: I only follow what is sent down to me."
draft: I only follow what is inputted to me.
hil: I only follow what is given to me.
compare: I only follow what is given to me.

src: Er (Moses) sagte: "lch tat es damals, als ich auf dem Irrweg war.
ref: (Moses) replied: "I did do that and I was in the wrong,
draft: He (Moses) said, "I did it back when I was lost."
hil: He (Moses) said, 'I did it back when I was lost.'
compare: He (Moses) said, 'I did it back when I was lost.'

src: Sie werden mit silbernen Spangen geschmückt sein. Und ihr Herr wird sie von einem reinen Trank trinken lassen.
ref: And adorned they shall be with bracelets of silver: and their Lord shall give them drink a beverage pure.
draft: They will be adorned with silver clasps. And their lord will let them drink a pure draught.
hil: They will be adorned with silver clasps. And their Lord will let them drink a pure drink.
compare: They will be adorned with silver clasps. And their Lord will let them drink a pure drink.

src: Die damit rechnen, daß sie ihrem Herrn begegnen und daß sie zu Ihm zurückkehren werden.
ref: Who are conscious that they have to meet their Lord, and to Him they have to return.
draft: Those who expect to meet their Lord and that they will return to Him.
hil: Those who anticipate encountering their Lord and returning to Him.
compare: Those who anticipate encountering their Lord and returning to Him.

src: Und diese sind die Weggenossen des Feuers. Darin werden sie ewig bleiben.
ref: They are the residents of Hell where they will live for ever.
draft: And these are the companions of the fire. They will remain in it forever.
hil: And those are the companions of the Fire. They will abide therein eternally.
compare: And these are the companions of the fire. They will remain in it forever.

src: Dann verdorrt es, und du siehst es gelb werden. Dann macht Er es zu zermalmtem Zeug.
ref: Thereafter it wirhereth, and thou beholdest it turn yellow; then He maketh it chaff.
draft: Then it withers, and you see it turn yellow. Then He turns it into crushed stuff.
hil: Then have you not seen that it withers, and you see it turn yellow, and then He turns it into crushed stuff? Surely in this there is a reminder for people of understanding.
compare: Then it withers, and you see it turn yellow. Then He turns it into crushed stuff.

src: Aber er wandte sich der Erde zu und folgte seiner Neigung. So ist es mit ihm wie mit einem Hund: Gehst du auf ihn los, hängt er die Zunge heraus; läßt du ihn in Ruhe, hängt er auch die Zunge heraus.
ref: if it had been Our will, We could have used these signs to exalt him, but instead he clung to the earth and followed his own desires, he was like a dog that pants whether you chase it away or leave it alone.
draft: But he turned towards the earth and followed his inclination. It's the same with him as with a dog: If you go after him, he sticks his tongue out; if you leave him alone, he also sticks his tongue out.
hil: But he turned towards the earth and followed his inclination. It is like with him as with a dog: If you go after him, he sticks his tongue out, and if you leave him alone, he also sticks his tongue out.
compare: But he turned towards the earth and followed his inclination. It is like with him as with a dog: If you go after him, he sticks his tongue out, and if you leave him alone, he also sticks his tongue out.

src: Und erwähne den Bruder von 'Aad, als er seine Leute in Al-ahqaf warnte, und bereits vergingen die Warner vor ihm und hinter ihm: "Dient nichts anderes als ALLAH!
ref: And remember (Hud) the brother of 'Ad, when he warned his people in Al-Ahqaf (the curved sand-hills in the southern part of Arabian Peninsula).
draft: And mention the brother of 'Aad, as he warned his people in Al-Ahqaf, and already the warners had passed away before him and behind him: "Serve none but Allah!
hil: " And mention the brother of 'Aad, as he warned his people in Al-Ahqaf, and already the warners had passed away before him and behind him: "Serve none but Allah!"
compare: " And mention the brother of 'Aad, as he warned his people in Al-Ahqaf, and already the warners had passed away before him and behind him: "Serve none but Allah!"

src: Aber was für ihre Teilhaber ist, das erreicht Allah nicht, während das, was für Allah ist, ihre Teilhaber erreicht.
ref: So what is for their associates reaches not God; and what is for God reaches their associates.
draft: But what is for their partners, that does not reach Allah, while what is for Allah, reaches their partners.
hil: "But what belongs to their partners, Allah does not reach, while what belongs to Allah, reaches their partners."
compare: "But what belongs to their partners, Allah does not reach, while what belongs to Allah, reaches their partners."

src: Sag: Wenn ich ihn ersonnen haben sollte, so vermögt ihr für mich nichts gegen Allah (auszurichten). Er weiß sehr wohl, worüber ihr euch (ausgiebig) auslaßt.
ref: Say (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “If I have fabricated it, then (I know that) you have no power to support me against Allah; He well knows the matters you are involved in; He is Sufficient as a Witness between me and you; and He only is the Oft Forgiving, the Most Merciful.”
draft: Say: If I had fabricated it, you would not be able to do anything to protect me from Allah. He knows best what you talk about among yourselves.
hil: Say: If I had fabricated it, you would not be able to do anything to protect me from Allah. He knows well what you talk about among yourselves.
compare: Say: If I had fabricated it, you would not be able to do anything to protect me from Allah. He knows well what you talk about among yourselves.

src: Und Nuh rief Uns ja bereits zu - welch trefflicher Erhörer sind Wir fürwahr!
ref: Noah had verily called to Us. And how gracious was He who answered (him).
draft: And Nuh already called us - what an excellent hearer we truly are!
hil: And Nuh called us indeed - what an excellent listener we truly are!
compare: And Nuh called us indeed - what an excellent listener we truly are!

src: Und gib denen frohe Botschaft, die Gutes tun.
ref: So give glad tidings to those who are doers of good.
draft: And give good news to those who do good.
hil: Give good news to those who do good.
compare: And give good news to those who do good.

src: ALLAH wird ihnen gewiß vergelten Besseres als das, wie sie handelten, und wird ihnen noch mehr von Seiner Gunst geben. Und ALLAH gewährt Rizq, wem ER will, ohne Berechnung.
ref: That God may reward them for the best of their deeds, and bestow more on them of His bounty, for God gives whom He please without measure.
draft: "ALLAH will certainly reward them with better than what they did, and will give them even more of His favor. And ALLAH grants Rizq to whom He wills, without calculation."
hil: Surely, Allah will reward them with better for what they did and will give them more of His grace. And Allah grants provision to whomever He wills without limit.
compare: "ALLAH will certainly reward them with better than what they did, and will give them even more of His favor. And ALLAH grants Rizq to whom He wills, without calculation."

src: Er macht sie deutlich für Leute, die Bescheid wissen.
ref: He manifesteth them for people who have knowledge.
draft: He makes it clear to people who know.
hil: He makes it clear to those who know.
compare: He makes it clear to those who know.

src: Dann vertauschten es diejenigen, die Unrecht taten, mit einem Ausspruch, der anders war als das, was ihnen gesagt worden war. Da sandten Wir über diejenigen, die Unrecht taten, ein Zorngericht vom Himmel herab dafür, daß sie frevelten.
ref: But the wicked changed and perverted the word We had spoken to a word distorted, and We sent from heaven retribution on the wicked, for they disobeyed.
draft: Then those who did wrong substituted a different saying for that which had been given to them. So We sent down upon those who wronged a punishment from the sky because they were defiantly disobeying.
hil: "Then those who unjustly substituted a statement other than the one that was addressed to them. For this reason, We sent a punishment down from the sky to those who committed injustice for their impiety.",
compare: Then those who did wrong substituted a different saying for that which had been given to them. So We sent down upon those who wronged a punishment from the sky because they were defiantly disobeying.

src: Und wen ALLAH abirren läßt, für den gibt es keinen Weg (zur Rechtleitung).
ref: He whom God allows to go astray has no way.
draft: And whoever Allah leads astray, there is no way (to guidance) for him.
hil: And whomever Allah leads astray, for him there is no way (to guidance).
compare: And whoever Allah leads astray, there is no way (to guidance) for him.

src: Sie gebieten das Rechte und verbieten das Verwerfliche, verrichten das Gebet und entrichten die Abgabe und gehorchen Allah und Seinem Gesandten.
ref: They advocate virtue, forbid evil, perform the prayers, practice charity, and obey God and His Messenger.
draft: They enjoin what is right and forbid what is reprehensible, perform prayer and pay the obligatory charity and obey Allah and His Messenger.
hil: They command what is reputable and prohibit what is disreputable, perform the prayer and pay the obligatory charity and obey Allah and His Messenger.
compare: They enjoin what is right and forbid what is reprehensible, perform prayer and pay the obligatory charity and obey Allah and His Messenger.

src: Die Bewohner von Medina und die arabischen Beduinen in ihrer Umgebung dürfen nicht hinter dem Gesandten Gottes zurückbleiben und sich selbst ihm vorziehen. Dies, weil sie weder auf dem Weg Gottes Durst oder Mühsal oder Hunger erleiden noch einen Schritt unternehmen, der die Ungläubigen in Groll versetzt, noch einem Feind etwas zufügen, ohne daß dadurch ein gutes Werk für sie aufgezeichnet würde.
ref: It was not worthy of the people of Madina, and the Arabs of the desert around them, to abandon the Prophet of God, and to care more for themselves than for him; for there is no hardship or thirst or hunger that they know in the service of God, and no place they walk on where walking provokes the unbelievers, and no harm they receive from the enemy, but is put down as a good deed in their favour.
draft: The residents of Medina and the Arab Bedouins in their surroundings are not allowed to remain behind the Messenger of God and prefer themselves to him. This is because they neither suffer thirst, hardship or hunger on the way of God, nor take a step that would provoke the unbelievers to anger, nor inflict harm on an enemy without it being recorded as a good deed for them.
hil: The people of Medinah and the villages around them should not stay behind the Noble Messenger of Allah or consider their own lives dearer than his life, because they neither suffer thirst, pain or hunger in Allah's cause, nor take on a place that angers the disbelievers, nor cause any harm to an enemy, without a good deed being recorded for them in lieu of all of these, indeed Allah does not waste the wages of the virtuous.
compare: The residents of Medina and the Arab Bedouins in their surroundings are not allowed to remain behind the Messenger of God and prefer themselves to him. This is because they neither suffer thirst, hardship or hunger on the way of God, nor take a step that would provoke the unbelievers to anger, nor inflict harm on an enemy without it being recorded as a good deed for them.

src: Gewiß, ALLAH ist allkräftig, allwürdig.
ref: Verily God is all-powerful and all-mighty.
draft: Sure, Allah is omnipotent, worthy of all praise.
hil: Surely, Allah is Almighty, Worthy of all praise.
compare: Sure, Allah is omnipotent, worthy of all praise.

src: Doch selbst dann, wenn sie sich mit ihrer Kleidung verhüllen, ER kennt alles, was sie verheimlichen und was sie offenlegen.
ref: But when they cover themselves up with their garments, He knows what they hide and what they expose.
draft: However, even if they hide themselves with their clothing, HE knows everything they conceal and everything they reveal.
hil: But behold, even if they wrap themselves in their garments, He knows what they secrete and what they publish. He surely knows all the thoughts within.
compare: However, even if they hide themselves with their clothing, HE knows everything they conceal and everything they reveal.

src: Und das Schiff kam auf dem Güdyy zur Rast.
ref: The Ark came to rest on Mount Judi.
draft: And the ship came to rest on the Güdyy.
hil: "And the ship came to rest on the Gudyy."
compare: And the ship came to rest on the Güdyy.

src: Und rufe neben Allah keinen anderen Gott an. Es gibt keinen Gott außer Ihm.
ref: And call not upon another god with God; there is no god but He.
draft: And do not invoke any god beside Allah. There is no god but Him.
hil: And call upon no other god besides Allah. There is no god but Him alone, the Lord of the glorious Throne.
compare: And do not invoke any god beside Allah. There is no god but Him.

src: Sag: "Diejenigen in den Himmeln und auf Erden kennen das Verborgene nicht, nur ALLAH (kennt es)!" Und sie merken nicht, wann sie erweckt werden.
ref: Say: "No one in the heavens and the earth has knowledge of the unknown except God, nor can they know when they will be raised again.
draft: Say: "Those in the heavens and on earth do not know the unseen, only Allah (knows it)!" And they do not perceive when they will be resurrected.
hil: "Say: 'Those in the heavens and on earth do not know the unseen, only Allah (knows it)!' And they do not perceive when they will be resurrected.",
compare: Say: "Those in the heavens and on earth do not know the unseen, only Allah (knows it)!" And they do not perceive when they will be resurrected.

src: Oder sagen sie etwa: "Er hat ihn sich selbst ausgedacht'"? Nein!
ref: What! They say, “He has invented the Qur'an”?
draft: Or do they say, "He made it up himself?" No!
hil: Or do they say, 'He made it up himself?' No!
compare: Or do they say, "He made it up himself?" No!

src: Gewiß, ALLAH ändert nichts von dem worin Menschen sind, bis sie das ändern, was sie in sich tragen. Und wenn ALLAH für Menschen Übel bestimmt, so kann es nicht aufgehalten werden.
ref: Lo! Allah changeth not the condition of a folk until they (first) change that which is in their hearts; and if Allah willeth misfortune for a folk there is none that can repel it, nor have they a defender beside Him.
draft: Certainly, Allah does not change anything in which people are until they change what they carry within themselves. And if Allah decrees evil for people, it cannot be stopped.
hil: Indeed, Allah does not alter what is within a people until they alter what is within themselves. And if Allah decrees evil for a people, it cannot be repelled.
compare: Indeed, Allah does not alter what is within a people until they alter what is within themselves. And if Allah decrees evil for a people, it cannot be repelled.

src: Und unter ihnen ist eine Gruppe, die mit ihren Zungen die Schrift verdrehen, damit ihr denkt, dies gehöre zur Schrift, obwohl es nicht zur Schrift gehört, noch dazu sagen sie: "Es sei von ALLAH", doch es ist nicht von ALLAH. Und sie verbreiten Lügen im Namen ALLAHs, während sie es wissen.
ref: Among them is a section which distorts in reading the Scripture in a way that though it sounds like the Scripture, in fact it is not; yet they say it is from God, when they know it is not; and they lie about God, and knowingly.
draft: And among them is a group who twist their tongues with the scripture so you may think it is from the scripture, while it is not from the scripture. And they say, "It is from Allah ," while it is not from Allah. And they speak untruth about Allah while they know.
hil: And among them is a group who twist their tongues with the scripture so you may think it is from the scripture, while it is not from the scripture. And they say, "It is from Allah," while it is not from Allah. And they spread lies in the name of Allah knowingly.
compare: And among them is a group who twist their tongues with the scripture so you may think it is from the scripture, while it is not from the scripture. And they say, "It is from Allah ," while it is not from Allah. And they speak untruth about Allah while they know.

src: Und haltet sie an; denn sie sollen befragt werden."
ref: And detain them, for they will be questioned."
draft: "And stop them; for they shall be questioned."
hil: "And stop them; for they shall be questioned."
compare: "And stop them; for they shall be questioned."

src: Und ER ist mit euch, wo ihr seid.
ref: And He is with you (by His Knowledge) wheresoever you may be.
draft: And HE is with you, wherever you are.
hil: And He is with you wherever you may be.
compare: And He is with you wherever you may be.

src: Vielmehr ist Allah euer Schutzherr; und Er ist der beste Helfer.
ref: Allah is your Patron and He is the best of the helpers.
draft: Rather, Allah is your protector, and He is the best helper.
hil: Allah is your protector, and He is the best helper.
compare: Allah is your protector, and He is the best helper.

src: Fürwahr, ungläubig sind diejenigen, die sagen: "Gewiß, Allah ist einer von dreien."
ref: They are unbelievers who say, 'God is the Third of Three.
draft: Truly, those who say "Indeed, Allah is one of three" are unbelievers.
hil: Truly, those who say 'Indeed, Allah is one of three' are unbelievers.
compare: Truly, those who say "Indeed, Allah is one of three" are unbelievers.

src: Und (Wir sandten) zu Madyan ihren Bruder Shuayb. Er sagte: «O mein Volk, dienet Gott. Ihr habt keinen Gott außer Ihm. Ein deutliches Zeichen ist von eurem Herrn zu euch gekommen, so gebt volles Maß und Gewicht und zieht den Menschen nichts ab, was ihnen gehört, und stiftet nicht Unheil auf der Erde, nachdem sie in Ordnung gebracht worden ist. Das ist bestimmt besser für euch, so ihr gläubig seid.
ref: And We sent Shuaib to Madyan from their community; he said, “O my people! Worship Allah – you do not have any God except Him; indeed a clear proof has come to you from your Lord, so measure and weigh in full and do not give the people their goods diminished, and do not spread turmoil in the earth after it is organised; this is for your good, if you believe.”
draft: And (We sent) to Midian their brother Shuayb. He said: "O my people, worship God. You have no other god but Him. A clear sign has come to you from your Lord, so give full measure and weight, and do not deprive people of what they rightfully own, and do not cause corruption on earth after it has been set in order. This is best for you, if you believe.
hil: And (We sent) their brother Shuayb to the people of Midian. He said, "O my people, worship Allah. You have no deity other than Him. There has come to you clear evidence from your Lord. So give full measure and weight and do not deprive people of their due and cause not corruption upon the earth after its reformation. That is best for you, if you should be believers."
compare: And (We sent) their brother Shuayb to the people of Midian. He said, "O my people, worship Allah. You have no deity other than Him. There has come to you clear evidence from your Lord. So give full measure and weight and do not deprive people of their due and cause not corruption upon the earth after its reformation. That is best for you, if you should be believers."

src: Seine Blütenstände sind so, als wären sie Köpfe der Satane.
ref: Its spathes are like the prickly pear.
draft: His inflorescences are as if they were heads of the Satans.
hil: Its inflorescences are like heads of the devils.
compare: Its inflorescences are like heads of the devils.

src: (Geht also) mit unseren Zeichen. Ihr und diejenigen, die euch folgen, werden die Sieger sein.»
ref: By virtue of Our signs, you and those who follow you will be the triumphant.”
draft: "So (goes it) with our signs. You and those who follow you will be the winners."
hil: So (goes it) with our signs. You and those who follow you shall be the victorious ones.
compare: So (goes it) with our signs. You and those who follow you shall be the victorious ones.

src: Und Sulaiman beerbte Dawud.
ref: And Sulaiman (Solomon) inherited (the knowledge of) Dawud (David).
draft: And Sulaiman succeeded David.
hil: And Solomon succeeded David.
compare: And Sulaiman succeeded David.

src: Kein Anderer als der Allerbarmer hält sie zurück.
ref: Nothing holds them aloft but God.
draft: No one but the Most Merciful restrains them.
hil: "No one but the Most Merciful restrains them."
compare: No one but the Most Merciful restrains them.

src: So vergelten Wir den Ungerechten.
ref: That is how We requite the iniquitous.
draft: So we repay the unjust.
hil: Thus do we repay the unjust.
compare: Thus do we repay the unjust.

src: Und Mein Fluch soll auf dir bis zum Tage des Gerichts lasten."
ref: Upon you will be My damnation till the Day of Doom."
draft: "And may my curse rest upon you until the day of judgment."
hil: And my curse shall rest upon you until the day of judgment.
compare: "And may my curse rest upon you until the day of judgment."

src: Entsinnt euch Meiner Gaben, die ICH euch gewährt habe, und daß ICH euch den Menschen gegenüber auszeichnete.
ref: Remember the favour of Mine, which I bestowed upon you and gave you superiority over others of your time. (by sending the Noble Messengers to your nation)
draft: Remember my gifts, which I have granted to you, and that I have distinguished you from other people.
hil: Remember my gifts, which I have granted to you, and that I distinguished you from other people.
compare: Remember my gifts, which I have granted to you, and that I have distinguished you from other people.

src: Sprich: "Er ist es, Der euch ins Dasein rief und Der euch Ohren und Augen und Herzen gab; (aber) gering ist es, was ihr an Dank wißt!"
ref: Say: "It is He who raised you and gave you ears and eyes and hearts. How little are the thanks you offer!"
draft: Speak: "He is the One who called you into being and who gave you ears and eyes and hearts; (but) little do you know of gratitude!"
hil: Say, "He is the One who brought you into being, and who gave you ears and eyes and hearts; (yet) little do you acknowledge."
compare: Say, "He is the One who brought you into being, and who gave you ears and eyes and hearts; (yet) little do you acknowledge."

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Wenn ihr zum rituellen Gebet aufstehen wollt, dann wascht (vorher) eure Gesichter, eure Hände und Arme bis zu den Ellenbogen, benetzt eure Köpfe und (wascht) eure Füße bis zu den Knöcheln.
ref: O believers, when you stand up for the service of prayer wash your faces and hands up to elbows, and also wipe your heads, and wash your feet up to the ankles.
draft: You who have internalized the Imam! When you want to stand up for the ritual prayer, then wash (beforehand) your faces, your hands and arms up to the elbows, moisten your heads and (wash) your feet up to the ankles.
hil: O you who have believed! When you wish to stand up for prayer, wash your faces, your hands up to the elbows, and wipe over your heads and wash your feet up to the ankles.
compare: O you who have believed! When you wish to stand up for prayer, wash your faces, your hands up to the elbows, and wipe over your heads and wash your feet up to the ankles.

src: Dies (geschieht), weil sie dem folgten, was Allah erzürnte, und das haßten, was ihm wohlgefällig war. So macht Er ihre Werke zunichte.
ref: This is because they followed the matter which displeases Allah, and they disliked what pleases Him – He therefore squandered away all their deeds.
draft: This happens because they followed what angered Allah and hated what pleased Him. Thus, He nullifies their deeds.
hil: That is because they followed what angered Allah and detested what pleased him, and thus their deeds are nullified.
compare: This happens because they followed what angered Allah and hated what pleased Him. Thus, He nullifies their deeds.

src: Und sag: "Die Wahrheit ist von eurem HERRN. Wer will, der soll den Iman verinnerlichen, und wer will, der soll Kufr betreiben."
ref: Say: "The truth is from your Lord: So believe if you like, or do not believe if you will."
draft: And say, "The truth is from your Lord. Whoever wishes, let him internalize faith, and whoever wishes, let him practice unbelief."
hil: And say: "The truth is from your Lord." Whoever wishes, let him internalize faith, and whoever wishes, let him practice unbelief.
compare: And say: "The truth is from your Lord." Whoever wishes, let him internalize faith, and whoever wishes, let him practice unbelief.

src: ALLAH gehört, was in den Himmeln und auf Erden ist. Gewiß, ALLAH ist Der absolut Autarke, Der Alllobenswürdige.
ref: To Allah only belongs whatsoever is in the heavens and in the earth; indeed Allah only is the Absolute, the Most Praiseworthy.
draft: ALLAH owns what is in the heavens and on earth. Certainly, ALLAH is the absolutely self-sufficient, the all-praiseworthy."
hil: God owns all that is in the heavens and on earth. Surely, He is the utterly self-sufficient, the all-praiseworthy."
compare: ALLAH owns what is in the heavens and on earth. Certainly, ALLAH is the absolutely self-sufficient, the all-praiseworthy."

src: Und WIR ließen darin einen Fluß entspringen.
ref: And We made a river flow through them.
draft: And WE let a river spring up in it.
hil: And WE made a river flow through it.
compare: And WE made a river flow through it.

src: Das, was Gott für euch an Lebensunterhalt herabgesandt hat und was ihr in Verbotenes und Erlaubtes eingeteilt habt, - sprich: Hat Gott es euch erlaubt, oder erdichtet ihr etwas gegen Gott?
ref: And you have made of it lawful and unlawful." Say (O Muhammad SAW): "Has Allah permitted you (to do so), or do you invent a lie against Allah?"
draft: What God has sent down to you as livelihood, and what you have divided into unlawful and lawful - say: Has God permitted you (to do so), or do you forge lies against God?
hil: What do you think about what God has sent down to you as sustenance, and then you have divided it into what is unlawful and what is lawful? Say: Has God given you His permission or are you inventing lies against God?
compare: What God has sent down to you as livelihood, and what you have divided into unlawful and lawful - say: Has God permitted you (to do so), or do you forge lies against God?

src: Und jeder Seele wird in vollem Maß zukommen, was sie getan hat. Er weiß sehr wohl Bescheid über das, was sie tun.
ref: And every soul will be repaid for its deeds in full, and He knows very well what they used to do.
draft: And every soul will receive in full measure what it has done. He is well aware of what they are doing.
hil: "And each soul will be fully paid for what it has done. He is cognisant of what you do."
compare: And every soul will receive in full measure what it has done. He is well aware of what they are doing.

src: Diejenigen nun, die gottergeben sind, bemühen sich um den rechten Wandel.
ref: Those who have submitted have taken the right course;
draft: Those who are devoted to God strive for the right conduct.
hil: Those who are devoted to God strive for the right conduct.
compare: Those who are devoted to God strive for the right conduct.

src: Und viel Beute, die sie nehmen würden.
ref: And the many spoils that they were to take.
draft: And a lot of loot they would take.
hil: And much loot, which they would take.
compare: And a lot of loot they would take.

src: ALLAH richtet zwischen euch am Tag der Auferstehung in dem, worüber ihr uneins zu sein pflegtet."
ref: God will judge between you on the Day of Judgement in what you are at variance."
draft: "ALLAH will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection regarding what you used to differ about."
hil: "Allah will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which you used to differ."
compare: "ALLAH will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection regarding what you used to differ about."

src: Nein! Vielmehr ist die Stunde (des Gerichts) der ihnen versprochene Zeitpunkt. Und die Stunde ist noch schrecklicher und bitterer.
ref: Surely the Hour will be the moment of their promise, and that moment will be calamitous and distressing.
draft: No! Rather, the hour (of judgment) is the promised time for them. And the hour is even more terrible and bitter.
hil: Rather, the Hour is their encounter. And the Hour is even more terrible and bitter.
compare: No! Rather, the hour (of judgment) is the promised time for them. And the hour is even more terrible and bitter.

src: angelehnt darin auf Liegen.
ref: [They will be] reclining therein on adorned couches.
draft: Based on this, on loungers.
hil: Reclining on loungers therein.
compare: Based on this, on loungers.

src: Für diejenigen, die Gutes tun, gibt es hier im Diesseits Gutes.
ref: For those who do good in this world, is goodness.
draft: "For those who do good, there is good here in this life."
hil: "For those who do good, there is good here in this life."
compare: "For those who do good, there is good here in this life."

src: Dann sprachen Wir: "Geht beide zum Volk, das Unsere Zeichen verworfen hat": dann zerstörten Wir sie alle vollständig.
ref: Then We told them: "Go to the people who have rejected Our signs." Then We annihilated them completely.
draft: Then We said, "Go both of you to the people who have rejected Our signs." And We destroyed them completely.
hil: Then We said, 'Go both of you to the people who have rejected Our signs.' Then We destroyed them completely.
compare: Then We said, "Go both of you to the people who have rejected Our signs." And We destroyed them completely.

src: Doch wenn ihr in Furcht seid, dann betet zu Fuß oder im Reiten. Und wenn ihr in Sicherheit seid, gedenkt Allahs, wie Er euch das gelehrt hat, was ihr nicht wußtet.
ref: If you fear (war or danger), pray while standing or on horseback; but when you have safety again remember God, for He taught you what you did not know.
draft: But if you feel fear, then pray on foot or riding. And when you are out of danger, remember Allah as he has taught you what you did not know.
hil: If you are afraid, then pray standing or on horseback. But if you feel secure, remember Allah as He taught you what you did not know.
compare: If you are afraid, then pray standing or on horseback. But if you feel secure, remember Allah as He taught you what you did not know.

src: Acht Paare: zwei von den Schafen und zwei von den Ziegen.
ref: There are eight pairs, two of the species of sheep and two of goats.
draft: Eight pairs: two from the sheep and two from the goats.
hil: Eight pairs: two from the sheep and two from the goats.
compare: Eight pairs: two from the sheep and two from the goats.

src: Und Wir haben Mose das Buch zukommen lassen.
ref: And indeed We gave Musa (Moses) the Scripture [the Taurat (Torah)].
draft: And We have sent down to Moses the Book.
hil: And indeed We sent Moses the Book - he therefore said, 'Indeed I am a Noble Messenger of the Lord of the creation.'
compare: And We have sent down to Moses the Book.

src: Und es werden sie dort ewig junge Knaben bedienen. Wenn du sie siehst, hältst du sie für verstreute Perlen.
ref: Immortal youths shall surround them, waiting upon them; when you see them, you would think they are scattered pearls.
draft: And there, forever young boys will serve them. When you see them, you take them for scattered pearls.
hil: And there eternal boys of everlasting youth will go about attending them. Looking at them, you would think they were pearls dispersed.
compare: And there, forever young boys will serve them. When you see them, you take them for scattered pearls.

src: Doch, mit Sicherheit! Gewiß, sein HERR war über ihn allsehend.
ref: Yes indeed; his Lord had sight of him.
draft: Yes, for sure! Indeed, his LORD was all-seeing over him.
hil: But, for sure! Indeed, his Lord was all-seeing over him.
compare: But, for sure! Indeed, his Lord was all-seeing over him.

src: Und WIR ließen diejenigen Leute, die unterdrückt wurden, erben das Östliche und das Westliche des Landes, das WIR mit Baraka erfüllt haben. Und das gute Versprechen deines HERRN für die Kinder Israils wurde vollständig eingelöst als Belohnung für die Geduld, die sie aufbrachten. Und WIR vernichteten das, was Pharao und seine Leute bewerkstelligten, und das, was sie an Bauten errichteten.
ref: And We made the people who were oppressed, the inheritors of the eastern and western parts of the land in which We placed blessings; and the good promise of your Lord was fulfilled for the Descendants of Israel – the reward of their patience; and We destroyed whatever Firaun and his people built and whatever they had contrived.
draft: And We let those people who were oppressed inherit the Eastern and Western parts of the land which We had blessed with Baraka. And the good promise of your Lord to the Children of Israel was fulfilled because of their patience. And We destroyed what Pharaoh and his people had accomplished and what they had built.
hil: And We let those people who were oppressed inherit the Eastern and Western parts of the land which We had blessed with Baraka. And your Lord's good promise for the Children of Israel was completely fulfilled as a reward for the patience they exhibited. And We destroyed whatever Pharaoh and his people accomplished, and whatever they built.
compare: And We let those people who were oppressed inherit the Eastern and Western parts of the land which We had blessed with Baraka. And the good promise of your Lord to the Children of Israel was fulfilled because of their patience. And We destroyed what Pharaoh and his people had accomplished and what they had built.

src: Auch haben sie eine Schuldklage gegen mich erhoben, deshalb fürchte ich, daß sie mich umbringen."
ref: And they have a charge (of murder) against me. So I fear that they will kill me."
draft: Also, they have filed a lawsuit against me, so I am afraid that they will kill me.
hil: They have also brought a charge of guilt against me, so I am afraid that they will kill me.
compare: Also, they have filed a lawsuit against me, so I am afraid that they will kill me.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Nehmt diejenigen, die euren Din zum Spott und zur Belustigung mißbrauchen von denjenigen, denen die Schrift vor euch zuteil wurde, und von den Kafir, nicht als Wali!
ref: O ye who believe! take not as friends those who make a mockery and fun of your religion from among those who have been vouchsafed the Book before you and other infidels.
draft: You, who have internalized the Iman! Do not take those who misuse your Din for mockery and amusement from those to whom the scripture was given before you, and from the Kafir, as Wali!
hil: You who have believed! Do not make friends with those who mock and make a sport of your religion, who were given the scripture before you and the unbelievers; and fear God if you truly believe;
compare: You who have believed! Do not make friends with those who mock and make a sport of your religion, who were given the scripture before you and the unbelievers; and fear God if you truly believe;

src: Nimm Almosen von ihrem Besitz, auf daß du sie dadurch reinigen und läutern mögest.
ref: Accept the offerings they make from their wealth in order to cleanse and purify them for progress, and invoke blessings upon them.
draft: Take alms from their possessions, so that you may purify and cleanse them thereby.
hil: Take alms from their possessions, so that you may purify and cleanse them thereby.
compare: Take alms from their possessions, so that you may purify and cleanse them thereby.

src: So gewähre den Ungläubigen noch eine Frist.
ref: So give a respite to the disbelievers.
draft: So grant the unbelievers yet another respite.
hil: So grant the unbelievers yet another respite.
compare: So grant the unbelievers yet another respite.

src: Sie folgen einem bloßen Wahn und ihren persönlichen Neigungen, obwohl doch die Weisung ihres Herrn zu ihnen kam.
ref: They only follow conjecture and wish-fulfilment, even though guidance had come to them already from their Lord.
draft: They follow mere delusion and their personal inclinations, even though the guidance of their Lord has come to them.
hil: They follow mere delusion and their personal inclinations, although the guidance of their Lord came to them.
compare: They follow mere delusion and their personal inclinations, even though the guidance of their Lord has come to them.

src: ER sagte: "Das von Mir Versprochene umfaßt nicht die Unrecht-Begehenden."
ref: He said 'My covenant shall not reach the evildoers.'
draft: He said, "What I promised does not include those who commit wrongdoing."
hil: He said, 'What I promised does not include those who commit wrongdoing.'
compare: He said, "What I promised does not include those who commit wrongdoing."

src: Das Wasser nahm ab, und die Angelegenheit war entschieden. Es hielt auf dem Djudi an.
ref: And the water was diminished (made to subside) and the Decree (of Allah) was fulfilled (i.e. the destruction of the people of Nuh (Noah).
draft: The water receded, and the matter was decided. It stopped at the Djudi.
hil: The water receded, and the matter was decided. It stopped at the Djudi.
compare: The water receded, and the matter was decided. It stopped at the Djudi.

src: Doch WIR sehen mit euch nicht eure Fürbittenden, die ihr unter euch als Partner (für ALLAH) angenommen habt. Gewiß, bereits ist (die Bindung) zwischen euch unterbrochen und euch ist das abhanden gekommen, was ihr angenommen habt.
ref: We do not see with you your intercessors, those you asserted to be associates in you; the bond between you is now broken; that which you ever asserted has now gone astray from you.
draft: But WE do not see among you those whom you have taken as partners (with ALLAH) as your intercessors. Indeed, the bond between you has already been broken, and what you have taken (as partners) has left you.
hil: And WE do not see with you those who you have accepted as partners (for Allah) among yourselves as your intermediaries. Indeed, now the bond between you has been broken, and what you have taken (as partners) has left you.
compare: But WE do not see among you those whom you have taken as partners (with ALLAH) as your intercessors. Indeed, the bond between you has already been broken, and what you have taken (as partners) has left you.

src: Und hätten WIR ihnen geboten: "ihr sollt euch selbst töten oder eure Wohnstätten verlassen, würden dies nur wenige von ihnen tun." Und hätten sie doch das getan, womit sie ermahnt werden, wäre es besser für sie und würde sie noch mehr (im Iman) bestärken.
ref: If We had commanded them to lay down their lives and to go forth from their homes, only a few would have obeyed; though had they followed what they had been commanded it would surely have been good for them and the strengthening of their faith.
draft: And if we had commanded them, "Kill yourselves" or "Leave your homes," only a few of them would have done it. But if they had done what they were instructed, it would have been better for them and would have strengthened their faith even more.
hil: And if we had commanded them, 'Kill yourselves' or 'Leave your homes,' only a few of them would have done it. But if they had done what they were instructed, which would have strengthened their faith even more, it would have been better for them.
compare: And if we had commanded them, "Kill yourselves" or "Leave your homes," only a few of them would have done it. But if they had done what they were instructed, it would have been better for them and would have strengthened their faith even more.

src: Und (denke daran,) wenn sie (dereinst) im (Höllen)feuer miteinander streiten, dann sagen die Schwachen zu denjenigen, die sich hochmütig verhielten: "Wir waren doch eure Gefolgsleute; könnt ihr uns nun einen Teil des (Höllen)feuers abnehmen?"
ref: As they will noisily argue in the Fire, the weaker ones will say to the arrogant: "We were your followers, so will you take over some of our share of the fire?"
draft: And (remember,) when they (someday) dispute with each other in the fire of hell, then the weak ones say to those who behaved arrogantly: "We were your followers; can you now take a part of the fire away from us?"
hil: And (remember), when they argue with each other in the fire of hell someday, the weak will say to those who acted arrogantly: "We were your followers, so can you take away a part of the fire from us now?"
compare: And (remember), when they argue with each other in the fire of hell someday, the weak will say to those who acted arrogantly: "We were your followers, so can you take away a part of the fire from us now?"

src: Wenn ihr ALLAH (Seiner Sache) eine Hasan-Anleihe gebt, wird ER euch vervielfachen und euch vergeben.
ref: If you lend a goodly loan to God, He will double it for you, and forgive you.
draft: If you give ALLAH (His cause) a goodly loan, He will multiply it for you and forgive you.
hil: If you give Allah (His cause) a beautiful loan, He will multiply it for you and forgive you.
compare: If you give Allah (His cause) a beautiful loan, He will multiply it for you and forgive you.

src: Und erwähne in der Schrift Isma'il!
ref: Commemorate Ishmael in the Book.
draft: And mention Isma'il in writing!
hil: Remember Isma'il in the scripture!
compare: Remember Isma'il in the scripture!

src: Da wandte Er sich euch wieder gnädig zu.
ref: Then He accepted your repentance.
draft: He turned back to you with mercy again.
hil: At that time, your Creator accepted your repentance because He is Relenting and Merciful.
compare: At that time, your Creator accepted your repentance because He is Relenting and Merciful.

src: Erhaben ist Allah, der König, der Wahre!
ref: So high exalted be God, the true King!
draft: Sublime is Allah, the King, the True!
hil: Exalted is God, the true King; do not try to anticipate the Qur'an before its completion, but pray: 'O Lord, give me greater knowledge.'
compare: Sublime is Allah, the King, the True!

src: Er (Fir'aun) sagte: "Ihr glaubt an ihn, bevor ich es euch erlaube?
ref: (The Pharaoh) said: "You have come to believe without my dispensation.
draft: He (Pharaoh) said: "You believe in him before I allow you to?
hil: He (Pharaoh) said: 'You believe in him before I allow you to?'
compare: He (Pharaoh) said: "You believe in him before I allow you to?

src: Dann warf Moses seinen Stock hin, und siehe, er verschlang (all) das, was sie vorgetäuscht hatten.
ref: Then Moses threw down his staff, and lo, it swallowed up their conjurations.
draft: Then Moses threw his staff down, and behold, it swallowed up all that they had falsely created.
hil: Then Moses threw down his staff, and lo, it devoured all that they had feigned.
compare: Then Moses threw down his staff, and lo, it devoured all that they had feigned.

src: Und sie haben Gott Teilhaber gegeben: die Djinn, wo Er sie doch erschaffen hat. Und sie haben Ihm Söhne und Töchter angedichtet, ohne (richtiges) Wissen.
ref: Yet they ascribe to jinns a partnership with God, although He created them; and they ascribe to Him sons and daughters, without possessing any knowledge.
draft: And they have given God partners: the djinn, even though He created them. And they have attributed to Him sons and daughters without knowledge (of the truth).
hil: And they have even dared, in their ignorance, to attribute sons and daughters to Him, the djinn, although He created them without knowledge of the truth.
compare: And they have given God partners: the djinn, even though He created them. And they have attributed to Him sons and daughters without knowledge (of the truth).

src: Sag: "ALLAH genügt als Zeuge zwischen mir und euch!
ref: Say: "Sufficient is Allah for a witness between me and you.
draft: Say: "ALLAH suffices as a witness between me and you!
hil: Say: Allah suffices as a witness between me and you!
compare: Say: "ALLAH suffices as a witness between me and you!

src: Sondern nur, wenn einer mit einem gesunden Herzen zu Gott kommt.»
ref: But to him who comes to God with a tranquil heart."
draft: But only if one comes to God with a healthy heart.
hil: But only if one comes to God with a healthy heart.
compare: But only if one comes to God with a healthy heart.

src: Sie sagten: "Wir vermissen den Kelch des Königs.
ref: "We cannot find the master's goblet.
draft: They said: "We miss the King's chalice."
hil: They said, "We miss the King's chalice."
compare: They said, "We miss the King's chalice."

src: Für alle sind Rangstufen bestimmt für das, was sie getan haben, und dies, damit Er ihnen ihre Taten voll erstatte. Und ihnen wird nicht Unrecht getan.
ref: Each will have a position in accordance with his deeds; and no wrong will be done to them.
draft: "For all, there are rank levels determined for what they have done, and this, so that He may fully compensate them for their deeds. And they will not be wronged."
hil: Every one has his place according to his deeds, for He may fully compensate them for their deeds. And they will not be wronged.
compare: "For all, there are rank levels determined for what they have done, and this, so that He may fully compensate them for their deeds. And they will not be wronged."

src: Und Wir machen damit (manch) totes Land wieder lebendig; so wird auch das Herauskommen (erfolgen).
ref: And We give life therewith to a dead land. Thus will be the resurrection (of the dead).
draft: And we make (some) dead land alive again with this; thus, the emergence will also take place.
hil: And with it, we make (some) dead land alive again; thus the emergence will also take place.
compare: And we make (some) dead land alive again with this; thus, the emergence will also take place.

src: (Es sind) diejenigen, wenn WIR sie im Lande festigen, dann verrichten sie ordnungsgemäß das rituelle Gebet, entrichten die Zakat, rufen zum Gebilligten auf und raten vomMißbilligten ab. Und ALLAH gehört das Anschließende von den Angelegenheiten.
ref: The people who, if We give them control in the land, would keep the prayer established and pay charity and enjoin virtue and forbid from evil; and for Allah only is the result of all works.
draft: (These are) those, when WE establish them in the land, then they perform the ritual prayer properly, pay Zakat, enjoin the good and forbid the evil. And to ALLAH belongs the outcome of all affairs.
hil: "Those who, when WE establish them in the land, perform the devotion properly, pay the Zakat, enjoin the good and forbid the evil. And to ALLAH belongs the outcome of all affairs."
compare: (These are) those, when WE establish them in the land, then they perform the ritual prayer properly, pay Zakat, enjoin the good and forbid the evil. And to ALLAH belongs the outcome of all affairs.

src: ER ist Derjenige, Der euch aus Erde erschuf, dann aus Nutfa, dann aus 'Alaqa, dann bringt ER euch als Kind heraus, dann damit ihr reif werdet, dann damit ihr Alte werdet - und von euch gibt es manche, deren (Seelen) vorher eingezogen werden - und damit ihr eine festgelegte Frist erreicht. Und damit ihr begreift.
