ref: It is He who created you from dust, then a drop of semen, then the embryo; afterwards He brings you forth as a child; then you attain the age of manhood, and then reach old age. But some of you die before you reach the appointed term that you may haply understand.
draft: HE is the One who created you from earth, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot; then He brings you out as a child; then [He develops you], that you may reach your [time of] maturity, then [He lets you continue] to reach your [time of] old age - although some among you die early - and that you may reach a specified term; and that you may understand.
hil: HE is the One who created you from earth, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot; then He brings you out as a child; then [He develops you], that you may reach your [time of] maturity, then [He lets you continue] to reach your [time of] old age - although some among you die early - and that you may reach a specified term; and that you may understand.
compare: HE is the One who created you from earth, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot; then He brings you out as a child; then [He develops you], that you may reach your [time of] maturity, then [He lets you continue] to reach your [time of] old age - although some among you die early - and that you may reach a specified term; and that you may understand.

src: Und es kamen die Brüder Yusufs und traten zu ihm ein; er erkannte sie, sie aber erkannten ihn nicht.
ref: The brothers of Joseph came (to Egypt) and visited him. He recognised them, though they did not recognise him.
draft: And the brothers of Joseph came and approached him; he recognized them, but they did not recognize him.
hil: "And the brothers of Joseph came and approached him; he recognized them, but they did not recognize him."
compare: And the brothers of Joseph came and approached him; he recognized them, but they did not recognize him.

src: Seid ihr darin also gleich (und) fürchtet sie, wie ihr einander fürchtet?
ref: Whom you fear as you fear each other?
draft: Are you therefore equal in it (and) fear them as you fear one another?
hil: Are you equal therein and fear them as you fear one another?
compare: Are you therefore equal in it (and) fear them as you fear one another?

src: Dies sind (die Mittel) zur Aufklärung für die Menschheit und eine Führung und Barmherzigkeit für Leute, die einen festen Glauben haben.
ref: These are precepts of wisdom for men, and guidance and grace for people who believe with certainty.
draft: These are means of enlightenment for mankind and a guidance and mercy for people who have a firm faith.
hil: These are means of enlightenment for humanity and guidance and mercy for those who have a firm faith.
compare: These are means of enlightenment for humanity and guidance and mercy for those who have a firm faith.

src: Und zehrt nicht ihr Vermögen auf zu eurem Vermögen hinzu. Das wäre eine große Sünde.
ref: And do not consume their properties by combining them with yours, for that would be a serious sin.
draft: And do not spend your wealth (in ways) that lead to self-destruction, and be not extravagant; surely, He does not love the extravagant. That would be a great sin.
hil: And do not spend your wealth in ways that lead to self-destruction and do not be extravagant, as it is a great sin.
compare: And do not spend your wealth in ways that lead to self-destruction and do not be extravagant, as it is a great sin.

src: Verderben auf den Menschen! Wie undankbar ist er!
ref: May man be slain – how ungrateful he is!
draft: Destruction upon humans! How ungrateful he is!
hil: Destruction upon man! How ungrateful he is!
compare: Destruction upon man! How ungrateful he is!

src: Also und wer ALLAHs Hurumat hochachtet, dies ist gut für ihn bei seinem HERRN.
ref: Apart from this, whoever respects the sacred ordinances of God, will find a better reward for him with his Lord.
draft: Therefore, whoever respects Allah's prohibitions, it is good for him with his LORD.
hil: "Therefore, whoever respects this, it is good for him with his LORD."
compare: Therefore, whoever respects Allah's prohibitions, it is good for him with his LORD.

src: Und (erinnere daran), als WIR dir sagten: "Gewiß, dein HERR wird die Menschen zugrunde richten!" Und WIR machten das Traumgesicht, dasWIR dich sehen ließen, nur als Fitna für die Menschen, so auch den verfluchten Baum im Quran. Und WIR ermahnen sie, doch dies bestärkt sie nur zu einer noch größeren Übertretung.
ref: And when We proclaimed to you, “Indeed all mankind is within the control of your Lord”; and We did not create the spectacle* which We showed you except to try mankind, and the Tree** which is cursed in the Qur’an; and We warn them – so nothing increases for them except extreme rebellion. (* The Ascent of the Holy Prophet to the heavens and beyond, which the disbelievers denied as just a dream. ** The Zakkum tree which will grow in hell and be the food for its inhabitants.)
draft: And (remember) when WE told you: "Verily, your Lord will surely destroy the people." And WE made the vision that WE showed you, only a trial for the people, as well as the cursed tree in the Quran. And WE warn them, but it only makes them more excessive in transgression.
hil: And (remember) when WE told thee: 'Verily, thy Lord will assuredly destroy the people; and WE appointed not aught but as a trial for mankind the sight that WE shewed thee,- with the tree of the Accursed in the Qur'an - We warn them, but it only adds to their inordinate transgression.
compare: And (remember) when WE told you: "Verily, your Lord will surely destroy the people." And WE made the vision that WE showed you, only a trial for the people, as well as the cursed tree in the Quran. And WE warn them, but it only makes them more excessive in transgression.

src: Und er sprach: "O meine Söhne, zieht nicht durch ein einziges Tor ein, sondern zieht durch verschiedene Tore ein; ich kann euch nichts gegen Allah nützen. Die Entscheidung ruht bei Allah allein.
ref: (As they were leaving) their father said to them: "O my sons, do not seek one approach but employ different ways (of attaining your object). If anything should befall you from God I shall not be able to avert it, for all authority belongs to God.
draft: And he said: "Oh my sons, do not enter through a single gate, but enter through different gates; I cannot benefit you against Allah. The decision rests with Allah alone."
hil: And he said, "O my sons! Do not enter all by one gate – enter by different gates; I cannot save you against Allah; there is no command but that of Allah; upon Him do I rely; and all those who trust, must rely only upon Him."
compare: And he said: "Oh my sons, do not enter through a single gate, but enter through different gates; I cannot benefit you against Allah. The decision rests with Allah alone."

src: Da sagte er: "O mein Volk, dient Allah, erwartet den Jüngsten Tag und richtet auf der Erde nicht unheilstiftend Verderben an."
ref: He said: "O people, worship God and be ready for the Day of Resurrection. Do no evil, and create no mischief in the land."
draft: He said, "O my people, worship Allah, expect the Day of Judgment, and do not cause corruption on earth as mischief-makers."
hil: "Then he said, \"O my people, worship Allah, expect the Day of Judgment, and do not cause corruption on earth as mischief-makers.\""
compare: He said, "O my people, worship Allah, expect the Day of Judgment, and do not cause corruption on earth as mischief-makers."

src: Ist es denn für die Menschen verwunderlich, daß Wir einem Mann von ihnen (als Offenbarung) eingegeben haben: "Warne die Menschen und verkünde denen, die glauben, die frohe Botschaft, daß sie bei ihrem Herrn einen wahrhaftigen Stand haben"?
ref: Are the people astonished that a man who is one of them was commanded by Us to warn them and to bring glad tidings to those who believe that they have a true precedence with their Lord?
draft: Is it not surprising for humans that we have revealed to a man among them, saying, "Warn humanity and give good news to those who believe that they will have a true status with their Lord"?
hil: Is it surprising to people that We have revealed to a man among them, saying, 'Warn people and give good news to those who believe that they will have a true status with their Lord'?
compare: Is it not surprising for humans that we have revealed to a man among them, saying, "Warn humanity and give good news to those who believe that they will have a true status with their Lord"?

src: Als der Schrecken von Abraham gewichen und die frohe Botschaft zu ihm gekommen war, begann er mit Uns über das Volk von Lot zu streiten.
ref: When Abraham's fear was dispelled, and the good news had come to him, he pleaded for the people of Lot with Us.
draft: When the horror of Abraham had receded and the joyful message had come to him, he began to argue with us about the people of Lot.
hil: When the horror had receded from Abraham and the good news had come to him, he began to argue with us about the people of Lot.
compare: When the horror of Abraham had receded and the joyful message had come to him, he began to argue with us about the people of Lot.

src: Das ist, was euch für den Tag der Abrechnung verheißen ist.
ref: This is what is promised you for the Day of Reckoning.
draft: This is what is promised to you for the Day of Reckoning.
hil: This is what is promised to you for the Day of Reckoning.
compare: This is what is promised to you for the Day of Reckoning.

src: Da fanden sie in ihr eine Mauer, die einzustürzen drohte, und so richtete er sie auf.
ref: There they found a wall that was crumbling, which he repaired.
draft: Then they found a wall in it that was about to collapse, so he straightened it up.
hil: Then they found a wall in it that was about to collapse, and so he straightened it up.
compare: Then they found a wall in it that was about to collapse, and so he straightened it up.

src: Das verursacht dem Propheten Ungelegenheit, und er ist scheu vor euch, jedoch Allah ist nicht scheu vor der Wahrheit.
ref: And when ye ask of them aught, ask it of them from behind a curtain.
draft: This causes inconvenience to the prophet, and he is shy before you, but Allah is not shy of the truth.
hil: This causes inconvenience to the Prophet, and he is shy before you, but Allah is not shy of the truth.
compare: This causes inconvenience to the prophet, and he is shy before you, but Allah is not shy of the truth.

src: Sie machten für ihn, was er begehrte: Paläste und Bildwerke, Becken wie Teiche und feststehende Kochbottiche: "Wirkt ihr vom Hause Davids in Dankbarkeit." Und nur wenige von Meinen Dienern sind dankbar.
ref: fashioning for him whatsoever he would -- places of worship, statues, porringers like water-troughs, and anchored cooking-pots. 'Labour, O House of David, in thankfulness; for few indeed are those that are thankful among My servants.'
draft: They made for him what he desired: palaces and statues, basins like ponds and fixed cooking troughs: "Work, you of the House of David, in gratitude." And only a few of My servants are grateful.
hil: They made for him what he desired: palaces and statues, basins like ponds and fixed cooking troughs: 'Work, you of the House of David, in gratitude.' And only a few of My servants are grateful.
compare: They made for him what he desired: palaces and statues, basins like ponds and fixed cooking troughs: "Work, you of the House of David, in gratitude." And only a few of My servants are grateful.

src: Sei geduldig.
ref: So be patient.
draft: Be patient.
hil: Be patient.
compare: Be patient.

src: So wurde Fir'aun sein böses Tun ausgeschmückt, und er wurde vom (rechten) Weg abgehalten. Aber Fir'auns listige Tat wird nur zugrunde gehen.
ref: So the evil of his deeds was decked out fair to Pharaoh, and he was barred from the way, and Pharaoh's guile came only to ruin.
draft: So Fir'aun's evil deed was embellished, and he was hindered from (the right) path. But Fir'aun's cunning deed will only perish.
hil: Thus, Pharaoh's evil deed was embellished, and he was kept away from the right path. But Pharaoh's cunning deed will only lead to its ruin.
compare: So Fir'aun's evil deed was embellished, and he was hindered from (the right) path. But Fir'aun's cunning deed will only perish.

src: (Schon) vor ihnen haben das Volk Nuhs und nach diesen die Gruppierungen (ihre Gesandten) der Lüge bezichtigt.
ref: The people of Noah had denied before them, and many factions after them.
draft: (Already) before them, the people of Noah and after them, the factions (their messengers) accused (the truth) of lying.
hil: (Already) before them, the people of Noah and after them, the groups accused (their messengers) of lying.
compare: (Already) before them, the people of Noah and after them, the groups accused (their messengers) of lying.

src: Und wenn ihr euch mit ihnen zusammentut, so sind sie eure Brüder. Allah weiß den Unheilstifter vom Heilstifter (zu unterscheiden).
ref: Say: "The best thing to do is what is for their good; if ye mix their affairs with yours, they are your brethren; but Allah knows the man who means mischief from the man who means good.
draft: And if you unite with them, they are your brothers. Allah knows how to distinguish between the mischief-maker and the peacemaker.
hil: And if you unite with them, they are your brothers. He knows how to distinguish between the corrupt and the good-doer.
compare: And if you unite with them, they are your brothers. Allah knows how to distinguish between the mischief-maker and the peacemaker.

src: Die Woge trennte sie beide, und so war er einer von denen, die ertränkt wurden.
ref: And a wave came between them, and he was among those who were drowned.
draft: The wave separated them both, and so he was one of those who drowned.
hil: "The wave separated both of them, and so he was one of those who drowned."
compare: "The wave separated both of them, and so he was one of those who drowned."

src: Dann sagten sie: "ALLAH gegenüber üben wir doch Tawakkul.
ref: They answered: "We have placed our trust in God.
draft: Then they said: "We exercise Tawakkul towards ALLAH."
hil: Then they said, "We exercise Tawakkul towards ALLAH."
compare: Then they said: "We exercise Tawakkul towards ALLAH."

src: Und wirf nur, was in deiner Rechten ist; es wird das verschlingen, was sie gemacht haben; denn das, was sie gemacht haben, ist nur die List eines Zauberers. Und ein Zauberer soll keinen Erfolg haben, woher er auch kommen mag."
ref: Throw down what is in your right hand: It will swallow up what they have conjured. For what they have fashioned is only a trick of the sorcerer; and a sorcerer does not succeed wherever he may come."
draft: "And throw only what is in your right hand; it will swallow up what they have made; for what they have made is only the trick of a magician. And a magician will not be successful no matter where he comes from."
hil: And throw that which is in your right hand! It will swallow up that which they have made. Indeed, what they have made is only the trick of a magician, and the magician will not have success, wherever he may come from.
compare: "And throw only what is in your right hand; it will swallow up what they have made; for what they have made is only the trick of a magician. And a magician will not be successful no matter where he comes from."

src: Bitte also deinen Herrn für uns, daß Er uns (Speise) von dem hervorbringe, was die Erde wachsen läßt, (von) Kräutern, Gurken, Knoblauch, Linsen und Zwiebeln Da sagte er: "Wollt ihr etwa das, was geringer ist, in Tausch nehmen für das, was besser ist?
ref: We shall never put up with only one kind of food, so call upon your Lord to produce for us what the earth grows – some herbs, cucumbers, corn, lentils and onions”; he said, “What!
draft: Please ask your Lord for us that He may bring forth produce for us from what the earth grows, from herbs, cucumbers, garlic, lentils and onions. He said, "Would you exchange that which is inferior for that which is better?"
hil: "Therefore, ask your Lord to bring forth for us food from that which the earth grows, from herbs, cucumbers, garlic, lentils, and onions."
compare: Please ask your Lord for us that He may bring forth produce for us from what the earth grows, from herbs, cucumbers, garlic, lentils and onions. He said, "Would you exchange that which is inferior for that which is better?"

src: Und wer mehr Gutes freiwillig gibt, so ist dies besser für ihn. Und wenn ihr fastet, ist es besser für euch, würdet ihr es nur wissen.
ref: Should anyone do good of his own accord, that is better for him, and to fast is better for you, should you know.
draft: And whoever gives more good voluntarily, this is better for him. And when you fast, it is better for you, if you only knew.
hil: And whoever gives more good voluntarily, this is better for him. And if you fast, it is better for you if you only knew.
compare: And whoever gives more good voluntarily, this is better for him. And when you fast, it is better for you, if you only knew.

src: Hast du nicht gesehen, wie dein Herr an den Aad gehandelt hat,
ref: Have you not seen what your Lord did to the 'Ad
draft: Have you not seen how your Lord has dealt with Aad?
hil: Do you not see how your Lord dealt with Aad?
compare: Do you not see how your Lord dealt with Aad?

src: Sag: "Den Überschuß."
ref: Tell them: "The utmost you can spare."
draft: Say: "The surplus."
hil: And they ask you about what they should give: say, 'The surplus.'
compare: Say: "The surplus."

src: Dies sind die Verse des Quran - eines deutlichen Buches.
ref: THESE are the verses of the Qur'an, and collection of explicit laws,
draft: These are the verses of the Quran - a clear book.
hil: These are the verses of the Quran - a perspicuous book.
compare: These are the verses of the Quran - a perspicuous book.

src: O Prophet, Wir erlaubten dir deine Gattinnen, denen du ihre Brautgabe gegeben hast, und jene, die du von Rechts wegen aus (der Zahl) derer besitzt, die Allah dir als Kriegsbeute gegeben hat, und die Töchter deines Vaterbruders und die Töchter deiner Vaterschwestern und die Töchter deines Mutterbruders und die Töchter deiner Mutterschwestern, die mit dir ausgewandert sind, und jedwede gläubige Frau, die sich dem Propheten schenkt, vorausgesetzt, daß der Prophet sie zu heiraten wünscht; (dies gilt) nur für dich und nicht für die Gläubigen. Wir haben bereits bekanntgegeben, was Wir ihnen bezüglich ihrer Frauen und jener, die sie von Rechts wegen besitzen, verordnet haben, so daß sich (daraus) keine Verlegenheit für dich ergibt. Und Allah ist Allverzeihend, Barmherzig.
ref: O Prophet, We have made lawful for thee thy wives whom thou hast given their wages and what thy right hand owns, spoils of war that God has given thee, and the daughters of thy uncles paternal and aunts paternal, thy uncles maternal and aunts maternal, who have emigrated with thee, and any woman believer, if she give herself to the Prophet and if the Prophet desire to take her in marriage, for thee exclusively, apart from the believers -- We know what We have imposed upon them touching their wives and what their right hands own -- that there may be no fault in thee; God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.
draft: O Prophet, We have made lawful to you your wives to whom you have given their due compensation and those your right hand possesses from what Allah has returned to you [of captives] and the daughters of your paternal uncles and the daughters of your paternal aunts and the daughters of your maternal uncles and the daughters of your maternal aunts who emigrated with you and a believing woman if she gives herself to the Prophet [and] if the Prophet wishes to marry her, [this is] only for you, excluding the [other] believers. We certainly know what We have made obligatory upon them concerning their wives and those their right hands possess, [but this is for you] in order that there will be upon you no discomfort. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
hil: O Prophet, We have made lawful to you your wives to whom you have given their due compensation and those your right hand possesses from what Allah has returned to you [of captives] and the daughters of your paternal uncles and the daughters of your paternal aunts and the daughters of your maternal uncles and the daughters of your maternal aunts who emigrated with you and a believing woman if she gives herself to the Prophet [and] if the Prophet wishes to marry her, [this is] only for you, excluding the [other] believers. We certainly know what We have made obligatory upon them concerning their wives and those their right hands possess, [but this is for you] in order that there will be upon you no discomfort. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
compare: O Prophet, We have made lawful to you your wives to whom you have given their due compensation and those your right hand possesses from what Allah has returned to you [of captives] and the daughters of your paternal uncles and the daughters of your paternal aunts and the daughters of your maternal uncles and the daughters of your maternal aunts who emigrated with you and a believing woman if she gives herself to the Prophet [and] if the Prophet wishes to marry her, [this is] only for you, excluding the [other] believers. We certainly know what We have made obligatory upon them concerning their wives and those their right hands possess, [but this is for you] in order that there will be upon you no discomfort. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.

src: Sag: "Ich sage euch nicht, daß ich über dieMagazine von ALLAHs (Rizq) verfüge. Auch kenne ich das Verborgene nicht.
ref: Tell them: "I do not say that I possess the treasures of God, or have knowledge of the Unknown, or that I am an angel.
draft: Say, "I do not tell you that I have control over the treasures of Allah's provision nor do I know the unseen."
hil: Say, 'I do not tell you that I have control over the treasures of Allah's provision nor do I know the unseen.'
compare: Say, "I do not tell you that I have control over the treasures of Allah's provision nor do I know the unseen."

src: Wahrlich, der Messias, Jesus, Sohn der Maria, ist nur der Gesandte Allahs und Sein Wort, das Er Maria entboten hat, und von Seinem Geist. Darum glaubt an Allah und Seine Gesandten, und sagt nicht: "Drei."
ref: The Messiah 'Iesa (Jesus), son of Maryam (Mary), was (no more than) a Messenger of Allah and His Word, ("Be!" - and he was) which He bestowed on Maryam (Mary) and a spirit (Ruh) created by Him; so believe in Allah and His Messengers.
draft: Truly, the Messiah, Jesus, son of Mary, is only Allah's messenger and His Word that He conveyed to Mary, and a spirit from Him. So believe in Allah and His messengers and do not say, "Three".
hil: Verily, the Messiah, Jesus, son of Mary, is only Allah's messenger and His Word that He conveyed to Mary, and a spirit from Him. Therefore, believe in Allah and His messengers and do not say, "Three".
compare: Truly, the Messiah, Jesus, son of Mary, is only Allah's messenger and His Word that He conveyed to Mary, and a spirit from Him. So believe in Allah and His messengers and do not say, "Three".

src: Wenn wir und unsere Väter zu Staub geworden sind, sollen wir dann wirklich wieder hervorgebracht werden?
ref: When we and our fathers have become dust shall we be raised [from the dead]?
draft: If we and our fathers have become dust, shall we then really be brought forth again?
hil: If we and our forefathers have turned into dust, how shall we be raised again?
compare: If we and our forefathers have turned into dust, how shall we be raised again?

src: Und sie sagen: "Sollen wir etwa, wenn wir (bereits) Knochen und Überreste geworden sind, denn wirklich als neue Schöpfung auferweckt werden?"
ref: Yet they say: "When we are turned to bones and bits, shall we be raised as a new creation?"
draft: And they say: "Should we really be resurrected as a new creation when we (already) have become bones and remains?"
hil: And they said, 'Should we really be resurrected as a new creation when we (already) have become bones and remains?'
compare: And they said, 'Should we really be resurrected as a new creation when we (already) have become bones and remains?'

src: Die Barmherzigkeit Gottes ist den Rechtschaffenen nahe.
ref: The blessing of God is at hand for those who do good.
draft: The mercy of God is close to the righteous.
hil: The mercy of Allah is close to the righteous.
compare: The mercy of God is close to the righteous.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Fügt euch ALLAH und dem Gesandten, wenn er euch zu dem aufruft, was euch lebendig macht. Und wisst, daß ALLAH gewiß dem Menschen die Verfügung über sein Inneres verwehren kann und daß ihr gewiß zu Ihm versammelt werdet.
ref: O believers, respond to God and the Messenger when He calls you unto that which will give you life; and know that God stands between a man and his heart, and that to Him you shall be mustered.
draft: You, who have internalized the Iman! Submit to Allah and the Messenger when he calls you to what gives you life. And know that Allah can certainly deny man control over his inner self and that you will certainly be gathered to Him.
hil: Present yourselves upon the command of Allah and His Messenger, when he calls you towards that which will bestow you with life; and know that a barrier can certainly arise between a man and his heart’s intentions, and that you will all be raised towards Him.
compare: You, who have internalized the Iman! Submit to Allah and the Messenger when he calls you to what gives you life. And know that Allah can certainly deny man control over his inner self and that you will certainly be gathered to Him.

src: Und sollten sie dem Salam zugeneigt sein, dann sei ihm ebenfalls zugeneigt und übe ALLAH gegenüber Tawakkul! ER ist gewiß Der Allhörende, Der Allwissende.
ref: But if they are inclined to peace, make peace with them, and have trust in God, for He hears all and knows everything.
draft: And if they are inclined towards the Salam, then be inclined towards them and practice Tawakkul towards ALLAH! HE is surely the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.
hil: And if they are inclined towards the Salam, be inclined to them as well and practice Tawakkul towards Allah! He is surely the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.
compare: And if they are inclined towards the Salam, be inclined to them as well and practice Tawakkul towards Allah! He is surely the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

src: Dann erfüllten WIR ihnen das Versprechen und erretteten sie und diejenigen, die WIR wollten, und richteten die Maßlosen zugrunde.
ref: Then We made Our promise good to them and delivered whomsoever We pleased, and destroyed the transgressors.
draft: Then WE fulfilled our promise to them and saved them and those whom WE wanted, and destroyed the transgressors.
hil: Then WE fulfilled our promise to them and saved them and those whom WE wanted, and destroyed the transgressors.
compare: Then WE fulfilled our promise to them and saved them and those whom WE wanted, and destroyed the transgressors.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Gehorcht ALLAH und gehorcht dem Gesandten und laßt eure Handlungen nicht nichtig werden!
ref: O you who believe, obey God and the Prophet, and do not waste your deeds.
draft: You, who have internalized the imam! Obey ALLAH and obey the messenger and do not let your actions become futile.
hil: Believers! Obey Allah and obey the messenger and do not let your actions become futile.
compare: Believers! Obey Allah and obey the messenger and do not let your actions become futile.

src: Heute versiegeln WIR ihnen ihre Münder, und zu Uns sprechen dann ihre Hände, auch ihre Beine legen Zeugnis ab für das, was sie zu erwerben pflegten.
ref: We shall seal their lips that day; and their hands will speak, their feet testify to what they had done.
draft: Today, we seal their mouths, and then their hands speak to us, and their legs bear witness to what they used to acquire.
hil: Today, we seal their mouths, and then their hands speak to us, and their legs bear witness to what they used to acquire.
compare: Today, we seal their mouths, and then their hands speak to us, and their legs bear witness to what they used to acquire.

src: Du bist nichts (anderes) als ein Mensch wie wir. So bringe ein Zeichen, wenn du zu den Wahrhaftigen gehörst."
ref: “You are just a human like us; therefore bring some sign if you are truthful.”
draft: "You are nothing but a human like us. So bring a sign if you belong to the truthful."
hil: You are nothing but a human like us. So bring a sign if you belong to the truthful.
compare: "You are nothing but a human like us. So bring a sign if you belong to the truthful."

src: Und derjenige, der zu seinen Eltern sagt: "Pfui über euch!
ref: And the one who said to his parents, “Uff – I am fed up with both of you! What!
draft: And the one who says to his parents: "Shame on you!"
hil: And whoever says to his parents, 'Fie on you!'
compare: And the one who says to his parents: "Shame on you!"

src: Und sei nicht laut beim Gebet, und auch nicht leise dabei.
ref: (Muhammad), do not be too loud or slow in your prayer.
draft: And do not be loud during prayer, nor quiet.
hil: And do not be loud during prayer, nor quiet.
compare: And do not be loud during prayer, nor quiet.

src: Es wurde von dem einen angenommen und von dem anderen nicht angenommen. Der sagte: «Ich schlage dich tot.»
ref: God accepted the sacrifice of one of them (Abel) but not that of the other (Cain) who then said to his brother, "I shall certainly kill you."
draft: It was accepted by one and not accepted by the other. He said, "I'll kill you".
hil: It was accepted by one and not accepted by the other. He said, 'I'll kill you.'
compare: It was accepted by one and not accepted by the other. He said, "I'll kill you".

src: Sie sind bei ALLAH nicht gleich!
ref: They are not equal before Allah.
draft: You are not equal in the sight of Allah!
hil: "You are not equal in the sight of Allah!"
compare: You are not equal in the sight of Allah!

src: Und der, der zu seinen Eltern sagt: «Pfui über euch! Wollt ihr denn mir versprechen, ich würde hervorgebracht werden, wo vor mir Generationen dahingegangen sind?»...
ref: But he who says to his parents: "Shame on you: You intimidate me that I will be resurrected when many generations will have passed before me?"
draft: And the one who says to his parents: "Shame on you! Do you promise me to be born where generations have passed away before me?"...
hil: And he who says to his parents, 'Shame on you! Do you promise me to be brought forth where generations have passed away before me?'...
compare: And he who says to his parents, 'Shame on you! Do you promise me to be brought forth where generations have passed away before me?'...

src: Das ist die Bedeutung dessen, was du nicht in Geduld zu ertragen vermöchtest."
ref: So, I did not do that of my own accord. This is the explanation of things you could not bear with patience."
draft: "The meaning of that which you cannot bear with patience."
hil: The meaning of that which you cannot endure patiently.
compare: The meaning of that which you cannot endure patiently.

src: Und Allah ist wahrlich Allwissend und Nachsichtig.
ref: Verily God is all-knowing and forbearing.
draft: And Allah is truly All-Knowing and Forgiving.
hil: And Allah is truly All-Knowing and Forbearing.
compare: And Allah is truly All-Knowing and Forgiving.

src: Und sie sagen: "Wir glauben an Allah und an den Gesandten, und wir gehorchen."
ref: They say, 'We believe in God and the Messenger, and we obey.'
draft: And they say, "We believe in Allah and in the Messenger, and we obey."
hil: And they say, “We believe in Allah and in the Messenger, and we obey.”
compare: And they say, "We believe in Allah and in the Messenger, and we obey."

src: Er sagte: "Bei ALLAH!
ref: He said: "By Allah!
draft: He said: "By Allah!
hil: He said, 'By Allah!'
compare: He said, 'By Allah!'

src: Es gibt unter ihnen aber auch manche, die, wenn du ihnen (nur) einen Dinar anvertraust, ihn dir nicht (wieder) aushändigen, es sei denn, du bist ständig hinter ihnen her. Dies, weil sie sagen: "Gegen uns kann man der Schriftunkundigen wegen nicht vorgehen".
ref: 6 lbs.), will return it to you, and there are others, who, if you trust him with a dinar will not hand it back unless you stand over him, for they say: 'As for the common people, they have no recourse to us' They say lies against Allah while they know.
draft: There are also some among them who, if you entrust them with a single dinar, will not return it to you unless you are constantly after them. This is because they say, "Against us, one cannot take action because of the ignorance of the unlettered."
hil: However, there are also some among them who, if you entrust them with a single dinar, will not return it to you unless you are constantly after them. They say this because they cannot be held accountable due to the ignorance of the unlettered.
compare: There are also some among them who, if you entrust them with a single dinar, will not return it to you unless you are constantly after them. This is because they say, "Against us, one cannot take action because of the ignorance of the unlettered."

src: Diejenigen aber, die Widerwillen zeigen und sich hochmütig verhalten, wird Er mit einer schmerzhaften Pein peinigen. Und sie werden für sich anstelle Gottes weder Freund noch Helfer finden.
ref: He will bestow upon those who have been disdainful and arrogant a painful chastisement; and they will find for themselves neither a guardian nor a helper besides Allah.
draft: But those who show reluctance and behave arrogantly, He will inflict painful punishment upon them. And they will find neither friend nor helper for themselves in place of God.
hil: But those who show reluctance and behave arrogantly, He will afflict with a painful punishment; and they shall find neither friend nor helper for themselves in place of God.
compare: But those who show reluctance and behave arrogantly, He will inflict painful punishment upon them. And they will find neither friend nor helper for themselves in place of God.

src: Gewiß, ALLAH ist mein HERR und euer HERR.
ref: Surely God is my Lord and your Lord; so serve Him.
draft: Certainly, ALLAH is my Lord and your Lord.
hil: Certainly, Allah is my Lord and your Lord.
compare: Certainly, ALLAH is my Lord and your Lord.

src: Er läßt die Nacht in den Tag eindringen, und Er läßt den Tag in die Nacht eindringen. Und Er hat die Sonne und den Mond dienstbar gemacht - ein jedes läuft auf eine festgesetzte Frist zu. Dies ist doch Allah, euer Herr; Ihm gehört die Herrschaft. Diejenigen aber, die ihr anstatt Seiner anruft, verfügen nicht einmal über das Häutchen eines Dattelkerns.
ref: He brings the night in a part of the day and He brings the day in a part of the night; and He has subjected the sun and moon; each one runs to its fixed term; such is Allah, your Lord – only His is the kingship; and those whom you worship instead of Him do not own even the husk of a date-seed.
draft: He causes the night to penetrate the day and the day to penetrate the night, and He has subjected the sun and the moon, each running [its course] for a specified term. This is Allah, your Lord; to Him belongs sovereignty. But those whom you invoke besides Him do not possess [as much as] the membrane of a date seed.
hil: He turns the night into the day, and turns the day into the night; and He has subjected the sun and the moon, each running [its course] for a specified term. This is Allah, your Lord; to Him belongs sovereignty. But those whom you invoke besides Him do not possess [as much as] the membrane of a date seed.
compare: He causes the night to penetrate the day and the day to penetrate the night, and He has subjected the sun and the moon, each running [its course] for a specified term. This is Allah, your Lord; to Him belongs sovereignty. But those whom you invoke besides Him do not possess [as much as] the membrane of a date seed.

src: Allah wird aber keine Seele zurückstellen, wenn ihre Frist kommt.
ref: But God does not grant a soul respite once its term has come to end.
draft: Allah, however, will not postpone any soul when its term comes.
hil: But Allah will not delay any soul when its appointed time has come.
compare: But Allah will not delay any soul when its appointed time has come.

src: Und ER fand dich irrend, so leitete ER dich recht.
ref: Did He not find you perplexed, and show you the way?
draft: And HE found you wandering, so HE guided you rightly.
hil: And if He found you wandering, He would guide you rightly.
compare: And HE found you wandering, so HE guided you rightly.

src: Sie sagten: "Wir haben zugehört und uns widersetzt." So wurde in ihren Herzen (die Zuneigung) zum Kalb wegen ihres Kufr eingeprägt.
ref: They said, 'We hear, and rebel'; and they were made to drink the Calf in their hearts for their unbelief.
draft: They said: "We listened and resisted." Thus, in their hearts, (affection) for the calf was engraved due to their kufr.
hil: They said: "We listened and resisted." Thus, in their hearts, (affection) for the calf was engraved due to their kufr.
compare: They said: "We listened and resisted." Thus, in their hearts, (affection) for the calf was engraved due to their kufr.

src: Und keiner begeht mehr Unrecht als derjenige, der Lügen im Namen ALLAHs erfindet oder Seine Ayat ableugnet.
ref: Who could be more wicked than he who imputes lies to God or denies His revelations?
draft: And no one commits more injustice than the one who invents lies in the name of Allah or denies His signs.
hil: And none is more unjust than one who invents lies about Allah or denies His signs.
compare: And no one commits more injustice than the one who invents lies in the name of Allah or denies His signs.

src: Und von den Satanen gab es welche, die für ihn tauchten und andere Arbeit als diese verrichten.
ref: And of the devils were some that dived for him, and performed other, lesser tasks.
draft: And among the satans there were some who dived for him and performed work other than this.
hil: And among the satans there were some who dove for him and performed work other than this.
compare: And among the satans there were some who dove for him and performed work other than this.

src: Erwarten Sie denn etwas anderes, als daß die Engel zu ihnen kommen, oder daß der Befehl deines Herrn eintrifft? So handelten auch diejenigen, die vor ihnen lebten.
ref: What! Do the (unbelievers) expect that the angels should descend, or the sentence of your Lord come to pass?
draft: Do you expect anything else than the angels to come to them or the command of your Lord to arrive? Those before them also acted in the same way.
hil: Do you expect anything other than that the angels come to them, or that the command of your Lord arrives? So did those before them act.
compare: Do you expect anything other than that the angels come to them, or that the command of your Lord arrives? So did those before them act.

src: Er sagte: "Ja! Und gewiß, ihr werdet dann doch von den Vertrauten sein."
ref: He said, “Yes, and you will then become close to me.”
draft: He said: "Yes! And surely, you will then be among the confidants."
hil: He said, "Yes, and surely you will then be among the confidants."
compare: He said, "Yes, and surely you will then be among the confidants."

src: Das sind ja nichts als Fabeln der Früheren."
ref: This is only the tales of the ancients!"
draft: "That's nothing but fables of the former ones."
hil: These are nothing but fables of the ancients.
compare: These are nothing but fables of the ancients.

src: Und die Ungläubigen werden in Scharen zu Gahannam geführt werden, bis daß, wenn sie sie erreichen, sich ihre Pforten öffnen und ihre Wächter zu ihnen sprechen: "Sind nicht Gesandte aus eurer Mitte zu euch gekommen, um euch die Verse eures Herrn zu verlesen und euch vor dem Eintreffen dieses euren Tages zu warnen?"
ref: The unbelievers will be driven into Hell in groups till, when they reach it and its doors are opened up, its keepers will say to them: "Did not apostles of your own come to you reciting your Lord's revelations, warning you of this your day of Doom?"
draft: And the unbelievers will be led in groups to Gahannam until when they reach it, its gates will open and its guardians will say to them: "Have not messengers from among yourselves come to you, reciting to you the verses of your Lord and warning you of the coming of this, your Day?"
hil: And the unbelievers will be led in groups to Gehenna until they reach it, and its gates will be opened, and its keepers shall say to them, "Have not apostles from among you come to you reciting to you the signs of your Lord and warning you of the coming of this your day of Doom?"
compare: And the unbelievers will be led in groups to Gahannam until when they reach it, its gates will open and its guardians will say to them: "Have not messengers from among yourselves come to you, reciting to you the verses of your Lord and warning you of the coming of this, your Day?"

src: Und Gott genügt als Freund, und Gott genügt als Helfer.
ref: Sufficieth Allah as a Friend and sufficieth Allah as a Helper.
draft: "And God is sufficient as a friend, and God is sufficient as a helper."
hil: And Allah suffices as a friend, and Allah suffices as a helper.
compare: "And God is sufficient as a friend, and God is sufficient as a helper."

src: Beinahe hätte er uns doch von unseren Gottheiten abirren lassen, hätten wir uns nicht in Geduld ihnen gegenüber geübt!" Und sie werden wissen, wenn sie die Peinigung sehen, wer weiter vom Weg abgeirrt ist.
ref: “Possibly he would have misled us away from our Gods had we not been firm upon them”; soon they will know, when they see the punishment, who was astray from the path.
draft: Almost he would have led us astray from our gods if we hadn't practiced patience towards them! And they will know, when they see the torment, who has strayed further from the path.
hil: He would have led us astray from our gods if we had not practiced patience towards them. And they shall know who has strayed further from the path when they see the punishment.
compare: Almost he would have led us astray from our gods if we hadn't practiced patience towards them! And they will know, when they see the torment, who has strayed further from the path.

src: Es ist für euch kein Vergehen, unbewohnte Häuser zu betreten, in denen sich eine Nutznießung für euch befindet. Und Gott weiß, was ihr offenlegt und was ihr verschweigt.
ref: There is no harm in going into uninhabited houses where there is some convenience for you, as God has knowledge of what you hide and what you disclose.
draft: It is not a sin for you to enter uninhabited houses in which there is a benefit for you. And God knows what you reveal and what you conceal.
hil: It is no sin for you to enter uninhabited houses in which there is a benefit for you. And Allah knows what you reveal and what you conceal.
compare: It is no sin for you to enter uninhabited houses in which there is a benefit for you. And Allah knows what you reveal and what you conceal.

src: Die Zurückgebliebenen werden sagen: "Wenn ihr zu den Beutegütern aufbrecht, um sie einzunehmen, dann laßt uns euch folgen!" Sie wollen ALLAHs Worte ändern.
ref: The Bedouins who were left behind will say, when you set forth after spoils, to take them, 'Let us follow you,' desiring to change God's words.
draft: "The remaining ones will say: "If you set out to take the spoils, then let us follow you!" They want to change ALLAH's words."
hil: "Those who stayed behind will say: "When you depart to take the spoils, allow us to follow you." They wish to change the word of God."
compare: "The remaining ones will say: "If you set out to take the spoils, then let us follow you!" They want to change ALLAH's words."

src: Da ergriff sie Allah für ihre Sünden, und sie hatten vor Allah keinen Beschützer.
ref: Yet they were seized by God for their sins, and had none to protect them against God.
draft: Then Allah seized them for their sins, and they had no protector against Allah.
hil: Thus, Allah seized them for their sins and they had no protector against God's favor and grace. They did not encounter any harm, and they attended God's pleasure. Great is the benevolence of God.
compare: Then Allah seized them for their sins, and they had no protector against Allah.

src: Eignet euch euer Vermögen untereinander nicht durch das für nichtig Erklärte an! Nicht verboten ist es, (es euch anzueignen) durch einen Handel, den ihr in gegenseitigem Einvernehmen abschließt.
ref: Eat not up your property among yourselves unjustly except it be a trade amongst you, by mutual consent.
draft: Do not transfer your property to each other through what has been declared void! It is not prohibited to appropriate it through a trade which you conclude by mutual agreement.
hil: Do not transfer your property to each other through what has been declared void! It is not prohibited to appropriate it through a trade which you conclude by mutual agreement.
compare: Do not transfer your property to each other through what has been declared void! It is not prohibited to appropriate it through a trade which you conclude by mutual agreement.

src: Ich wußte für euch von keinem anderen Gott außer mir! Also Haman behandle meinetwegen die Erde mit Feuer und lasse für mich einen Turm errichten!
ref: I know not that ye have a god other than me, so kindle for me (a fire), O Haman, to bake the mud; and set up for me a lofty tower in order that I may survey the god of Moses; and lo!
draft: I knew of no other god for you except me! So let Haman treat the earth with fire for my sake and let a tower be built for me!
hil: I knew of no other lord for you except myself. So, O Haman, fire the earth for me and let a tower be built for me!
compare: I knew of no other god for you except me! So let Haman treat the earth with fire for my sake and let a tower be built for me!

src: Und wisset, daß der Gesandte Allahs unter euch ist. Würde er sich in so vielen Dingen nach euren Wünschen richten, würdet ihr sicher in Bedrängnis kommen; jedoch Allah hat euch den Glauben lieb gemacht und sehr begehrenswert für eure Herzen; und Er hat euch Unglauben, Widersetzlichkeit und Ungehorsam verabscheuenswert gemacht.
ref: Know that the Apostle of God is among you: If he agreed with you in most matters you would surely come to grief. But God has made faith more desirable to you, and attractive to your hearts, and rendered disbelief and sin and disobedience repugnant.
draft: And know that the messenger of Allah is among you. If he were to follow you in many things, you would certainly be in distress, but Allah has made faith dear to you and has made it pleasing to your hearts, and He has made disbelief, defiance and disobedience detestable to you.
hil: And know that the messenger of Allah is among you. If he were to follow you in many things, you would certainly be in distress, but Allah has made faith dear to you and has made it pleasing to your hearts, and He has made disbelief, defiance and disobedience detestable to you.
compare: And know that the messenger of Allah is among you. If he were to follow you in many things, you would certainly be in distress, but Allah has made faith dear to you and has made it pleasing to your hearts, and He has made disbelief, defiance and disobedience detestable to you.

src: Sie werden nicht sprechen, ausgenommen der, dem der Erbarmer es erlaubt und der das Richtige sagt.
ref: None will speak except who is permitted by Ar-Rahman and says what is right.
draft: They will not speak, except for the one to whom the Merciful One permits, and he says the right thing.
hil: They will not speak, except for the one to whom the Merciful One permits, and he says the right thing.
compare: They will not speak, except for the one to whom the Merciful One permits, and he says the right thing.

src: (sie), die auf Lügen horchen, und die darauf aus sind, unrechtmäßig Erworbenes zu verschlingen.
ref: Eavesdropping for telling lies, earning through unlawful means!
draft: (They) who listen to lies and are keen on devouring unlawfully acquired possessions.
hil: "They" who listen to lies and are keen on devouring unlawfully acquired possessions.
compare: (They) who listen to lies and are keen on devouring unlawfully acquired possessions.

src: Jede Seele wird den Tod kosten, und euch wird euer Lohn am Tag der Auferstehung vollständig gegeben; und wer da vom Feuer ferngehalten und ins Paradies geführt wird, der soll glücklich sein. Und das irdische Leben ist nichts als ein trügerischer Nießbrauch.
ref: Every soul must taste death; and only on the Day of Resurrection will you be fully recompensed; so the one who is saved from the fire and is admitted into Paradise – he is undoubtedly successful; and the life of this world is just counterfeit wealth.
draft: "Every soul will cost death, and your reward will be given to you in full on the Day of Resurrection; and whoever is kept away from the Fire and admitted to Paradise will have attained success. And the life of this world is nothing but a deceptive enjoyment."
hil: Every soul shall cost death, and he who is removed far away from the Fire and made to enter into paradise shall indeed have achieved the goal. And the life of the world is naught but an illusory enjoyment.
compare: "Every soul will cost death, and your reward will be given to you in full on the Day of Resurrection; and whoever is kept away from the Fire and admitted to Paradise will have attained success. And the life of this world is nothing but a deceptive enjoyment."

src: Also Vernichtung sei den Weggenossen der Gluthitze!
ref: Deprived (of all joys) will be the inmates of Hell.
draft: Also destruction be to the companions of the glowing heat!
hil: Therefore, destruction be on the companions of the scorching heat!
compare: Also destruction be to the companions of the glowing heat!

src: Sie möchten Allah und diejenigen, die glauben, betrügen. Aber sie betrügen nur sich selbst, ohne zu merken.
ref: They (try to) deceive God and those who believe, yet deceive none but themselves although they do not know.
draft: They want to deceive Allah and those who believe. But they only deceive themselves without realizing it.
hil: They want to deceive Allah and those who believe. But they only deceive themselves without realizing it.
compare: They want to deceive Allah and those who believe. But they only deceive themselves without realizing it.

src: Und ALLAH gewährt Rizq, wem er will, ohne Berechnung.
ref: And Allah provideth whomsoever He listeth without reckoning.
draft: And Allah grants Rizq (sustenance) to whom He wills, without limit.
hil: And Allah grants sustenance to whom He will, without measure.
compare: And Allah grants Rizq (sustenance) to whom He wills, without limit.

src: In Gärten und an Quellen,
ref: In these gardens and these springs,
draft: In gardens and at springs,
hil: In gardens and at springs,
compare: In gardens and at springs,

src: Unter ihnen gab es Rechtschaffene und solche, die dies nicht waren.
ref: Some of them righteous, and some of them short of that.
draft: Among them, there were the righteous and those who were not.
hil: Among them were the righteous and those who were not.
compare: Among them, there were the righteous and those who were not.

src: Fühlt ihr euch etwa sicher vor Dem, Dessen (Anweisung) im Himmel ist, daß ER mit euch die Erde versinkt, und daß sie gleich bebt?!
ref: Are you so unafraid that He who is in Heaven will not open up the earth to swallow you, when it will begin to tremble?
draft: Do you feel safe from Him Whose (instruction) is in heaven that He may cause the earth to swallow you, and suddenly it should begin to quake?
hil: Do you feel safe from Him Whose (instruction) is in heaven that He may cause the earth to swallow you, and suddenly it will begin to quake?
compare: Do you feel safe from Him Whose (instruction) is in heaven that He may cause the earth to swallow you, and suddenly it should begin to quake?

src: Unser HERR! Lasse in unseren Herzen keine Falschheit entstehen, nachdem DU uns rechtgeleitet hast, und schenke uns von Dir aus Gnade! Gewiß, DU bist zweifellos Der großzügigste Schenkende.
ref: Our Lord, make not our hearts to swerve after that Thou hast guided us; and give us mercy from Thee; Thou art the Giver.
draft: "Our Lord! Do not allow any falsehood to arise in our hearts after You have guided us, and bestow Your mercy upon us from Your own generosity. Indeed, You are the most generous giver."
hil: Our Lord! Do not allow any falsehood to arise in our hearts after You have guided us, and bestow Your mercy upon us from Your own generosity. Indeed, You are the most generous giver.
compare: "Our Lord! Do not allow any falsehood to arise in our hearts after You have guided us, and bestow Your mercy upon us from Your own generosity. Indeed, You are the most generous giver."

src: Hättest du alles, was auf der Erde ist, dafür ausgegeben, hättest du ihre Herzen nicht vereint!
ref: Had you given away all the riches of the earth you could not have joined their hearts, but it is Allah Who joined their hearts.
draft: If you had spent everything that is on Earth for it, you would not have united their hearts!
hil: If you had spent all that is on Earth for it, you would not have united their hearts! But Allah has united them. Indeed, He is Almighty and Wise.
compare: If you had spent everything that is on Earth for it, you would not have united their hearts!

src: Wenn dem Menschen Unheil widerfährt, ruft er Uns an.
ref: When adversity touches the human being, he calls on Us.
draft: When a human suffers from adversity, he calls upon us.
hil: When some hardship strikes man, he prays to us.
compare: When a human suffers from adversity, he calls upon us.

src: (Dies ist) eine Verpflichtung von ALLAH, und ALLAH ist allwissend, allweise.
ref: God is all-knowing and all-wise.
draft: This is a commitment of Allah, and Allah is all-knowing, all-wise.
hil: This is a commitment of Allah, and Allah is all-knowing, all-wise.
compare: This is a commitment of Allah, and Allah is all-knowing, all-wise.

src: Dies ist eine Erinnerung.
ref: This is indeed a reminder.
draft: This is a reminder.
hil: This is a reminder.
compare: This is a reminder.

src: Für euch gibt es anstelle von Ihm weder Wali noch Fürbittenden. Wollt ihr euch etwa nicht entsinnen?!
ref: Apart from Him, you have no protector neither mediator; will you not remember?
draft: For you, there is neither a guardian nor an intercessor instead of Him. Do you not remember?!
hil: Do you set up, instead of Him, supporters who can neither benefit nor harm themselves? Will you then not remember?
compare: Do you set up, instead of Him, supporters who can neither benefit nor harm themselves? Will you then not remember?

src: Er sagte: "Meine Leute! Wie seht ihr es? Wenn ich über ein eindeutiges Zeichen von meinem HERRN verfüge und ER mir Gnade von Ihm erwies, die euch verborgen blieb, sollen wir diese euch etwa zur Pflicht machen, wenn ihr demgegenüber abgeneigt seid?
ref: He said: bethink ye, O my people! if I rested upon an evidence from my Lord, and a mercy hath come unto me from Him, and that hath been obscured unto you, Shall we make you adhere to it while ye are averse thereto?
draft: He said: "My people! How do you see it? If I have a clear sign from my LORD and HE has bestowed me grace from Him, which was hidden from you, should we make it a duty for you, if you are opposed to it?"
hil: He said: 'My people! Tell me, if I have a clear evidence from my Lord, and He has given me grace from Himself, which was hidden from you, shall we make it a duty for you, if you are opposed to it?'
compare: He said: "My people! How do you see it? If I have a clear sign from my LORD and HE has bestowed me grace from Him, which was hidden from you, should we make it a duty for you, if you are opposed to it?"

src: Oder wer wird ihr Beschützer sein?
ref: Or who will be their representative?
draft: Or who will be her protector?
hil: Or who will be her protector?
compare: Or who will be her protector?

src: Kehrt zurück zu eurem Vater, dann sagt: "Unser Vater! Dein Sohn hat gestohlen, und wir haben nur das bezeugt, was wir wußten. Und wir hatten über das Verborgene keine Kenntnis.
ref: Return you all to your father, and say, "Father, thy son stole; we do not testify except that we know; we were no guardians of the Unseen.
draft: Return to your father and say, "Our father! Your son has stolen, and we have only testified to what we knew, and we had no knowledge of the hidden things."
hil: Go to your father and tell him, 'O father, your son has committed a theft, and we bear witness to only what we know. We could not prevent the unknown.'
compare: Return to your father and say, "Our father! Your son has stolen, and we have only testified to what we knew, and we had no knowledge of the hidden things."

src: Nein, sie leugnen die Stunde; und denen, welche die Stunde leugnen, haben Wir einen Höllenbrand bereitet.
ref: Yet they reject the Hour as untrue. We have prepared a Fire for those who deny the Resurrection.
draft: No, they deny the Hour; and those who deny the Hour are in loss, and they have prepared for them a painful punishment.
hil: No, they deny the Hour; and for those who deny the Hour, We have prepared a Hellfire.
compare: No, they deny the Hour; and for those who deny the Hour, We have prepared a Hellfire.

src: Doch nie war ich mit dem Bittgebet zu Dir - HERR!  erfolglos.
ref: And in calling on Thee, my Lord, I have never been hitherto unprosperous.
draft: But I was never unsuccessful with the prayer to You - LORD!
hil: Yet never have I been unsuccessful with the supplication to You - O Lord!
compare: Yet never have I been unsuccessful with the supplication to You - O Lord!

src: Er sagte: "Nein! Vielmehr habt ihr selbst euch etwas eingeredet.
ref: (Their father) said: "It is not so; you have made up the story.
draft: He said, "No! Rather, you have convinced yourselves of something."
hil: He said, 'No, you have convinced yourselves of something.'
compare: He said, 'No, you have convinced yourselves of something.'

src: ALLAH wird ihnen gewiß vergelten Besseres als das, wie sie handelten, und wird ihnen noch mehr von Seiner Gunst geben.
ref: That Allah may reward them according to the best of their deeds, and add even more for them out of His Grace.
draft: "ALLAH will certainly reward them with something better than what they did, and will give them even more of His grace."
hil: Verily, Allah will give back something better to them than what they have done, and He will grant more of His grace unto them.
compare: "ALLAH will certainly reward them with something better than what they did, and will give them even more of His grace."

src: Sie sagten: "Wir glauben an den Herrn der Welten
ref: And said: "We have come to believe in the Lord of all the worlds,
draft: They said, "We believe in the Lord of the worlds."
hil: They said, "We believe in the Lord of the worlds."
compare: They said, "We believe in the Lord of the worlds."

src: So haben Wir bemessen.
ref: Then We facilitated (your birth).
draft: So we have measured.
hil: Thus have We measured.
compare: Thus have We measured.

src: Bereits sehen WIR das Schweifen deines Gesichts himmelwärts. So werden WIR dich gewiß eine Gebetsrichtung einnehmen lassen, an der du Wohlgefallen findest.
ref: We have seen thee turning thy face about in the heaven; now We will surely turn thee to a direction that shall satisfy thee.
draft: We already see the wandering of your face towards the sky. So we will certainly let you take a direction of prayer that you find pleasing.
hil: We already see the wandering of your face towards the sky. So we will certainly let you take a prayer direction that you find pleasing.
compare: We already see the wandering of your face towards the sky. So we will certainly let you take a prayer direction that you find pleasing.

src: Die Gesandten unseres Herrn haben in der Tat die Wahrheit gebracht."
ref: The apostles of our Lord had indeed brought the truth."
draft: "The envoys of our Lord have indeed brought the truth."
hil: "The envoys of our Lord have indeed brought the truth."
compare: "The envoys of our Lord have indeed brought the truth."

src: Und sollten sie für euch auf etwas davon freiwillig verzichten, dann nehmt es als Gutes Unschädliches an.
ref: But if they willingly forego some of it, then consume it with enjoyment and pleasure.
draft: And if they voluntarily renounce something of it for you, then accept it as good and harmless.
hil: And if they voluntarily waive something of it for you, then take it as good and harmless.
compare: And if they voluntarily renounce something of it for you, then accept it as good and harmless.

src: Er sagte: "Nein, sondern euer Ego machte euch etwas leicht! (Ich übe mich) in klagloser Geduld.
ref: He said, ‘No, your souls have made a matter seem decorous to you.
draft: He said, "No, but your ego made something easy for you! (I am practicing) in patient endurance."
hil: He said, 'No, rather your ego made something easy for you!' 'I am practicing' in patient endurance.
compare: He said, 'No, rather your ego made something easy for you!' 'I am practicing' in patient endurance.

src: Gott wollte feststellen, wer Ihn und seine Gesandten unterstützt, auch in Abwesenheit.
ref: That God may know who supports Him and His messengers invisibly.
draft: God wanted to determine who supports Him and His messengers, even in their absence.
hil: God wanted to determine who supports Him and His messengers, even in their absence.
compare: God wanted to determine who supports Him and His messengers, even in their absence.

src: Hätten sie doch dafür vier Zeugen gebracht! Und sollten sie nun die Zeugen nicht bringen, dann sind diese selbst bei ALLAH die wirklichen Lügner.
ref: Would that they had brought four witness to testify to their report. Since they brought none, they are liars before God.
draft: If only they had brought four witnesses for it! And if they do not produce the witnesses, then these people are the liars in the sight of Allah.
hil: Say: "If only they had brought four witnesses for it! And if they do not produce the witnesses, then these people are the liars in the sight of Allah."
compare: Say: "If only they had brought four witnesses for it! And if they do not produce the witnesses, then these people are the liars in the sight of Allah."

src: Gewiß, bereits entsandten WIR (Gesandte) zu Umam vor dir, dann hat diesen der Satan ihre (schlechten) Taten schön erscheinen lassen, so ist er ihr Wali heute.
ref: We have sent messengers before you to other nations. But Satan made their [foul] deeds seem fair to them and today he is their patron.
draft: Surely, We had already sent messengers to the people of 'Ad and Thamud before you. The devil made their deeds appealing to them and he is their patron today.
hil: Certainly we have sent messengers to the people of Ummah before you, but Satan made their bad deeds appear attractive to them, so he is their ally today.
compare: Certainly we have sent messengers to the people of Ummah before you, but Satan made their bad deeds appear attractive to them, so he is their ally today.

src: Mit denen, die ihr Vermögen spenden im Streben nach dem Wohlwollen Gottes und zur Festigung ihrer Seelen, ist es wie mit einem Garten auf einer Anhöhe.
ref: And the parable of those who spend their wealth seeking God’s approval, and to strengthen their souls, is that of a garden on a hillside.
draft: Those who donate their wealth in the pursuit of God's goodwill and to strengthen their souls are like a garden on a hill.
hil: As for those who donate their wealth in the pursuit of God's goodwill and to strengthen their souls, it is like a garden on a hill.
compare: As for those who donate their wealth in the pursuit of God's goodwill and to strengthen their souls, it is like a garden on a hill.

src: Gewiß, bereits waren sie vorher um Fitna bemüht und wollten deine Angelegenheiten (durch Intrigen) durcheinander bringen, bis dieWahrheit kam und die Sache ALLAHs siegte, während sie (diesem) abgeneigt sind.
ref: They had tried to create disorder before and intrigued against you, but truth came out in the end and God's will prevailed, even though they did not like it.
draft: Certainly, they had already been concerned about Fitna before and wanted to disrupt your affairs (through intrigues) until the truth came and the matter of Allah prevailed, while they are averse to it.
hil: Certainly, they had already been concerned about Fitna before and wanted to disrupt your affairs (through intrigues) until the truth came and the matter of Allah prevailed, while they are averse to it.
compare: Certainly, they had already been concerned about Fitna before and wanted to disrupt your affairs (through intrigues) until the truth came and the matter of Allah prevailed, while they are averse to it.

src: Ergötzt euch denn (eine Weile), bald jedoch werdet ihr es wissen.
ref: Please yourselves for a time; you will come to know soon.
draft: Enjoy it (for a while), but soon you will know it.
hil: Enjoy it (for a while), but soon you will know it.
compare: Enjoy it (for a while), but soon you will know it.

src: Und wen ALLAH rechtleitet, ist zweifellos der Rechtgeleitete, und wen ER abirren läßt, für die findest du gewiß keine Wali anstelle von Ihm! Und WIR werden sie am Tag der Auferstehung auf ihren Gesichtern versammeln - blind, stumm und taub.
ref: Whomsoever God guides, he is rightly guided; and whom He leads astray -- thou wilt not find for them protectors, apart from Him.
draft: And whom ALLAH guides, is undoubtedly the guided one, and whom HE leads astray, you will certainly find no protector other than Him! And We will gather them on the Day of Resurrection, face to face - blind, dumb and deaf.
hil: And whoever Allah guides, he is the guided one. And whoever He leads astray, you will never find for them protectors besides Him. And We will gather them on the Day of Resurrection, [fallen] on their faces - blind, dumb and deaf.
compare: And whoever Allah guides, he is the guided one. And whoever He leads astray, you will never find for them protectors besides Him. And We will gather them on the Day of Resurrection, [fallen] on their faces - blind, dumb and deaf.

src: Da warfen sie sich nieder, außer Iblis. Er weigerte sich.
ref: They fell prostrate, but Iblis did not; he refused.
draft: They threw themselves down, except Iblis. He refused.
hil: Then they threw themselves down, except for Iblis who refused.
compare: They threw themselves down, except Iblis. He refused.

src: Und darin haben sie vollkommen gereinigte Gattinnen. Und ewig werden sie darin bleiben.
ref: And they shall have fair spouses there, and live there abidingly.
draft: And therein they have completely purified wives. And they will remain therein forever.
hil: And they will have therein spouses purified, and therein they shall be abiders forever.
compare: And therein they have completely purified wives. And they will remain therein forever.

src: Nehmt euch daher keine Beschützer von ihnen, solange sie nicht auf Allahs Weg wandern. Und wenn sie sich abwenden, dann ergreift sie und tötet sie, wo immer ihr sie auffindet; und nehmt euch keinen von ihnen zum Beschützer oder zum Helfer
ref: Wherefore take not friends from among them until they migrate for the sake of Allah; and if they turn away, then lay hold of them and slay them, wheresoever ye find them, and take not from among them a friend or a helper.
draft: Therefore, do not take any protectors from them as long as they walk not in His way. But if they turn back, seize them and kill them wherever ye find them; and take no friend or helper from among them.
hil: Therefore, do not take any protectors from among them as long as they do not walk on the path of Allah. And if they turn away, seize and kill them wherever you find them, and do not take any of them as protector or helper.
compare: Therefore, do not take any protectors from among them as long as they do not walk on the path of Allah. And if they turn away, seize and kill them wherever you find them, and do not take any of them as protector or helper.

src: So sollen sie Mich nicht um Beschleunigung bitten.
ref: So let them not ask Me to hasten (the punishment).
draft: They should not ask me to accelerate.
hil: They should not ask me to accelerate.
compare: They should not ask me to accelerate.

src: Sie gehören nicht zu euch, und auch nicht zu ihnen.
ref: They are not of you, nor of them.
draft: They don't belong to you, nor to them.
hil: They don't belong to you, and not to them either.
compare: They don't belong to you, nor to them.

src: Und der Sünde der Juden wegen haben Wir ihnen gute Dinge verboten, die ihnen erlaubt waren, wie auch, weil sie viele Hindernisse in Allahs Weg legten
ref: Because of the wickedness of some among the Jews, and because they obstructed people from the way of God, We forbade them many things which were lawful for them;
draft: And because of the Jews' sin, We have forbidden them some good things, which were allowed to them before, as well as for hindering many people from the way of Allah.
hil: And because of the sin of the Jews, We have forbidden them some good things that were previously allowed to them, as well as because they placed many obstacles in Allah's way.
compare: And because of the sin of the Jews, We have forbidden them some good things that were previously allowed to them, as well as because they placed many obstacles in Allah's way.

src: Seine Leute kamen eilig zu ihm getrieben.
ref: His people came excited to him.
draft: His people came rushing towards him.
hil: His people came rushing towards him.
compare: His people came rushing towards him.

src: Hinsichtlich derjenigen, in deren Herzen Falschheit ist, so folgen sie dem, was darin mehrdeutig ist  in Bestrebung nach Fitna und in Bestrebung nach (irriger) Auslegung.
ref: As for those in whose hearts is swerving, they follow the ambiguous part, desiring dissension, and desiring its interpretation; and none knows its interpretation, save only God.
draft: Regarding those in whose hearts is falsehood, they follow that which is ambiguous therein - in pursuit of discord and [for the purpose of] interpretation [suitable to them].
hil: Regarding those in whose hearts there is falsehood, they pursue that which is ambiguous therein - in pursuit of discord and in pursuit of (erroneous) interpretation. However, only Allah knows its correct interpretation and those firmly grounded in knowledge say, "We have believed in it, all of it is from our Lord." But none will be reminded except those of understanding.
compare: Regarding those in whose hearts is falsehood, they follow that which is ambiguous therein - in pursuit of discord and [for the purpose of] interpretation [suitable to them].

src: Vor dem Unheil dessen, was Er erschaffen hat,
ref: From the evil of what He has created,
draft: Before the disaster of that which He has created.
hil: Before the calamity of that which He has created
compare: Before the disaster of that which He has created.

src: Ist etwa derjenige, der ins Feuer geworfen wird, besser oder derjenige, der am Tage der Auferstehung sicher kommt?! Tut, was ihr wollt!
ref: Is he who is hurled into the Fire better? Or he who arrives safely on the Day of Resurrection?
draft: Is the one who is thrown into the fire better, or the one who comes safely on the day of resurrection?! Do what you want!
hil: Is the person thrown into the fire better, or the one who arrives safely on the Day of Resurrection? Do as you please!
compare: Is the one who is thrown into the fire better, or the one who comes safely on the day of resurrection?! Do what you want!

src: Dies sind die Gesandten; einige von ihnen haben Wir vor anderen bevorzugt. Unter ihnen gibt es manche, zu denen Allah gesprochen hat, und einige, die Er um Rangstufen erhöht hat.
ref: Of those messengers, some of whom We have caused to excel others, and of whom there are some unto whom Allah spake, while some of them He exalted (above others) in degree; and We gave Jesus, son of Mary, clear proofs (of Allah's Sovereignty) and We supported him with the holy Spirit.
draft: These are the messengers; We have favored some of them over others. Among them are those to whom Allah has spoken, and some He has raised in rank.
hil: These are the messengers; We have favored some of them over others. Among them are those to whom Allah has spoken, and some He has raised in rank.
compare: These are the messengers; We have favored some of them over others. Among them are those to whom Allah has spoken, and some He has raised in rank.

src: Dient ALLAH, meinem HERRN und eurem HERRN.
ref: Worship Allah, my Lord and your Lord."
draft: Serve ALLAH, my Lord and your Lord.
hil: Serve ALLAH, my Lord and your Lord. Indeed, anyone who associates anything with ALLAH, then ALLAH has forbidden him Paradise, and his abode shall be in the Fire.
compare: Serve ALLAH, my Lord and your Lord.

src: Ehefrauen des Propheten! Ihr seid nicht wie irgendeine (Gruppe) der Frauen, wenn ihr Taqwa gemäß handelt.
ref: O wives of the Prophet, you are not like other women.
draft: Wives of the Prophet! You are not like any other women, if you act according to Taqwa.
hil: O wives of the Prophet! You are not like any other women, if you act according to Taqwa.
compare: O wives of the Prophet! You are not like any other women, if you act according to Taqwa.

src: ALLAH möge ihnen vergeben. Gewiß, ALLAH ist allvergebend, allgnädig.
ref: It may be that God will accept their repentance, for God is forgiving and kind.
draft: "May Allah forgive them. Indeed, Allah is all-forgiving, all-merciful."
hil: May Allah forgive them. Truly, Allah is Most Forgiving, Most Merciful.
compare: May Allah forgive them. Truly, Allah is Most Forgiving, Most Merciful.

src: "Es gibt nur unseren ersten Tod, und wir werden nicht wiedererweckt werden.
ref: "There is no dying for us but once; and we shall not be raised again.
draft: "There is only our first death, and we will not be resurrected."
hil: They say there is no other life but the one in this world, and we will not be raised (from the) dead.
compare: "There is only our first death, and we will not be resurrected."

src: Als er dort ankam, wurde ihm zugerufen: "Gesegnet ist wer im Feuer und wer in dessen Umgebung ist, und Preis sei Allah, dem Herrn der Weltenbewohner!
ref: But when he reached it, a voice called out: "Blessed is He who is in the fire and all around it. Praised be God, the Lord of all the worlds.
draft: When he arrived there, it was called out to him: "Blessed is he who is in the fire and he who is in its vicinity, and praise be to Allah, the Lord of the worlds!
hil: As he arrived there, it was called out to him: 'Blessed is he who is in the fire and he who is in its vicinity, and praise be to Allah, the Lord of the worlds!'. And their greeting there will be 'Peace!'. And their concluding call will be, 'All praise belongs to Allah, the Lord of all the worlds.'
compare: When he arrived there, it was called out to him: "Blessed is he who is in the fire and he who is in its vicinity, and praise be to Allah, the Lord of the worlds!

src: Als ihr fortlieft und euch nach niemandem umdrehtet, während der Gesandte euch von hinten her rief. Da belohnte Er euch mit Kummer für (den) Kummer (des Propheten), damit ihr weder traurig wäret über das, was euch entgangen war, noch über das, was euch getroffen hatte. Und Allah ist Kundig dessen, was ihr tut.
ref: Remember, as you were rushing up (the hill) without turning back to look, though the Prophet was calling you from the rear, He requited you with anguish for an anguish that you do not fret for missed opportunity and what befell you, for God is aware of all that you do,
draft: As you walked away and did not turn to anyone while the envoy called you from behind. Then He rewarded you with grief for the Prophet's grief so that you would not be sad about what you had missed or what had befallen you. And Allah is aware of what you do.
hil: And recall when ye were running off and would not look back on anyone, albeit the messenger in your rear was calling unto you. Wherefore, He caused sorrow to overtake you for sorrow, that ye might not be sad for what ye missed, nor what befell you. And Allah is aware of what ye do.
compare: As you walked away and did not turn to anyone while the envoy called you from behind. Then He rewarded you with grief for the Prophet's grief so that you would not be sad about what you had missed or what had befallen you. And Allah is aware of what you do.

src: Am Morgen war er in der Stadt furchtsam und hielt (immer wieder) Ausschau. Auf einmal schrie derjenige, der ihn am Tag zuvor um Hilfe gebeten hatte, zu ihm um Beistand. Musa sagte zu ihm: "Du bist offenkundig einer, der wahrlich (zu Gewalttaten) verleitet."
ref: So he was in the city at morning fearing, waiting to see what happens – thereupon he sighted the one who had appealed to him the day before, crying out to him for help; Moosa said to him, “Indeed you are clearly astray.”
draft: In the morning, he was fearful in the city and kept looking around (over and over again). Suddenly, the person who had asked him for help the day before screamed to him for support. Musa said to him: "You are obviously someone who is truly prone to (acts of violence)."
hil: In the morning, he was fearful in the city and kept looking around (over and over again). Suddenly, the one who had asked him for help the day before shouted to him for help. Musa said to him, "You are clearly someone who is truly prone to (acts of violence)."
compare: In the morning, he was fearful in the city and kept looking around (over and over again). Suddenly, the one who had asked him for help the day before shouted to him for help. Musa said to him, "You are clearly someone who is truly prone to (acts of violence)."

src: Und WIR senden nach und nach vom Quran hinab, was eine Heilung und Gnade für die Mumin ist. Doch er bestärkt die Unrecht-Begehenden nur noch im Fehlgehen.
ref: What We have sent down of the Qur'an is a healing and a grace for the faithful, and adds only loss for the sinners.
draft: And WE send down gradually from the Quran what is a healing and a mercy for the believers. But it only increases the evildoers in their wrongdoing.
hil: And We gradually reveal from the Quran what is a healing and mercy for the believers. But it only increases the wrongdoing of those who pursue injustice.
compare: And WE send down gradually from the Quran what is a healing and a mercy for the believers. But it only increases the evildoers in their wrongdoing.

src: Solcherart erläutert ALLAH für euch Seine Ayat.
ref: Thus Allah makes clear His Ayat (Commandments and legal obligations) for you.
draft: Such Allah explains His verses to you.
hil: In this way Allah explains His signs to you.
compare: In this way Allah explains His signs to you.

src: Und gäbe es nicht das Wort des Richtens, würde bestimmt unter ihnen gerichtet.
ref: But for the decisive Word (of God) a sentence would have been passed amongst them.
draft: And if it were not for the word of judgment, they would certainly be judged among them.
hil: And were it not for a word that had already gone forth, the judgement would have been passed upon them.
compare: And were it not for a word that had already gone forth, the judgement would have been passed upon them.
