Also, the ones to whom the Scriptures were given certainly know that it is the truth from their LORD. And ALLAH is certainly not unaware of what you do.
hil: We already see your face turning towards the sky. We will surely choose a prayer direction for you that you find pleasing. Turn your face towards Al-Masjid al-Haram and wherever you are, turn towards it. Those given the Scripture certainly know it is the truth from their LORD. ALLAH is not unaware of your deeds.
compare: We already see the wandering of your face towards heaven. So we will surely take you in a prayer direction that you find pleasing. So turn your face towards Al-Masjid al-Haram, and wherever you are, turn your face towards its direction! Also, the ones to whom the Scriptures were given certainly know that it is the truth from their LORD. And ALLAH is certainly not unaware of what you do.

src: Schreit heute nicht um Hilfe!
ref: Invoke not loudly this day!
draft: Don't scream for help today!
hil: Do not shout for help today!
compare: Do not shout for help today!

src: Es wurde befohlen: "O Noah, geh an Land, (und sei) mit Unserem Frieden begleitet!
ref: It was said, “O Nooh!
draft: It has been commanded: "O Noah, disembark, (and be) accompanied by Our peace!
hil: And it was said, 'O Noah, disembark, accompanied by Our peace!'
compare: It has been commanded: "O Noah, disembark, (and be) accompanied by Our peace!

src: Sie sagten: "Al-'aziz! Er hat doch einen Vater, der ein Greis ist, so nimm einen von uns an seiner Stelle fest.
ref: They said: "O Minister, he has an aged father, so keep one of us in his place.
draft: They said, "Al-'Aziz! He does have a father who is an old man, so take one of us in his place instead."
hil: They said, 'O Aziz, he has an aged father, so keep one of us in his place instead; for we see that you are a virtuous man.'
compare: They said, 'O Aziz, he has an aged father, so keep one of us in his place instead; for we see that you are a virtuous man.'

src: Wenn ihr das nicht tut, wird Verwirrung im Lande und gewaltiges Unheil entstehen.
ref: Unless you do the same there will be discord in the land and anarchy.
draft: If you do not do this, confusion will arise in the country and great harm will be caused.
hil: If you don't do this, confusion will arise in the country and a tremendous calamity will occur.
compare: If you don't do this, confusion will arise in the country and a tremendous calamity will occur.

src: Das ist die Huld Gottes. Er läßt sie zukommen, wem Er will. Und Gott besitzt große Huld.
ref: This is Allah’s munificence, which He may give to whomever He wills; and Allah is Extremely Munificent.
draft: This is the grace of God. He bestows it upon whom He will. And God possesses great grace.
hil: That is the grace of God. He bestows it upon whom He wills. And God has great grace.
compare: That is the grace of God. He bestows it upon whom He wills. And God has great grace.

src: Ein Wohlgefallen von Gott ist aber größer.
ref: But the greatest bliss is the Good Pleasure of Allah.
draft: A pleasure from God, however, is greater.
hil: However, a pleasure from God is greater.
compare: A pleasure from God, however, is greater.

src: Begebt euch in einen Schatten mit drei Verzweigungen,
ref: Go to the shadow with three ramifications,
draft: Please proceed to a shadow with three branches.
hil: Proceed to a shadow with three branches.
compare: Proceed to a shadow with three branches.

src: Sie sagten: "Bist du zu uns gekommen, um uns von unseren Göttern abwendig zu machen? So bring uns doch her, was du uns androhst, wenn du zu den Wahrhaftigen gehörst."
ref: They said: art thou come Unto us that thou mayest turn us aside from our gods? then bring thou upon us that wherewith thou threatenest us, if thou art of the truth-tellers.
draft: They said, "Have you come to turn us away from our gods? Then bring us what you promise if you are one of the truthful."
hil: They said, 'Have you come to turn us away from our gods? Then bring us what you promise if you are one of the truthful.'
compare: They said, "Have you come to turn us away from our gods? Then bring us what you promise if you are one of the truthful."

src: Das ist der Lohn der Ungläubigen.
ref: This is the recompense of those who do not believe.
draft: "This is the reward of the infidels."
hil: This is the recompense of the unbelievers.
compare: "This is the reward of the infidels."

src: So zieh mit deinen Angehörigen in einem Teil der Nacht fort, und folge du hinterdrein. Und keiner von euch soll sich umdrehen.
ref: Depart with your family in a part of the night and walk behind them and let none of you turn round.
draft: So leave with your relatives in a part of the night, and you follow afterwards. And none of you should turn around.
hil: So leave with your relatives in a part of the night, and follow behind them, and let none of you turn back to look.
compare: So leave with your relatives in a part of the night, and follow behind them, and let none of you turn back to look.

src: Und sie kamen vor ALLAH allesamt. Die Schwachen sagten dann zu denjenigen, die sich in Arroganz erhoben haben: "Wir waren doch Gefolgsleute von euch! Könnt ihr von uns (nicht) etwas von ALLAHs Peinigung abwehren?" Sie sagten: "Hätte ALLAH uns rechtleiten lassen, hätten wir euch gewiß rechtgeleitet. Es ist uns gleich, ob wir uns in Ungeduld oder in Geduld üben. Für uns gibt es kein Entrinnen mehr."
ref: They will all publicly come in the presence of Allah – then those who were weak will say to those who were the leaders, “We were your followers – is it possible for you to avert some of Allah’s punishment from us?” They will answer, “If Allah had guided us, we would have guided you; it is the same for us, whether we panic or patiently endure – we have no place of refuge.” (* This conversation will take place between the disbelievers and their leaders.)
draft: And they all came before Allah. The weak ones then said to those who had risen in arrogance, "We were your followers! Can you protect us from Allah's punishment?" They said, "If Allah had guided us, we would have guided you. It is the same to us whether we are patient or hasty. We have no escape."
hil: And they all came before Allah. The weak ones said to those who had become arrogant, 'We were surely your followers! Can you not prevent us from Allah's punishment?' They said, 'If Allah had guided us, we would have surely guided you. It is the same to us whether we are patient or hasty. There is no escape for us.'
compare: And they all came before Allah. The weak ones then said to those who had risen in arrogance, "We were your followers! Can you protect us from Allah's punishment?" They said, "If Allah had guided us, we would have guided you. It is the same to us whether we are patient or hasty. We have no escape."

src: (Und ich bin zu euch gesandt worden, auf) daß ihr Vergebung von eurem Herrn erflehet und euch dann reumütig zu Ihm bekehret. Er wird euch dann bis zum Ende einer festgesetzten Frist reich versorgen.
ref: and: 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord, then repent to Him, and He will give you fair enjoyment unto a term stated, and He will give of His bounty to every man of grace.
draft: (And I have been sent to you) so that you beg for forgiveness from your Lord and then repent to Him in remorse. He will then abundantly provide for you until the end of an appointed term.
hil: "(And) I have been sent to you (so) that you may ask forgiveness from your Lord and then turn to Him (in repentance). He will then provide for you (abundantly) until the end of an appointed time."
compare: "(And) I have been sent to you (so) that you may ask forgiveness from your Lord and then turn to Him (in repentance). He will then provide for you (abundantly) until the end of an appointed time."

src: Kein Volk kann seine Frist überschreiten; noch können sie dahinter zurückbleiben.
ref: No people can hasten or delay the term already fixed for them.
draft: No nation can exceed its deadline; nor can they fall behind it.
hil: "No nation can exceed its appointed time; they cannot postpone it for even an hour, nor can they move it ahead."
compare: "No nation can exceed its appointed time; they cannot postpone it for even an hour, nor can they move it ahead."

src: Sie belauschen nicht die hohen Angesehenen. Und sie werden von jeder Seite beworfen,
ref: So that they are not able to listen to the angels of higher (echelons), and are pelted from all sides
draft: They do not eavesdrop on the highly esteemed. And they are being bombarded from every side.
hil: They don't spy on the highly respected. And they are being pelted from every side.
compare: They don't spy on the highly respected. And they are being pelted from every side.

src: Also Niedergang sei denjenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, an ihrem Tag, der ihnen angedroht wird.
ref: Alas the woe for those who refuse to believe in the Day which has been promised them.
draft: Also decline be to those who practiced kufr on their day, which is threatened to them.
hil: So ruin be on those who have committed kufr on their day, which is threatened to them.
compare: So ruin be on those who have committed kufr on their day, which is threatened to them.

src: Allah ist Gnädig zu den Menschen.
ref: God is Kind towards the servants.
draft: Allah is gracious to people.
hil: Allah is gracious to people.
compare: Allah is gracious to people.

src: Aber die Heuchler wissen nicht Bescheid.
ref: But the hypocrites do not know.
draft: But the hypocrites don't know.
hil: But the hypocrites do not know.
compare: But the hypocrites don't know.

src: Er sagte: "Nein! Vielmehr ist euer Herr der Herr der Himmel und der Erde, Der sie erschaffen hat. Und ich gehöre zu denjenigen, die euch darüber Zeugnis ablegen.
ref: He said: "In fact it was your Lord, the Lord of the heavens and the earth, who created them; and I bear witness to this.
draft: He said: "No! Rather your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, who created them. And I am one of those who testify to that."
hil: He said: "Not at all! But your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth who created them, and I belong to those who testify about that."
compare: He said: "No! Rather your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, who created them. And I am one of those who testify to that."

src: Sie sagte: "Ach, wehe mir!
ref: She said: "Woe betide me!
draft: She said: "Oh, woe is me!
hil: She said, 'Oh, woe is me!'
compare: She said: "Oh, woe is me!

src: So darfst du nicht meinen, daß Gott sein Versprechen an die Gesandten bricht.
ref: Think not that God would go back on His promise (made) to the apostles.
draft: So you must not think that God breaks his promise to the messengers.
hil: You should not think that God breaks His promise to the messengers.
compare: You should not think that God breaks His promise to the messengers.

src: Ah sieh!
ref: Alas indeed!
draft: Ah see!
hil: Ah look!
compare: Ah look!

src: Ich schwöre bei den sich Verbergenden,
ref: I swear by the slinkers,
draft: I swear by those who hide themselves.
hil: I swear by those who conceal themselves.
compare: I swear by those who conceal themselves.

src: Und ich wurde angewiesen, von den Muslimen zu sein,
ref: And I have been commanded to be of those that surrender,
draft: And I was instructed to be of the Muslims.
hil: And I was instructed to be of the Muslims.
compare: And I was instructed to be of the Muslims.

src: ALLAH hat sie euch vergeben. Und ALLAH ist allvergebend, allnachsichtig.
ref: God has overlooked (your failings) in this (respect), for God is forgiving and forbearing.
draft: ALLAH has forgiven you. And ALLAH is all-forgiving, all-lenient.
hil: "Has ALLAH forgiven you. And ALLAH is all-forgiving, all-lenient."
compare: ALLAH has forgiven you. And ALLAH is all-forgiving, all-lenient.

src: Nein, sondern ALLAH gehört die Bestimmung insgesamt. Wollen diejenigen, die den Iman verinnerlichten, etwa nicht zur Kenntnis nehmen, daß wenn ALLAH wollte, ER alle Menschen rechtleitete?!
ref: So, do not the people of faith (still look forward to such a sign in response to the demand of the unbelievers and) despair as a result of knowing that had Allah so willed, He could have guided all to the Truth.
draft: No, but Allah has complete control over destiny. Do those who have internalized faith not realize that if Allah wanted, He could guide all people?
hil: No, instead the destiny belongs entirely to Allah. Do those who believe not realize that if Allah willed, He could guide all people?
compare: No, but Allah has complete control over destiny. Do those who have internalized faith not realize that if Allah wanted, He could guide all people?

src: Auch gewähre ICH ihnen noch mehr Zeit. Doch Meine Bestrafung ist hart.
ref: And I will give them respite; indeed My secret plan is extremely solid.
draft: Also, I grant them more time. But my punishment is harsh.
hil: I shall grant them more time, but My punishment is severe.
compare: Also, I grant them more time. But my punishment is harsh.

src: Und der geraden und der ungeraden (Zahl),
ref: The multiple and the one,
draft: And the even and the odd (number),
hil: Of the even and the odd (number),
compare: Of the even and the odd (number),

src: Da vergaben Wir ihm dies.
ref: So We forgave him.
draft: We forgave him for this.
hil: So We forgave him for this.
compare: We forgave him for this.

src: Da kehrte Er Sich ihnen mit Erbarmen zu, auf daß sie sich bekehren möchten. Wahrlich, Allah ist der Gnädige, der Barmherzige.
ref: So He softened towards them that they may repent; for God surely accepts repentance and is merciful.
draft: He turned to them in mercy so that they might repent. Verily, Allah is the Merciful, the Most Merciful.
hil: "He turned to them in mercy so that they might repent. Verily, Allah is the Merciful, the Most Merciful."
compare: He turned to them in mercy so that they might repent. Verily, Allah is the Merciful, the Most Merciful.

src: O die ihr glaubt, wenn ihr auf eine festgesetzte Frist, einer vom anderen, eine Geldschuld aufnehmt, dann schreibt es auf. Und ein Schreiber soll (es) für euch gerecht aufschreiben.
ref: O believers, when you negotiate a debt for a fixed term, draw up an agreement in writing, though better it would be to have a scribe write it faithfully down; and no scribe should refuse to write as God has taught him, and write what the borrower dictates, and have fear of God, his Lord, and not leave out a thing.
draft: O ye who believe! When ye contract a debt for a fixed term, record it in writing. Let a scribe record it in justice between you.
hil: O you who believe! If you make an agreement for debt for a specified time, write it down. And let a scribe write it for you in justice.
compare: O ye who believe! When ye contract a debt for a fixed term, record it in writing. Let a scribe record it in justice between you.

src: Gärten und Beerengehege
ref: Orchards and vineyards,
draft: Gardens and berry enclosures.
hil: Gardens and berry enclosures
compare: Gardens and berry enclosures.

src: Habt ihr etwa keinen Einblick?!
ref: Can you still not comprehend?
draft: Do you have no insight?!
hil: Do you not have any insight?!
compare: Do you have no insight?!

src: Und dein Herr wird dir wahrlich geben, und dann wirst du zufrieden sein.
ref: For your Lord will certainly give you, and you will be content.
draft: And your Lord will surely give you, and then you will be satisfied.
hil: Surely, your Lord will give you and you will be pleased with it.
compare: Surely, your Lord will give you and you will be pleased with it.

src: Aber nein! Vielmehr sagen sie: "(Das ist) ein Bündel von wirren Träumen. Nein! Vielmehr hat er ihn ersonnen. Nein! Vielmehr ist er ein Dichter. So soll er uns ein Zeichen bringen, so wie die Früheren gesandt wurden."
ref: Yet they say: "These are only confused dreams," or rather: "He has invented them;" or: "He is only a poet. Let him therefore bring a miracle to us as the earlier (apostles) were sent with."
draft: But no! Rather, they say, "(This is) a bundle of confused dreams. No! Rather, he has devised it. No! Rather, he is a poet. Thus shall he bring us a sign, just as the ancients were sent."
hil: But no! Rather, they say, "(This is) a bundle of confused dreams. No! Rather, he has devised it. No! Rather, he is a poet. Thus shall he bring us a sign, just as the ancients were sent."
compare: But no! Rather, they say, "(This is) a bundle of confused dreams. No! Rather, he has devised it. No! Rather, he is a poet. Thus shall he bring us a sign, just as the ancients were sent."

src: Und gebt den Frauen ihre Brautgabe als Schenkung.
ref: Give women their dowries graciously.
draft: And give the women their dowry as a gift.
hil: "And command the believers to give the women their dowry as a gift."
compare: And give the women their dowry as a gift.

src: Und bestimmt wirst du sie unter allen Menschen am gierigsten nach Leben finden, und mehr noch als diejenigen, die Götzen anbeten.
ref: You will see they are covetous of life more than other men, even more than those who practise idolatry.
draft: And for sure you will find her among all people the most avid for life, and even more so than those who worship idols.
hil: And you will find her, for sure, among all people the most avid for life and even more than those who worship idols.
compare: And you will find her, for sure, among all people the most avid for life and even more than those who worship idols.

src: "Mein Söhnchen! Sollte es sich auch nur um das Gewicht eines Senfkorns handeln, das sich in einem Stein, in den Himmeln oder auf Erden befinden sollte, ALLAH bringt sie. Gewiß, ALLAH ist allgütig, allkundig.
ref: 'O my son, if it should be but the weight of one grain of mustard-seed, and though it be in a rock, or in the heavens, or in the earth, God shall bring it forth; surely God is All-subtle, All-aware.
draft: "My little son! Even if it should be only the weight of a mustard seed that should be in a rock, in the heavens or on earth, ALLAH will bring them. Surely, ALLAH is all good, all knowledgeable."
hil: O my son, if it is (anything) equal to the weight of a mustard-seed, and though it be in a rock, or in the heavens, or on the earth, Allah will bring it forth. Verily, Allah is All-Forgiving, All-Aware.
compare: O my son, if it is (anything) equal to the weight of a mustard-seed, and though it be in a rock, or in the heavens, or on the earth, Allah will bring it forth. Verily, Allah is All-Forgiving, All-Aware.

src: Ich will auch nicht (einfach) euch widersprechen im Hinblick auf das, was ich euch verbiete.
ref: I have no desire to do what I forbid you from doing.
draft: I also don't want to (simply) contradict you with regard to what I forbid you.
hil: I also don't want to (simply) contradict you in regards to what I forbid you.
compare: I also don't want to (simply) contradict you in regards to what I forbid you.

src: Und die Berge wie Wolleflocken sein werden,
ref: The mountains like the tufts of (carded) wool,
draft: And the mountains will be like woolen flakes.
hil: And the mountains will be like woolen flakes.
compare: And the mountains will be like woolen flakes.

src: Und ihre Zungen behaupten lügnerisch, daß für sie das Beste bestimmt ist.
ref: Their tongues utter falsehoods (when they say) the finest of wages shall be theirs.
draft: And their tongues falsely claim that the best is destined for them.
hil: And their tongues falsely claim that the Best is destined for them.
compare: And their tongues falsely claim that the best is destined for them.

src: Diejenigen aber, die sich um Unsertwillen abmühen, werden Wir ganz gewiß Unsere Wege leiten. Und Allah ist wahrlich mit den Gutes Tuenden.
ref: And those who strove in Our way – We shall surely show them Our paths; and indeed Allah is with the virtuous.
draft: But those who strive in Our cause, We will surely guide them to Our paths. And indeed, Allah is with the doers of good.
hil: But those who strive for Our sake, We will surely guide them to Our paths. And Allah is indeed with the doers of good.
compare: But those who strive in Our cause, We will surely guide them to Our paths. And indeed, Allah is with the doers of good.

src: So diene Ihm und verlasse dich auf Ihn.
ref: So worship Him (O Muhammad SAW) and put your trust in Him.
draft: Serve Him and rely on Him.
hil: Serve Him and put thy trust in Him.
compare: Serve Him and rely on Him.

src: Und solltet ihr darin niemanden finden, dann betretet sie nicht, bis euch Erlaubnis gewährt wird.
ref: If you find that no one is in, then do not enter unless you have received permission.
draft: And if you do not find anyone in it, do not enter until permission is granted to you.
hil: And if you do not find anyone there, do not enter until permission is granted to you.
compare: And if you do not find anyone there, do not enter until permission is granted to you.

src: Dann machte ich doch ihnen Da'wa öffentlich,
ref: Then I called them loudly and more openly,
draft: Then I did Da'wah to them publicly.
hil: Then I publicly made Da'wah to them.
compare: Then I did Da'wah to them publicly.

src: Doch wer ALLAH und Seinem Gesandten widerspricht und ALLAHs Richtlinien überschreitet, den wird ER ins Feuer eintreten lassen, darin wird er ewig bleiben. Und für ihn ist eine erniedrigende Peinigung bestimmt.
ref: Those who disobey God and the Prophet and exceed the bounds of law, will be taken to Hell and abide there for ever and shall suffer despicable punishment.
draft: But whoever contradicts Allah and His Messenger and exceeds Allah's limits - He will put him into the Fire to abide eternally therein, and he will have a humiliating punishment.
hil: But those who contradict Allah and His Messenger and exceed Allah's limits - He will cast them into the Fire; they will dwell therein forever. And for them is a humiliating punishment.
compare: But whoever contradicts Allah and His Messenger and exceeds Allah's limits - He will put him into the Fire to abide eternally therein, and he will have a humiliating punishment.

src: Und Er hat eure Gattinnen, von denen ihr euch durch den Rückenschwur trennt, nicht (wirklich) zu euren Müttern gemacht. Und Er hat eure angenommenen Söhne nicht (wirklich) zu euren Söhnen gemacht.
ref: Neither has He made your wives whom you declare to be like your mothers' backs, your real mothers. [AzZihar is the saying of a husband to his wife, "You are to me like the back of my mother" i.e. You are unlawful for me to approach.], nor has He made your adopted sons your real sons.
draft: And He has not truly made your wives, from whom you separate by oath of back-divorce, your mothers. And He has not truly made your adopted sons your sons.
hil: And He has not truly made your wives, from whom you separate by oath of back-divorce, your mothers. And He has not truly made your adopted sons your sons.
compare: And He has not truly made your wives, from whom you separate by oath of back-divorce, your mothers. And He has not truly made your adopted sons your sons.

src: Und ALLAH genügt als Allwissender.
ref: God suffices as Knower.
draft: And Allah suffices as the All-Knowing.
hil: And Allah suffices as the All-Knowing.
compare: And Allah suffices as the All-Knowing.

src: Die Hölle, in der sie brennen. Welch schlimme Lagerstätte!
ref: Hell; which they shall enter; what an evil resting-place!
draft: The hell in which they are burning. What a terrible place of storage!
hil: The hell in which they burn. What an awful storage place!
compare: The hell in which they burn. What an awful storage place!

src: Als er nun den Ort des Sonnenuntergangs erreichte, fand er, daß sie in einer verschlammten Quelle unterging.
ref: Until, when he reached the setting place of the sun, he found it setting in a spring of black muddy (or hot) water.
draft: When he reached the place of the sunset, he found that it set in a muddy spring.
hil: When he arrived at the place of sunset, he found that it was going down into a muddy spring.
compare: When he arrived at the place of sunset, he found that it was going down into a muddy spring.

src: Am Tag, da das Beben einsetzt
ref: The day the convulsive (first blast) shatters convulsively
draft: On the day the quake begins.
hil: On the Day when the quake begins
compare: On the day the quake begins.

src: Und ER ist Derjenige, Der vom Himmel Wasser hinabsenden ließ. So haben WIR damit Pflanzenwuchs jeder Art ermöglicht, so haben WIR daraus Grünes sprießen lassen, von dem WIR übereinander liegende Saatkörner hervorbrachten. Und aus den Dattelpalmen, aus ihrem Blütenstand (haben WIR hervorgebracht) herunterhängende Dattelbüschel und Dschannat mit Trauben, Oliven und Granatäpfeln - einander ähnelnd und nicht ähnelnd. Betrachtet ihre Früchte, wenn sie Früchte tragen und reif werden. Gewiß, darin sind zweifelsohne Ayat für Menschen, die den Iman verinnerlichen.
ref: And it is He Who sends down water from the sky; so with it We produced all things that grow; hence We produce from it vegetation from which We bring forth grains in clusters; and from the pollen of dates, dense bunches – and gardens of grapes and olives and pomegranates, similar in some ways and unlike in some; look at its fruit when it bears yield, and its ripening; indeed in it are signs for the people who believe.
draft: And HE is the one who sent down water from the sky, thereby enabling the growth of every type of plant. And out of them, We bring forth greenery, from which We produce grains arranged in layers. And from the date-palm, We bring forth clusters of dates hanging low and near, and gardens of grapes, olives and pomegranates, alike and unlike. Look at their fruits when they begin to bear, and ripen. Surely, in all this, there are signs for people who believe.
hil: And HE is the one who sends down water from the sky, thereby enabling the growth of every type of plant. And out of them, We bring forth greenery, from which We produce grains arranged in layers. And from the date-palm We bring forth clusters of dates hanging low and near, and gardens of grapes, olives and pomegranates, alike and unlike. Look at their fruits when they begin to bear, and ripen. Surely, in all this there are signs for people who believe.
compare: And HE is the one who sent down water from the sky, thereby enabling the growth of every type of plant. And out of them, We bring forth greenery, from which We produce grains arranged in layers. And from the date-palm, We bring forth clusters of dates hanging low and near, and gardens of grapes, olives and pomegranates, alike and unlike. Look at their fruits when they begin to bear, and ripen. Surely, in all this, there are signs for people who believe.

src: Und daß Er der Herr des Sirius ist.
ref: That He is the Lord of Sirius;
draft: And that He is the Lord of Sirius.
hil: And that He is the Lord of Sirius.
compare: And that He is the Lord of Sirius.

src: Und da sie deinem Herrn in einer Reihe vorgeführt werden: «Ihr seid zu Uns gekommen, so wie Wir euch das erste Mal erschaffen haben.
ref: And they will be set before your Lord in (lines as) rows, (and Allah will say): "Now indeed, you have come to Us as We created you the first time.
draft: And when they are presented before your Lord in a row, [He will say], "You have certainly come to Us just as We created you the first time."
hil: And when they are presented before your Lord in a row, [He will say], “You have certainly come to Us just as We created you the first time.”
compare: And when they are presented before your Lord in a row, [He will say], "You have certainly come to Us just as We created you the first time."

src: Da löschten Wir ihre Augen aus. "Kostet nun Meine Strafe und Meine Warnungen."
ref: So We blinded their eyes, "Then taste you My Torment and My Warnings."
draft: We extinguished their eyes. "Now taste My punishment and My warnings."
hil: We extinguished their eyes. 'Now taste My punishment and My warnings.'
compare: We extinguished their eyes. "Now taste My punishment and My warnings."

src: Als zu ihnen die Gesandten von vor ihnen und von hinter ihnen kamen: "Dient niemandem außer ALLAH."
ref: Their apostles came to them one after the other (saying): "Do not worship any one but God."
draft: When the messengers came to them from before them and from behind them: "Serve no one but Allah."
hil: When the messengers came to them from before them and behind them: "Serve none but Allah."
compare: When the messengers came to them from before them and from behind them: "Serve no one but Allah."

src: ER wird sie mit Seiner Gnade umgeben. Gewiß, ALLAH ist allvergebend, allgnädig.
ref: God will admit them into His mercy; God is indeed most forgiving and merciful.
draft: HE will surround her with HIS grace. Indeed, Allah is all-forgiving, most merciful.
hil: HE shall enclose her with His grace. Surely, Allah is forgiving, ever-merciful.
compare: HE will surround her with HIS grace. Indeed, Allah is all-forgiving, most merciful.

src: Ist derjenige, der qanit während der Nacht sudschud- und qiyam-vollziehend ist, der sich vor dem Jenseits in Acht nimmt und der sich die Gnade seines HERRN erhofft, (etwa mit dem Kafir gleich)?!
ref: Can one who prays in the watches of the night, bowing in homage or standing attentive, fearful of the life to come, and hoping for the mercy of his Lord, (be like one who does not)?
draft: Is the one who is obedient during the night, performing Sujud and Qiyaam, fearing the Hereafter and hoping for the Mercy of his Lord, (equal to the disbeliever)?!
hil: Is the one who obediently performs Sujud and Qiyaam during the night, fearing the Hereafter and hoping for the mercy of his Lord (equal to the disbeliever)?!
compare: Is the one who obediently performs Sujud and Qiyaam during the night, fearing the Hereafter and hoping for the mercy of his Lord (equal to the disbeliever)?!

src: Ausgenommen der auserwählten Diener Gottes.
ref: Other than the chosen creatures of God.
draft: Excluding the chosen servants of God.
hil: Excluding the chosen servants of God.
compare: Excluding the chosen servants of God.

src: Wir werden es gewiß nicht betreten, bis sie aus ihm herausgehen.
ref: We will not enter it until they leave it.
draft: We certainly will not enter it until they come out of it.
hil: We certainly will not enter it until they come out of it.
compare: We certainly will not enter it until they come out of it.

src: Allah verfährt barmherzig mit euch.
ref: Surely God is compassionate to you.
draft: Allah deals mercifully with you.
hil: Allah deals mercifully with you.
compare: Allah deals mercifully with you.

src: Schau, wie Wir die einen von ihnen vor den anderen auszeichnen; aber das Jenseits ist wahrlich größer an Rangstufen und größer an Auszeichnungen.
ref: "See, how We favour one over the other; and in life to come are higher ranks and favours greater still.
draft: Look how We distinguish some of them above others; but the Hereafter is truly greater in degrees of rank and greater in distinction.
hil: Behold, how We distinguish some of them over others, but the Hereafter is truly greater in degrees of rank and greater in distinction.
compare: Look how We distinguish some of them above others; but the Hereafter is truly greater in degrees of rank and greater in distinction.

src: Beide rannten dann zur Tür und sie zerriß sein Hemd von hinten, dann stießen beide auf ihren Ehemann an der Tür.
ref: Both of them raced to the door, and she (grabbed and) rent his shirt from behind.
draft: Both then ran to the door and she tore his shirt from behind, then both stumbled upon their husband at the door.
hil: Both then ran to the door and she tore his shirt from behind, then both stumbled upon their husband at the door.
compare: Both then ran to the door and she tore his shirt from behind, then both stumbled upon their husband at the door.

src: DU bist Unser Maula, so leiste uns Beistand gegen die kufr-betreibenden Leute!"
ref: And help us against the people of the unbelievers.
draft: "You are our Maula, so assist us against the people who engage in kufr."
hil: You are Our Maula, so assist us against the people who engage in Kufr!
compare: "You are our Maula, so assist us against the people who engage in kufr."

src: Nein! Vielmehr haben Wir diesen da und ihren Vätern Nießbrauch gewährt, bis sie ein langes Leben geführt haben.
ref: We allowed them and their fathers time to enjoy till the very end of their lives.
draft: No! Rather, We have granted this one and their fathers the right of use until they have led a long life.
hil: Yea! We have granted this one and their fathers the right of use until they have led a long life.
compare: No! Rather, We have granted this one and their fathers the right of use until they have led a long life.

src: Als die Karawane aufgebrochen war, sprach ihr Vater: "Wahrlich, ich spüre den Geruch Yusufs, auch wenn ihr mich für schwachsinnig haltet."
ref: The caravan departed (from Egypt) and Jacob said (at home): "Say not that I am in my dotage, but I get the smell of Joseph."
draft: When the caravan had set out, her father spoke: "Truly, I sense the smell of Joseph, even if you think me foolish."
hil: When the caravan had set out, her father said, 'Verily, I can smell Joseph's scent, even if you think I'm crazy.'
compare: When the caravan had set out, her father spoke: "Truly, I sense the smell of Joseph, even if you think me foolish."

src: So ließ der Satan sie diesbezüglich Fehler begehen, so brachte er sie hinaus von dem, wo sie sich befanden. Und WIR sagten: "Steigt ab!
ref: Then the Satan caused the twain to slip on account thereof, and drave them forth from that which the twain were in.
draft: So the Satan let them make mistakes in this regard, so he brought them out from where they were. And WE said: "Get down!
hil: Thus Satan made them commit mistakes in this regard, and he led them away from where they were. And We said: 'Get down!'
compare: Thus Satan made them commit mistakes in this regard, and he led them away from where they were. And We said: 'Get down!'

src: Auch Musa wurde der Lüge bezichtigt, so gewährte ICH den Kafir noch längere Zeit, dann richtete ICH sie zugrunde.
ref: Moses was also accused of lies. So I allowed the infidels respite and then seized them.
draft: Also, Musa was accused of lying, so I granted the Kafir more time, then I destroyed them.
hil: Even Musa was accused of lying, so I granted the unbelievers more time, then I destroyed them.
compare: Even Musa was accused of lying, so I granted the unbelievers more time, then I destroyed them.

src: Aber sie verleugnen den Erbarmer.
ref: But they do not believe in Ar-Rahman.
draft: But they deny the Merciful.
hil: But they deny the Merciful.
compare: But they deny the Merciful.

src: Soll ich etwa andere außer Ihm zu Göttern nehmen?
ref: “What! Shall I appoint Gods other than Allah?
draft: Should I take others besides Him as gods?
hil: Should I take others as gods besides Him?
compare: Should I take others besides Him as gods?

src: Und bittet euren HERRN um Vergebung, dann seid Ihm gegenüber reumütig!
ref: "Beg your Lord to forgive you, and turn to Him.
draft: And ask your LORD for forgiveness, then be remorseful towards Him!
hil: And implore your Lord for forgiveness, then turn to Him in repentance. Surely, my Lord is Near, Responsive.
compare: And implore your Lord for forgiveness, then turn to Him in repentance. Surely, my Lord is Near, Responsive.

src: Alles geschieht zu einem vorbestimmten Termin.
ref: For every age there is a law.
draft: All happens at a predetermined time.
hil: Everything happens at a predetermined time.
compare: Everything happens at a predetermined time.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Bemüht euch eurer Verpflichtung ALLAH gegenüber nachzukommen und seid Zeugen in gerechter Weise!
ref: O you who believe, stand up as witnesses for God in all fairness, and do not let the hatred of a people deviate you from justice.
draft: You who have internalized the Imam! Strive to fulfill your obligation to ALLAH and be witnesses in a just manner!
hil: O People who have firmly established the commands of Allah! Give testimony with justice, and do not be tempted by the enmity of anyone to not do justice. Be just; that is nearer to piety. Fear Allah; indeed, Allah is well aware of your deeds.
compare: You who have internalized the Imam! Strive to fulfill your obligation to ALLAH and be witnesses in a just manner!

src: Darum wartet ab; seht, ich warte auch mit euch ab."
ref: So watch and wait (for the sign); I am waiting and expecting with you."
draft: Therefore wait; see, I also wait with you.
hil: Therefore, wait and see, I also wait with you.
compare: Therefore, wait and see, I also wait with you.

src: Dem Allvergebenden der Verfehlung und Dem Annehmenden der Reue, Dem Harten im Strafen, Dem mit den Wohltaten. Es gibt keine Gottheit außer Ihm. Zu Ihm ist das Werden.
ref: The Forgiver of sin, and the Most Acceptor of Repentance, the Severe in Punishing, the Greatly Rewarding; there is no God except Him; towards Him only is the return.
draft: To the All-Forgiving of faults and to the Accepting of repentance, to the severe in punishment, to the Bestower of favors. There is no deity except Him. To Him is the destination.
hil: To the All-Forgiving of faults and to the Accepting of repentance, to the severe in punishment, to the Bestower of favors. There is no god but Him. To Him is the return.
compare: To the All-Forgiving of faults and to the Accepting of repentance, to the severe in punishment, to the Bestower of favors. There is no god but Him. To Him is the return.

src: Allah ist dessen, was ihr tut, Kundig.
ref: This will absolve you of some of your sins; and God is cognisant of all you do.
draft: Allah is knowledgeable of what you do.
hil: Allah is aware of what you do.
compare: Allah is knowledgeable of what you do.

src: Diejenigen aber, die glauben und die guten Werke tun, befinden sich in den Gärten des Paradieses. Sie haben bei ihrem Herrn, was sie wollen.
ref: And those who believe and work righteous works will be in meadows of the Gardens theirs will be whatsoever they list, in the presence of their Lord.
draft: But those who believe and do good deeds are in the Gardens of Paradise. They have with their Lord what they desire.
hil: But those who believe and do good deeds, for them are Gardens beneath which rivers flow. They have with their Lord whatever they desire.
compare: But those who believe and do good deeds, for them are Gardens beneath which rivers flow. They have with their Lord whatever they desire.

src: Derjenige, den Allah rechtleitet, ist auf dem rechten Weg. Diejenigen aber, die Er irreführt, sind wahrlich jene, die verloren haben.
ref: He alone is guided whom God shows the way; and whom He leads astray is surely lost.
draft: The one whom Allah guides is on the right path. But those whom He leads astray, those are the ones who are lost.
hil: Whomever Allah guides is on the right path. And whomever He sends astray, these are the losers.
compare: The one whom Allah guides is on the right path. But those whom He leads astray, those are the ones who are lost.

src: Ihr wendet euch jedoch davon ab.
ref: To which you pay no heed.
draft: You, however, turn away from it.
hil: "Believers, however, turn away from it."
compare: You, however, turn away from it.

src: Siehst du!
ref: What thinkest thou?
draft: You see!
hil: Do you see!
compare: You see!

src: Und sie ziehen sich den Zorn Allahs zu, und für sie ist die Armut vorgeschrieben, weil sie Allahs Zeichen verleugneten und die Propheten ungerechterweise ermordeten.
ref: That is because they have been disbelieving in the signs of Allah, and slaying the prophets without justice.
draft: And they incur the wrath of Allah, and poverty is prescribed for them, because they denied Allah's signs and unjustly killed the prophets.
hil: And they incur the wrath of Allah, and poverty is prescribed for them, because they denied Allah's signs and unjustly killed the prophets.
compare: And they incur the wrath of Allah, and poverty is prescribed for them, because they denied Allah's signs and unjustly killed the prophets.

src: Allah weiß, was ihr offen tut und was ihr heimlich tut.
ref: God knows what you reveal and what you hide.
draft: Allah knows what you do openly and what you do in secret.
hil: Allah knows what you do openly and in secret.
compare: Allah knows what you do openly and what you do in secret.

src: Am Tag, da du siehst, wie den gläubigen Männern und den gläubigen Frauen ihr Licht vor ihnen und zu ihrer Rechten eilt: «Eine frohe Botschaft für euch heute: Gärten, unter denen Bäche fließen; darin werdet ihr ewig weilen. Das ist der großartige Erfolg.»
ref: The day when you will see the believing men and believing women, that their light runs before them and on their right – it being said to them, “This day, the best tidings for you are the Gardens beneath which rivers flow – abide in it forever; this is the greatest success.”
draft: On the day you see the faithful men and the faithful women, their light proceeding before them and to their right, [it will be said], "Your good tidings today are [of] gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein you will abide eternally." That is what is the great attainment.
hil: On the day when you see the believing men and believing women, their light proceeding before them and on their right, [it will be said], 'This is good news for you today: gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein you will abide eternally.' That is the great attainment.
compare: On the day you see the faithful men and the faithful women, their light proceeding before them and to their right, [it will be said], "Your good tidings today are [of] gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein you will abide eternally." That is what is the great attainment.

src: (Andere) sagten: "Euer Herr kennt die (Zeit), die ihr verbracht habt, am besten.
ref: "Your Lord knows best," they said, "how long you have stayed.
draft: (Andere) said: "Your Lord knows best the (time) you spent."
hil: (Others) said: Your Lord knows best the (time) you have spent.
compare: (Others) said: Your Lord knows best the (time) you have spent.

src: ER ist Derjenige, Der euch die Nacht einrichtete, um darin zu ruhen, sowie den Tag mit Licht.
ref: It is He who made the night for you to rest, and made the day enlightening.
draft: He is the one who designed the night for you to rest in and the day with light.
hil: He is the One who created the night for you to rest and the day with light.
compare: He is the One who created the night for you to rest and the day with light.

src: Da erhörten Wir ihn und schenkten ihm Jahya und heilten seine Frau.
ref: So We heard him and gave him John, and cured his wife (of barrenness).
draft: We heard him and gave him Yahya and healed his wife.
hil: So, we heard his prayer and gave him Yahya, and healed his wife
compare: So, we heard his prayer and gave him Yahya, and healed his wife

src: Esst von den Tay-yibat und tut gottgefällig Gutes!
ref: Eat of the Taiyibat [all kinds of Halal (legal) foods which Allah has made legal (meat of slaughtered eatable animals, milk products, fats, vegetables, fruits, etc.], and do righteous deeds.
draft: Eat from the Tay-yibat and do good deeds pleasing to Allah!
hil: Eat from the good things and do good deeds pleasing to God!
compare: Eat from the good things and do good deeds pleasing to God!

src: Und sie sagen: «O weh uns! Das ist der Tag des Gerichtes!»
ref: And they will say: Ah! woe be Unto us! this is the Day of Requital.
draft: And they say: "Woe to us! This is the day of judgment!"
hil: And they say: 'Alas, woe to us! This is the day of judgment!'
compare: And they say: 'Alas, woe to us! This is the day of judgment!'

src: Auf Ihn ver lassen sich diejenigen, die sich (überhaupt auf jemanden) verlassen.
ref: The trusting place their trust in Him."
draft: Those who rely on someone at all rely on him.
hil: Those who rely on anyone at all rely on Him.
compare: Those who rely on anyone at all rely on Him.

src: Und wen ALLAH irre gehen läßt, für den wirst du keinen Weg (zum Iman) finden.
ref: For them who are not given the guidance by God, you will never find a way.
draft: And whoever ALLAH misleads, you will not find a way (to Iman) for him.
hil: And whom Allah misguides, you will not find a way (to Iman) for him.
compare: And whoever ALLAH misleads, you will not find a way (to Iman) for him.

src: Solcherart erwecken WIR die Toten, damit ihr euch entsinnt.
ref: Similarly, We shall raise up the dead, so that you may remember or take heed.
draft: We awaken the dead in this way so that you can remember.
hil: Thus do We revive the dead that you may remember
compare: Thus do We revive the dead that you may remember

src: ALLAH gehört alles, was in den Himmeln und was auf Erden ist. Und gewiß, bereits haben WIR denjenigen, denen die Schrift vor euch zuteil wurde, sowie euch angewiesen: "Handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber! Und solltet ihr Kufr betreiben, so gehört ALLAH gewiß alles, was in den Himmeln und was auf Erden ist." Und ALLAH bleibt immer absolut autark, alllobenswürdig.
ref: And to Allah only belongs all whatever is in the heavens and all whatever is in the earth; and indeed We have commanded those who received the Books before you, and commanded you, that keep fearing Allah; and if you disbelieve, undoubtedly to Allah only belongs all whatever is in the heavens and all whatever is in the earth; and Allah is Independent, Worthy Of All Praise.
draft: ALLAH owns everything in the heavens and on earth. And indeed, We have already instructed those to whom the Scripture was given before you, as well as you yourselves, to fear Allah. And if you disbelieve - indeed, Allah is Free from need and Praiseworthy.
hil: Allah owns everything in the heavens and on earth. Indeed, we have already instructed those to whom the scripture was given before you, as well as you, to fear Allah. And if you disbelieve, Allah surely possesses everything in the heavens and on earth. And Allah always remains absolutely self-sufficient and praiseworthy.
compare: ALLAH owns everything in the heavens and on earth. And indeed, We have already instructed those to whom the Scripture was given before you, as well as you yourselves, to fear Allah. And if you disbelieve - indeed, Allah is Free from need and Praiseworthy.

src: Dann sing das Lob deines Herrn und bitte Ihn um Vergebung. Siehe, Er wendet sich gnädig wieder zu.
ref: Then proclaim the Purity of your Lord while praising Him, and seek forgiveness from Him; indeed He is the Most Acceptor of Repentance.
draft: Then sing the praise of your Lord and ask Him for forgiveness. Behold, He turns graciously back to you.
hil: Then glorify your Lord and seek His forgiveness. Verily, He turns mercifully towards you.
compare: Then sing the praise of your Lord and ask Him for forgiveness. Behold, He turns graciously back to you.

src: Das sind die, von denen Gott weiß, was in ihrem Herzen ist. Wende dich von ihnen ab, ermahne sie und sprich zu ihnen über sie selbst eindringliche Worte.
ref: The secrets of their hearts are well known to Allah; so avoid them and explain to them, and speak to them clearly in their affairs.
draft: These are the ones of whom God knows what is in their hearts. Turn away from them, admonish them, and speak to them penetrating words about themselves.
hil: These are the ones of whom God knows what is in their hearts. Turn away from them, admonish them, and speak to them penetrating words about themselves.
compare: These are the ones of whom God knows what is in their hearts. Turn away from them, admonish them, and speak to them penetrating words about themselves.

src: Er hat doch einen Vater, der ein Greis ist, so nimm einen von uns an seiner Stelle fest.
ref: Verily, he has an old father (who will grieve for him); so take one of us in his place.
draft: He does have a father who is an old man, so take one of us instead of him.
hil: He does have a father who is an old man, so take one of us instead of him.
compare: He does have a father who is an old man, so take one of us instead of him.

src: Aber nein, er ist mit der Wahrheit gekommen und hat die Gesandten bestätigt.
ref: Not in the least. He has brought the truth and confirmed the other messengers.
draft: But no, he came with the truth and confirmed the messengers.
hil: "But no, he came with the truth and confirmed the messengers."
compare: "But no, he came with the truth and confirmed the messengers."

src: Und sie fragen dich nach Dhul-qarnain.
ref: They will question thee concerning Dhool Karnain.
draft: And they ask you about Dhul-qarnain.
hil: And they ask you about Dhul-qarnain.
compare: And they ask you about Dhul-qarnain.

src: Fir'auns und der Tamud?
ref: Of Pharaoh and Thamud come to you?
draft: Fir'aun's and the Tamud?
hil: "Fir'aun's and the Tamud?"
compare: "Fir'aun's and the Tamud?"

src: Also wenn die Augen strahlen,
ref: Yet when the eyes are dazzled,
draft: So when the eyes sparkle,
hil: So when the eyes sparkle,
compare: So when the eyes sparkle,

src: Diese haben ihre Belohnung bei ihrem HERRN. Gewiß, ALLAH ist schnell im Zur-Rechenschaft-Ziehen.
ref: Their reward is verily with their Lord; and swift is the reckoning of God!
draft: These have their reward with their Lord. Verily, Allah is swift in reckoning.
hil: These will receive their reward from their Lord. Indeed, Allah is swift in accountability.
compare: These have their reward with their Lord. Verily, Allah is swift in reckoning.

src: Sag: O ihr Menschen, wenn ihr über meine Religion im Zweifel seid, so diene ich nicht denjenigen, denen ihr anstatt Allahs dient, sondern ich diene Allah, Der euch abberuft.
ref: Say (O Muhammad SAW): "O you mankind! If you are in doubt as to my religion (Islam), then (know that) I will never worship those whom you worship, besides Allah.
draft: Say: O mankind, if you are in doubt about my religion, then I do not serve those whom you serve instead of Allah, but I serve Allah, who recalls you.
hil: Say: O people, if you are in doubt about my religion, I do not serve those whom you serve instead of Allah, but I serve Allah, who recalls you.
compare: Say: O people, if you are in doubt about my religion, I do not serve those whom you serve instead of Allah, but I serve Allah, who recalls you.

src: Und dies zum Schutz vor jedem rebellischen Satan.
ref: Protecting them against every wayward devil,
draft: And this is to protect against every rebellious Satan.
hil: "And this is [done] to protect against every rebellious Satan."
compare: "And this is [done] to protect against every rebellious Satan."

src: Und WIR umhüllten ihre Herzen mit Bedeckung, damit sie ihn nicht begreifen, und machten ihre Ohren schwerhörig.
ref: And We put covers over their hearts and deafness in their ears that they should not understand it.
draft: And WE covered their hearts with coverings, so they could not comprehend him, and made their ears heavy.
hil: But We cast veils over their hearts lest they should understand him, and in their ears there is heaviness; and if they see every sign they will not believe in it.
compare: But We cast veils over their hearts lest they should understand him, and in their ears there is heaviness; and if they see every sign they will not believe in it.

src: Als die Nacht über ihn hereinbrach, sah er einen Himmelskörper.
ref: Then when the night darkened on him, he beheld a star.
draft: When night fell upon him, he saw a celestial body.
hil: When the night fell upon him, he saw a celestial body.
compare: When night fell upon him, he saw a celestial body.

src: So machen Wir die Zeichen klar für ein Volk, das begreift.
ref: In this wise We detail the signs for a people who reflect.
draft: So we make the signs clear to a people who understand.
hil: That is how we make our signs clear to those who understand.
compare: That is how we make our signs clear to those who understand.

src: Und die Berge, die du für fest hältst, wirst du wie Wolken dahingehen sehen: Das (ist das) Werk Allahs, Der alles vollendet hat.
ref: You will see the mountains and think they are firmly planted, but they will pass away like flying clouds: Artistry of God who perfected everything.
draft: And the mountains that you deem to be firm, shall be made to pass away as the passing of the clouds: the work of Allah, Who perfected all things surely.
hil: And those mountains that you consider to be firm, you will see them passing away like clouds: this is the doing of Allah who accomplished everything.
compare: And those mountains that you consider to be firm, you will see them passing away like clouds: this is the doing of Allah who accomplished everything.

src: Ist nicht zu ihnen der deutliche Beweis dessen gekommen, was in den früheren Blättern steht?
ref: Have not clear proofs come to them in what is contained in the earlier Books?
draft: Hasn't the clear proof of what is written in the earlier papers come to them?
hil: "Has not the clear proof of what is written in the earlier writings come to them?"
compare: Hasn't the clear proof of what is written in the earlier papers come to them?

src: Als sie dann vor ihn (Yusuf) traten, da sagten sie: "O `Aziz, die Not hat uns und unsere Familie geschlagen, und wir haben Ware von geringem Wert mitgebracht; so gib uns das volle Maß und sei wohltätig gegen uns. Wahrlich, Allah belohnt die Wohltätigen."
ref: Then when they reached in the company of Yusuf they said, “O governor! Calamity has struck us and our household, and we have brought goods of little value, so give us the full measure and be generous to us; undoubtedly Allah rewards the generous.”
draft: When they stood before him (Joseph), they said: "O `Aziz! Hardship has afflicted us and our family, and we have brought measly currency, so give us full measure and be charitable to us. Truly, Allah rewards those who are charitable."
hil: When they stood before him (Joseph), they said, 'O Minister! Hardship has afflicted us and our family, and we have brought measly currency. So give us full measure and be charitable to us. Truly, Allah rewards those who are charitable.'
compare: When they stood before him (Joseph), they said, 'O Minister! Hardship has afflicted us and our family, and we have brought measly currency. So give us full measure and be charitable to us. Truly, Allah rewards those who are charitable.'

src: Sie sagten: "Bitte für uns deinen Herrn, uns Klarheit zu geben, wie sie sein soll! Die Kühe erscheinen uns (alle) ähnlich.
ref: "Call on your Lord," they said, "to name its variety, as cows be all alike to us.
draft: They said, "Please ask your Lord to clarify for us what she should be like! The cows appear similar to us (all).
hil: They said, 'Oh Lord, give us clarity as to how she should be! The cows all look the same to us.'
compare: They said, "Please ask your Lord to clarify for us what she should be like! The cows appear similar to us (all).

src: Der Tag der Entscheidung ist wahrlich die festgesetzte Zeit für sie alle
ref: The Day of Judgement is your promised day of meeting,
draft: The Day of Judgment is truly the appointed time for them all.
hil: The Day of Judgement is truly the appointed time for them all.
compare: The Day of Judgment is truly the appointed time for them all.

src: (Es ist) die Befreiung eines Sklaven
ref: To free a neck (from the burden of debt or slavery),
draft: The liberation of a slave.
hil: The freeing of a slave.
compare: The liberation of a slave.

src: Es ziemt dem Allerbarmer nicht, Sich Kinder zu nehmen.
ref: When it does not behove the Merciful to have a son.
draft: It is not fitting for the Most Merciful to have children.
hil: It is not befitting for the Most Merciful to take children unto Himself.
compare: It is not fitting for the Most Merciful to have children.

src: Aber niemals werden sie ihn sich wünschen wegen dessen, was ihre Hände vorausgeschickt haben.
ref: And they will never wish there for, because of that which their hands have sent forward.
draft: But they will never wish for it because of what their hands have sent ahead.
hil: But they will never wish for it because of what their hands have sent ahead.
compare: But they will never wish for it because of what their hands have sent ahead.

src: Ist es nur eine, soll sie die Hälfte haben.
ref: If there is only one, she gets one-half.
draft: If there is only one, she should have half.
hil: If there is only one, she should have half.
compare: If there is only one, she should have half.

src: Und sollte eine Schwerbelastete um (die Entlastung von) ihrer Last rufen, der (Gerufene) wird (ihr) davon nichts abnehmen, und selbst dann nicht, wäre er von den Nahverwandten.
ref: Even if one weighted down calls for help with its burden, nothing can be lifted from it, even if they were related.
draft: And if a heavily burdened person calls for (relief from) their burden, the (called upon) will not take any of it away from them, not even if they were close relatives.
hil: And if someone heavily burdened calls for relief from their burden, the person called upon will not take any of it away from them, not even if they were close relatives.
compare: And if a heavily burdened person calls for (relief from) their burden, the (called upon) will not take any of it away from them, not even if they were close relatives.

src: Allah ist Allhörend, Allsehend.
ref: Truly, Allah is Ever All-Hearer, All-Seer.
draft: Allah is all-hearing, all-seeing.
hil: Allah is All-Hearing, All-Seeing.
compare: Allah is all-hearing, all-seeing.

src: Und wir haben bestimmt gesündigt.»
ref: We were definitely in the wrong.”
draft: "And we have certainly sinned."
hil: "And we certainly have sinned."
compare: "And we have certainly sinned."

src: Allah wird euer Tun sehen, und (auch) Sein Gesandter und die Gläubigen.
ref: Allah will see your deeds, and (so will) His Messenger and the believers.
draft: "Allah will see your actions, and (also) His Messenger and the believers."
hil: God will see your conduct, and so will His Apostle and the faithful; for you will in the end go back to Him, who knows the unknown and the known, who will tell you of what you were doing.
compare: "Allah will see your actions, and (also) His Messenger and the believers."

src: Und bestimme für uns im Diesseits Gutes, und auch im Jenseits.
ref: Enjoin for us good in the world, and good in the world to come.
draft: And determine good for us in this world, and also in the hereafter.
hil: Determine good for us in this world, and also in the Hereafter.
compare: Determine good for us in this world, and also in the Hereafter.

src: Allah schämt Sich nicht, ein Gleichnis auch nur mit einer Mücke oder mit etwas darüber (hinaus) zu prägen. Was nun diejenigen angeht, die glauben, so wissen sie, daß es die Wahrheit von ihrem Herrn ist. Was aber diejenigen angeht, die ungläubig sind, so sagen sie: "Was will denn Allah damit als Gleichnis?" Er läßt damit viele in die Irre gehen und leitet viele damit recht, doch läßt Er damit nur die Frevler in die Irre gehen,
ref: Surely Allah is not ashamed to set forth any parable-- (that of) a gnat or any thing above that; then as for those who believe, they know that it is the truth from their Lord, and as for those who disbelieve, they say: What is it that Allah means by this parable: He causes many to err by it and many He leads aright by it! but He does not cause to err by it (any) except the transgressors,
draft: Allah is not ashamed to use even a mosquito (or something above it) as an example. As for those who believe, they know it is the truth from their Lord. But as for those who disbelieve, they ask, "What does Allah mean by this parable?" It is He who lets many go astray and leads many aright, but it is only the evildoers who go astray.
hil: Allah is not ashamed to use even a mosquito (or something above it) as an example. As for those who believe, they know it is the truth from their Lord. But as for those who disbelieve, they say, 'What does Allah mean by this parable?' He leads many astray and guides many aright by it, but it is only the evildoers He leads astray.
compare: Allah is not ashamed to use even a mosquito (or something above it) as an example. As for those who believe, they know it is the truth from their Lord. But as for those who disbelieve, they ask, "What does Allah mean by this parable?" It is He who lets many go astray and leads many aright, but it is only the evildoers who go astray.

src: Diejenigen aber, die ungläubig waren, (bekommen zu hören): «Sind euch nicht meine Zeichen immer wieder verlesen worden?
ref: As for the infidels, (it will be said): "Were not My messages read out to you?
draft: But those who were unbelievers, (hear): "Have not my signs been recited to you again and again?"
hil: But those who were unbelievers, (hear): 'Have not my signs been recited to you again and again?'
compare: But those who were unbelievers, (hear): "Have not my signs been recited to you again and again?"

src: Die, denen ihr anstelle Gottes dient, können euch keinen Lebensunterhalt bringen.
ref: Surely those you worship other than God have no power over your means of livelihood.
draft: The ones you serve instead of God cannot provide you a livelihood.
hil: Those whom you serve instead of God cannot bring you any sustenance.
compare: Those whom you serve instead of God cannot bring you any sustenance.

src: Und den, dem Wir ein langes Leben geben, setzen wir körperlichem Verfall aus.
ref: Whoever reaches old age, We reverse in natural disposition.
draft: And to those to whom We grant long life, We expose them to physical deterioration.
hil: And whomever We bring to an old age, We reverse him in creation; do they not understand?
compare: And to those to whom We grant long life, We expose them to physical deterioration.

src: Diejenigen, die den ehrbaren Ehefrauen (Untreue) vorwerfen und hierauf nicht vier Zeugen beibringen, die geißelt mit achtzig Hieben und nehmt von ihnen niemals mehr eine Zeugenaussage an - das sind die (wahren) Frevler -,
ref: Those who defame chaste women and do not bring four witnesses should be punished with eighty lashes, and their testimony should not be accepted afterwards, for they are profligates,
draft: Those who accuse honorable wives of (infidelity) and do not bring four witnesses to support it, flog them with eighty lashes and never again accept their testimony - those are the (true) wrongdoers -
hil: Those who accuse honorable wives of (infidelity) and do not bring four witnesses to support it, flog them with eighty lashes and never again accept their testimony - they are the wrongdoers -
compare: Those who accuse honorable wives of (infidelity) and do not bring four witnesses to support it, flog them with eighty lashes and never again accept their testimony - those are the (true) wrongdoers -

src: Und verzehrt ihn nicht maßlos und ihrem Erwachsenwerden zuvorkommend.
ref: And do not consume it extravagantly or hastily before they grow up.
draft: And do not consume it excessively, and anticipate their growing up.
hil: Do not consume it excessively, and anticipate their coming of age.
compare: Do not consume it excessively, and anticipate their coming of age.

src: Alsdann sagte einer von ihnen: "Tötet Yusuf nicht, sondern werft ihn in die Tiefe des Brunnens hinein, so finden ihn einige Reisende, solltet ihr dies tun wollen."
ref: One of them said: "If you must do so, then do not kill Joseph, but throw him into an unused well. Some passing caravan may rescue him."
draft: Then one of them said, "Do not kill Yusuf, but throw him into the depths of the well, so that some travelers may find him, if you are determined to do this."
hil: Then one of them said, 'Do not kill Yusuf, but cast him into the bottom of the dark pit, so that some travelers may find him, if you are determined to do this.'
compare: Then one of them said, "Do not kill Yusuf, but throw him into the depths of the well, so that some travelers may find him, if you are determined to do this."

src: Erklärt nicht für haram die Tay-yibat dessen, was ALLAH euch für halal erklärte, und übertretet nicht!
ref: Make not unlawful the Taiyibat (all that is good as regards foods, things, deeds, beliefs, persons, etc.) which Allah has made lawful to you, and transgress not.
draft: Do not declare the Tay-yibat of what ALLAH has declared halal to you as haram, and do not transgress!
hil: Do not declare as haram the Tay-yibat which ALLAH has declared halal to you, and do not transgress!
compare: Do not declare the Tay-yibat of what ALLAH has declared halal to you as haram, and do not transgress!

src: Und sie erkundigen sich bei dir: "Ist es wahr?"
ref: Yet they want to be informed if it is true.
draft: And they inquire with you: "Is it true?"
hil: "And they inquire with you, 'Is it true?'".
compare: And they inquire with you: "Is it true?"

src: Eine Gruppe davon pflegte er zu unterdrücken, indem er ihre Söhne erschlug und ihre Frauen leben ließ.
ref: He persecuted a group of them, slaughtering their sons, while sparing their daughters.
draft: One group of them, he used to suppress by killing their sons and letting their wives live.
hil: He used to oppress one group of them by killing their sons and sparing their women.
compare: He used to oppress one group of them by killing their sons and sparing their women.

src: Ein Buch, dessen Zeichen im einzelnen dargelegt sind, als arabischer Koran, für Leute, die Bescheid wissen,
ref: A Book whose verses have been distinguished and explained, a lucid discourse for people who understand,
draft: A book, whose characters are explained in detail, like an Arabic Quran, for people who are knowledgeable.
hil: That is how We explain Our signs in detail to those who know, like an Arabic Quran.
compare: A book, whose characters are explained in detail, like an Arabic Quran, for people who are knowledgeable.

src: Und sie fragen dich nach einer Fatwa, sag: "ALLAH gibt euch Fatwa hinsichtlich der Kalala. Wenn ein Mensch stirbt, ohne daß er Kinder (oder Eltern), aber eine Schwester (väterlicherseits) hinterläßt, so bekommt sie die Hälfte dessen, was er hinterläßt, und er beerbt sie, wenn sie keine Kinder (oder Eltern) hinterläßt.
ref: They ask you for a ruling. Say, ‘Allah gives you a ruling concerning the kalalah: If a man dies and has no children [or parents], but has a sister, for her shall be a half of what he leaves, and he shall inherit from her if she has no children.
draft: And they ask you for a fatwa, say: "ALLAH gives you fatwa regarding kalala. If a person dies without leaving children (or parents), but leaving behind a sister (paternally), then she receives half of what he leaves behind, and he inherits her if she does not leave behind children (or parents)."
hil: And when they ask you for a fatwa, say: "ALLAH gives you a directive regarding Kalala. If a person dies leaving behind no children (or parents) but a sister from the father's side, she will receive half of what he has left behind, and he will inherit her, if she does not leave behind any children (or parents)."
compare: And when they ask you for a fatwa, say: "ALLAH gives you a directive regarding Kalala. If a person dies leaving behind no children (or parents) but a sister from the father's side, she will receive half of what he has left behind, and he will inherit her, if she does not leave behind any children (or parents)."

src: Laß die Ungläubigen nicht meinen, sie hätten (Uns) übertroffen.
ref: The infidels should not think that they can bypass (the law of God).
draft: Let not the disbelievers think they can outstrip (Allah, or defeat His purpose).
hil: Do not let the disbelievers think that they have surpassed us.
compare: Do not let the disbelievers think that they have surpassed us.

src: "Yusuf, du Wahrhaftiger! Gib uns eine Antwort über sieben fette Kühe, die von sieben mageren Kühen gefressen werden, und über sieben grüne Ähren und (sieben) andere Vertrocknete, vielleicht kehre ich zu den Menschen zurück, vielleicht wissen sie es dann."
ref: (And coming to the prison) he said: "O Joseph the truthful, tell us (the meaning of) seven fat cows being devoured by seven lean ones, and seven green ears of corn and seven seared, that I may go back to the people and tell them."
draft: "Yusuf, you truthful one! Give us an answer regarding seven fat cows that are being eaten by seven lean cows, and regarding seven green ears of corn and (seven) others that are withered. Perhaps I will return to the people, perhaps then they will know it."
hil: Yusuf, O truthful one! Give us an answer regarding seven fat cows that are being eaten by seven lean cows, and regarding seven green ears of corn and (seven) others that are withered. Perhaps I will return to the people, and then they will know it.
compare: "Yusuf, you truthful one! Give us an answer regarding seven fat cows that are being eaten by seven lean cows, and regarding seven green ears of corn and (seven) others that are withered. Perhaps I will return to the people, perhaps then they will know it."

src: Ihr dient anstatt Allahs nur Götzen und schafft (dabei nur) ungeheuerliche Lüge. Gewiß, diejenigen, denen ihr anstatt Allahs dient, vermögen euch nicht zu versor gen.
ref: You only serve, apart from God, idols and you create a calumny; those you serve, apart from God, have no power to provide for you.
draft: You serve only idols instead of Allah and (in doing so) create only enormous lies. Surely, those whom you serve instead of Allah cannot provide for you.
hil: Say: 'Believe in Allah or not, (it does not matter to Us)!' Indeed, those to whom knowledge has been given before it, when it is recited to them, bow in adoration. Surely, those whom you serve instead of Allah cannot provide for you.
compare: You serve only idols instead of Allah and (in doing so) create only enormous lies. Surely, those whom you serve instead of Allah cannot provide for you.

src: Auf Ihn vertraue ich.
ref: In Him I have put my trust.
draft: I trust him.
hil: I trust in Him.
compare: I trust him.

src: (Und auch) acht Tiere zu Paaren: von den Schafen zwei und von den Ziegen zwei. - Sprich: Sind es die beiden Männchen, die Er verboten hat, oder die beiden Weibchen, oder was der Leib der beiden Weibchen enthält?
ref: There are eight pairs, two of the species of sheep and two of goats. Ask them which has He forbidden, the two males or the two females, or what the females carry in their wombs?
draft: (And also) eight animals into pairs: two from the sheep and two from the goats. - Say: Are they the two males that He prohibited, or the two females, or what the bodies of the two females contain?
hil: And also eight animals into pairs: two from the sheep and two from the goats. Say: Are they the two males that He prohibited, or the two females, or what the bodies of the two females contain?
compare: (And also) eight animals into pairs: two from the sheep and two from the goats. - Say: Are they the two males that He prohibited, or the two females, or what the bodies of the two females contain?

src: Dieser (Quran) ist nichts als eine Ermahnung für die Welten.
ref: This is only a warning for mankind.
draft: This (Quran) is nothing but a reminder for the worlds.
hil: This (Quran) is nothing but a reminder for the worlds.
compare: This (Quran) is nothing but a reminder for the worlds.

src: Und den, der an Allah glaubt und recht handelt, wird Er in Gärten führen, durch die Bäche fließen, worin (er) auf ewig verweilen wird. Allah hat ihm wahrlich eine treffliche Versorgung gewährt.
ref: And those who believe in Allah and work righteousness, He will admit to Gardens beneath which Rivers flow, to dwell therein for ever: Allah has indeed granted for them a most excellent Provision.
draft: And whoever believes in Allah and acts rightly, He will lead him into gardens beneath which rivers flow, where he will remain forever. Allah has surely granted him an excellent provision.
hil: And those who believe in Allah and do righteous deeds, He will admit them into gardens with streams of running water where they will abide forever. Allah has indeed granted them a goodly provision.
compare: And whoever believes in Allah and acts rightly, He will lead him into gardens beneath which rivers flow, where he will remain forever. Allah has surely granted him an excellent provision.

src: Und sie sagen: "Er ist ja fürwahr besessen."
ref: They say: “Surely he is afflicted with madness”;
draft: And they say, "He is indeed possessed."
hil: And they said, 'He is indeed possessed.'
compare: And they said, 'He is indeed possessed.'

src: Gewiß, ALLAH ist allumfassend, allwissend.
ref: Allah is All-Sufficient for His creatures' needs, All-Knowing.
draft: Sure, ALLAH is comprehensive, all-knowing.
hil: Verily, Allah is all-encompassing, all-knowing.
compare: Verily, Allah is all-encompassing, all-knowing.

src: So machten Wir es zu einem warnenden Beispiel für die Zeitgenossen und die Nachfolgenden und zu einer Ermahnung für die Gottesfürchtigen.
ref: And whom We made an example for the people (of the day) and those after them, and warning for those who fear God.
draft: So we made it a warning example for contemporaries and followers and a admonition for the God-fearing.
hil: Thus, We made it a warning example for contemporaries, followers, and a reminder for the God-fearing.
compare: Thus, We made it a warning example for contemporaries, followers, and a reminder for the God-fearing.

src: (Damals als Allah sie dir in deinem Traum in geringer Anzahl zeigte; und hätte Er sie dir in großer Anzahl gezeigt, wäret ihr sicherlich Versager und über die Sache uneins gewesen; Allah aber bewahrte (euch davor); wahrlich, Er kennt wohl, was in den Herzen ist.
ref: God showed (the Makkans) to be few in your dream, for if He had shown them to be many you would surely have lost courage and disagreed about the (wisdom) of the battle. But God spared you this, for He surely knows what is in the hearts of men.
draft: Back when Allah showed them to you in your dream in small numbers; and if He had shown them to you in large numbers, you would certainly have failed and disagreed about the matter; but Allah saved you from that; surely, He knows well what is in the hearts.
hil: Back when God showed them to you as few in your dream, for if He had shown them to be many, you would surely have lost courage and disagreed about the (wisdom) of the matter. But God saved you from that battle, surely, He knows well what is in the hearts.
compare: Back when Allah showed them to you in your dream in small numbers; and if He had shown them to you in large numbers, you would certainly have failed and disagreed about the matter; but Allah saved you from that; surely, He knows well what is in the hearts.

src: Gewiß, für die Unrecht-Begehenden ist eine qualvolle Peinigung bestimmt.
ref: Verily, there is a painful torment for the Zalimun (polytheists and wrong-doers, etc.)."
draft: Surely, a painful punishment is intended for those who commit injustice.
hil: Surely, for those who commit injustice, a painful punishment is ordained.
compare: Surely, a painful punishment is intended for those who commit injustice.

src: Damit Gott einem jeden vergelte, was er erworben hat.
ref: That God may reward each soul for its deeds.
draft: So that God may reward everyone according to what he has earned.
hil: So that God may pay to each one fully what they have earned; and He knows best what they do.
compare: So that God may reward everyone according to what he has earned.

src: So erfolgt auch das Herauskommen.
ref: Even thus will be the life after death.
draft: So the coming out also takes place.
hil: Thus, the coming out also takes place.
compare: Thus, the coming out also takes place.

src: Und ER machte für euch Bekleidungen, die euch vor der Hitze schützen, und Bekleidungen, die euch vor eurer Gewalttätigkeit (gegeneinander) schützen.
ref: He has given you garments to protect you from the heat, and garments to protect you from your own violence.
draft: And HE made for you garments that protect you from the heat and garments that protect you from your violence (against each other).
hil: And HE made for you clothing to protect you from the heat, and clothing to protect you from your violence (towards each other).
compare: And HE made for you clothing to protect you from the heat, and clothing to protect you from your violence (towards each other).

src: Und wer von euch es vorsätzlich tötet, so ist die Vergeltung (dafür) Gleiches von den An'am wie das, was man getötet hat, - darüber befinden zwei Redliche von euch - als Hady-Opfertier, das bei der Ka'ba geopfert wird.
ref: Whoever of you kills any intentionally, its penalty shall be a domestic animal comparable to what he killed, as determined by two honest persons among you—an offering delivered to the Kaabah.
draft: And whoever intentionally kills it among you, then retribution is (required) like its kind from the sacrificial animals to be judged by two just men among you as an offering (to Allah) delivered to Ka'ba.
hil: If any of you kills intentionally (i.e. by design and not by accident), the compensation shall be a like animal from the grazing livestock (i.e. camels, cattle, and sheep), as determined by two just men among you as an offering delivered to (the Ka'ba in) Mecca.
compare: If any of you kills intentionally (i.e. by design and not by accident), the compensation shall be a like animal from the grazing livestock (i.e. camels, cattle, and sheep), as determined by two just men among you as an offering delivered to (the Ka'ba in) Mecca.

src: Das Gleichnis Seiner Erleuchtung ist wie eine Aushöhlung, in der eine Leuchte ist.
ref: The allegory of His light is that of a pillar on which is a lamp.
draft: The parable of His enlightenment is like a hollowing out in which there is a light."
hil: "The analogy of His enlightenment is like a hollowing out in which there is a light."
compare: "The analogy of His enlightenment is like a hollowing out in which there is a light."

src: Da erretteten Wir ihn und diejenigen, die mit ihm waren, im Schiff. Und Wir machten sie zu Nachfolgern und ließen diejenigen ertrinken, die Unsere Zeichen für Lüge erklärten.
ref: They denied him, but We delivered him, and those with him in the ship, and We made them generations replacing one after another, while We drowned those who belied Our Ayat (proofs, evidences, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.).
draft: We saved him and those who were with him in the ship. And We made them successors and made those who declared Our signs as lies drown.
hil: Thus We saved him and those with him in the ship, and made them successors, while We drowned those who denied Our signs. See, then, what was the end of those who had been warned!
compare: Thus We saved him and those with him in the ship, and made them successors, while We drowned those who denied Our signs. See, then, what was the end of those who had been warned!

src: Wie kann Ihm ein Sohn gehören, wo ER niemals eine Partnerin hatte und doch alles erschuf?! Und ER ist über alles allwissend.
ref: How can He have children when He has no wife? He created all things and He is the All-Knower of everything.
draft: How can he have a son when he never had a partner and yet created everything?! And he is omniscient above all.
hil: How can He have a son when HE never had a mate and yet created everything?! And HE is all-knowing about everything.
compare: How can He have a son when HE never had a mate and yet created everything?! And HE is all-knowing about everything.

src: Sowie die Bewohner von Madyan. Auch Musa wurde der Lüge bezichtigt, so gewährte ICH den Kafir noch längere Zeit, dann richtete ICH sie zugrunde.
