draft: And mention Ishmael in the scripture. Indeed, he was true to his promise and he was a messenger, a prophet.
hil: And mention Ishmael in the scripture. Surely, he was truthful in promise and was a messenger, a prophet.
compare: And mention Ishmael in the scripture. Indeed, he was true to his promise and he was a messenger, a prophet.

src: Oder (sind jene sicher davor,) daß Er sie nicht durch vorgewarnte Vernichtung erfaßt? Euer Herr ist wahrlich Gütig Barmherzig.
ref: Or, that he will not take hold of them by giving them a fright? verily thy Lord is Kind, Merciful.
draft: Or (are those secure from the) that He not seize them by a sudden seizure? Indeed, your Lord is Kind, Merciful.
hil: Or are those secure from that He not seize them by a sudden seizure, such as the one that seized the communities before them, except that they submit to Allah's will? Your Lord is truly Compassionate and Merciful to the people.
compare: Or are those secure from that He not seize them by a sudden seizure, such as the one that seized the communities before them, except that they submit to Allah's will? Your Lord is truly Compassionate and Merciful to the people.

src: Und Allah hat euch aus Erde erschaffen, dann aus einem Samentropfen, dann machte Er euch zu Paaren. Und kein weibliches Wesen wird schwanger oder entbindet ohne Sein Wissen.
ref: God has created you from dust, then from a drop of semen and then divided you into pairs; no female conceives or gives birth without His knowledge; and no one's life is prolonged or shortened, but it is recorded in a Book.
draft: And Allah created you from earth, then from a drop of semen, then made you into pairs. And no female being becomes pregnant or gives birth without His knowledge.
hil: And Allah created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop, then made you pairs. And no female conceives or gives birth without His knowledge.
compare: And Allah created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop, then made you pairs. And no female conceives or gives birth without His knowledge.

src: Und wenn sie ein Zeichen sehen, so verdrehen sie es zu Spott
ref: When they see a sign, they laugh at it,
draft: And when they see a sign, they turn it into mockery.
hil: But when they see a sign, they twist it into mockery.
compare: And when they see a sign, they turn it into mockery.

src: Belehrt hat ihn der Besitzer starker Kräfte,
ref: Bestowed on him by the Supreme Intellect,
draft: The owner of strong powers has taught him.
hil: The owner of strong powers has taught him.
compare: The owner of strong powers has taught him.

src: Und ALLAH ist über das, was ihr tut, allwissend.
ref: God is aware of what you do.
draft: And ALLAH is knowledgeable about what you do.
hil: And Allah is well aware of what you do.
compare: And Allah is well aware of what you do.

src: Sie sagten: "O Moses, siehe, dort lebt ein tyrannisches Volk, und wir werden es (das Land) nicht betreten, ehe jene es nicht verlassen haben.
ref: They said: "O Moses, in that land live a people who are formidable; we shall never go there until they leave.
draft: They said: "O Moses, behold, there is a tyrannical people living there, and we will not enter it (the land) until they have left it.
hil: They said, 'O Moses, behold, there is a tyrannical people living there, and we will not enter it (the land) until they have left it.'
compare: They said: "O Moses, behold, there is a tyrannical people living there, and we will not enter it (the land) until they have left it.

src: Was dich an Gutem traf, dies ist von ALLAH. Und was dich an Unglück traf, dies ist aufgrund eigener (Verfehlungen).
ref: What comes to you of good is verily from God; and what comes to you of ill is from your own self (your actions).
draft: "What happened to you in terms of good, this is from Allah. And what happened to you in terms of misfortune, this is due to your own (mistakes)."
hil: What befell you in terms of goodness is from ALLAH. And what befell you in terms of misfortune is due to your own mistakes.
compare: What befell you in terms of goodness is from ALLAH. And what befell you in terms of misfortune is due to your own mistakes.

src: Und zu Uns führt der Lebensweg.
ref: To Us is the arrival.
draft: And the path of life leads us to Us.
hil: "And the path of life leads us to Us."
compare: And the path of life leads us to Us.

src: Das ist die Ermahnung derer, die mit mir sind, und die Ermahnung derer, die vor mir lebten. Aber die meisten von ihnen kennen die Wahrheit nicht, so wenden sie sich ab.
ref: Say, “Bring your proof; this is the remembrance of those with me and those before me”; but in fact most of them do not know the Truth, so they turn away.
draft: "This is the exhortation of those who are with me, and the exhortation of those who lived before me. But most of them do not know the truth, so they turn away."
hil: "Have you not considered the teachings of those who are with me and the teachings of those who lived before me? However, most of them do not know the truth and so they turn away."
compare: "This is the exhortation of those who are with me, and the exhortation of those who lived before me. But most of them do not know the truth, so they turn away."

src: Gewiß, manches Spekulieren ist eine Verfehlung.
ref: And spy not, neither backbite one another.
draft: Certainly, some speculating is a transgression.
hil: Indeed, some speculating is a transgression.
compare: Indeed, some speculating is a transgression.

src: Er sprach: "lch bin der Bote deines Herrn.
ref: If thou fearest God...
draft: He said, "I am the messenger of your lord."
hil: He said, 'I am the messenger of your lord.'
compare: He said, "I am the messenger of your lord."

src: Und sie folgten dem, was die Satane während der Herrschaft Salomos vortrugen; doch nicht Salomo war ungläubig, sondern. die Satane waren ungläubig; sie brachten den Menschen die Zauberei bei sowie das, was den beiden Engeln in Babel, Harut und Marut, herabgesandt wurde.
ref: And they follow that which the Satans recited in the reign of Sulaiman; and Sulaiman blasphemed not, but the Satans blasphemed.; teaching people magic; and they follow that also which was sent down unto the two angels in Babil, Harut, and Marut.
draft: And they followed what the Satans recited during the reign of Solomon. But it was not Solomon who disbelieved, it was the Satans who disbelieved. They taught people magic and that which was revealed to the two angels at Babylon, Harut and Marut.
hil: And they followed what the satans recited during the reign of Solomon. It was not Solomon who disbelieved, but the satans who disbelieved. They taught the people magic and what was revealed to the two angels in Babylon, Harut and Marut.
compare: And they followed what the Satans recited during the reign of Solomon. But it was not Solomon who disbelieved, it was the Satans who disbelieved. They taught people magic and that which was revealed to the two angels at Babylon, Harut and Marut.

src: (Dies) als Belohnung von deinem Herrn, als hinreichende Gabe,
ref: A recompense from your Lord, a sufficient gift,
draft: "As a reward from your Lord, as a sufficient gift,"
hil: As a reward from your Lord, as a sufficient gift,
compare: As a reward from your Lord, as a sufficient gift,

src: Du siehst dann die, die Unrecht tun, erschrocken vor dem, was sie erworben haben, und es wird über sie hereinbrechen. Diejenigen aber, die glauben und die guten Werke tun, befinden sich in den Gärten des Paradieses.
ref: You will see (on the Day of Resurrection), the Zalimun (polytheists and wrong-doers, etc.) fearful of that which they have earned, and it (Allah's Torment) will surely befall them, while those who believe (in the Oneness of Allah Islamic Monotheism) and do righteous deeds (will be) in the flowering meadows of the Gardens (Paradise), having what they wish from their Lord.
draft: You will then see those who do wrong, terrified by what they have acquired, and it will fall upon them. But those who believe and do good works are in the gardens of paradise.
hil: "You will then see those who do wrong, terrified by what they have acquired, and it will fall upon them. But those who believe and do good deeds, will be for them glad tidings of gardens beneath which rivers flow; when they are provided with the fruit of the gardens, they will say, “This is the same food as what was given to us before,” whereas it is in resemblance; and in the gardens are pure spouses for them, and they shall abide in it forever."
compare: "You will then see those who do wrong, terrified by what they have acquired, and it will fall upon them. But those who believe and do good deeds, will be for them glad tidings of gardens beneath which rivers flow; when they are provided with the fruit of the gardens, they will say, “This is the same food as what was given to us before,” whereas it is in resemblance; and in the gardens are pure spouses for them, and they shall abide in it forever."

src: (Die Folgen) eurer Übertretungen tragt nur ihr selbst.
ref: Your violations are against your own souls.
draft: "Only you yourselves bear the consequences of your transgressions."
hil: "Any one who violates (rules) bears the consequences alone."
compare: "Only you yourselves bear the consequences of your transgressions."

src: Ihm gehört, wer in den Himmeln und auf der Erde ist. Alle sind Ihm demütig ergeben.
ref: All those who are in the heavens and the earth are His, and they are all obedient to Him.
draft: He owns whoever is in the heavens and on Earth. All are humbly devoted to Him.
hil: To Him belongs all that is in the heavens and on earth. All are humbly obedient to Him.
compare: To Him belongs all that is in the heavens and on earth. All are humbly obedient to Him.

src: Diese sind unsere Leute, sie nahmen sich anstelle von Ihm Götter. Würden sie doch dafür eine klare Bestätigung vorlegen!
ref: “These – the people of ours – have set up Gods besides Allah; why do they not bring a clear proof regarding them?
draft: These are our people, they took gods instead of Him. Would that they could present a clear confirmation for it!
hil: Proclaim, “Allah.” Say, “Have you appointed such as supporters besides Him, who can neither benefit nor harm themselves?” Say, “Would that they could present a clear confirmation for it!”
compare: These are our people, they took gods instead of Him. Would that they could present a clear confirmation for it!

src: Er ist es, Der euch Gehör, Augenlicht und Herzen hat entstehen lassen.
ref: It is He, Who has created for you (the sense of) hearing (ears), sight (eyes), and hearts (understanding).
draft: He is the one who has created hearing, sight, and hearts for you.
hil: He is the one who has brought into being for you hearing, sight, and hearts.
compare: He is the one who has brought into being for you hearing, sight, and hearts.

src: "O Moses, tritt vor und fürchte dich nicht; denn du gehörst zu jenen, die in Sicherheit sind.
ref: "O Moses, approach," (said the Voice), "and have no fear. You will be safe.
draft: "O Moses, step forward and do not fear; for you belong to those who are in safety."
hil: He said, "O Moses, step forward and do not fear, for you belong to those who are in safety."
compare: He said, "O Moses, step forward and do not fear, for you belong to those who are in safety."

src: Zu ihnen kam ein edler Gesandter:
ref: A respected prophet had come to them (saying):
draft: "A noble envoy came to them."
hil: To them came a noble envoy:
compare: "A noble envoy came to them."

src: Ist das (etwa) eine Gunst, die du mir vorhältst, daß du die Kinder lsra'ils geknechtet hast?"
ref: But the favour you oblige me with is that you have enslaved the children of Israel."
draft: Is this (perhaps) a favor that you hold against me, that you have enslaved the children of Israel?
hil: "Is this (perhaps) a favor that you hold against me, that you have oppressed the descendants of Israel?"
compare: "Is this (perhaps) a favor that you hold against me, that you have oppressed the descendants of Israel?"

src: Und Allah gab ihm die Herrschaft und die Weisheit und lehrte ihn von dem, was Er wollte.
ref: David slew Goliath, and Allah bestowed on him the kingship and wisdom, and taught him from that He willed.
draft: And Allah granted him the kingdom and wisdom and taught him what He wanted.
hil: And Allah granted him sovereignty and wisdom and taught him what He willed.
compare: And Allah granted him sovereignty and wisdom and taught him what He willed.

src: Und die Engel stehen an seinem Rand.
ref: The angels will stand on all its sides.
draft: And the angels stand at its edge.
hil: And the angels stand at His border.
compare: And the angels stand at its edge.

src: Wisset, daß wahrlich das diesseitige Leben nur ein Spiel und ein Zeitvertreib ist und ein Prunk und Geprahle unter euch und ein Wettrennen um Vermehrung von Gut und Kindern. Es gleicht dem reichlichen Regen, dessen Pflanzenwuchs den Säern gefällt. Dann verdorrt er; und du siehst ihn vergilben; hierauf wird er brüchig; und im Jenseits gibt es eine strenge Strafe, aber auch Vergebung von Allah und Wohlgefallen. Und das diesseitige Leben ist nichts anderes als eine Nutznießung, durch die man sich betören läßt.
ref: Know that the life of this world is nothing but play and pastime, and adornment, and boasting amongst yourselves, and the desire to surpass each other in wealth and children; like the rain the produce of which pleased the farmer, then dried so you see it yellow, and then turned into dry trampled hay; and in the Hereafter is a severe punishment, and the forgiveness from Allah and His pleasure; and the life of this world is nothing but counterfeit wealth.
draft: Know that truly, this worldly life is only a game and a diversion and adornment and boasting among you and competition in increase of wealth and children, like the example of a rain whose [resulting] plant growth pleases the tillers; then it dries and you see it turned yellow; then it becomes [scattered] debris. And in the Hereafter is severe punishment and forgiveness from Allah and approval. And what is the worldly life except the enjoyment of delusion.
hil: Know that truly, this worldly life is nothing but a play and pastime, and adornment and boasting among you, and the desire to acquire wealth and children. It is like the rain that is pleasing to the cultivator for his vegetation which sprouts and swells, and then begins to wither, and you see it turn yellow and reduced to chaff. In the afterlife there is severe punishment, but also forgiveness from God, and acceptance. And the life of this world is nothing but mere enjoyment of delusion.
compare: Know that truly, this worldly life is only a game and a diversion and adornment and boasting among you and competition in increase of wealth and children, like the example of a rain whose [resulting] plant growth pleases the tillers; then it dries and you see it turned yellow; then it becomes [scattered] debris. And in the Hereafter is severe punishment and forgiveness from Allah and approval. And what is the worldly life except the enjoyment of delusion.

src: Der Mensch lehnt sich wahrlich auf,
ref: Verily, man does transgress all bounds (in disbelief and evil deed, etc.).
draft: The human truly rebels.
hil: Man truly rebels.
compare: The human truly rebels.

src: Dann werden Wir euch eure Sünden vergeben; wahrlich, Wir werden jenen, die Gutes tun, noch mehr (an Gnade) erweisen."
ref: We shall forgive you your wrong-doings. We shall increase (the reward) for the good-doers."
draft: Then We will forgive you your sins; truly, We will bestow more (of grace) on those who do good."
hil: "Then We will forgive you your sins; truly, We will bestow more (of grace) on those who do good."
compare: Then We will forgive you your sins; truly, We will bestow more (of grace) on those who do good."

src: Kein Willkomm (sei) ihnen! Sie sollen im Feuer brennen.
ref: Verily, they shall burn in the Fire!
draft: No welcome (be) to them! They should burn in the fire.
hil: No welcome be to them! They should burn in the fire.
compare: No welcome (be) to them! They should burn in the fire.

src: Und erlahmt nicht in der Verfolgung der Leute. Wenn ihr leidet, so leiden sie auch, wie ihr leidet; ihr aber erhofft von Gott, was sie nicht erhoffen. Gott weiß Bescheid und ist weise.
ref: Do not relax in pursuit of the disbelievers; if you are suffering, they also suffer as you do; and you expect from Allah what they do not; and Allah is All Knowing, Wise.
draft: And do not falter in the persecution of people. If you suffer, they suffer as well, just as you suffer; but you hope from God what they do not hope for. God knows and is wise.
hil: Do not be faint of heart in pursuing these people: if you suffer harm they are also suffering just as you are, while you may hope from God what they cannot hope. God knows and is wise.
compare: Do not be faint of heart in pursuing these people: if you suffer harm they are also suffering just as you are, while you may hope from God what they cannot hope. God knows and is wise.

src: Und wir werden gewiß nicht gepeinigt werden.»
ref: We are not the punished!
draft: And we certainly will not be tormented.
hil: And we certainly will not be tormented.
compare: And we certainly will not be tormented.

src: Diejenigen, die auf ihren Herrn hören, erhalten das Beste. Diejenigen, die nicht auf ihn hören, würden wohl, wenn sie alles, was auf der Erde ist, besäßen und noch einmal soviel dazu, sich damit loskaufen wollen. Sie erwartet eine böse Abrechnung, und ihre Heimstätte ist die Hölle - welch schlimme Lagerstätte!
ref: For those who obeyed the command of Allah is goodness and if those who did not obey Him owned all that is in the earth and in addition a similar one like it, they would give it to redeem their souls; it is they who will have a wretched account, and their destination is hell; and what a wretched resting place!
draft: Those who listen to their Lord receive the best. Those who do not listen to Him would want to redeem themselves with everything on earth, and twice as much. They can expect a painful punishment, and their home is Hell - what a terrible resting place!
hil: Those who listen to their Lord get the best, even sinners would want to offer whatever is in the heavens and the earth, and as much more to ransom themselves, but Allah will show them what they never imagined. They can expect a painful reckoning, and their home is Hell - what a terrible resting place!
compare: Those who listen to their Lord receive the best. Those who do not listen to Him would want to redeem themselves with everything on earth, and twice as much. They can expect a painful punishment, and their home is Hell - what a terrible resting place!

src: ALLAH leitet zum Seinem Licht recht, wen ER will.
ref: God guides to His light whom He will.
draft: ALLAH guides to His light whoever He wills.
hil: Thus does Allah lead astray whomsoever He wills and guides whomsoever He wills to His light.
compare: ALLAH guides to His light whoever He wills.

src: Diesen wird ALLAH Gnade erweisen.
ref: Allah will have His Mercy on them.
draft: Allah will show grace to him/her.
hil: Allah will show grace to him/her.
compare: Allah will show grace to him/her.

src: Sie sagen: "Pflegten nicht doch eure Gesandten mit den klaren Beweisen zu euch zu kommen?"
ref: They will say: "Did not your apostles come to you with clear proofs?"
draft: They say, "Did not your messengers used to come to you with clear proofs?"
hil: They say, "Did not your messengers used to come to you with clear proofs?"
compare: They say, "Did not your messengers used to come to you with clear proofs?"

src: Meine Söhne! Geht und erkundigt euch nach Yusuf und seinem Bruder und verzweifelt nicht an den Ruhh von ALLAH, denn es zweifeln an den Ruhh von ALLAH nur die Kafir-Leute."
ref: O sons, go in search of Joseph and his brother, and do not despair of the mercy of God. Only they despair of God's mercy who do not believe."
draft: "My sons! Go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother and do not despair of the mercy of Allah, for only the disbelieving people despair of the mercy of Allah."
hil: O my sons! Inquire about Yusuf and his brother, and do not despair of the mercy of Allah, for only the disbelieving people despair of Allah's mercy.
compare: "My sons! Go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother and do not despair of the mercy of Allah, for only the disbelieving people despair of the mercy of Allah."

src: Sag: "Weshalb habt ihr ALLAHs Propheten vorher getötet, solltet ihr Mumin sein?!"
ref: Say: "Why have you then been slaying God's apostles as of old, if you do believe?"
draft: Say: "Why did you kill Allah's prophets before, if you are believers?!"
hil: Say: 'Why did you kill Allah's prophets before, if you are believers?!'
compare: Say: "Why did you kill Allah's prophets before, if you are believers?!"

src: Und unter den Leuten der Schrift gibt es wahrlich manche, die an Allah glauben und (an) das, was zu euch (als Offenbarung) herabgesandt worden ist, und was zu ihnen (selbst) herabgesandt worden ist.
ref: And there are, certainly, among the people of the Scripture (Jews and Christians), those who believe in Allah and in that which has been revealed to you, and in that which has been revealed to them, humbling themselves before Allah.
draft: And among the People of the Scripture are those who believe in Allah and what has been revealed to you and what was revealed to them.
hil: Certainly among the people of the Book are some who believe in God and in what has been revealed to you and had been revealed to them; and they bow in humility before God, and do not trade for gain the signs of God.
compare: And among the People of the Scripture are those who believe in Allah and what has been revealed to you and what was revealed to them.

src: Darin ist wahrlich ein Zeichen für euch, wenn ihr gläubig seid.
ref: In this will be a portent for you if you do believe.
draft: Therein is truly a sign for you, if you are believers.
hil: Verily, therein is a sign for you, if you believe.
compare: Therein is truly a sign for you, if you are believers.

src: Und zu Madyan (entsandten WIR) ihren Bruder Schu'aib. So sagte er: "Meine Leute!
ref: And We sent towards Madyan, their fellowman Shuaib – he therefore said, “O my people!
draft: And to Midian, We sent their brother Shu'aib. So he said: "My people!
hil: And unto Midian We sent their brother Shu'eyb. He said, "My people!
compare: And to Midian, We sent their brother Shu'aib. So he said: "My people!

src: DU bist unser Wali, so vergib uns und erweise uns Gnade! Und DU bist der Beste der Vergebenden.
ref: You are our saviour, so forgive us and have mercy on us, for You are the best of forgivers.
draft: "You are our protector, so forgive us and show us mercy! And You are the best of forgivers."
hil: You are our protector, so forgive us and have mercy on us! And You are the Best of those who forgive.
compare: "You are our protector, so forgive us and show us mercy! And You are the best of forgivers."

src: Und es begreifen sie nur die Wissenden.
ref: But only those endowed with knowledge will comprehend them.
draft: And only the knowledgeable understand them.
hil: And only the knowledgeable understand them.
compare: And only the knowledgeable understand them.

src: Oder fühlt ihr euch etwa sicher vor Dem, Dessen (Anweisung) im Himmel ist, daß ER über euch Sandsturm schickt?!
ref: Or have you become so unafraid that He who is in Heaven will not send a violent wind to shower stones at you?
draft: Or do you feel safe from Him whose instruction is in the sky, that He might send upon you a storm of sand?!
hil: Or do you feel safe from Him whose instruction is in the sky, that He might send upon you a sandstorm?!
compare: Or do you feel safe from Him whose instruction is in the sky, that He might send upon you a sandstorm?!

src: Kann es sein, daß wenn er stirbt oder getötet wird, daß ihr auf euren Fersen (zum Kufr) umkehrt?
ref: So what if he dies or is killed! Will you turn back and go away in haste?
draft: It is possible that if he dies or is killed, you will turn on your heels (towards disbelief)?
hil: It is possible that if he dies or is killed, you will turn on your heels (towards disbelief)?
compare: It is possible that if he dies or is killed, you will turn on your heels (towards disbelief)?

src: Und da die Berge versetzt und zu einer Luftspiegelung werden.
ref: The mountains put in motion turning into a mirage.
draft: And as the mountains are shifted and become a mirage.
hil: And as the mountains are moved and become a mirage.
compare: And as the mountains are moved and become a mirage.

src: Und gehorcht Allah und Seinem Gesandten, und streitet nicht miteinander, sonst würdet ihr den Mut verlieren, und eure Kraft würde vergehen! Und seid standhaft!
ref: And obey Allah and His apostle, and dispute not, lest ye flag and your predominance depart, and be patient.
draft: And obey Allah and His Messenger, and do not fight with each other, or else you will lose courage and your strength will fade away! And be steadfast!
hil: Obey Allah and His Messenger, and do not fight with each other, or you will lose courage, and your strength will fade away! And be steadfast!
compare: And obey Allah and His Messenger, and do not fight with each other, or else you will lose courage and your strength will fade away! And be steadfast!

src: Das sind die (wahren) Lügner.
ref: These are the liars.
draft: These are the (true) liars.
hil: They alone are liars who do not believe in the words of God, and they are liars.
compare: These are the (true) liars.

src: Doch sollten sie dich verraten wollen, so haben sie ALLAH bereits vorher verraten, dann hat ER sie unterwerfen lassen.
ref: But if they intend to betray you (O Muhammad SAW), they have already betrayed Allah before. So He gave (you) power over them.
draft: But if they want to betray you, they have already betrayed ALLAH before, then HE has caused them to submit.
hil: If they try to deceive you, they have already deceived God before. So He gave you mastery over them, for God is all-knowing and all-wise.
compare: If they try to deceive you, they have already deceived God before. So He gave you mastery over them, for God is all-knowing and all-wise.

src: Und wenn die Gräber umgewühlt werden,
ref: When the graves are overturned,
draft: And when the graves are dug up.
hil: And when the graves are dug up,
compare: And when the graves are dug up,

src: Allah wird alles ans Licht bringen, wovor ihr euch fürchtet."
ref: Say: 'Mock on; God will bring forth what you fear.'
draft: "Allah will bring to light everything you fear."
hil: Say, 'Mock on! Indeed, Allah will expose that which you fear.'
compare: "Allah will bring to light everything you fear."

src: Richte Bittgebete an deinen HERRN mit dem, wozu ER dich verpflichtete, wir sind gewiß rechtgeleitet!"
ref: Pray for us to your Lord, by the means of His covenant which is with you; we will certainly come to guidance.”
draft: "Direct prayers to your LORD with what HE obligated you, we are certainly guided aright!"
hil: Invoke supplications to your LORD in accordance with what HE has obligated you, we are certainly guided aright!
compare: "Direct prayers to your LORD with what HE obligated you, we are certainly guided aright!"

src: Entweder peinigst du sie, oder du gewährst ihnen Gutes."
ref: Either you punish them, or treat them with kindness."
draft: Either you torment them or you grant them good."
hil: Either you torment them or you grant them good.
compare: Either you torment them or you grant them good."

src: Dies ist ein von Ihm gemachtes Versprechen, ein Wahrhaftiges - (erwähnt) in At-taurat, Alindschil und im Quran. Und wer hält sein Versprechen besser als ALLAH ein?!
ref: Rejoice wherefore in your bargain which ye have made.
draft: This is a promise made by Him, a truthful one - mentioned in the Torah, the Injil, and the Quran. And who is better at keeping their promise than Allah?!
hil: A binding promise upon Him in the Torah, the Injil and the Qur'an. And who fulfills his covenant more truthfully than Allah?
compare: A binding promise upon Him in the Torah, the Injil and the Qur'an. And who fulfills his covenant more truthfully than Allah?

src: Die (wahren) Gläubigen sind ja diejenigen, die an Allah und Seinen Gesandten glauben und hierauf nicht zweifeln und sich mit ihrem Besitz und mit ihrer eigenen Person auf Allahs Weg abmühen.
ref: They alone are believers who come to believe in God and His Apostle, then never doubt again, and struggle wealth and soul in the way of God.
draft: The (true) believers are those who believe in Allah and His Messenger and do not doubt thereafter, and strive with their wealth and their selves in the way of Allah.
hil: The (true) believers are those who believe in God and His Messenger and do not doubt thereafter, and strive with their possessions and their lives in the way of God.
compare: The (true) believers are those who believe in Allah and His Messenger and do not doubt thereafter, and strive with their wealth and their selves in the way of Allah.

src: Aber die meisten von ihnen wissen nicht Bescheid.
ref: But most of them do not know.
draft: But most of them do not know.
hil: But most of them do not know.
compare: But most of them do not know.

src: Da kam seine Frau in Aufregung heran, und sie schlug ihre Wange und sagte: "(Ich bin doch) eine unfruchtbare alte Frau!"
ref: His wife came out lamenting, striking her forehead, and said: "I, am old and barren woman?"
draft: Then his wife came up in excitement, and she slapped her cheek and said, "(I am indeed) an infertile old woman!"
hil: "Then his wife came up to him in distress, she struck her cheek and said, \"(I am indeed) an infertile old woman!\""
compare: "Then his wife came up to him in distress, she struck her cheek and said, \"(I am indeed) an infertile old woman!\""

src: Solltest DU sie peinigen, so sind sie doch Deine Diener.
ref: If Thou punish them, lo! they are Thy slaves, and if Thou forgive them (lo! they are Thy slaves).
draft: If you torture them, they are still your servants.
hil: If you torture them, they are still your servants.
compare: If you torture them, they are still your servants.

src: Und wenn diejenigen, die Schirk betrieben, die von ihnen beigesellten Partner gesehen haben, werden sie sagen: "Unser HERR!
ref: And when the polytheists will see their ascribed partners, they will say, “Our Lord!
draft: And when those who practiced sorcery see their associated partners, they will say, "Our Lord!
hil: And when those who practiced polytheism see the partners they attributed with Allah, they will say, "Our Lord!"
compare: And when those who practiced polytheism see the partners they attributed with Allah, they will say, "Our Lord!"

src: So wurden ihre Häuser dem Erdboden gleichgemacht, auch der Brunnen ist verlassen und das Schloß ist errichtet.
ref: How many a well and fortress reinforced lie abandoned!
draft: So their houses were leveled to the ground, the well is abandoned and the castle is built.
hil: So their houses were leveled to the ground, the well is abandoned and the castle is erected.
compare: So their houses were leveled to the ground, the well is abandoned and the castle is built.

src: Dann brachten WIR heraus, wer in ihr von den Mumin war.
ref: So We evacuated everyone who was a believer there,
draft: Then we found out who among them was a Moomin.
hil: Then WE found out who among them was a Moomin.
compare: Then we found out who among them was a Moomin.

src: Wollt ihr denn geduldig sein? Und dein Herr ist Allsehend.
ref: And O dear Prophet, your Lord is All Seeing.
draft: Do you want to be patient? And your Lord is All-Seeing.
hil: And do you want to have patience? And your Lord is All-Seeing.
compare: And do you want to have patience? And your Lord is All-Seeing.

src: Sie haben sich ihre Schriftgelehrten und Mönche zu Herren genommen außer Allah; und den Messias, den Sohn der Maria.
ref: They have taken their rabbis and their priests as lords instead of God, as well as the Messiah son of Mary.
draft: They have taken their scholars and monks as lords besides Allah; and [also] the Messiah, the son of Mary.
hil: They have taken their scholars and monks as lords besides Allah; and [also] the Messiah, the son of Mary.
compare: They have taken their scholars and monks as lords besides Allah; and [also] the Messiah, the son of Mary.

src: Sag: "Wie seht ihr das, was ALLAH euch vom Rizq hinabsandte, dann ihr es in Haram und Halal eingeteilt habt?"
ref: Say: "Have you thought of what God has sent you for food, of which you have labelled some as lawful and some forbidden?"
draft: Say: "How do you see what Allah has sent down to you as sustenance, then you have divided it into forbidden and permissible?"
hil: Say: What do you think about what Allah has sent down to you as sustenance, some of which you have made unlawful and some lawful? Say: Have you been given permission by Allah or are you inventing lies against Allah?
compare: Say: "How do you see what Allah has sent down to you as sustenance, then you have divided it into forbidden and permissible?"

src: Ebenso zu Seinen Ayat zählt, daß ER für euch von eurem Wesen Partnerwesen erschuf, damit ihr bei ihnen Geborgenheit findet. Und ER setzte zwischen euch Liebe und Barmherzigkeit. Gewiß, darin sind doch Ayat für Leute, die nachdenken.
ref: And among His signs is that He created spouses for you from yourselves for you to gain rest from them, and kept love and mercy between yourselves; indeed in this are signs for the people who ponder.
draft: Likewise, among His signs is that He created for you from yourselves mates that you may find tranquility in them; and He placed between you affection and mercy. Indeed, in that are signs for a people who give thought.
hil: Likewise, among His signs is that He created for you from yourselves mates that you may find tranquility in them; and He placed between you affection and mercy. Indeed, in that are signs for a people who reflect.
compare: Likewise, among His signs is that He created for you from yourselves mates that you may find tranquility in them; and He placed between you affection and mercy. Indeed, in that are signs for a people who give thought.

src: Hierauf legte Er sie den Engeln vor und sagte: "Teilt Mir deren Namen mit, wenn ihr wahrhaftig seid!"
ref: After this he taught Adam the names of all things. Then He set these before the angels and asked, "Tell Me the names of these things, if you are right (in thinking that the appointment of a vicegerent will cause disorder)".
draft: Then He presented them to the angels and said, 'Tell Me their names, if you are truthful!'"
hil: Then He presented them to the angels and said, 'Tell Me their names, if you are truthful!'
compare: Then He presented them to the angels and said, 'Tell Me their names, if you are truthful!'"

src: Und ohne die Huld Allahs gegen euch und Seine Barmherzigkeit würde niemand von euch jemals lauter sein.
ref: And whosoever followeth the footsteps of the Satan, then he only urgeth to indecency and abomination.
draft: And without Allah's grace towards you and His mercy, none of you would ever be pure.
hil: Without the grace of Allah towards you and His mercy, no one of you would ever be purified.
compare: Without the grace of Allah towards you and His mercy, no one of you would ever be purified.

src: Dann entfernten sie sich. ALLAH möge ihre Herzen (vom Iman) entfernen, weil sie gewiß Leute sind, die nicht begreifen.
ref: Indeed God has turned their hearts away (from the truth), for they cannot discern the law of heaven.
draft: Then they left. May Allah remove their hearts (from faith), because they are certainly people who do not understand.
hil: Then they left. May Allah remove their hearts (from faith), because they are certainly people who do not understand.
compare: Then they left. May Allah remove their hearts (from faith), because they are certainly people who do not understand.

src: Darum, wenn sie sich von euch fernhalten und nicht gegen euch kämpfen, sondern euch Frieden bieten; dann hat Allah euch keinen Grund gegen sie gegeben.
ref: If they keep aloof and do not fight, and offer peace, God has left you no reason to fight them.
draft: Therefore, if they keep away from you and do not fight you and offer you peace, then Allah has not given you any reason [to fight] against them.
hil: Therefore, if they stay away from you and do not fight against you but offer you peace, then Allah has not given you any reason to fight against them.
compare: Therefore, if they stay away from you and do not fight against you but offer you peace, then Allah has not given you any reason to fight against them.

src: Wenn wir wollten, könnten auch wir etwas Derartiges sagen. Das sind nichts als Fabeln der Früheren.»
ref: Had we wanted, we could have said the like of this; these are nothing but myths of the ancients.”
draft: "If we wanted to, we could also say something like this. These are nothing but fables of the ancients."
hil: If we wanted to, we could say something like that too. These are nothing but fables of the ancients.
compare: "If we wanted to, we could also say something like this. These are nothing but fables of the ancients."

src: Josef, wende dich davon ab. Und (du), bitte um Vergebung für deine Schuld. Du gehörst ja zu denen, die sich versündigt haben.»
ref: Ignore this affair, O Joseph; and you, O woman, ask forgiveness for your sin, for you were surely errant."
draft: Josef, turn away from it. And (you), please ask for forgiveness for your guilt. You belong to those who have sinned.
hil: Joseph, turn away from it. And (you), ask for forgiveness for your guilt. You belong to those who have sinned.
compare: Joseph, turn away from it. And (you), ask for forgiveness for your guilt. You belong to those who have sinned.

src: Und gewiß, manch einer von euch zögert. Und wenn ein Unglück euch heimsucht, sagt er: "ALLAH hat mir bereits eine Wohltat erwiesen, daß ich unter ihnen nicht anwesend war."
ref: Someone among you will surely lag behind, and if calamity should befall you, will say: "God was gracious to me that I was not among them."
draft: And certainly, some of you hesitate. And when a misfortune befalls you, he says, "ALLAH has already shown me a favor by not being present among them."
hil: And certainly, some of you hesitate. And if a misfortune befalls you, he says, "Indeed Allah has favoured me that I was not present among them."
compare: And certainly, some of you hesitate. And if a misfortune befalls you, he says, "Indeed Allah has favoured me that I was not present among them."

src: Und als sie die Peinigung überkam, sagten sie: "Musa!
ref: And whenever the punishment came upon them they said, “O Moosa!
draft: And when the torment came upon them, they said: "Musa!
hil: And when the torment came upon them, they said: 'Moses!'
compare: And when the torment came upon them, they said: 'Moses!'

src: Sie schwören euch bei ALLAH, damit sie euch zufriedenstellen, während ALLAH und Sein Gesandter doch berechtigter sind, zufriedengestellt zu werden, sollten sie Mumin sein.
ref: They swear by God to please you; but if they are believers it would have been worthier to have pleased God and His Apostle.
draft: They swear by ALLAH to satisfy you, while ALLAH and His Messenger are more entitled to be satisfied if they are believers.
hil: They swear by Allah to satisfy you, while it is more justifiable that Allah and His Messenger should be satisfied if they are believers.
compare: They swear by ALLAH to satisfy you, while ALLAH and His Messenger are more entitled to be satisfied if they are believers.

src: So wende dein Gesicht in Richtung der geschützten Gebetsstätte!
ref: And wheresoever you people are, turn your faces (in prayer) in that direction.
draft: So turn your face towards the protected place of worship!
hil: So turn your face towards the protected place of worship!
compare: So turn your face towards the protected place of worship!

src: Also vergalten Wir es ihnen. Siehe nun, wie das Ende der Leugner war!
ref: So We took revenge from them – therefore see what sort of fate befell those who denied!
draft: Also we repay it to them. See now how the end of the deniers was!
hil: Thus, We repay it to them. See now how the end of the deniers was!
compare: Also we repay it to them. See now how the end of the deniers was!

src: Er hat euch aus der Erde entstehen lassen und sie euch zu bebauen und zu bestellen gegeben.
ref: He hath caused you to spring out of the earth, and hath made you dwell therein.
draft: He has caused you to emerge from the earth and has given it to you to cultivate and care for.
hil: He who has raised you from the earth and settled you upon it.
compare: He has caused you to emerge from the earth and has given it to you to cultivate and care for.

src: Und sie sagen: "Dies sind verwehrtes Vieh und verwehrte (Früchte auf den) Saatfelder(n).
ref: They also say: "These cattle and these crops are consecrated. None may eat of them other than those we permit," -- so they assert.
draft: And they say: "These are forbidden cattle and forbidden fruits (on the) fields."
hil: And they said, 'these are forbidden cattle and forbidden fruits (on the) fields.'
compare: And they say: "These are forbidden cattle and forbidden fruits (on the) fields."

src: Er sagte: "Ihr befindet euch in einer (noch) schlechteren Lage. Und Allah weiß sehr wohl, was ihr beschreibt."
ref: But Joseph kept this secret and did not disclose it to them, and said (to himself): "You are worse in the degree of evil, for God knows better of what you allege."
draft: He said, "You are in an even worse situation. And Allah knows very well what you describe."
hil: He said, "You are in an even worse situation. And Allah knows very well what you describe."
compare: He said, "You are in an even worse situation. And Allah knows very well what you describe."

src: Und er wird froh zu seinen Angehörigen zurückkehren.
ref: And will return to his people full of joy.
draft: And he will return happily to his relatives.
hil: "And he will return home happily to his relatives."
compare: "And he will return home happily to his relatives."

src: Darin sind gehobene Liegen
ref: And within it are couches placed on high,
draft: There are elevated loungers in it.
hil: There are elevated sun loungers in it.
compare: There are elevated sun loungers in it.

src: Fir'aun sagte: "Was ist denn der Herr der Weltenbewohner?"
ref: The Pharaoh asked: "And what is the Lord of all the worlds?"
draft: Pharaoh said, "So what is the Lord of the Worlds?"
hil: Pharaoh asked: "So what is the Lord of the Worlds?"
compare: Pharaoh asked: "So what is the Lord of the Worlds?"

src: Und wer Kufr gegenüber dem Iman betreibt, dessen Handeln ist zweifellos nichtig, und er gehört im Jenseits zu den Verlierern.
ref: Useless shall be rendered the acts of those who turn back on their faith, and they will be among the losers in the life to come.
draft: And whoever commits disbelief towards the Imam, his actions are undoubtedly void and he will be among the losers in the afterlife.
hil: And whosoever disbelieves in the faith, his work has failed, and in the world to come he shall be among the losers.
compare: And whoever commits disbelief towards the Imam, his actions are undoubtedly void and he will be among the losers in the afterlife.

src: ER sagte: "Ist dies nicht dieWahrheit?!"
ref: He will say, 'Is not this the truth?'
draft: He said, "Isn't this the truth?!"
hil: He said, "Isn't this the truth?!"
compare: He said, "Isn't this the truth?!"

src: Die Menschen fragen dich nach der Stunde. Sag: Das Wissen darüber ist nur bei Allah.
ref: People ask thee ccncerning the Hour.
draft: The people ask you about the hour. Say: "The knowledge about it is only with Allah."
hil: They ask you about the hour. Proclaim, "The knowledge about it is only with Allah."
compare: The people ask you about the hour. Say: "The knowledge about it is only with Allah."

src: Und ALLAH erschuf alles sich bewegende Lebewesen aus Wasser. So geht manch einer von ihnen auf seinem Bauch, und manch einer von ihnen geht auf zwei Beinen, und manch einer von ihnen geht auf Vieren. ALLAH erschafft, was ER will! Gewiß, ALLAH ist über alles allmächtig.
ref: And Allah created every animal on earth, from water; so among them is a kind that moves upon its belly; and among them is a kind that moves upon two legs; and among them a kind that moves upon four legs; Allah creates whatever He wills; indeed Allah is Able to do all things.
draft: And Allah created every moving creature from water. Some of them move upon their bellies, and some of them move upon two legs, and some of them move upon four. Allah creates what He wills. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent.
hil: "And if the Lord wills, He could have taken away their hearing and their sight. Indeed, Allah creates what He wills. Surely, God is all-powerful."
compare: And Allah created every moving creature from water. Some of them move upon their bellies, and some of them move upon two legs, and some of them move upon four. Allah creates what He wills. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent.

src: Die Juden sagen: "Auf nichts fußen die Christen"; und die Christen sagen: "Auf nichts fußen die Juden", obwohl sie doch (beide) die Schrift lesen.
ref: The Jews say, 'The Christians stand not on anything'; the Christians say, 'The Jews stand not on anything'; yet they recite the Book.
draft: The Jews say: "Christians have no foundation"; and the Christians say: "Jews have no foundation", although both read scripture.
hil: The Jews say that Christians have no foundation, and the Christians say that Jews have no foundation, although they both read the scripture.
compare: The Jews say: "Christians have no foundation"; and the Christians say: "Jews have no foundation", although both read scripture.

src: Das Gleichnis dessen, was sie in diesem diesseitigen Leben spenden, ist wie das Gleichnis vom Wind, der bittere Kälte bringt und die Äcker von Leuten, die Unrecht begangen haben, heimsucht und dann zerstört. Und ALLAH fügte ihnen kein Unrecht zu, sondern sie fügten sich selbst Unrecht zu.
ref: The example of what they spend in this worldly life is similar to the freezing cold wind which struck the fields of a nation who wronged themselves, and destroyed it completely; and Allah did not oppress them, but it is they who wronged themselves.
draft: The parable of what they spend in this worldly life is like the parable of a wind which brings bitter cold and strikes the harvest of a people who have wronged themselves and destroys it. And Allah has not wronged them, but they wrong themselves.
hil: The example of what they spend in this worldly life is like the example of a wind that brings bitter cold and strikes the fields of people who have committed injustice and then destroys it. And Allah did not wrong them, but they wronged themselves.
compare: The example of what they spend in this worldly life is like the example of a wind that brings bitter cold and strikes the fields of people who have committed injustice and then destroys it. And Allah did not wrong them, but they wronged themselves.

src: An jenem Tag waren sie dem Unglauben näher als dem Glauben, sie sagten ja mit ihrem Munde, was nicht in ihrem Herzen war.
ref: They were that day, nearer to disbelief than to Faith, saying with their mouths what was not in their hearts.
draft: On that day, they were closer to disbelief than to faith; they said with their mouth what was not in their heart.
hil: On that day, they were closer to disbelief than to faith; they said yes with their mouth, which was not in their heart.
compare: On that day, they were closer to disbelief than to faith; they said yes with their mouth, which was not in their heart.

src: (Ich vermag) nur etwas zu übermitteln von Allah und Seinen Botschaften. Und wer sich Allah und Seinem Gesandten widersetzt, gewiß, für ihn wird es das Feuer der Hölle geben, ewig und auf immer darin zu bleiben.
ref: “I only convey the commands from Allah, and His messages; and whoever disobeys the commands of Allah and His Noble Messenger – then indeed for him is the fire of hell, in which they will remain for ever and ever.”
draft: (Ich vermag) only to convey something from Allah and His messages. And whoever resists Allah and His Messenger, surely for him will be the fire of Hell, to abide therein forever.
hil: I can only convey something from Allah and His messages. And whoever resists Allah and His Messenger, surely for him there will be the fire of hell, to abide therein forever.
compare: (Ich vermag) only to convey something from Allah and His messages. And whoever resists Allah and His Messenger, surely for him will be the fire of Hell, to abide therein forever.

src: Dann erfaßte Ich jene, die ungläubig waren, und wie war es mit der Verleugnung!
ref: So We seized the unbelievers. How great was the change I wrought in their condition then!
draft: Then I seized those who were unbelievers, and how it was with the denial!
hil: Then I seized those who disbelieved and how was the denial!
compare: Then I seized those who were unbelievers, and how it was with the denial!

src: Und die Soldaten deines HERRN kennt niemand außer Ihm.
ref: And none knoweth the hosts of thy Lord but He.
draft: "And the soldiers of your Lord are known only to Him."
hil: And no one knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him.
compare: And no one knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him.

src: Doch sie fügten damit niemandem Schaden zu, es sei denn mit der Ermächtigung Allahs.
ref: Yet they could not harm any one or without the dispensation of God.
draft: But they did not harm anyone with it, except with Allah's permission.
hil: But they did not harm anyone with it, except with Allah’s command, and only upon Allah must the believers rely.
compare: But they did not harm anyone with it, except with Allah's permission.

src: Fir'aun sagte: "Laßt mich Musa töten; soll er (doch) seinen Herrn anrufen!
ref: "Let me kill Moses," the Pharaoh said, "and let him call to his Lord.
draft: Pharaoh said, "Let me kill Moses; let him call upon his Lord!"
hil: Pharaoh said: "Let me kill Moses, let him call upon his Lord!"
compare: Pharaoh said: "Let me kill Moses, let him call upon his Lord!"

src: Und wer Allah Götter zur Seite stellt, der hat wahrhaftig eine gewaltige Sünde begangen.
ref: And he who ascribes compeers to God is guilty of the gravest sin.
draft: And whoever associates gods with Allah has certainly committed a tremendous sin.
hil: And whosoever sets up partners with Allah, has indeed committed a heinous sin.
compare: And whosoever sets up partners with Allah, has indeed committed a heinous sin.

src: Gewiß, Er weiß über das Innerste der Brüste Bescheid.
ref: Indeed, He knows the secrets of the hearts.
draft: Certainly, He knows about the innermost of the breasts.
hil: Whether you keep your words secret or speak them openly, He knows the innermost secrets of your hearts.
compare: Whether you keep your words secret or speak them openly, He knows the innermost secrets of your hearts.

src: Sie sagten: "Wir brachen das Versprechen dir gegenüber nicht aus eigener Kraft.
ref: They replied: 'We have not failed in our promise to you through our choosing.
draft: They said: "We did not break the promise to you on our own."
hil: They said, 'We didn't break our promise to you under our own power.'
compare: They said: "We did not break the promise to you on our own."

src: Sollte er von ihr dann (zum dritten Mal) die Talaq-Scheidung vollzogen haben, so wird sie für ihn danach nicht mehr halal, bis sie einen anderen Ehemann heiratet.
ref: If a man divorces her again (a third time), she becomes unlawful for him (and he cannot remarry her) until she has married another man.
draft: If he (for the third time) then performed the Talaq divorce with her, she will not be halal for him thereafter until she marries another husband.
hil: If he then completes the Talaq divorce with her (for the third time), she will not be halal for him thereafter until she marries another husband.
compare: If he then completes the Talaq divorce with her (for the third time), she will not be halal for him thereafter until she marries another husband.

src: Und es ist für euch kein Vergehen, wenn ihr Heiratsabsichten gegenüber solchen Frauen andeutet oder bei euch innerlich hegt.
ref: You commit no error by announcing your engagement to women, or by keeping it to yourselves.
draft: And it is not a sin for you to hint at marriage intentions towards such women or to harbor them internally.
hil: It is not a crime for you to suggest or entertain marriage intentions towards such women, either overtly or privately.
compare: It is not a crime for you to suggest or entertain marriage intentions towards such women, either overtly or privately.

src: Und WIR erretteten diejenigen, die den Iman verinnerlichten und Taqwa gemäß zu handeln pflegten.
ref: We deliver those who believe and take heed for themselves.
draft: And WE saved those who internalized faith and acted according to Taqwa.
hil: And WE saved those who believed and acted according to Taqwa.
compare: And WE saved those who internalized faith and acted according to Taqwa.

src: Du bist der, der alles hört und weiß.»
ref: Thou art the Hearer, the Knower.
draft: "You are the one who hears and knows everything."
hil: You are the One who hears and knows everything.
compare: You are the One who hears and knows everything.

src: Aber wenn sie sich dessen enthalten, ist das besser für sie.
ref: But to refrain (i.e. not to discard their outer clothing) is better for them.
draft: But if they refrain from it, it is better for them.
hil: But if they refrain from it, it is better for them.
compare: But if they refrain from it, it is better for them.

src: Abziehende der Kopfhäute,
ref: That would skin the scalp.
draft: peeling off the scalps.
hil: Peeling off the scalps,
compare: peeling off the scalps.

src: Meine Leute! Handelt euren Standpunkten entsprechend, auch ich handle.
ref: Do on your part what you can, O people, I will do what I will.
draft: My people! Act according to your opinions, so do I act.
hil: My people! Act according to your ability and way, I am acting (on my way) too.
compare: My people! Act according to your opinions, so do I act.

src: Waret ihr dabei, als Allah euch dies gebot?" Wer ist also ungerechter als der, welcher eine Lüge gegen Allah ersinnt, um die Leute ohne Wissen irrezuführen?
ref: Then who doth greater wrong than he who deviseth a lie concerning Allah, that he may lead mankind astray without knowledge. Lo!
draft: "Were you there when Allah commanded you to do this?" So who is more unjust than the one who invents a lie about Allah to mislead people without knowledge?
hil: Were you there when Allah commanded you to do this? So who is more unjust than the one who invents lies about Allah to mislead people without knowledge?
compare: Were you there when Allah commanded you to do this? So who is more unjust than the one who invents lies about Allah to mislead people without knowledge?

src: Den Menschen erschaffen hat aus einem Embryo.
ref: Created man from an embryo;
draft: "Created humans from an embryo."
hil: "Hasn't it been seen that Allah, who created the heavens and the earth, is able to create the likes of humans from an embryo, and has appointed for them a term about which there is no doubt."
compare: "Created humans from an embryo."

src: (Dies ist) das Gleichnis des (Paradies)gartens, der den Gottesfürchtigen versprochen ist: Er ist durcheilt von Bächen'; sein Ernteertrag ist immerwährend und (auch) sein Schatten.
ref: The likeness of Paradise promised the pious and devout is (of a garden) with streams of rippling water, everlasting fruits and shade.
draft: (This is) the parable of the paradise garden that is promised to the God-fearing: it is crossed by streams; its yield is everlasting and (also) its shade.
hil: This is a description of the garden which is promised to the pious: rivers flow beneath it; its fruits are unending, and its shade; this is the reward of those who fear.
compare: (This is) the parable of the paradise garden that is promised to the God-fearing: it is crossed by streams; its yield is everlasting and (also) its shade.

src: Und die ihr Zeugnis ablegen,
ref: Who uphold their testimonies,
draft: And those who testify,
hil: And those of you who bear witness,
compare: And those who testify,

src: Aber Er läßt in seine Barmherzigkeit eingehen, wen Er will.
ref: But He admits whomsoever He pleases into His Mercy.
draft: But He admits into His mercy whomever He wills.
hil: But He admits to His mercy whom He will.
compare: But He admits into His mercy whomever He wills.

src: Und als Unsere Boten zu Lot kamen, war er ihretwegen besorgt und fühlte sich außerstande, ihnen zu helfen. Sie sprachen: "Fürchte dich nicht und sei nicht traurig, wir wollen dich und die Deinen sicher retten, bis auf deine Frau, die zu denen gehört, die zurückbleiben sollen.
ref: And when Our sent angels came to Lut, he was unhappy at their arrival and was depressed – and they said, “Do not fear or grieve; we will surely rescue you and your family, except your wife, who is of those who will stay behind.”
draft: And when our messengers came to Lot, he was worried about them and felt unable to help them. They said, "Don't be afraid and don't be sad, we will surely save you and your people, except for your wife, who is one of those who will stay behind.
hil: When our messengers came to Lot, he was worried about them and felt unable to help them. They said, "Do not be afraid and do not be sad, we will surely save you and your people, except for your wife, who is one of those who will stay behind."
compare: And when our messengers came to Lot, he was worried about them and felt unable to help them. They said, "Don't be afraid and don't be sad, we will surely save you and your people, except for your wife, who is one of those who will stay behind.

src: Und gewiß, bereits erleichterten WIR den Quran zur Ermahnung! Gibt es etwa einen sich Erinnernden?!
ref: Easy have We made the Qur'an to understand: So is there any one who will pay heed?
draft: And indeed, We have made the Quran easy to understand and remember. Is there anyone who will take heed?
hil: And surely, We have made the Quran easy to remember. Is there anyone who remembers?
compare: And indeed, We have made the Quran easy to understand and remember. Is there anyone who will take heed?

src: Allah sieht die Menschen wohl,
ref: And under God's eyes are devotees
draft: Allah probably sees the people.
hil: God probably sees people.
compare: God probably sees people.

src: (Erinnere) an den Tag, wenn er euch zum Tag des Zusammenbringens zusammenbringt. Dies ist der (Anklage-)Tag wegen Übervorteilung.
ref: The day He will gather you together on the Day of Gathering, will be the day of Judgement.
draft: Remember the day when he brings you together for the day of gathering. This is the day of indictment due to fraud.
hil: Remember the day when he will gather you for the day of gathering. This is the day of indictment for fraud.
compare: Remember the day when he will gather you for the day of gathering. This is the day of indictment for fraud.

src: Und am Tag, da Er sie versammelt, als hätten sie nur eine Stunde vom Tag verweilt, um einander kennenzulernen. Den Verlust haben diejenigen, die die Begegnung mit Gott für Lüge erklärt haben und der Rechtleitung nicht gefolgt sind.
ref: And on the day when He will raise all of them together, as if they had never stayed on earth except for a moment during the day, they will recognise one another; for completely ruined are those who denied the meeting with Allah and were not on guidance.
draft: And on the day He gathers them, as if they had stayed only an hour of the day to get to know each other, those who have deemed encountering God to be a falsehood and have not followed guidance will be the losers.
hil: And on the Day when He will gather them, as if they had never stayed except an hour of the day, they will recognize each other. Those who have denied the meeting with Allah and were not guided will have lost.
compare: And on the Day when He will gather them, as if they had never stayed except an hour of the day, they will recognize each other. Those who have denied the meeting with Allah and were not guided will have lost.

src: ALLAH will ihnen keinen Anteil am Jenseits gewähren.
ref: It is Allah's Will to give them no portion in the Hereafter.
draft: ALLAH will not grant them a share of the Hereafter.
hil: ALLAH will surely not grant them a share in the Hereafter
compare: ALLAH will surely not grant them a share in the Hereafter

src: Sie sagte zu seiner Schwester: "Spüre ihm nach."
ref: She told his sister: "Follow him."
draft: She said to his sister: "Trace him."
hil: She said to his sister: 'Trace him.'
compare: She said to his sister: "Trace him."

src: Zakaria! Gewiß, WIR überbringen dir doch frohe Botschaft von einem Jungen Namens Yahya. Dessen Namen haben WIR niemandem zuvor gegeben.
ref: O Zakariyya! verily We give thee the glad tidings of a boy: his name shall be Yahya; We have not afore-time made his namesake.
draft: Zakaria! Certainly, we bring you good news of a boy named Yahya. Whose name we haven't given to anyone before.
hil: Verily, We bring you good news of a boy named Yahya. Whose name We have not given to anyone before.
compare: Verily, We bring you good news of a boy named Yahya. Whose name We have not given to anyone before.

src: Und wer an Allah glaubt und das Rechte tut - Er wird seine Übel von ihm nehmen und wird ihn in Gärten führen, durch die Bäche fließen, worin (sie) auf ewig verweilen.
ref: He who believed and did the right, will have his evil deeds expunged by God and admitted to gardens with rivers flowing by, and abide there perpetually.
draft: And whoever believes in Allah and does what is right - He will remove his evils from him and will lead him to gardens, through which rivers flow, in which they will abide forever.
hil: And those who believe and do righteous deeds, He will admit them into gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever. This is a true promise of Allah, and who is truer than Allah in statement?
compare: And those who believe and do righteous deeds, He will admit them into gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever. This is a true promise of Allah, and who is truer than Allah in statement?

src: Da könnt ihr weder (etwas) abwenden noch Hilfe erfahren. Und wer von euch Unrecht tut, den lassen Wir große Strafe kosten "
ref: Then you shall neither be able to repel your punishment nor shall get any help from anywhere; and whoso is guilty. of iniquity'' among you, We shall make him taste a severe torment.
draft: There, you can neither prevent (something) nor find help. And whoever of you does wrong, we let them pay a heavy penalty.
hil: There you can neither prevent anything nor receive help. And whoever of you does wrong, we let them pay a heavy penalty.
compare: There you can neither prevent anything nor receive help. And whoever of you does wrong, we let them pay a heavy penalty.

src: Wer ist dieser, der um ALLAHs willen eine Hasan-Anleihe macht, damit ALLAH sie für ihn um ein Vielfaches vermehrt?!
ref: Who will give a goodly loan to God which He might double many times?
draft: Who is this person making a Hasan loan for the sake of Allah, so that Allah may multiply it for him many times over?!
hil: Who is it that makes a Hasan loan for the sake of Allah, so that Allah may multiply it for him many times over?
compare: Who is this person making a Hasan loan for the sake of Allah, so that Allah may multiply it for him many times over?!

src: So fragt die Leute der Ermahnung, wenn ihr (es) nicht wißt.
ref: If you do not know, then ask the keepers of the oracles of God.
draft: So ask the people for admonition, if you do not know.
hil: O people who believe! If you are not aware, ask for clarification.
compare: O people who believe! If you are not aware, ask for clarification.

src: Du Mensch!
ref: O Man!
draft: You human!
hil: You human!
compare: You human!

src: Zu Ihm ist eure Rückkehr, alle zusammen - ein wahrhaftiges Versprechen von ALLAH.
ref: To Him will you all return: God's promise is true.
draft: To Him is your return, all together - a true promise from Allah.
hil: To Him only you all are to return; the promise of Allah; indeed He creates for the first time and then after its extinction creates it again, in order to give those who believe and do good deeds, the reward of justice; and for the disbelievers, boiling water to drink and a painful punishment – the recompense of their disbelief.
compare: To Him is your return, all together - a true promise from Allah.

src: Gewiß, denjenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, werden weder ihre Vermögenswerte noch ihre Kinder vor ALLAH etwas nutzen.
ref: As for those who disbelieve, neither wealth nor children will avail them in the least against God.
draft: Certainly, those who have practiced disbelief, neither their wealth nor their children will benefit them before Allah.
hil: Certainly, those who have committed Kufr, their wealth and their children will be of no use to them before Allah.
compare: Certainly, those who have practiced disbelief, neither their wealth nor their children will benefit them before Allah.

src: Sag: "Nennt sie doch!" Oder macht ihr Ihm etwa Mitteilung über das, was ER auf der Erde nicht kennt oder sind dies nur Worthülsen?!
ref: Proclaim, “Just name them – or is it that you inform Him of something which in His knowledge does not exist in the earth – or is it just superficial talk?”
draft: Say: "Name them!" Or are you informing Him about what He does not know on Earth, or are these just empty words?!
hil: Tell them: "Name them!" Or are you informing Him about what He does not know on Earth, or are these just empty words?!
compare: Say: "Name them!" Or are you informing Him about what He does not know on Earth, or are these just empty words?!

src: Sie sagten: "Wer hat dies mit unseren Göttern getan? Er gehört wahrlich zu den Ungerechten."
ref: They said: who hath wrought this to our gods? verily he is of the wrong-doers.
draft: They said, "Who has done this with our gods? He truly belongs to the unrighteous."
hil: They said, 'Who has done this with our gods? He truly belongs to the unjust.'
compare: They said, "Who has done this with our gods? He truly belongs to the unrighteous."

src: Diese sind diejenigen, die ihrem HERRN gegenüber Kufr betrieben haben. Und diese sind es, um deren Hälse Eisenringe sein werden.
ref: They are the ones who deny their Lord, and they will have collars around their necks.
draft: These are the ones who have committed Kufr against their Lord. And these are the ones who will have iron collars around their necks.
hil: Those are they who defied their Lord. And those will be the ones who will have iron collars around their necks.
compare: These are the ones who have committed Kufr against their Lord. And these are the ones who will have iron collars around their necks.

src: So diene Mir und verrichte das Gebet zu Meinem Gedenken.
ref: So serve Me and establish Prayers to remember Me.
draft: So serve me and perform the prayer in my remembrance.
hil: So serve Me, enjoin righteousness, and forbid evil, and say the truth about Me, and perform As-Salat (Iqamat-as-Salat), and give Zakat in My remembrance.
compare: So serve me and perform the prayer in my remembrance.

src: Was ist mit diesem Buch, daß es nichts, weder klein noch groß, ausläßt, ohne es zu erfassen?»
ref: What sort of Book is this that leaves neither a small thing nor a big thing, but has recorded it with numbers!"
draft: "What is it about this book that leaves out nothing, neither small nor large, without grasping it?"
hil: "What is it about this book that it excludes nothing, neither small nor large, without grasping it?"
compare: "What is it about this book that it excludes nothing, neither small nor large, without grasping it?"

src: Und für sie ist eine andauernde Peinigung bestimmt,
ref: There is perpetual punishment for them,
draft: And an ongoing torment is destined for them.
hil: And for them is an enduring torment destined.
compare: And an ongoing torment is destined for them.

src: Das ist eine Ermahnung für dich und dein Volk. Und ihr werdet zur Verantwortung gezogen.
ref: And it is undoubtedly an honour for you and your people; and you will soon be questioned.
draft: This is a warning for you and your people. And you will be held accountable.
hil: "This is a warning for you and your people. And you will be held accountable. Allah will see your conduct, and (also) His apostle and the faithful; for you will in the end go back to Him, who knows the unknown and the known, who will tell you of what you were doing."
compare: This is a warning for you and your people. And you will be held accountable.

src: Das ist etwas von Allahs Huld gegen uns und gegen die Menschen. Aber die meisten Menschen sind nicht dankbar.
ref: This is among God's favours to us and to all mankind; but most men are not grateful.
draft: This is something of Allah's grace towards us and towards people. But most people are not grateful.
hil: This is something of Allah's mercy towards us and towards people. However, most people are not grateful.
compare: This is something of Allah's mercy towards us and towards people. However, most people are not grateful.

src: Und keiner von euch soll sich umdrehen.
ref: Walk behind them and let no one turn around.
draft: "And none of you should turn around."
hil: And none of you turn around.
compare: And none of you turn around.

src: Das ist eine Gemeinschaft, die dahingegangen ist. Sie erhält, was sie erworben hat, und ihr erhaltet, was ihr erworben habt.
ref: Those are a people who have passed away; theirs is that which they earned and yours that which ye earn.
draft: This is a community that has passed away. It receives what it has earned, and you receive what you have earned.
hil: This was a community that has passed away; for them is what they earned, and yours is what you earn; and you will not be questioned about their deeds.
compare: This was a community that has passed away; for them is what they earned, and yours is what you earn; and you will not be questioned about their deeds.

src: Aber die bösen Ränke umschließen nur ihre Urheber.
ref: But their evil plots will turn back on the plotters themselves.
draft: But the evil intrigues only surround their creators.
hil: But the evil plotting only surrounds its creators.
compare: But the evil plotting only surrounds its creators.

src: Er ist es, Der in Wahrheit die Himmel und die Erde erschuf; und am Tage, da Er spricht: "Sei!" wird es so sein.
ref: It is He who created the heavens and the earth with a definite purpose. The day He will say "Be, " it will be.
draft: He is the one who truly created the heavens and the earth, and on the day when he says "Be!", it will be so.
hil: He is the one who created the heavens and the earth in truth and on the day when He says 'Be!', it will be.
compare: He is the one who truly created the heavens and the earth, and on the day when he says "Be!", it will be so.

src: Doch wenn sie dich auffordern, Mir das zur Seite zu setzen, wovon du keine Kenntnis hast, dann gehorche ihnen nicht. In weltlichen Dingen aber verkehre mit ihnen auf gütige Weise.
ref: But if they (both) strive with you to make you join in worship with Me others that of which you have no knowledge, then obey them not, but behave with them in the world kindly, and follow the path of him who turns to Me in repentance and in obedience.
draft: But if they ask you to set aside for Me what you have no knowledge of, do not obey them. However, in worldly matters, associate with them kindly.
hil: But if they ask you to set aside something of which you have no knowledge for Me, do not obey them. However, in worldly matters, associate with them kindly.
compare: But if they ask you to set aside for Me what you have no knowledge of, do not obey them. However, in worldly matters, associate with them kindly.

src: Das ist es, was Er euch geboten hat, auf daß ihr es begreifen möget.
ref: These things has God enjoined on you. Haply you may understand.
draft: This is what He commanded you, so that you may understand.
hil: This is what He commanded you, that you may understand.
compare: This is what He commanded you, that you may understand.

src: Das geschah, um Schlechtigkeit und Unsittlichkeit von ihm abzuwenden.
ref: Thus it was, that We might turn away from him evil and illegal sexual intercourse.
draft: "This was done to ward off wickedness and immorality from him".
hil: "This happened in order to prevent evil and immorality from him."
compare: "This happened in order to prevent evil and immorality from him."

src: Diese sind unsere Leute, sie nahmen sich anstelle von Ihm Götter.
ref: As for these our people here, they have taken to other gods apart from Him.
draft: These are our people, they took gods instead of Him.
hil: Say, these are our people, they took gods instead of Him.
compare: These are our people, they took gods instead of Him.

src: Es steht uns nicht zu, eine Ermächtigung zu bringen - außer mit der Erlaubnis Allahs.
ref: It is not in our power to bring a miracle for you without the leave of God.
draft: "It is not up to us to bring an authorization - except with the permission of Allah."
hil: It is not for us to bring you an authority save by the leave of God; and in God let the believers put all their trust.
compare: It is not for us to bring you an authority save by the leave of God; and in God let the believers put all their trust.

src: Er sagte: "Meine Leute! Wie seht ihr es?
ref: He said: "O my people, think.
draft: He said: "My people! What do you think?"
hil: He said, "My people! What do you think?"
compare: He said: "My people! What do you think?"

src: Und die Ungläubigen werden sagen: "Unser Herr, zeige uns jene der Ginn und der Menschen, die uns irreführten, damit wir sie mit unseren Füßen treten, so daß sie zu den Niedrigsten gehören."
ref: Those who disbelieve will say: "O Lord, show us those among the jinns and men who had led us astray that we may trample them underfoot and make them wholly abject."
draft: And the unbelievers will say: "Our Lord, show us those among the jinn and mankind who misled us, that we may put them under our feet so that they will be among the lowest."
hil: "And those who disbelieve will say: "Our Lord, show us those among the jinn and mankind who misled us, that we may trample them under our feet so that they will be among the lowest.""
compare: "And those who disbelieve will say: "Our Lord, show us those among the jinn and mankind who misled us, that we may trample them under our feet so that they will be among the lowest.""

src: Aber nein, bei deinem Herrn!
ref: But no, by your Lord!
draft: But no, by your Lord!
hil: No, indeed, by your Lord!
compare: But no, by your Lord!

src: So wurde in ihren Herzen (die Zuneigung) zum Kalb wegen ihres Kufr eingeprägt.
ref: (The image of) the calf had sunk deep into their hearts on account of unbelief.
draft: So in their hearts (the affection) for the calf was imprinted because of their disbelief.
hil: So in their hearts (the affection) for the calf was imprinted because of their disbelief.
compare: So in their hearts (the affection) for the calf was imprinted because of their disbelief.

src: Und wir sind Ihm ergeben.
ref: To Him we are submitters (Muslims)'
draft: And we are devoted to Him.
hil: And we are His devotees.
compare: And we are devoted to Him.

src: So siehe wiederholt hin, siehst du irgend etwas an Rissen?!
ref: Turn your eyes again. Do you see any fissures?
draft: So look again, do you see anything about cracks?!
hil: "So look again, do you see anything about cracks?!"
compare: So look again, do you see anything about cracks?!

src: Und gebt den Frauen ihre Brautgabe als Schenkung. Und wenn sie euch gern etwas davon erlassen, so könnt ihr dies unbedenklich zum Wohlsein verbrauchen.
ref: Give to women their dowers willingly, but if they forego part of it themselves, then use it to your advantage.
draft: And give women their bridal gift as a gift. And if they willingly waive something from it, you can safely use it for your well-being.
hil: And give women their bridal gift as a gift. And if they willingly waive something from it, you can safely use it for your well-being.
compare: And give women their bridal gift as a gift. And if they willingly waive something from it, you can safely use it for your well-being.

src: Aber er kann ihnen keinen Schaden zufügen, außer mit Allahs Erlaubnis. Und auf Allah sollen sich die Gläubigen verlassen.
ref: But he cannot harm them in the least, except as Allah permits, and in Allah let the believers put their trust.
draft: But he cannot harm them except with Allah's permission. And the believers should rely on Allah.
hil: But he cannot harm them save by God's leave; and in God let the believers put all their trust.
compare: But he cannot harm them except with Allah's permission. And the believers should rely on Allah.

src: Muhammad ist nicht der Vater eines eurer Männer, sondern der Gesandte Allahs und der letzte aller Propheten, und Allah besitzt die volle Kenntnis aller Dinge.
ref: Muhammad is not the father of any man among you, but a messenger of God, and the seal of the prophets. God has knowledge of everything.
draft: Muhammad is not the father of one of your men, but the Messenger of Allah and the last of all prophets, and Allah has full knowledge of all things.
hil: Muhammad is not the father of one of your men, but the Messenger of Allah and the last of all prophets, and Allah has full knowledge of all things.
compare: Muhammad is not the father of one of your men, but the Messenger of Allah and the last of all prophets, and Allah has full knowledge of all things.

src: Denn ER ist mir gegenüber immer großzügig gewesen.
ref: He has been gracious to me.
draft: Because he has always been generous to me.
hil: For HE has always been generous towards me.
compare: Because he has always been generous to me.

src: "So halte sie fest und befiel deinem Volk, sich an das Schönste in ihnen zu halten!
ref: “Hold fast to them, and exhort your people to adopt the best of them.
draft: "So hold them tight and command your people to hold onto the most beautiful thing in them!"
hil: So hold them firmly and command your people to hold onto the most beautiful thing in them!
compare: So hold them firmly and command your people to hold onto the most beautiful thing in them!

src: Und wer darauf verzichtet, wird dies eine Kaffara für ihn sein.
ref: But if anyone remits the retaliation by way of charity, it shall be for him an expiation.
draft: And whoever refrains from it, this will be a Kaffara for him.
hil: "And whoever refrains from it, this will be a Kaffara for him."
compare: And whoever refrains from it, this will be a Kaffara for him.

src: Und nachdem das Beben sie erfaßt hatte, sagte er: "HERR!
ref: When they arrived they were seized by a tremor.
draft: And after the earthquake had seized them, he said, "Lord!
hil: And after the earthquake had seized them, he said, "Lord!
compare: And after the earthquake had seized them, he said, "Lord!

src: Das sind die Gefährten des Feuers, sie werden darin ewig weilen.
ref: They are the residents of Hell, and will there for ever abide.
draft: These are the companions of fire, they will dwell in it forever.
hil: These are the companions of fire, they will abide therein forever.
